Deal ID 日期 目标国家 标的公司 交易类型 买方 买方国家 卖方 交易所属行业 交易金额 USD (mn) 交易价值来源 股份 % 评论
114771 23/09/2015 墨西哥 Grupo Finclusion de Mexico SAPI de CV SOFOM ENR 收购 Te Creemos SA de CV SFP 墨西哥 Undisclosed investor(s); Creation Investments Capital Management LLC 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 100 Mexican microfinance firm Te Creemos SA de CV SFP (TC) has acquired compatriot peer Grupo Finclusion de Mexico SAPI de CV SOFOM ENR, TC's financial advisors reported. Financial terms were not disclosed. With this acquisition TC expands its credits portfolio by more than 40%, becoming the second largest independent micro finance company in Mexico. Grupo Finclusion de Mexico is a microfinance institution providing individual and group credits to SMEs in 13 Mexican states. Te Creemos provides financial services to the low-income population of Mexico. The company offers savings accounts, loans and insurance products.
112109 23/09/2015 罗马尼亚 RE Project Development SRL 收购 STRABAG SE 奥地利 　 建筑、开发及承包 (233); 建筑，工程及相关服务 (5413) 　 100 Austria's construction firm STRABAG SE announced it has acquired Romanian civil engineering project developer RE project development s.r.l., part of Austria's real estate firm Raiffeisen evolution project development GmbH. Financial terms were not disclosed. The development team of Raiffeisen evolution in Bucharest will be integrated in STRABAG s.r.l., the buyer's subsidiary in Romania, and will form a separate department. Through the acquisition STRABAG will enter the property development segment in Romania and will strengthen its position on the European project development market. The buyer also operates as a real estate developer in Austria and in Poland. STRABAG has entered the development market in 1965, and it has completed more than 450 projects, amounting a total volume of over EUR 6.0bn. Among them are famous buildings, like the Dancing Towers in Hamburg, a project which has received four real estate awards, the Milaneo in Stuttgart or currently the Astoria in Warsaw. The group employs around 73,000 people and its revenues were EUR 13.5bn in 2014. RE project development s.r.l. employs 10 people and for 2014 it had a turnover of RON 4.3mn (USD 1.08mn). Raiffeisen evolution project development GmbH develops office and commercial real estates in Austria and Eastern Europe. It was established in 2003 by Raiffeisen Holding NO-Wien, construction company STRABAG and the UNIQUA Insurance AG, which hold 20% stakes each; and Raiffeisen Central Bank (RZB) which holds the remaining 40%. The company employs 150 people. Since 2003, it has invested in a total of 919,000 m2 gross floor space worth EUR 1.2bn.
111811 23/09/2015 秘鲁 A carbon desorption plant in Peru 收购 Inca One Gold Corp 加拿大 　 非金属矿的采选 (2123) 　 　 100 Peru-focused Canadian miner Inca One Gold Corp announced the acquisition of a carbon desorption plant located in the Chala City area. Financial terms were not disclosed. Inca One Gold said that the purchase of the desorption plant provides the company with a deeper vertical integration. It will also complement the operations of its Chala One mineral processing plant, which is currently undergoing adjustments. Edward Kelly, President and CEO of Inca, commented that the carbon desorption plant, relocated on site at the Chala One mill site, will enhance the company's economic and operating efficiency. Inca One Resources is a mineral resource and ore processing company focused on Peru. It reported a net loss of CAD 4.2mn (USD 3.3mn) for FY ended 30 April 2015.
111626 23/09/2015 中国 Shanghai Zendai Bund International Finance Services Centre Real Estate Co Ltd 收购 Fosun International Ltd 香港 Shanghai Haizhimen Property Investment Management Co Ltd 建筑、开发及承包 (233); 房地产 (531) 1,330.12 (官方数据) 100 Shanghai-based diversified group Fosun said it will acquire local real estate company Shanghai Zendai Bund International Finance Services Centre Real Estate from Shanghai Haizhimen Property Investment Management for RMB 8.5bn (USD 1.3bn). Completion of the deal is subject to customary closing conditions. Fosun acts in the deal via its subsidiary Zhejiang Fosun Commerce Development Limited. The acquisition is in line with buyer's strategy to develop a real estate project named "Bund Financial Center", located in Huangpu District, Shanghai. Shanghai Zendai Bund International Finance Services Centre Real Estate engages in real estate holding and development in Shanghai. Fosun International, founded in 1992, is engaged in insurance, industrial operations, investments and assets management. The company's shares are listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. In 2014, it posted a revenue of RMB 61.7bn (USD 10bn). Fosun is controlled by Chinese billionaire Guo Guangchang.
111622 23/09/2015 中国 Digital Rainbow Holdings Ltd 收购 Private investor(s) 中国 Wealth Glory Holdings Ltd 金属和矿产品（石油除外）的批发 (4215); 化工产品的批发 (4226) 4.13 (官方数据) 100 China's noodles production and coal trading company Wealth Glory Holdings said it will sell its chemical trading subsidiary Digital Rainbow Holdings for HKD 32mn (USD 4.1mn). The buyers on the deal are private investors Mr. Lau Kan Sung Saville and Mr. Lui Ka Yin. Completion of the deal is subject to customary closing conditions. Wealth Glory Holdings acts in the deal via its subsidiary Silver Summit Investments Limited. The disposal is in line with seller's strategy to exit non-performing businesses. Digital Rainbow Holdings and its subsidiaries engage in magnetite sand concentrate trading.
111618 23/09/2015 香港 MD Inc Ltd 收购 Wealth Glory Holdings Ltd 香港 Private investor(s) 服装、服饰店 (448) 6.06 (官方数据) 100 China's noodles production and coal trading company Wealth Glory Holdings said it will acquire Hong Kong's apparel trading company MD Inc for HKD 47mn (USD 6.1mn). Sellers on the deal are private investors Mr. Lau Kan Sung Saville and Mr. Lui Ka Yin. The buyer will pay in cash and newly issued own shares. Upon completion of the deal, the vendors will hold a combined 2.54% stake in Wealth Glory Holdings' enlarged capital. The acquisition is in line with buyer's strategy to diversify its existing business. MD Inc focuses on the trading of bags, fashion apparels and accessories in Hong Kong and other Asia markets. Completion of the deal is subject to various conditions precedent. Wealth Glory Holdings is engaged in the manufacture and sale of fresh and dried noodles, as well as coal trading. In fiscal year ending 31 March 2014, the company posted a revenue of HKD 316.6mn (USD 40.9mn).
111520 23/09/2015 西班牙 Marques del Atrio 少数股权购买 Yantai Changyu Pioneer Wine Co Ltd 中国 　 葡萄酒制造 (31213) 　 　 　 Chinese wine producer Yantai Changyu Pioneer Wine Co Ltd announced that it will acquire Spanish peer Marques del Atrio. The transaction details were not disclosed. The acquisition is in line with buyer's goal to expand its operations abroad as well as to introduce Spanish wine products in China. According to Mr. Wei, a senior analyst at Shanghai-based Guotai Junan Securities Co Ltd, Changyu Pioneer Wine's overseas annual capacity will reach 20,000 tons upon the completion of the transaction. Changyu Pioneer Wine has acquired a France-based Roullet-Fransac Cognac in 2013. Founded in 2003, Marques del Atrio produces high quality wines which will be exported worldwide. The company has sold its products to over 40 countries. Yantai Changyu Pioneer Wine Co Ltd manufactures and sells wine and alcoholic beverages such as wine, brandy and healthy liquor. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and generated revenues of CNY 4.1bn (USD 668.4mn) in 2014.
111510 23/09/2015 巴林 Investcorp Bank BSC 少数股权购买 Gulf-based institutional shareholder 中东北非 　 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 137.8 (官方数据) 9.9 An undisclosed Gulf-based institutional shareholder has acquired a 9.95 stake in Bahrain-based investment firm Investcorp for USD 137.8mn, the target company reported in market filings to the stock exchange. Investcorp was established in 1982. The company is mainly active in corporate, real estate and technology investment, as well as hedge funds management. It has offices in New York, London, Bahrain, Abu Dhabi and Riyadh. Investcorp is listed on the Bahrain stock exchange and has USD 10bn in assets under management. Its real estate group had approximately USD 1.4bn in assets under management.
111364 23/09/2015 日本 Kirarito Ginza building in Tokyo 收购 State Oil Fund of Azerbaijan (SOFAZ) 阿塞拜疆 　 房地产 (531) 435.13 (官方数据) 100 The State Oil Fund of Azerbaijan (SOFAZ) announced that it has acquired the Kirarito Ginza building in Tokyo for JPY 52.3bn (USD 435.1mn). On the sell side was a special purpose vehicle called GK John. The purchase is the first of its kind for SOFAZ in Japan's real estate market. Kirarito Ginza is located in Chou Avenue, Ginza, a prime retail location in Tokyo, Japan. The retail building opened doors in 2014 and is one of the very few trophy assets recently completed in the Ginza area. Kirarito Ginza has gross floor area of approximately 15,647 square meters and is currently let to 47 tenants. The State Oil Fund of Azerbaijan acts as a sovereign wealth fund that manages the oil & gas revenues of the country. The fund invests in gold, real estate and equities worldwide. The total assets under the fund's management were USD 35bn as of 01 July 2015. Note: The MVE/Area multiple is based on the gross floor area of Kirarito Ginza of 15,647 square meters.
111352 23/09/2015 印度 Juggernaut 少数股权购买 William Bissell - private investor; Neeraj Aggarwal - private investor; Nandan Nilekani - private investor 美国; 印度 　 报纸、期刊、图书和字典的出版 (5111); 互联网出版与传播 (516) 2.28 (官方数据) 　 India-based publisher Juggernaut has raised INR 150mn (USD 2.3mn) in a seed funding round from private investors Nandan Nilekani, Neeraj Aggarwal, and William Bessel, Livemint reported. The target aims to tap into the Indian e-book market and is aimed to start operations in April 2016. Juggernaut is a publishing firm that publishes physical and internet-based books. The firm aims to have a wider digital library as compared to its physical publications and publish 50 books annually. Juggernaut was founded in 2015
111292 23/09/2015 荷兰 IJS Global 收购 Russian Railways (RZhD); GEFCO SA 俄罗斯; 法国 Nimbus BV 交通运输及物流仓储 (48); 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 　 100 French logistics integrator GEFCO, controlled by Russian state-run railway operator Russian Railways, acquired Dutch peer IJS Global, the buyer and the target announced in separate statements. The deal value was not disclosed. The completion of the transaction is subject to customary conditions preceding. The acquisition will enhance GEFCO’s expertise in air and sea freight transportation, as well as expand its geographic coverage with markets such as China, South-East Asia, Australia and the U.S.A. GEFCO will also gain stronger foothold in markets such as the United Kingdom, the Netherlands and Germany. In addition, GEFCO will increase its client portfolio in the fields of pharmaceuticals, high-tech products, fashion, oil and gas, aerospace and humanitarian relief. The takeover is in line with GEFCO’s and IJS Global’s growth strategies. Sjoerd Van Loon, the current CEO of IJS Global, will manage the overseas freight forwarding operations of GEFCO once the deal is completed. IJS Global was set up in 2004 and employs 500 people. The company provides multi-modal freight forwarding services by air, water and road, as well as storage, customs, tax representation, integrated co-ordination, supply chain organisation and other logistic support activities. IJS Global operates in 16 countries worldwide. In 2014, the company generated EUR 160mn (USD 212.6mn) in turnover. GEFCO is an international logistics operator and among the top 10 in Europe with EUR 4.1bn (USD 5.45bn) in sales. The company has 41 subsidiaries on five continents. GEFCO is 75%-owned by Russian state-owned railway operator Russian Railways and the remainder belongs to French car-maker PSA Peugeot Citroen.
111314 23/09/2015 印度; 美国 Quintype Inc 少数股权购买 Raghav Bahl - private investor 印度 　 互联网出版与传播 (516); 定制电脑编程服务 (541511) 3.25 (官方数据) 　 India and U.S-based content publishing platform Quintype Inc, has raised USD 3.2mn from private investor Raghav Bahl, VCCircle reported. The funding raised expand its product engineering and sales teams in its California and Bangalore. Quintype is a data analytics and content publishing platform that offers SaaS big-data analytics, content optimisation, audience development and engagement, and monetisation services. It is based in California and Bangalore and was founded 2014.
111313 23/09/2015 印度 SilverEdge Technologies Pvt Ltd 少数股权购买 IDG Ventures India; M&S Partners Pte Ltd; 500 Startups 印度; 新加坡; 美国 　 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518); 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 1.25 (官方数据) 　 India-based advertising analytics firm SilverEdge Technologies Pvt Ltd, has raised INR 82mn (USD 1.2mn) from M&S Partners, The Economic Times reported. Existing investors 500 Startups and IDG Venture India also invested in the round. The funding raised will be used to launch its PRISM TV advertising analytics platform. SilverEdge Technologies is an advertising analytics firm which offers products covering mobile and TV advertisements. Its clients include McDonald's, Nestle, Royal bank of Scotland and Kellogg's. It was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Gurgaon and California. M&S Partners Pte Ltd is a Singapore-based financial advisory services and investment services. It mainly focuses on seed and early stage firms. IDG Ventures India is a venture capital company which focuses on investing in Indian technology firms such as Myntra, Ozone Media and Yatra. IDG Ventures has presence in 10 offices across Asia and North America and manages a portfolio of more than 200 companies worth over USD 4bn.
111301 23/09/2015 拉脱维亚; 立陶宛 Retail banking business of Danske Bank in Lithuania and Latvia 收购 Swedbank AB 瑞典 Danske Bank A/S 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 100 Swedish lender Swedbank announced that it has signed an agreement to acquire Danske Bank's retail banking business in Lithuania and Latvia. The deal value is confidential. The transaction is subject to approval by competition regulators in relevant countries and is expected to close in Q1 2016. The business includes 120,000 private customers in Lithuania with approximately EUR 525mn of loans and 7,000 private customers in Latvia with approximately EUR 116mn of loans. Swedbank is a leading Nordic-Baltic banking group, operating some 304 branches in Sweden and over 154 branches in the Baltic states. It has eight million private customers and more than 600,000 corporate and organisational customers. The group is also present in the US, China, Luxembourg and South Africa. Danske Bank is the largest bank in Denmark and one of the leading financial enterprises in northern Europe. The lender has 3.6 million customers and operates in 15 countries. It employs 19,000 people in 329 branches.
111298 23/09/2015 哥伦比亚 Onest Colombia SAS 收购 Linzor Capital Partners LP 智利 　 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 39.55 (市场估计) 85 Chile-based, Latin America-focused asset manager Linzor Capital Partners LP has acquired an 85% stake in Colombian loan origination company Onest Colombia SAS via a capital increase for COP 120bn (approximately USD 40mn), Linzor Capital announced cited by local media. With this acquisition Onest Colombia is expected to expand and improve its products offering. Onest, which operates via Originar Soluciones SAS and Expocredit Colombia SAS, offers credit origination services. Currently, the company has 20,000 clients across the country and annual loan origination capacity exceeding COP 375bn (USD 123.6mn). Linzor Capital Partners is one of the major middle market private equity firms in Latin America. The company's investment focus falls on Mexico, Colombia, Chile, and Argentina and covers various industries. Currently, it manages over USD 700mn in assets under management, and since its inception in 2006 it has raised more than USD 1.2bn of capital commitments.
111255 23/09/2015 俄罗斯 Easy Pack Russia 收购 Integer.pl SA 波兰 QIWI Group 邮政服务 (491) 　 　 5 Polish postal operator Integer.pl has acquired a 5% stake in its Russian subsidiary - postal terminals operator Easy Pack Russia (brand Qiwi Post) from local alternative payment services provider QIWI Group, Kommersant daily reported. The amount of the transaction was not specified. As a result of the deal, QIWI Group completely exited the list of shareholders, keeping only the licence agreement for the QIWI Post brand as well as the web portal www.qiwipost.ru. Integer.pl concentrated 90% in Easy Pack Russia upon the acquisition. Venture fund iTech Capital retained its 10% ownership. Integer.pl plans to further develop its Inpost brand locally along with the QIWI Post brand. Qiwi Post was founded in 2011. The company develops a network of terminals for automated delivery in which customers of e-commerce companies can receive and pay for their orders. Qiwi Post cooperates with more than 200 major online stores in Russia such as Ozon, MediaMarkt, Yulmart, Avon, Oriflame, Amway and others. Currently, the company operates 380 service machines in 25 federal regions. Integer.pl provides innovative postal-courier solutions and e-commerce services. The company operates based on its own network of branches and Customer Service Centres, as well as own postmen provided by its subsidiary InPost. In addition, the company provides financial and insurance services, and parcel services based on a network of automatic parcel machines. In Poland, the automatic 24/7 parcel service project is managed by the company InPost Paczkomaty, while internationally the service is managed by the company easyPack, established by Integer.pl and PineBridge Investments, a global private equity fund.
111276 23/09/2015 南非 Hansen Transmissions South Africa (Pty) Ltd (Hansen SA) 收购 Invicta Holdings Ltd 南非 Sumitomo Group 内燃机、汽轮机、传动设备的制造 (3336) 　 　 　 South African investment holding company Invicta Holdings announced the acquisition of local industrial gearbox units (IGUs) producer Hansen South Africa for an undisclosed amount. The seller is Hansen Industrial Transmissions NV, a member of Japanese keiretsu Sumitomo Group. Invicta said that the purchase provides its subsidiary Bearing Man Group (BMG) with assembly and distribution rights for all Sumitomo and Hansen branded IGUs throughout Africa, mostly on an exclusive basis. Invicta added that the integration of Hansen SA's business into BMG's existing electromechanical drives division moves BMG into a position of market leadership in this product segment across Africa. Hansen SA assembles and distributes IGUs under the Sumitomo and Hansen brands and has an installed base of over 10,000 IGUs in South Africa. Invicta Holdings was founded in 1989 and is an investment holding and management company focused on investments in distributors of capital equipment, spare parts and engineering consumables. The company is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and booked ZAR 10.5bn (USD 946.6mn) revenues in its FY ended 31 March 2015.
111262 23/09/2015 印度 Elitecore Technologies Pvt Ltd 收购 Sterlite Technologies Ltd 印度 First Carlyle Ventures Mauritius; Seller(s) unknown 软件出版 (5112); 定制电脑编程服务 (541511) 26.99 (DW 估计) 100 Indian cable and conductor manufacturer Sterlite Technologies Ltd has entered into definitive agreements with the Carlyle Group other stake holders of Elitecore Technologies Pvt Ltd to acquire the latter for an estimated consideration of INR 2bn (USD 30.6mn), the target and buyer announced. The acquisition expands Sterlite's telecom portfolio to include software solutions and will expand its client base. The deal is subject to regulatory and statutory conditions. Elitecore Technologies is a telecommunications software solutions and services provider that offers billing, public branch exchange and session management products. The firm was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Ahmenabad with offices across India, Mauritius and U.A.E. Elite core reported total revenues of INR 1.3bn (USD 22.3mn) for FY ended 31 March, 2014. Sterlite Technologies is an International India-based cable manufacturer which produces high voltage data, power transmission and optical fibre lines. It is listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and the National Stock Exchange of India (NSE). Sterlite reported a consolidated net loss of INR 26.4mn (USD 421,195) for FY ended 31 March, 2015. Note: The deal value was assumed to be equal to the reported enterprise value.
111265 23/09/2015 中国 Beijing Zhongcheng Huitong Telecommunications Technology Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Tiantu Capital Co Ltd; Hillhouse Capital Group; Sequoia Capital 中国; 美国 　 软件出版 (5112) 70 (市场估计) 　 Beijing-based online community services O2O (online-to-office) platform Beijing Zhongcheng Huitong Telecommunications Technology Co Ltd, operator of Beequick, has secured USD 70mn from its series C round of financing led by Hillhouse Capital, China Money Network reported. Venture capital firms Tiantu Capital and Sequoia Capital also joined the funding. Investment proceeds of the transaction will be used for market expansion and investments in logistics infrastructure. In January, Beequick has received USD 20mn from Sequoia Capital and Hillhouse Capital from its series B round of funding. Founded in 2014, Beequick operates as an end-service for fast-paced consumer industry. The company guarantees consumers with one-hour delivery of fresh consumer products from convenient stores. Hillhouse Capital is a private equity fund that invests in consumers, media, industrial and technology related sectors.
111219 23/09/2015 印度尼西亚 Wailawi Oil and Gas Project 收购 Enhanced Oil & Gas Recovery Ltd 澳大利亚 Vibrant Link Sdn Bhd; KEH Industrial Park Sdn Bhd; Union Pacific Trading Pty Ltd 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 9.1 (官方数据) 85 Australia-based Enhanced Oil & Gas Recovery Ltd announced that it will acquire an 85% stake in the Wailawi Oil and Gas Project located in East Kalimantan, Indonesia for AUD 12.8mn (USD 9.1mn). Under the terms of the deal, the buyer will acquire the total capital of Centre Energy Petroleum which in turn hold an 85% interest in the target. The sellers on the transaction are Vibrant Link Sdn Bhd, KEH Industrial Park Sdn Bhd and Union Pacific Trading Pty Ltd. The acquisition is in line with the plan of the buyer to transition its business activities to oil and gas exploration and extraction. Enhanced Oil & Gas Recovery, formerly known as Artist & Entertainment Group Ltd, is currently transition to become and oil gas company form its previous mining activities. The company incurred a net loss of AUD 800,000 (USD 612,432) for FY ended 30 June 2015.
117833 22/09/2015 津巴布维 Seven supermarkets in Zimbabwe 收购 Choppies Enterprises Ltd 博茨瓦纳 　 超市和食品杂货店 (4451) 　 　 100 Botswanian supermarket chain Choppies disclosed in its financial report for the year ended 30 June 2015 that it has acquired seven supermarkets in Zimbabwe. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. The company now has 20 stores in the country. Choppies is an Africa-focused supermarket chain and it operated a total of 129 stores across the continent at the end of June 2015. The company is listed on the Botswana Stock Exchange and the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and it booked BWP 5.95bn (USD 621.9mn) revenues in its FY ended 30 June 2015.
111939 22/09/2015 开曼群岛; 中国 CPT Wyndham Holdings Ltd 收购 Shenzhen Energy Group Co Ltd 中国 CPI Ballpark Investments Ltd; NewQuest Asia Fund I LP; NewQuest Asia Investments II Ltd; China Environment Fund III LP 水电发电 (221111) 492.6 (官方数据) 100 Shenzhen-listed Shenzhen Energy Group Co Ltd announced that it will acquire Cayman-based CPT Wyndham Holdings Ltd for a total consideration of USD 492.6mn. Sellers in the deal are investment vehicles CPI Ballpark Investments Ltd, NewQuest Asia Fund I LP, NewQuest Asia Investments II Ltd and China Environment Fund III LP. The transaction will be satisfied through its wholly owned subsidiary Sunon (Hongkong) International Co Ltd. The buyer also agreed that it will assume the target company's debt worth USD 50mn. The acquisition will expand the buyer's installed capacity of hydropower and hydropower resources. CPT Wyndham Holdings Ltd operates 25 hydropower stations with a total installed capacity of 505,800 kilowatts. The company recorded revenues of USD 88.5mn in 2014. Shenzhen Energy Group Co Ltd generates electric power and operates gas turbine, wind, photovoltaic, hydropower and waste incineration power plants. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 12bn (USD 2bn) in 2014.
111399 22/09/2015 以色列 Ahava Dead Sea Laboratories Ltd 收购 Fosun International Ltd 香港 B Gaon Holdings Ltd 化妆品，美容用品，香水店 (44612) 76.24 (市场估计) 　 Chinese conglomerate and investment company Fosun International Ltd will acquire a 51% stake in Israel-based skin care company Ahava Dead Sea Laboratories Ltd for ILS 300mn (USD 76.2mn). The seller on the deal is pipeline and metal valves manufacturer B Gaon Holdings Ltd. The acquisition is in line with buyer's efforts to penetrate the cosmetics market in China. B Gaon Holdings Ltd sells and trades pipelines and metal valves which are used in water and sewage, industrial plants, agriculture, water treatment and desalination facilities on Israel. The company is listed on the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange and posted revenues of ILS 410.7mn (USD 105.1mn) in 2014. Ahava Dead Sea Laboratories Ltd manufactures and sells skincare cosmetic products made from Dead Sea minerals and mud. The company generated revenues of ILS 183 million (USD 46.8mn) in 2014. Founded in 1992, Fosun International operates diversified business wherein it specialises in insurance, industrial operations, investments and assets management. The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and reported revenues of CNY 61.7bn (USD 10bn) in 2014.
111372 22/09/2015 印度 Zapak Digital Entertainment Ltd 少数股权购买 Lead Eastern Investment Co Ltd 中国 　 软件出版 (5112) 15 (官方数据) 10 Indian games and applications developer Zapak Digital Entertainment Ltd has entered into an agreement to divest a 10% stake to China-based diversified media company Lead Eastern Investment Co Ltd, The Economic Times reported. The transaction is subject to regulatory approval and values the target company at USD 150mn. Zapak Digital Entertainment is an Indian game publishing company that offers web and mobile-based games. The firm has 8 million registered users and offers more than 1,200 games from partners such as Playfish, Popcap, Boonty and Oberon among others. Lead Eastern Co is a Chinese holding company with business units in video production, television and radio broadcasting, content creation and media distribution. It is listed in the Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Exchange.
111367 22/09/2015 乌克兰 CTPark Lviv 收购 CTP Invest spol sro 捷克共和国 　 房地产 (531) 　 　 100 Czech-based commercial real estate developer said it acquired a business park in Lviv. The financial terms of the deal, and the seller on the deal were not disclosed. The new park will be named CTPark Lviv. The acquisition is in line with buyer's strategy to invest and establish new parks in strategic locations, such as Lviv. CTPark Lviv will be developed on a 23 hectares plot, in the north-west part of Lviv. The future clients of the park are expected to be from different industries, with focus on high-tech production, logistics, automotive, engineering. CTP, founded in 1998, is a real estate developer and property manager focused on markets in Central Eastern Europe. The company's portfolio consists of premium industrial, office, retail and mixed-use properties with over 2.5 million square meters of leasable space. CTP employs over 140 people.
111359 22/09/2015 新加坡; 南非; 澳大利亚 Link Healthcare 收购 Clinigen Group plc 英国 　 医药制造 (3254); 药品和医疗器具的批发 (4222) 69.09 (官方数据) 100 British pharmaceutical company Clinigen Group announced that it has agreed to acquire Asia and Africa-focused peer Link Healthcare for GBP 44.5mn (USD 69.1mn) in cash and shares. The sum of the deal will be settled through the payment of GBP 22.25mn (USD 34.54mn) in cash and the issue of 3,102,558 new Clinigen shares. The purchase consideration can increase to up to GBP 100mn (USD 155.3mn) based on the achievement of certain milestones in the years ending 30 June 2016 and 2017. Clinigen said that the purchase will significantly strengthen its global footprint and position in the Asia, Africa and Australasia (AAA) region. Link founder John Bacon will be joining Clinigen's board as a non-executive director. Link Healthcare provides distribution infrastructure, pharmacovigilance, quality control, medical information and sales/marketing in local markets for its own products, partnered products, and sourced products where there is a local demand. The company's key hubs are located in Singapore, South Africa and Australia. Link generated revenue of GBP 31.6mn (USD 51mn) and EBITDA of GBP 4.2mn (USD 6.8mn) in the year ended 31 March 2015. Clinigen Group is a specialty pharmaceutical and services company focused on three segments, namely clinical trial supply, specialty pharmaceuticals and global access programmes. The company is listed on the London Stock Exchange and had a market capitalisation of GBP 806.4mn (USD 1.23bn) on 25 September 2015.
111299 22/09/2015 香港 Winfoong International Limited 收购 HK Guoxin Investment Group Limited 香港 Hong Fok Corporation Ltd 房地产 (531) 77.16 (官方数据) 62.61 Singapore-listed property investment company Hong Fok Corporation Ltd said it will sell a 62.61% stake in Hong Kong's real estate company Winfoong International Limited to Hong Kong investment holding company HK Guoxin Investment Group Limited for HKD 598.02mn (USD 77.1mn). The deal is subject to certain closing conditions. Thus, HK Guoxin Investment Group will acquire a total of 1,652,910,365 Winfoong ordinary shares at HKD 0.3618 (USD 0.0466) apiece. The price per each sold share represents a premium of around 22.6% over the closing price of HKD 0.295 (USD 0.038) as at 27 March 2015, the last trading day of Winfoong on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. First, Hong Fok Corporation (Cayman) Limited and Hong Fok Corporation (H.K.) Limited, wholly-owned subsidiaries of Hong Fok Corp, have agreed to sell a 38.79% stake in the target. Secondly, First Strategy Investments Limited, a wholly owned subsidiary of Hong Fok Land International Limited, which in turn is an associated company of Hong Fok Corp, has agreed to sell a 23.81% stake in the target. Winfoong International Limited is engaged in property related businesses, the provision of horticultural services and securities trading business. Winfoong is a company incorporated in Bermuda. For 2014, it reported a turnover of HKD 5.35mn (USD 0.7mn). Hong Fok Corp, incorporated in 1967, is an investment holding company whose principal activities consist of property investment, property development, property management, and investment trading. It operates in Singapore and Hong Kong and for 2014, it reported revenues of SGD 98.0mn (USD 69.6mn).
111295 22/09/2015 智利 Grupo Empresas Navieras SA (GEN) 少数股权购买 Banco BTG Pactual SA 巴西 Grupo Bethia 水上运输业 (483); 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 21.58 (官方数据) 14.7246 Brazilian investment bank Banco BTG Pactual SA acquired 14.72% of Chilean shipping services provider Grupo Empresas Navieras SA (GEN) from Chilean conglomerate Grupo Bethia in an auction which took place on the Santiago Stock Exchange. BTG purchased 1,017,449,607 shares at an unitary price of CLP 14.5 (USD 0.0212), bringing the deal value at 14.75bn (USD 21.6mn). Following this operation, Grupo Bethia, which acted via its investment subsidiary Axxion SA, no longer holds any interest in the target. Further deal details were not revealed. Grupo Empresas Navieras is engaged in the provision of water transportation, ship agency, cargo, and sea and air transport operation services. The company is also involved in the land and afloat equipment, ground transportation, as well as storage and distribution of cargo. It reported sales revenues of USD 680.75mn and net income of USD 11.61mn for 2014. BTG Pactual is a leading provider of investment banking, asset and wealth management services in Brazil. The group has an international investment and distribution platform covering Latin America, the United States, the United Kingdom, Singapore and Hong Kong. It posted total revenues of BRL 4.87bn (USD 1.16bn) and net income of BRL 3.41bn (USD 810mn) for 2014. Grupo Bethia is a Chilean conglomerate which invests and manages a group of own businesses in the retail, real estate, health, agriculture, wine, communications and transportation industries.
111278 22/09/2015 荷兰 Joint venture of LANXESS and Saudi Aramco 合资企业 Saudi Aramco; LANXESS AG 沙特阿拉伯; 德国 　 橡胶制品的制造 (3262) 1,351.97 (官方数据) 50 German plastic and rubber product manufacturer LANXESS announced that it has signed an agreement to create a 50:50 joint venture with Saudi Arabian national petroleum and natural gas firm Saudi Aramco. The joint venture is valued at an enterprise value EUR 2.75bn (USD 3.1bn). It will be managed by newly created company headquartered in Netherlands. Under the terms of the agreement, Saudi Aramco's subsidiary Aramco Overseas will pay EUR 1.2bn (USD 1.35bn) after deducting debt and other financial liabilities for a 50% stake in the JV. LANXESS will contribute its synthetic rubber business - Tire & Specialty Rubbers (TSR) and the High Performance Elastomers (HPE), which comprises 20 production facilities in nine countries and has 3,700 employees. In 2014, the business generated approximately EUR 3bn in revenues. The transaction is subject to regulatory approvals and is expected to close in Q1 2016. LANXESS will use around EUR 400mn of the proceeds from the transaction to invest in the growth of the well-positioned and less cyclical segments Advanced Intermediates and Performance Chemicals. Another EUR 400mn will be used for debt reduction, and around EUR 200mn will be spent on a share buy-back program. Saudi Aramco is a fully integrated global petroleum enterprise that exports crude oil and natural gas liquids in addition to producing natural gas. The company managed proven conventional crude oil and condensate reserves of 261.1 billion barrels in 2014. Its daily crude production was 9.54 million barrels per day, while its total oil production for 2014 was 294 trillion standard cubic feet. Saudi Aramco has 61,000 employees in 77 countries. LANXESS is engaged in the development, manufacturing and marketing of plastics, rubber, intermediates and specialty chemicals. The company employs 16,300 people in 29 countries. It recorded revenues of EUR 8bn and a net income of EUR 47mn in 2014. Note: The valuation multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis and using the 2014 revenues of LANXESS's synthetic rubber business.
111253 22/09/2015 乌克兰; 美国 Allset Technologies Inc 少数股权购买 Alexandr Chernyak - private investor; SMRK VC Fund 乌克兰 　 软件出版 (5112) 1.5 (官方数据) 　 Ukrainian venture capital fund SMRK VC Fund and local private investor Alexandr Chernyak have invested USD 1.5mn in U.S.-based company with Ukrainian roots Allset Technologies Inc, a developer of application for restaurant booking and lunchtime services, the target announced. The company will use the funds for expansion of its U.S. operations, marketing purposes and hiring of personnel, Firrma.ru reported. Allser was set up by the Ukrainian founders of the Settle service. The application allows people to pre-book, pre-order and pre-pay in restaurants. It is dedicated to busy diners. SMRK VC Fund focuses on investment in software for mobile operation systems, software for MacOS, casual/business software, offline business’ online presence, B2C services and B2B services.
111251 22/09/2015 俄罗斯 Polymetal International 少数股权购买 Otkritie Holding 俄罗斯 Sumeru Gold BV 金属矿的开采 (2122) 232 (官方数据) 7.4 Russian gold producer Polymetal International has bought back 7.4% of its shares for USD 300mn from company Sumeru Gold BV of Kazakh businessman Timur Kulibaev under an earlier put option agreement between the companies, Polymetal announced. Simultaneously, Russian financial corporation Otkritie Holding purchased the stake from Polymetal for USD 232mn. The settlement of the put option was included in an earlier transaction when Polymetal agreed to acquire the Kyzyl gold project in Kazakhstan from Sumeru Gold in May 2014. Then Polymetal had to issue 31,347,078 new ordinary shares worth USD 300mn along with the consideration payable for the deposit. Sumeru received a put option to require Polymetal to acquire or procure acquirers for the issued shares during the one-month period commencing 4 September 2015 at a price equal to USD 9.57 per share. The consideration payable by Otkritie to Polymetal represents the average closing price of Polymetal shares for the period being one month ended five business days before the date of signing the agreement, i.e. USD 7.41 per share. Polymetal settled the difference of USD 68mn to USD 300mn from its free cash flow. Thus the company ensured its stable balance sheet position and the regular payment of dividends. Under the current contract, Otkritie Holding pledged not to dispose of any interest in 90% of the shares purchased for a lock-up period of six months. Jersey-registered Polymetal International is a leading Russian silver, gold and copper producer. The company also has operations in Kazakhstan. Company's shares are listed on the London and Moscow stock exchanges. Otkritie is a full-service financial corporation offering retail, corporate and institutional clients a wide range of banking, investment, insurance and pension plan solutions. It has over 22,000 employees and provides services to 186,000 corporate and some 4 million private clients, according to the company's website.

The completion of the transaction is subject to satisfaction of closing conditions. The acquisition will be carried out through the purchase of 100% of M. Demajo Port Ventures Ltd. (MDPV), the company which owns the stake. Upon completion, Global Liman will control 63.95% of VSP. Earlier in September 2015, Global Yatirim said that Global Liman will acquire 30.79% of VSP for an undisclosed price. VCP won in 2012 an international tender to operate the cruise port in Valletta for 65 years. It also holds the rights to use the adjacent building and commercial areas of 48,000 m2 and owns 90% of duty-free shop operator Travel Shopping Ltd. The company expects to service 650,000 cruise passengers in 2015. Global Liman is engaged in port operations in Turkey and abroad, including in Spain, Singapore, Albania, Montenegro and Portugal. Global Yatirim has interests in energy, sea port operations, property development and financial services. It posted revenues of TRY 337mn (USD 154.1mn) for 2014.

The round was also participated by Dexter Capital Advisors, YourNest Angel Fund and Globevestor. The capital raised will be used to upgrade its current technology and hire new talent. Bestdealfinance.com is a financial services and products aggregator that offers credit cards, loans and balance transfer services. It claims to have 9,400 registered users and has disbursed over INR 1.5bn from over 40 partner financial institution. Kalaari Capital is an Indian advisory, consultancy and venture capital firm focused on local technology-based start-ups. Its portfolio includes Snapdeal.com, Robosoft Technologies and Urban Ladder among others.

Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. The transaction is subject to approval by Polish competition regulator UOKiK. CHIC Group operates under brand eSmoking World. It sells its products under brands VOLISH, P1, Provog, Cottien, LiQueen and Aromativ. The company has 800 points of sale in Poland, e-liquids production facility and research and development centre (eSmoking Institute). BAT, founded in 1902 and headquartered in London, is the world's second largest quoted tobacco group by global market share, with brands sold in more than 200 markets. It has over 200 brands in its portfolio, including Dunhill, Kent, Lucky Strike, Pall Mall and Rothmans. The company employs over 57,000 people and it posted revenues of GBP 42.5bn (USD 23.03bn), and a net profit of GBP 3.4bn (USD 5.6bn) in 2014. BAT is listed on the London Stock Exchange, on NYSE and on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange.
111226 22/09/2015 美国 CloudFlare Inc 少数股权购买 Microsoft Corp; Google Capital; Qualcomm Ventures; Fidelity Management and Research Co; Baidu Inc 美国; 中国 　 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518) 110 (官方数据) 　 U.S.-based internet performance and security firm CloudFlare Inc announced that it has raised USD 110mn in its latest round of funding led by U.S.-based investment firm Fidelity Management and Research Co. The funding also saw the participation of American multinational technology company Microsoft Corp, Google's venture capital firm Google Capital, Qualcomm Ventures and NASDAQ-listed Chinese internet giant Baidu Inc. CloudFlare company has raised a total of USD 182mn from all of its funding rounds to date. Proceeds from the funding will be used for the target company's growth and international market expansion purposes, and to extend its product range. CloudFlare Inc, founded in 2009, provides website protection solutions. The company offers the CloudFlare content delivery network, along with products CloudFlare Optimizer, CloudFlare Security and CloudFlare Analytics. Fidelity Management and Research Co operates as a multinational financial services company. It is one of the world's largest mutual fund and financial services group with over USD 2,063bn of assets under management as of 31 March 2015. Google Capital, founded in 2013, invests in growth stage technology companies and is financed by NASDAQ-listed internet technology giant Google Inc. Qualcomm Ventures invests in early-stage high-technology companies. The company operates as the investment arm of NASDAQ-listed Qualcomm Inc. Baidu Inc is the operator of a Chinese internet search services that includes news, images and information. The company also designs and delivers online marketing services to small and medium enterprises on its website Baidu.com. Baidu Inc is listed on the NASDAQ Stock Exchange and booked revenues of CNY 49bn (USD 8bn) in 2014.

Through the deal, Corum has entered the Slovenian market and has expended its presence in seven European countries, after adding the Netherlands to its diversified portfolio in the first half of 2015. SCPI Corum Convictions was created in 2012 with the aim to invest in real-estate assets all over Eurozone. As of end-2014, the fund is already invested in France, Portugal, Spain, Germany and Belgium. By the end of 2015, Corum Convictions has targeted to reach a portfolio of EUR 450mn. The fund is managed by Corum Asset Management (Corum AM), which is a new player in the European real estate market. Corum AM, founded in 2011, had real-estate assets under management of EUR 600mn as at end-April 2015.

This investment will allow DiGiFi Korea to enter the communication markets in Middle East, Africa and Central Asia. Founded in 2014, DiGiFi Korea has developed an antenna for satellite communication that enables worldwide Internet access. 111426 21/09/2015 墨西哥 ICA Operadora de Vias Terrestres SAPI de CV (ICA OVT) 少数股权购买 CKD Infraestructura Mexico SA de CV (CKD IM) 墨西哥 Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec (CDPQ) 公用基础设施建筑 (2341) 88.65 (市场估计) 24.01 Canadian privately-owned investment manager Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec (CDPQ) announced it has agreed to sell 49% of its 49% shareholding, or 24.01%, in the Mexican infrastructure and construction company ICA Operadora de Vias Terrestres SAPI de CV (ICA OVT) to Mexican institutional investors joined under CKD Infraestructura Mexico SA de CV (CKD IM). Financial terms were not disclosed, but market sources estimate the deal value at approximately MXN 1.48bn (USD 88.7mn). CDPQ acquired a 49% stake in ICA OVT from Mexican infrastructure and construction company Empresas ICA SAB de CV back on 19 June 2015, for approximately MXN 3.01bn (then USD 197mn). Empresas ICA retained the remaining 51%. Following completion of today's deal, ICA OVT will be owned by Empresas ICA (51%), CDPQ (25%) and CKD IM (24%). Simultaneously, on 21 September 2015, CDPQ and CKD IM announced they have agreed to form a co-investment vehicle for infrastructure projects in Mexico. The new co-investment platform will invest MXN 35.1bn (USD 2.1bn) over the next five years in Mexican infrastructure projects in sectors such as energy generation (including renewable energy), transmission and distribution, transportation and public transit, and others. CDPQ, which will hold 51% in the new co-investment vehicle, will commit MXN 17.9bn (USD 1.1bn), while CKD IM will commit MXN 17.2bn (more than USD 1bn) and will hold the remaining 49%. ICA Operadora de Vias Terrestres owns concessions for four operational toll roads and highways. The four assets include the Mayab toll road, the Rioverde - Ciudad Valles highway, as well as the La Piedad bypass, and the Acapulco tunnel. CKD Infraestructura Mexico is owned by the Mexican pension fund managers XXI Banorte, SURA, Banamex, and Pensionissste, as well as by the infrastructure fund Fonadin. Combined, they own 62% of Mexico's total pension fund assets. Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec is a privately-owned funds manager with net assets of CAD 226bn (USD 185.1bn) as of 31 December 2014. CDPQ invests in private equity, infrastructure, financial markets, and real estate. Its infrastructure portfolio exceeds CAD 10bn (USD 8.2bn) in assets.
111382 21/09/2015 墨西哥 A joint venture between CDPQ and CKD IM 合资企业 Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec (CDPQ); CKD Infraestructura Mexico SA de CV (CKD IM) 加拿大; 墨西哥 　 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 　 　 　 Canadian privately-owned investment manager Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec (CDPQ) announced it has agreed to form a co-investment vehicle for infrastructure projects in Mexico with a consortium of Mexican institutional investors joined under CKD Infraestructura Mexico SA de CV (CKD IM). The new co-investment platform will invest MXN 35.1bn (USD 2.1bn) over the next five years in Mexican infrastructure projects in sectors such as energy generation (including renewable energy), transmission and distribution, transportation and public transit, and others. CDPQ, which will hold 51% in the new co-investment vehicle, will commit MXN 17.9bn (USD 1.1bn), while CKD IM will commit MXN 17.2bn (more than USD 1bn) and will hold the remaining 49%. CDPQ added that this agreement provides an ideal platform for the company and for CKD IM to take part in the expansion and modernization of Mexico's infrastructure. As part of the deal, CKD IM has agreed to acquire 49% of CDPQ's 49% shareholding, or 24.01%, in the Mexican infrastructure and construction company ICA Operadora de Vias Terrestres SAPI de CV (ICA OVT) for an estimated MXN 1.48bn (USD 88.7mn), in a transaction subject to regulatory and other approvals. CDPQ acquired the 49% stake in ICA OVT from Mexican infrastructure and construction company Empresas ICA SAB de CV back on 19 June 2015, for approximately MXN 3.01bn (then USD 197mn). Empresas ICA retained the remaining 51%. CKD Infraestructura Mexico is owned by the Mexican pension fund managers XXI Banorte, SURA, Banamex, and Pensionissste, as well as by the infrastructure fund Fonadin. Combined, they own 62% of Mexico's total pension fund assets. Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec is a privately-owned funds manager with net assets of CAD 226bn (USD 185.1bn) as of 31 December 2014. CDPQ invests in private equity, infrastructure, financial markets, and real estate. Its infrastructure portfolio exceeds CAD 10bn (USD 8.2bn) in assets.
111284 21/09/2015 澳大利亚 SembSITA Australia Pty Ltd 收购 Suez Environment SA 法国 Sembcorp Industries Ltd 废物治理 (562) 348.31 (官方数据) 40 UPDATE: On 06 November 2015, Sembcorp announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Singapore-listed diversified utility company Sembcorp Industries Ltd announced it will sell its 40% stake in solid waste management firm SembSITA Australia Pty Ltd. to its joint venture partner, France-based peer Suez Environment SA, for a total consideration of AUD 485mn (USD 348.3mn). The transaction is carried out through the divestment of 40% stake in its holding company SembSita Pacific Pte Ltd, which is the owner of the target. The deal is subject to regulatory approval in Australia and is expected to complete by Q4 2015. Post deal completion, Suez Environment SA will hold 100% stake in the target. The sale proceeds will be used by Sembcorp to invest in businesses and markets with high growth potential, in line with its focus on the energy and water sectors. The buyer is acting in the transaction through its subsidiary Suez Environment Asia. Established in 1983, SembSITA Australia Pty Limited, former Pacific Waste Management Pty Ltd., is engaged in solid waste collection, including transportation, recycling, disposal at landfills, and waste management. The company employs over 1,700 people. It operates as a subsidiary of SembSita Pacific Pte Ltd. Suez Environment SA, founded in 1858, is an utility company providing various solutions in the drinking water, wastewater treatment and waste management sectors; serving the public authorities, industrial and commercial clients worldwide. In addition, it provides technical, economic, environmental, and social consulting services. Its shares are listed on the Euronext exchanges in Paris and Brussels. The company employs around 76,700 people and it reported revenues of EUR 14.3bn in 2014. Sembcorp Industries Ltd is an energy, water, marine infrastructure, and urban properties development firm with operations in 16 countries across six continents. The group employs 8,000 and its largest shareholder is Singaporean investment company Temasek Holdings with a 49.5% stake. Sembcorp Industries had a turnover of SGD 10.9bn (USD 8.3bn) in 2014.
111277 21/09/2015 南非 Rorotika Technologies (Pty) Ltd 收购 Digitata Ltd 毛里求斯 　 软件出版 (5112); 电脑系统设计及相关服务 (5415) 　 　 Mauritius-based software developer Digidata announced the acquisition of a controlling stake in South African peer Rorotika Technologies. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. "Following years of successful collaboration, the joining of Digitata and Rorotika was a logical next step in the relationship between the two companies, and we look forward to bringing the services and products provided by Rorotika into the Digitata fold and under the Digitata brand," said Digidata CEO Ted Bartlett. Rorotika Technologies was founded in 2006 and provides development and support services for Digitata's Dynamic Tariffing System, which is a dynamic tariffing solution for voice, SMS and data. Rototica Technologies' product portfolio includes NetCM, a vendor-agnostic network configuration management solution which manages and troubleshoots all major mobile technologies (2G, 3G, LTE, Wi-Fi) and multi-domains (Core, RAN, TX). Also, the company's subsidiary Rorotika Mobile has developed a mobile gaming platform. Digidata was founded in 2008 and focuses on the development of network-based solutions for mobile network operators. The company's flagship product is the Dynamic Tariffing System. Digidata has offices in Mauritius, South Africa, New Zealand and the UAE.

Kalink and SSWL has also entered into an agreement to set up an alloy wheel plant in Gujarat. Steel Strips Wheels is an automotive steel wheels manufacturer which produces wheels for two and three wheelers, cars, utility vehicles, tractors and trucks. It has three manufacturing facilities Punjab, Chennai and Jharkhand. The firm has a total annual capacity of 17 million wheels per annum. Wheel Strip Wheel reported total revenues of INR 11.8bn (USD 177.8) for FY ended 31 March 2015. Kalink is a South Korean alloy wheel manufacturer which produces for clients such as Nissan Subaru, Volkswagen and Chrysler among others. It has 250 employees and manufacturing facilities in China and Korea. The firm was founded in 2000 and is headquartered Jeonbuk, Korea. Note: The deal stake was calculated using the target's outstanding shares and closing price of INR 347.5 (USD 5.3) as of 21 September 2015, and the reported INR 132mn (USD 2mn) investment.
111246 21/09/2015 巴西 Pipefy Marketing e Tecnologia Ltda 收购 Redpoint e.Ventures; Valor Capital Group LLC 巴西; 美国 　 软件出版 (5112); 电脑设备管理服务 (541513) 　 　 　 Brazilian business management software provider Pipefy Marketing e Tecnologia Ltda announced it has raised an undisclosed equity funding from local venture capital firm Redpoint eVentures and U.S. investment firm Valor Capital Group LLC. Alessio Alionco, CEO of Pipefy, said that the investment will be used to increase company's customers' base and to develop its technological solutions. According to Manoel Lemos, a shareholder in Redpoint, Pipefy's business has been growing steadily and has a great potential for technological innovation and development. Pipefy was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Curitiba city (Parana state, Brazil). It develops process management software for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SME) on a subscription basis. Redpoint e.Ventures was launched in 2012 in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil) and is a joint venture between U.S. private equity firms Redpoint Ventures and e.ventures (former BV Capital). The company focuses on investing in early-stage technological companies in Brazil. Valor Capital is an investment firm, specialised in growth equity and venture capital investments in Brazilian technological companies. It operates three offices in New York, San Francisco and Sao Paulo, and among its investment portfolio are Brazilian technology companies Descomplica, BoaConsulta, olook, and Baby.com.br. ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora brasileira de software de gestão empresarial Pipefy Marketing e Tecnologia Ltda anunciou que levantou um aporte de capital não revelado da local empresa de capital de risco Redpoint eVentures e da empresa de investimento norte-americana Valor Capital Group LLC. O Alessio Alionco, CEO da Pipefy, disse que o investimento será usado para aumentar a base de clientes da empresa e para aperfeiçoar a sua tecnologia. De acordo com o Manoel Lemos, acionista na Redpoint, o negócio da Pipefy revela um crescimento estável e um grande potencial de inovação e desenvolvimento tecnológico. A Pipefy foi fundada em 2014 e está sediada na cidade de Curitiba (PA, Brasil). A empresa desenvolve software de controle das atividades das Pequenas e Médias Empresas (PME) por meio de subscrição. A Redpoint e.Ventures surgiu em 2012 na cidade de São Paulo (SP, Brazil) como uma joint venture entre as empresas estadunidenses de capital privado em participações Redpoint Ventures e e.ventures (ex-BV Capital). A companhia está focada em empresas tecnológicas que estão no início das suas atividades. A Valor Capital é uma empresa de investimento especializada em investimentos em empresas tecnológicas com forte potencial de crescimento e em investimento em capital de risco no Brasil. A companhia opera escritórios em Nova Iorque, São Francisco e São Paulo e entre as suas investidas estão as empresas de tecnologia brasileiras Descomplica, BoaConsulta, olook e Baby.com.br.
111249 21/09/2015 象牙海岸 Ity gold mine and various regional exploration properties 收购 Endeavour Mining Corp 加拿大 Sawiris family 金矿和银矿的开采 (21222) 80.37 (DW 估计) 55 Canadian gold mining company Endeavour Mining Corp announced that it has reached an agreement for the acquisition of a 55% stake in the Ity gold mine in Cote d'Ivoire and various regional exploration properties from the Sawiris family. After the completion of the deal, La Mancha Holding Sarl, a gold investment company owned by the Sawiris, will be issued 177.1 million Endeavour shares, equal to 30% of the latter's enlarged capital. Based on the closing price of Endeavour's shares on the Toronto Stock Exchange of CAD 0.60 (USD 0.45) on 18 September 2015, the trading day prior to the announcement, the transaction could be worth CAD 106.3mn (USD 80.4mn). Under the deal terms, Endeavour will acquire La Mancha's indirect interest in Societe des Mines d'Ity SA, while La Mancha will contribute USD 63mn into the businesses. Also, La Mancha has expressed an in-principle commitment to invest up to USD 75mn in additional funds to support Endeavour's growth. "This transaction will immediately add to Endeavour's operating cash flow, increase our attributable Mineral reserve and resource base by 22% and 23%, respectively, while also strengthening our balance sheet and funding position to pursue further growth", said Endeavour CEO Neil Woodyer. La Mancha Group chairman Naguib Sawiris, in turn, said that he is committed to the future of Africa and the gold mining industry, and that his strategic goal is to create value with a long-term approach. The Ity gold mine is located 480 km northwest of Abidjan and had heap leach proven and probable reserves of 2.3 million tonnes at 2.4 g/t containing 173,000 ounces. In 2014, the business generated revenues of USD 100mn and EBITDA of USD 35.8mn. Endeavour Mining Corp operates four gold mines in West Africa with a annual production of close to 500,000 ounces. The company is listed on both the Toronto Stock Exchange and the Australian Securities Exchange, and had a market capitalisation of CAD 252mn (USD 190.6mn) as of 22 September 2015.
111244 21/09/2015 克罗地亚 Terminal Dunav doo 收购 Undisclosed buyer(s) 　 LukOil 仓储 (493) 　 　 100 Russian oil major Lukoil said it will sell Croatian port operator Terminal Dunav for an undisclosed amount. The buyer on the deal was not revealed. The deal is in line with Lukoil's strategy of actively selling its European assets. In 2014, Lukoil has sold its gas stations in the Czech Republic, Slovakia and Hungary. In April 2015, it has closed the transaction for the sale of Ukraine's Lukoil retail network to Austrian company AMIC Energy Management GmbH. In July 2015, Lukoil has also received permission to sell 37 gas stations in Estonia. Terminal Dunav is engaged in transshipment and storage of oil products, and is located in the city of Vukovar. The oil terminal has a total area of 30,000 m2 and it operates four gasoline/diesel storage tanks with a capacity of 8000 m3 as well as an auto-loading platform for unloading/loading of tankers. For 2014, it reported revenues of HRK 4.49mn (USD 0.65mn). Lukoil is responsible for nearly 2% of the global crude oil production, and owns about 1% of the world's proved oil reserves. Lukoil is the biggest Russian privately owned company, with over USD 144bn of revenue in 2014, according to Forbes. Lukoil holds a network of 50 fuel stations in Croatia. Lukoil ships oil products to the fuel stations of Croatia from its oil refinery plant in Italy. The company also has a contract with the Croatian JANAF pipeline company for storage of petroleum products in the port of Omisalj, where Lukoil will be able to place up to 100 thousand tons of diesel fuel.
111228 21/09/2015 波兰 Poleczki Business Park 收购 UBM Development AG 奥地利 CA Immobilien Anlagen AG 房地产 (531) 90.45 (官方数据) 50 Austrian real estate company CA Immobilien Anlagen announced that it has sold its 50% stake in Poleczki Business Park in Poland to its long-term joint venture partner, Austrian real estate developer UBM Development, for around EUR 80mn. The parties agreed to not disclose the exact deal value. The transaction is expected to close by the end of the year. Poleczki Business Park is situated at Warsaw airport. The project will consist of 16 buildings with total gross floor space of 200,000 m2. Currently, it was developed Phase I with lettable space of 45,000 m2, and Phase II with lettable space of 21,000 m2. Another office building with rentable space of 8,500 m2 is almost completed. UBM Development (formerly UBM Realitatenentwicklung) concentrates on pure real estate development and covers the entire value chain from repurposing and planning permits to design, marketing and construction management, right through to sales. The company is focused on Austria, Germany and Poland. CA Immo was established in 1987. The company specialises in acquisition, optimisation and letting of commercial investment properties. It is focused on office properties in Austria, Germany and CEE. Its shares have been listed on the Vienna Stock Exchange since 1988. As at 31 March 2015, the company's total property assets stood at EUR 3.4bn with a total rentable area of 1,548,936 m2. Note: The MVE/Area multiple is based on the aggregated area of all properties of 74,500 m2.
111216 21/09/2015 美国 Jaunt Inc 少数股权购买 Sky; China Media Capital; Axel Springer SE; ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE; Evolution Media Partners; Google Ventures; Highland Capital Partners LLC; Madison Square Garden Company; Participant Media; Redpoint e.Ventures; SVAngel; TPG Growth; Walt Disney Co 美国; 中国; 德国; 巴西 　 软件出版 (5112); 电影和录音 (512) 65 (官方数据) 　 U.S.-based technology company Jaunt Inc announced that it has completed its series C round of financing worth USD 65mn led by the Walt Disney Co, Evolution Media Partners, TPG Growth and Participant Media, and China Media Capital. The other new investor in the funding round include media companies ProSiebenSat.1 SE and Axel Springer SE, as well as The Madison Square Garden Co. The existing participating investors were Google Ventures, Highland Capital Partners LLC, Redpoint Ventures, Sky and SV Angel. The latest round of funding will bring the target's total fund raised to date to USD 100mn. The investment proceeds will help Jaunt Inc to make virtual reality (VR) the next mainstream content medium by scaling up the company's virtual reality production, advancing camera hardware and software, and expanding its content delivery. Jaunt Inc develops hardware, software, tools, and applications to enable cinematic virtual reality (VR) for content creators. The company uses computational photography, statistical algorithms, parallel processing and virtual reality technologies to capture 360 degree video content. China Media Capital is a private equity and venture capital firm that specialises in growth capital, mid venture, emerging growth, corporate restructuring, management buyouts and mergers and acquisitions.
111214 21/09/2015 印度 L&T Finance Holdings Ltd 少数股权购买 Bain Capital LLC 美国 　 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522); 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 35.7 (官方数据) 1.75 India-based investment firm L & T Finance Holdings Ltd acquired board approval to issue equity shares equivalent to 1.75% stake to U.S-based private equity Bain Capital LLC for a total of INR 2.4bn (USD 35.7mn), the target announced on the local bourse. L & T Finance will issue 31,836,971 shares at a price of INR 74 (USD 1.12) per share. The target will also issue 63,820,990 convertible warrants equivalent to 3.51% of the target's post-issue total share capital at a price of INR 74 (USD 1.12) apiece. The warrants may be exercised by Bain Capital within 18 months from the allotment date or accelerated after 6 month from the date of allotment. The equity and warrants will be issued to Bain Capital subsidiaries BC Investments VI Ltd and BC Asia Growth Investments respectively. The transaction is subject to shareholder and regulatory approval. L&T Financial Holdings is a financial holdings company offering financial products and services such as investment management services and mutual funds to clients in the retail, corporate, housing and infrastructure finance sectors. For FY ending 31 March, 2015 L&T Financial reported consolidated total assets of INR 527.4bn (USD 8.4bn). Bain Capital is U.S-based private equity firm and alternative asset investment firm which focuses on equity, fixed income, and venture capital investments in various sectors worldwide. It was founded in 1984 and currently has around USD 75bn worth of assets under management. Note: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis.

Vale Panama is engaged in the distribution and operation of vouchers nationwide. Following the acquisition, the company will maintain its brand name. The round was also participated by the International Finance Corporation (IFC), Qualcomm Ventures and VenturEast. According to the IFC, it contributed USD 7mn during the funding round. The proceeds of the round will be used to fund its ongoing efforts to expand its local and international footprint. It operates in 24 cities and claims to have over 1,800 employees that make more than 60,000 home visits per month. MetTube will acquire the Goa-based hotel through its Indian subsidiary Ceres Hotels Pvt Ltd. The transaction is in line with the seller's strategy to restructure its debt and to follow an asset light strategy. The deal is subject to certain customary and regulatory conditions. Post-transaction, Hotel Leelaventure Ltd will continue to operate the property. The Leela Goa hotel has 206 rooms across an area of more than 202,300 m2. Its facilities include a spa, golf course, private beach and restaurants. The hotel had a net income of INR 1.19bn for the FY 2014/2015, which accounted for 15% of the total income of Hotel Leelaventure Ltd. MetTube Sdn Bhd is a diversified Malaysian firm, which primarily manufactures and fabricates copper and other metal products. It also has units in the apparel, real estate and insurance verticals. The company is a part of U.K.-based MetDist Group.

The company has 6,000 students. Its investments are executed mainly through leveraged buyouts, recapitalisations, spinouts, growth investments, joint ventures and restructurings. As of 31 March 2015, the firm has total assets under management of USD 75bn. Satya Capital, founded by Sudanese businessman Mo Ibrahim, is an independent investment firm focused on providing long-term growth capital to African businesses. The company targets investments of between USD 20mn and USD 150mn and invests in a broad range of sectors including: consumer and retail, healthcare, TMT and financial services.

AfricInvest was founded in 1994 and has made over 120 investments in 25 African countries. 111368 18/09/2015 巴西 Thebe Bombas Hidraulicas SA 收购 Ebara Corp 日本 Cipolla Family 其他通用机械制造业 (3339) 　 　 100 Japanese engineering company Ebara Corporation (Ebara) announced it has agreed to acquire the total capital of Brazilian hydraulic pumps manufacturer Thebe Bombas Hidraulicas SA (Thebe) from the Brazilian Cipolla family, for an undisclosed sum. The buyer acted through its Brazilian subsidiary Ebara Industrias Mecanicas e Comercio Ltda (Ebara Brazil). The investment is part of the Ebora's Medium-Term Management Plan called “E-Plan 2016” to reach a leading position in the global pump market, especially in the emerging markets. The acquisition will allow Ebara to offer a wider product portfolio to the South American pump market, as well as to optimise its production capabilities and sales networks. Thebe was founded in 1946 in the municipality of Vargem Grande do Sul (Sao Paulo state, Brazil). The company is involved in the manufacturing and marketing of pump products for industrial, agricultural, building, construction, and residential use. In addition to the headquarters, the company operates a distribution and production center in the municipality of Jaboatao dos Guararapes (Pernambuco state, Brazil) and sells its production across Brazil and South America. Thebe employs 289 people and had a turnover of BRL 289mn (USD 107.6mn) in 2014. Ebara Brazil, created in 1975 in Bauru city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil), manufactures and markets submersed motors and pumps. It employs 239 people and had net sales of BRL 83mn (USD 30.9mn) in 2014. Ebara was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. The company manufactures and sells industrial machinery in the Fluid Machinery & Systems, Environmental Engineering, and Precision Machinery segments. The Fluid Machinery & Systems segment produces pumps, compressors, turbines, refrigeration and heating equipment, blowers and fans; the Environmental Engineering manufactures municipal waste incineration plants, industrial waste incineration plants and water treatment plants, and the Precision Machinery - dry vacuum pumps, plating equipment and exhaust-gas treating equipment, among others. Ebara has more than 16,000 employees and reported revenues of USD 4.02bn for the fiscal year ended March 2015. ______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A empresa japonesa de engenharia Ebara Corporation (Ebara) anunciou que entrou em um acordo para a aquisição da totalidade do capital social da fabricante brasileira de bombas hidráulicas Thebe Bombas Hidráulicas SA (Thebe) da família brasileira Cipolla, por um valor não revelado. A compradora agiu através da sua subsidiária brasileira Ebara Indústrias Mecânicas e Comércio Ltda (Ebara Brasil). O investimento faz parte do Plano de Gerenciamento de Médio Prazo da Ebora chamado "E-Plan 2016" para se tornar uma empresa líder no mercado global de bombas, com um foco especial nos mercados emergentes. A aquisição vai permitir a Ebara ampliar o seu portfólio de produtos no mercado de bombas sul-americano e também otimizar a sua capacidade produtiva e redes de vendas. A Thebe foi fundada em 1946 no município de Vargem Grande do Sul (SP, Brasil). A empresa está envolvida na fabricação e comercialização de bombas hidráulicas para uso industrial, agrícola, predial, residencial e na construção civil. Para além da sua sede, a empresa dispõe de um centro de distribuição e produção no município de Jaboatão dos Guararapes (PE, Brasil), e comercializa a sua produção no Brasil e na América do Sul. Thebe emprega 289 pessoas e registou um faturamento de BRL 289mn (USD 123.2mn) em 2014. A Ebara Brasil, criada em 1975 na cidade de Bauru (SP, Brasil), fabrica e comercializa bombas e motores submersos. A companhia emprega 239 pessoas e teve um faturamento de BRL 83mn (USD 35.4mn) em 2014. A Ebara foi fundada em 1912 e está sediada em Tóquio, Japão. A empresa fabrica e comercializa máquinas industriais nos segmentos de Máquinas e Sistemas para Fluidos, Engenharia Ambiental e Máquinas de Precisão. O segmento de Máquinas e Sistemas para Fluidos produz bombas, compressores, turbinas, equipamentos para aquecimento e refrigeração, ventiladores e sopradores; o de Engenharia Ambiental fabrica incineradores de resíduos municipais, incineradores de resíduos industriais e sistemas de tratamento de águas, e o de Máquinas de Precisão - bombas de vácuo seco, equipamentos para galvanização e equipamento para tratamento de gases de exaustão, entre outros. A Ebara tem mais de 16,000 colaboradores e registrou um faturamento de USD 4.02bn para o ano fiscal findo em março de 2015.
111379 18/09/2015 中国 Foshan Degangjian 收购 Guangdong Fugang Investment Group Ltd 中国 Debao Property Development Ltd 房地产 (531) 36.66 (官方数据) 50 Singapore Exchange-listed property developer and manager Debao Property Development Ltd. said it will sell a 50% stake in China's real estate company Foshan Degangjian for CNY 233.75mn (USD 36.6mn). The buyer on the deal is China's investment holding company Guangdong Fugang Investment Group Ltd., a 74%-owned company by local private investor Mr Chen Guangming together with its related parties. The buyer is acting in the transaction through its wholly-owned subsidiary Foshan Sanshui Fugang Property Development Co., Ltd., which currently owns 35% of the target. The deal is subject to certain closing conditions. Post deal completion, Guangdong Fugang Investment Group will indirectly hold a 85% stake in Foshan Degangjian. The sale proceeds will be used by Debao Property Development for general working capital. The deal represents for the seller a great opportunity to divest a loss-making business. Foshan Degangjian was incorporated in 2014 and its main business activities are property development and investment. The company currently owns two land plots in Sanshui district, Foshan city, Guangdong Province, southern China. Debao Property Development Ltd., founded in 2000, develops and manages integrated residential and commercial properties in China. It is also engaged in building structural projects and interior works; sells and distributes construction materials; and provides public utilities engineering, landscaping, and renovation services. For 2014, it reported revenues of CNY 149.67mn (USD 24.0mn).
111375 18/09/2015 中国 Sihui Debao 少数股权购买 Debao Property Development Ltd 新加坡 Guangzhou Mingxin Investment Co Ltd 建筑、开发及承包 (233); 房地产 (531) 19.97 (官方数据) 45 UPDATE: On 26 February 2016, Debao Property Development Ltd. announced the completion of the acquisition. ORIGINAL: Singapore Exchange-listed property developer and manager Debao Property Development Ltd. said it will acquire the remaining 45% in China's real estate firm Sihui Debao for CNY 127.35mn (USD 19.97mn). The seller on the deal is China's investment holding company Guangzhou Mingxin Investment Co. Ltd., a 78%-owned company by private investor Mr Chen Guangming. The buyer is acting in the transaction through its wholly-owned subsidiary Foshan Nanhai Debao Property Development Co., Ltd. which currently owns 54.999% of Sihui Debao. The deal is subject to certain closing conditions. Post deal completion, Debao Property Development will indirectly own 99.999% of Sihui Debao. The buyer is on the view that Sihui Debao will be able to provide it with a sustainable leasing income in the future. The purchase consideration will be funded through internal resources. Sihui Debao, incorporated in 2011, is the developer and owner of Sihui development project, which comprises Sihui City Mall and residential properties. The Sihui City Mall commenced business in January 2015, and the residential properties will be delivered by the end of 2015. Debao Property Development Ltd., founded in 2000, develops and manages integrated residential and commercial properties in China. It is also engaged in building structural projects and interior works; sells and distributes construction materials; and provides public utilities engineering, landscaping, and renovation services. For 2014, it reported revenues of CNY 149.67mn (USD 24.0mn).
111374 18/09/2015 亚美尼亚 Electric Networks of Armenia CJSC 收购 Liormand Holding Ltd 塞浦路斯 Inter RAO UES 电力传送，控制和分配 (22112) 500 (市场估计) 100 Russian energy group Inter RAO will sell its Armenian peer Electric Networks of Armenia (ENA) to Cypriot investment company Liormand Holding, ArmInfo reported. According to the source, the deal value is around USD 500mn. The deal value includes USD 300mn for the outstanding payables of ENA, and USD 200mn for the company's shares. According to the Cypriot trade registry, the purchaser Liormand Holding is controlled by wealth management company Marcuard Heritage. Completion of deal is subject to various conditions precedent. ENA was established in 2002. The company engages in distributing and selling electric energy in Armenia. It serves some 935,000 customers. Note: The deal value includes both the price of the ENA shares and the assumed company payables to be covered by the buyer.
111347 18/09/2015 中国; 香港; 印度尼西亚; 韩国; 新加坡; 越南 Axxmo International Pte Ltd; TAT Petroleum Pte Ltd 收购 Brenntag AG 德国 SHS Holdings Ltd 化工产品的批发 (4226); 石油及制品的批发 (4227) 71.73 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 28 January 2016, SHS Holdings Ltd. announced the completion of the transaction. ORIGINAL: Singapore Exchange-listed SHS Holdings Ltd announced that it will sell its refined petroleum products distribution and wholesale business, marketed under the names TAT Petroleum Pte Ltd and Axxmo International Pte Ltd, to German global chemicals distributor Brenntag AG for SGD 100.3mn (USD 71.7mn / EUR 67.0mn). The cash consideration is subject to closing adjustments. The transaction is pending regulatory approval and is expected to complete by the fourth quarter of 2015. The deal will also include TAT Petroleum's six subsidiaries located in China, Hong Kong, South Korea, Vietnam and Indonesia. The sale is in line with the ongoing strategy of SHS Holdings to streamline activities and businesses across the group in order to strengthen and grow its other strategic business units. Singapore-based TAT Petroleum and Axxmo International operate a distribution business for refined petroleum products including solvents, lubricants, fuels, polyalphaolefins, asphalt and white oils (including tolling, blending, repackaging and mixing) in the Asia Pacific region. The companies serve customers in agricultural, adhesive, coating, construction, electronics, personal care, pharmaceutical, plastic and vehicular industries. TAT Petroleum was incorporated in 1985 and has offices in Hong Kong, China, South Korea, Vietnam and Indonesia. Axxmo International, established in 1993, was acquired by SHS Holdings in 2012 for USD 1.07mn. The companies had net tangible assets of SGD 27.8mn an SGD 1.7mn, respectively, as of 30 June 2015. Brenntag, established in 1874, is an international distributor and marketer of industrial and specialty chemicals. With a team of 13,500 employees, the company offers over 10,000 products to around 170,000 customers through a network of 490 storage and distribution facilities in 72 countries. Its shares are listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange. Brenntag posted EUR 10.0bn in revenues and a net income of EUR 339mn in 2014. SHS Holdings Ltd, former See Hup Seng Ltd, has corrosion prevention services (CP) and refined petroleum products and services (RP) divisions. Established in 1971, the CP business provides services to the marine, oil and gas, construction and infrastructure industries in Singapore. The RP business, operated by subsidiaries TAT Petroleum and Axxmo International, distribute refined petroleum products to customers in Asia Pacific, through offices in Hong Kong, China (Guangzhou), South Korea, Vietnam and Indonesia.

ORIGINAL: Singapore Exchange-listed Silverlake Axis Ltd., a software solutions provider for banking and financial services, announced it will acquire local peer SunGard Ambit (Singapore) Pte. Ltd. from U.S. global software and technology provider SunGard Data Systems Inc. for USD 12.0mn. The deal will also include the target's seven subsidiaries in Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, Pakistan, Czech Republic and Slovakia. The acquisition will enable Silverlake Axis to expand its suite of software and services as well as broaden its customer relationships and geographical presence. The purchase price will be financed entirely using the internal resources of Silverlake Axis. The seller is acting in the transaction through its Singapore's subsidiary SunGard Asia Pacific Inc. SunGard Ambit (Singapore), former System Access Limited, engages in providing a range of banking software that enables banks to address their core banking, customer management, online banking, mobile banking and card management requirements in Asia Pacific, Middle East, South Asia and Eastern Europe. Silverlake Axis, former Axis Systems Holdings Limited, is a leading provider of digital economy solutions and services for major organisations in banking, insurance, payments, retail and logistics sectors. The company serves over 100 organisations across Asia, including 40% of the largest banks in South East Asia. for 2014, it reported revenues of USD 154.3mn.
