The purchase price was not disclosed. The buyer acted through its subsidiary Press Glass UK Ltd. Glass Systems Group comprises Glass Systems Ltd, Glass Systems Direct Ltd, Vizor Tempered Glass Ltd and encompasses the Climate Glass a conservatory roof division. The group manufactures 35,000 m2 of tempered glass and over 50,000 insulated glass units (IGU's) per week. Press Glass was established in 1991. The company manufactures flat glass products, supplying window frame manufacturers, door manufacturers, fire screen glaziers, interior fit-out contractors, etc. It produces over 150,000 IGU's and 50 000 m2 of single tempered glass per week. Press Glass employs around 2,000 people. It posted individual revenues of PLN 529.8mn (EUR 126.2mn) and net income of PLN 69.1mn (EUR 16.5mn) in 2013.
111197 18/09/2015 智利 Lagunillas-El Olivo solar power plant 收购 Undisclosed buyer(s) 　 Grenergy Renovables SA 太阳能发电 (221114) 5.25 (官方数据) 100 Spanish solar plants developer and operator Grenergy Renovables said that it has sold the Lagunillas-El Olivo solar farm in Chile to an undisclosed buyer for USD 5.25mn. The buyer has already paid USD 1.57mn. The remaining USD 3.67mn will be paid in December 2015. After closing of the transaction, Grenergy will reveal the buyer's name. The Lagunillas-El Olivo solar farm is located in Ovalle city, Limari province Coquimbo region, Chile. It has total installed capacity of 40 MW and consists of 181,692 solar modules and 28 inverters. It is expected to produce 88 GWh of electricity annually. The total cost of the project is USD 80mn. Grenergy Renovables, established in 2007, is a project developer and an Independent Power Producer (IPP). To date, the company has developed and executed several projects in Spain and Chile with total capacity of 100 MW. It has offices in Spain, Mexico, Chile and Peru.
111182 18/09/2015 德国 Ascania nonwoven Germany GmbH 收购 Mondi Plc; Mondi Ltd 英国; 南非 Schloss Neugattersleben Group 纺织加工 (313) 61.14 (官方数据) 100 International paper and packaging group Mondi announced that it has agreed to acquire German nonwoven fabrics and composites producer Ascania for EUR 54mn (USD 61.1mn) on a debt-and-cash-free basis The seller is German private equity investment group Schloss Neugattersleben and the sum of the deal is equal to 5.7 times Ascania's EBITDA for the year ended 31 May 2015. Mondi said that Ascania is one of its key suppliers of nonwovens for diaper elastic laminates and added that the company will be integrated into its Consumer Packaging Business Unit. Ascania is a manufacturer of nonwoven fabrics and nonwoven composites used as components in personal care products. The company has a production plant in the city of Aschersleben (central Germany) and employs around 150 people. In the year ended 31 May 2015, Ascania generated revenues of EUR 53mn (USD 64.8mn) Mondi is an international packaging and paper group with operations in more than 30 countries and some 25,000 employees. The group consists of Johannesburg-listed Mondi Ltd and London-listed Mondi plc. In 2014, Mondi Group booked revenues of EUR 6.4bn (USD 8.51bn).
111174 18/09/2015 墨西哥 Processing plant and select equipment of the El Sauzal gold mine 收购 Timmins Gold Corp 加拿大 Goldcorp Inc 金矿和银矿的开采 (21222); 钢铁及其他主要金属制造业 (331) 6.07 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 2 November 2015, Timmins Gold said it completed the acquisition of the processing plant and select auxiliary equipment of the El Sauzal gold mine in Mexico. ORIGINAL: Mexico-focused mining company Timmins Gold Corp announced that it has agreed to acquire the processing plant and select auxiliary equipment of the El Sauzal gold mine in Mexico from Canadian peer Goldcorp for CAD 8mn (USD 6.07mn). A total of CAD 5mn (USD 3.79mn) of the sum is payable in cash and the remainder will be settled through an issue of shares. The transaction is subject, among other things, the completion of a CAD 6mn (USD 4.55mn) investment by Goldcorp in Timmins Gold through a non-brokered private placement. El Sauzal mine is located in Mexico's northern Chihuahua State and was operational until December 2014 when it began its closure. The processsing plant for the mine is a nominal 6,000 tonne per day milling and processing facility with a cyanide circuit and a carbon-in-pulp circuit (CIP). Timmins Gold said it plans to use the processing plant for its Ana Paula project in the Guerrero Gold Belt. The company added that the plant is expected to save in the range of USD 40mn to USD 60mn in initial capital expenditure when construction of the project is completed. Timmins Gold Corp is engaged in the acquisition, exploration, development and operation of mineral resource properties in Mexico. The company is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange and it generated revenues of USD 154.1mn in 2014.

The company is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and had a market capitalisation of USD 23.7bn on 18 September 2015.

Seller in the deal is cement and aggregates supplier PT Holcim Indonesia Tbk. The acquisition follows the merger of global cement companies Lafarge SA (France) and Holcim Ltd (Switzerland), creating the world's largest construction materials maker LafargeHolcim. The seller's original cost of investment in Holcim (M) Sdn Bhd was USD 36.9mn, as incurred in May 2009. Lafarge Malaysia Bhd said that its cement plant annual production capacity will increase by 9.2% to 14.14 million tonnes, up from 12.95 million tonnes, following the completion of the deal. Holcim (M) Sdn Bhd, founded in 1990, manufactures and trades cement and other related products. It also quarries and trades granite and other types of materials for cement or concrete use. Lafarge Malaysia Bhd manufactures and sells cement, ready-mixed concrete and other related building materials. The company is listed on Bursa Malaysia and its revenues were MYR 2.7bn (USD 783.1mn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. PT Holcim Indonesia Tbk acts as a cement-based building material and service provider. It caters to the cement needs of the domestic retail and home building markets, as well as commercial and infrastructure projects. The company is listed on the Indonesia Stock Exchange and its revenues were IDR 10,529bn (USD 845.5mn) for FY ended 31 December 2014.

It also offers paper consultation and business-process outsourcing, paper-management systems and tools, among others. 111148 18/09/2015 澳大利亚 Portfolio of 26 logistics properties in Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Perth 收购 Ascendas Real Estate Investment Trust 新加坡 GIC Pte Ltd; Frasers Centrepoint Ltd 仓储 (493) 727.2 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 18 November 2015, Ascendas Real Estate Investment Trust (A-REIT) announced it has completed the acquisition of the Australian logistics portfolio. ORIGINAL: Singapore's Ascendas Real Estate Investment Trust (A-REIT) has announced the acquisition of a portfolio of 26 logistics properties located in Australia from local real estate company GIC Australia and Frasers Property Australia for a total consideration of AUD 1.01bn (USD 727.2mn). The transaction is subject to certain closing conditions and is expected to complete in the fourth quarter of 2015. The deal value is subject to post-completion adjustments. The acquisition is in line with the strategy of A-REIT to invest in prime logistics properties located in key cities of Australia. It will establish A-REIT as the 8th largest industrial landlord in the country and will also diversify A-REIT's portfolio geographically. In connection with the acquisition and for the purposes of acquiring and holding the target portfolio, A-REIT has established a wholly-owned managed investment trust under the name of Ascendas REIT Australia. A-REIT intends to fund the acquisition with a combination of a loan for about AUD 600mn and through the issuance of perpetual securities. The 26 logistics properties are located in the core industrial markets of Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Perth, and comprise a combined gross floor area of around 630,946 m2. The current occupancy rate of the properties is 94.4% and their tenants include major companies such as Wesfarmers, Mondelez, Pacific Brands, API, Nestlé, Officemax, and multinational third-party logistics tenants such as CEVA, DB Schenker and Linfox. A-REIT is Singapore's first listed business space and industrial real estate investment trust. It has a portfolio, comprising business and science park properties, hi-specs industrial properties, light industrial properties, and logistics and distribution centres. Its total assets stood at SGD 7.9bn (USD 6.0bn) at the end of 2014. Following the acquisition, A-REIT will own 102 properties in Singapore, two business park properties in China and 26 logistics properties in Australia.

114980 17/09/2015 德国 Lloyd Investitions- und Verwaltungs GmbH; Lloyd Werft Bremerhaven AG 收购 Genting Hong Kong Ltd 香港 Ehlerding Beteiligungs GmbH; Petram Beteiligungs GmbH; BLG Logistics Group AG & Co KG 房地产 (531); 船舶制造 (3366) 19.73 (官方数据) 　 UPDATE: On 23 November 2015, Genting HK announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Cruise firm Genting Hong Kong said it has agreed to acquire a 70% stake in German ships builder Lloyd Werft Bremerhaven AG (LWB) and a 50% stake in German real estate firm Lloyd Investitions- und Verwaltungs GmbH (LIV) for an aggregate purchase price of EUR 17.5mn. The sellers include German harbor operations and consulting services provider BLG Logistics Group, and the holdings companies Petram Beteiligungs GmbH and Ehlerding Beteiligungs GmbH. The deal is subject to certain conditions precedent. The acquisition will allow Genting HK to facilitate its fleet expansion and brand development plan, by leveraging on the know-how and expertise of LWB, a reputable shipyard. Following the deal, Petram will keep 30% of LWB and 50% of LIV, while Ehlerding and BLG Logistics will exit the ownership of the targets. As part of the deal, Genting HK and Petram entered into a separate option agreement to acquire the remaining shares in LIV and LWB for a combined consideration of EUR 16.47mn. The buyer is acting in the transaction through its wholly-owned subsidiary Star Cruises Singapore Investment Holding Pte. Ltd. Post deal completion, Genting HK committed to provide additional EUR 20.0mn to LWB by way of shareholders' loans if sufficient financing cannot be obtained from banks. LWB operates a shipyard for the construction and repair of ships, and it also owns and maintains mobile and fixed docks. For 2014, it reported net profit of EUR 4.82mn. LIV is engaged in letting and leasing real estate and operating facilities. In 2014, it registered net profit of EUR 1.95mn. Genting HK is a global luxury cruise line operator. Its main activity include cruise and cruise related services and leisure, entertainment and hospitality activities. It posted a turnover of USD 570.8mn in 2014. The company is listed on the Hong Kong and Singapore stock exchanges.

NIS Imob SRL was recently established by Romanian real estate developer MTK Admin Imob SRL, for the purpose of this acquisition. MTK Admin Imob SRL is ultimately backed by Azerbaijani capital. Immorom Alpha SRL, founded in 1998, is engaged in the construction of residential and non-residential buildings in Romania. 114281 17/09/2015 捷克共和国 NEPA Business Solutions 收购 Sharp Corp 日本 　 专业和商业设备及用品商人批发商 (4214) 　 　 100 Janapese electronic products manufacturer Sharp Corp announced that it has acquired Czech distributor NEPA Business Solutions. The value of the transaction was not provided. Prior to the transaction, NEPA and Sharp Electronics Europe have been a long-term business partners. NEPA Business Solutions, founded in 1990, provides printers and document solutions. The company operates in the Czech Republic and Slovakia. Sharp Corp, established in 1912, manufactures audio-visual, communication, health, environmental and information products and core technologies. The company employs over 50,000 people. In 2014, it had revenues of USD 28.7bn and net profit of USD 110mn.
111952 17/09/2015 土耳其 Kumport Liman 收购 COSCO Pacific Ltd 香港 Fina Holding; Undisclosed seller(s) 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 940.13 (官方数据) 65 China's terminals operator COSCO Pacific said it will acquire 65% of Turkish terminal operator Kumport Liman from local industrial group Fina Holding and minority shareholders for a total USD 940.1mn. The completion of the transaction is subject to fulfilment of closing conditions, including the receipt of an approval from the Turkish Competition Board. COSCO Pacific will acquire 64.5% of Fina Liman from Fina Holding for USD 919.85mn. Fina Liman holds 98.65% of Kumport Liman. The remaining shares in Fina Liman are owned by State General Reserve Fund of the Sultanate of Oman. COSCO Pacific will also acquire a direct stake of 1.35% in Kumport Liman for USD 20.3mn from minority shareholders. Kumport Liman operates a modern container terminal in the Ambarli Port Complex, which is on the northwest coast of the Marmara Sea on the European side of Istanbul. Kumport Terminal is the third largest container terminal in Turkey. It can handle 18,000 TEU vessels and its current capacity is 1.84 million TEU with six berths. The terminal has room for expansion to up to 3.5 million TEU capacity. In the past five years, Kumport Terminal has maintained a CAGR of approximately 30% in container volume. Its container throughput reaching 1.4 million TEU in 2014. The acquisition will create a potential business synergy between Kumport Terminal and COSCO Pacific's existing investment in Piraeus Container Terminal S.A. in Greece. COSCO Pacific is a Hong Kong-listed group engaged in the management and operation of terminals, container leasing, management and sale, and their related businesses. Fina Holding, the investment holding company of Fiba Group, is engaged mainly in finance, but it also has investments in other sectors, including real estate, tourism, aviation, sea port management and retail.
111304 17/09/2015 俄罗斯 Russian Mining and Metallurgical Company; Russian Mining and Metallurgical Company - South 收购 Grandstream Ltd 塞浦路斯 Ukrainian Mining and Mettalurgical Co OJSC 金属和矿产品（石油除外）的批发 (4215) 　 　 100 Cyprus-registered holdings company Grandstream Ltd has obtained antitrust approval to acquire 100% in Russian Mining and Metallurgical Company and 75% in Russian Mining and Metallurgical Company - South, according to an announcement of the Federal Antimonopoly Service. Financial terms of the deal were not mentioned. In fact, if the buyer receives the necessary clearance, it will gain control over 100% in Russian Mining and Metallurgical Company - South, as Russian Mining and Metallurgical Company already holds 25% in it. Currently, Russian Mining and Metallurgical Company is fully-owned by Ukrainian Mining and Metallurgical Co. Both targets are part of Ukraine's major steel group Industrial Union of Donbass (ISD) and act as the latter’s exclusive trade representatives in the Russian Federation. Russian Mining and Metallurgical Company was created in 2005 with the aim to increase the efficiency of interaction between ISD’s output assets and the metal market participants in Russia. In 2008, the company introduced the warehouse trade and started to sell also other metal products, apart from ISD’s assortment. According to information of Kommersant, Grandstream Ltd, via another shell company Calmco Holdings Ltd, belongs to the general director of Russian Mining and Metallurgical Company - Ashot Tamrazyan.
111285 17/09/2015 土耳其 Mika Tur Seyahat 少数股权购买 Is Girisim Sermayesi Yatirim Ortakligi; MCI Management SA 土耳其; 波兰 Hedef Group 旅行社、旅游经营者的活动 (5615) 15.75 (官方数据) 80 UPDATE: Polish private equity firm MCI Private Ventures FIZ also participated in the investment, TurkInternet Intervizyon reported. The two investment firms acquired combined 80% of Mika Tur for TRY 46mn (USD 15.75mn). MCI, founded in 1999, focuses on early stage, growth stage and expansion/buy-out stage investments in Central Eastern Europe and has over PLN 1.7bn (USD 426mn) in assets under management. The firm is listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange. ORIGINAL: Turkish venture capital investment company Is Girisim said it will acquire a stake of 20% in local tour operator Mika Tur Seyahat for TRY 11.5mn (USD 3.8mn) from private investors. The transaction is subject to customary closing conditions. Mika Tur Seyahat operates tour website TatilBudur.com. The company is part of Hedef Grup, which is engaged in distribution, production, tourism and other industries. Is Girisim, established in 2000, is an affiliate of Turkish lender Is Bankasi. 111311 17/09/2015 塞尔维亚 Interex's nine supermarkets 收购 Aman doo 塞尔维亚 Groupement des Mousquetaires 超市和食品杂货店 (4451) 　 　 100 French retail group Les Mousquetaires is in the process of selling Interex's nine supermarkets in Serbia to the local supermarket chain Aman d.o.o. Financial terms were not disclosed. The divestment is part of a larger operation which began in 2011, which oversees the withdrawal of the French food retailer from the Balkans, allowing the group to strategically refocus its business. The acquisition will enable Aman to consolidate its position on the local food retail market, ahead of the arrival of global discount chain Lidl, which should launch operations in Serbia by end-2016 or in 2017. Interex has been present in Serbia since 2004, when it opened its first supermarket in Cacak, west-central of the country. Today, Interex is present in the cities of Belgrade, Cacak, Nis, Obrenovac, Zajecar, Sabac, Valjevo, and plans to open new facilities. It employs around 400 people and its turnover for the supermarkets amounted to around EUR 50mn (USD 56.68mn). Les Mousquetaires group, founded in 1969, is currently present in France, Poland, Belgium and Portugal and operates a retail network of over 3,150 stores under brands such as Intermarché, Ecomarché, Net, Bricomarché, Veta, Roady and Restaumarché. The group is also engaged in logistics and real estate sectors and has around 130,000 employees. Aman was established in 1992 as a discount supermarket chain and is owned by Jordanian-born citizen Nedal Halil. The company has grown significantly since its inception, including through the purchase of SOS Marketa with 30 stores, taking the total to 175 retail outlets across the country, and over 1,000 employees. Aman operates its retail network under private label brands such as Bravo, Bravissimo, Alloro and VIP. Recently, in July 2015, Aman has also acquired Belgrade-based grocery chain Višnjica Dućani for an undisclosed amount.

The deal also includes a deferred consideration payment of up to USD 0.4mn payable 90 days after completion. IMImobile said that it considers the purchase to be highly strategic with significant opportunities to leverage its African footprint to expand into the wider enterprise market. Archer Digital is engaged in the provision of mobile engagement solutions and its products include personalised mobile statements, mobile marketing and customer service messaging. The company employs over 50 people and it booked revenues of ZAR 117mn (USD 10.8mn) in 2014. IMImobile provides software and services for enterprise mobile engagement and its clients include Vodafone, O2, Telefonica, Aircel, Airtel, BSNL, AT&T, MTN, France Telecom, Centrica, Coca-Cola, Universal Music and Tata among other. The company is listed on the London Stock Exchange and it generated revenues of GBP 48.9mn (USD 78.9mn) in its FY ended 31 March 2015.

Financial terms were not disclosed. Chims Africa will use the funds obtained to open an additional of 700 mobile cash kiosks, with main focus on rural areas. This is Ascent's second deal after acquiring a 50% stake in Ethiopian lab group Medpharm Holdings Africa for USD 2.5mn back in February 2015. Chims Africa operates a chain of 130 MTN mobile money agencies in Uganda and serves more than seven million clients per year. Ascent Capital Africa Ltd raised USD 50mn for the Ascent Rift Valley Fund (ARVF) in 2014. ARVF mainly invests in growth capital for companies working in Eastern Africa with an average investment of USD 4mn to USD 5mn per deal.

Farmako, Helios Farmacja and MX Holding operate in Slaskie, Dolnoslaske, Lodzkie, Malopolskie and Wielkopolskie regions. BRL Center Polska operates a network of pharmacies branded Dr Max. The company has over 300 pharmacies across Poland. Penta Investments, established in 1994, is a CEE-focused investment firm active in healthcare, financial services, retail, manufacturing and real estate. It operates in more than 10 markets across Europe, providing more than 35,000 jobs through investee companies. The company has six offices in Prague, Bratislava, Warsaw, Limassol, Amsterdam and Munich. Penta owns assets of EUR 6.7bn.

The funding was led by U.S.-based investment firm Sequoia Capital and Chinese firm Joy Capital. Proceeds from the funding will be used by NextEV for the production of more vehicles for the U.S. market in order to compete with American peer Tesla Motors Inc. The company currently has 300 employees and has offices in Silicon Valley, Munich, London and Beijing. Sequoia Capital is a leading U.S. venture capital firm invests in seed, start-up, early and emerging growth companies in the sectors of healthcare and healthcare services, internet, mobile and technology.

Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. KTH carried out the purchase through its media subsidiary Kagiso Media. 111145 17/09/2015 克罗地亚 Grand Hotel Lav doo; Grand Marina Lav doo 收购 Odien Group 捷克共和国 HETA Asset Resolution AG 游乐场、博彩和其他休闲娱乐活动 (713); 住宿服务 (721) 　 100 Austria's bank Heta Asset Resolution AG announced it has agreed to sell Croatian deluxe hotel and marina operator Grand Hotel Lav d.o.o and Grand Marina Lav d.o.o to Czech PE and VC firm Odien Group. Financial terms were not disclosed. According to Heta CEO Sebastian Prinz von Schoenaich-Carolath, the sale process involved numerous interested parties, but Odien Group submitted the best bid, which also ensures further development of this tourism facility. The deal represents another important step in Heta's disposition efforts, which it intends to conclude by the end of 2020. The acquisition is in line with Odien's strategy to focus on further investment opportunities in Croatia and the region. The buyer is acting in the transaction through its subsidiary Odien Hotels N.V. Grand Hotel Lav d.o.o. and Grand Marina Lav d.o.o. own the luxurious Le Meridien Lav, a large 5-star resort complex with marina located in Split, on the Adriatic coast. The complex comprises 44,000 m2 of land, 381 rooms and suites, 12 restaurants and bars, 30 retail units, a health and spa facility with more than 3,000 m2 and one of the largest conference facilities in Croatia. In addition, the resort is home to the 2,500 m2 Grand Casino Lav. The marina currently has more than 75 berths. Odien, founded in 2001, is a leading PE investment firm in Central and Eastern Europe specialised on turnarounds, with regional offices in Prague and Istanbul. It focuses to acquire control or significant stake in companies in the region and it typically invests in special situations consisting of restructurings and complex transactions. Heta Asset Resolution is the "bad bank" of the former Austrian state-owned bank Hypo Group Alpe Adria (HGAA), created with the aim to dispose of the group's non-performing assets. A portfolio of EUR 19.1bn had been transferred to Heta Asset Resolution since its foundation in 2014. In 2012, HGAA became the owner of Grand Hotel Lav and Marina Lav, after it activated a lien on the hotel and the former owners had to leave the property.

The newspaper added that the purchase will boost the assets of Grupo Promerica to over USD 11.7bn. Citi announced its plans to sell the business in October 2014. As of 30 June 2015, Banco Citibank de Guatemala and Cititarjetas de Guatemala had an asset base of USD 865mn as well as 63 branches. Grupo Promerica has operations in 10 countries, namely Ecuador, Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Nicaragua, Panama, Cayman Islands, Dominican Republic and the USA. The group's Guatemalan banking, Banco Promerica Guatemala, has an asset base of USD 609mn as of 30 June 2015.

On the sell side are Ring Family Trust, a trust to which Mr. Stephen Ring, the descendant of Swisse's founder Mr. Kevin Ring, is the beneficiary, and 16 members of the management team of the target. Completion of the transaction is subject to customary closing conditions. The buyer will pay in cash and newly issued own shares. Upon completion of the deal, the sellers will hold a 3.3% stake in Biostime's enlarged capital. The vendors will retain a 17% stake in Swisse. The acquisition is in line with buyer's strategy to increase its investments in the health and wellness products sector. 111122 17/09/2015 中国 99cloud; Beijing AWCloud Technology Co Ltd; Bluebank Communication Technology Co Ltd; Nuovo Film Inc; Shenzhen Hampoo Science & Technology Co Ltd ; Shenzhen PraFly Technology Co Ltd; Telink Semiconductor Co Ltd; Ninebot Inc 收购 Intel Capital 美国 　 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518); 有线电话的制造 (33421); 广播电视设备、无线通信设备制造 (33422); 其他交通运输设备制造业 (3369); 汽车整车制造 (3361) 67 (官方数据) 　 Chinese technology firms 99cloud, Beijing AWCloud Technology Co Ltd, Bluebank Communication Technology Co Ltd, Nuovo Film Inc, Shenzhen Hampoo Science & Technology Co Ltd, Shenzhen PraFly Technology Co Ltd, Semiconductor firm Telink Semiconductor Co Ltd and Ninebot Inc have received an investment worth USD 67mn from Chinese investment company Intel Capital, according to a disclosure made by company. In celebration of Intel's 30th anniversary in China, the company has decided to use the investment proceeds to foster Chinese technology innovation and accelerate China's Technology Ecosystem (CTE) development. The transaction is subject to customary closing conditions. Bluebank Communication Technology Co Ltd and Nuovo Film Inc develops smartphones, tablets and software applications. Shenzhen Hampoo Science & Technology Co Ltd specialises in printed circuit board (PCB) design, production, assembly and component searching. Shenzhen PraFly Technology Co Ltd provides solutions for industrial automation equipment and high-end control system. Cloud computing companies 99cloud and Beijing AWCloud Technology Co Ltd controls large pools of compute, storage and networking resources throughout a data centre. Semiconductor firm Telink Semiconductor Co Ltd manufactures low-power chips for Internet of Things (IoT) devices. Ninebot Inc produces short-distance transportation equipment such as unicycle and two-wheel self-balancing vehicle. Intel China is a division of Intel Corporation that manages corporate venture capital, global investment and mergers and acquisitions. The company focuses on investments in smart devices, robotics, drones, Internet of Things (IoT), cloud services, OpenStack and data analytics sectors. There are thirty five Intel-Capital backed companies that have been acquired to date.

Warburg Pincus and Legend Holdings will settle their investment through its affiliate Tourmaline Gem Holdings Ltd and private equity firm Legend Capital Management Co Ltd, respectively. Founded on April 2014, Car Inc provides car rental services and sales of used cars. The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and booked revenues of CNY 3.5bn (USD 572mn) in 2014. Legend Holdings Ltd invests in IT, financial services, modern services, agriculture and food, property and chemicals and energy materials sectors in China. Warburg Pincus LLC is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in all company's startup cycles.

According to Mr. Manfred Peter Johann, Automation Managing Director of WEG, the investment will be beneficial for WEG's automation European product line and will help the company to internationalise its business. The transaction is subject to certain conditions. Autrial, founded in 1977 and headquartered in Valencia city (Spain), manufactures electrical panels for industrial equipment and plants. The company operates a manufacturing plant with an area of 10,000 m2 and employs more than 130 people. It had net revenues of approximately EUR 14mn (USD 15.87mn) in 2014. WEG, established in 1961, is a vertically-integrated producer of electric-electronic equipment with operations in five main segments: motors, energy, transmission and distribution, automation and coatings. The company has manufacturing facilities in Brazil, Argentina, Austria, China, Colombia, Germany, India, Mexico, Portugal, South Africa and the United States, and employs over 31,000 people. WEG is listed on the BM&FBovespa Stock Exchange reported sales revenues of BRL 7.84bn (USD 2.02bn) and net income of BRL 954mn (USD 246mn) in 2014. __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A fabricante brasileira de equipamentos eletroeletrônicos WEG SA anunciou a aquisição de uma participação majoritária na fabricante de painéis elétricos Autrial SL, por um valor não revelado. O Sr. Manfred Peter Johann, Director Geral de Automação da WEG, disse que o investimento vai beneficiar a linha de produção de automação da WEG na Europa e vai ajudar a empresa a internacionalizar seu negócio. A transação está sujeita ao cumprimento de determinadas condições precedentes. A Autrial, fundada em 1977 e sediada na cidade de Valência (Espanha), produz painéis elétricos para equipamentos e instalações industriais. A companhia opera uma fábrica com uma área de 10,000 m2 e emprega mais de 130 colaboradores. A Autrial teve uma receita líquida de aproximadamente EUR 14mn (USD 15.87mn) em 2014. A WEG, criada em 1961, é uma produtora verticalmente integrada de equipamentos eletroeletrônicos, com operações em cinco linhas principais: motores, energia, transmissão e distribuição, automação e tintas. A empresa tem fábricas no Brasil, Argentina, Áustria, China, Colômbia, Alemanha, Índia, México, Portugal, África do Sul e Estados Unidos, e emprega mais de 31,000 pessoas. A WEG está listada na Bolsa de Valores de São Paulo BM&FBovespa, e atingiu um volume de negócios de BRL 7.84bn (USD 2.02bn) e um lucro líquido de BRL 954mn (USD 246mn) em 2014.
111099 16/09/2015 俄罗斯 International Centrе of Financial and Economic Development 收购 Minority shareholders 俄罗斯 Wolters Kluwer NV 出版业（因特网除外） (511); 专业服务、科学研究和技术服务 (54); 教育服务活动 (611) 55 Wolters Kluwer Legal & Regulatory Solutions, a unit of Dutch global information services provider Wolters Kluwer, announced the sale of 55% in Russian legal and regulatory business Center of Financial and Economic Development (MCFR) to the latter’s minority shareholders. The sale was conducted via the group’s full-fledged subsidiary Wolters Kluwer Russia Publishing Holding which owns 100% in MCFR. The financial terms of the agreement were not specified. The disposal is triggered by the adopted Russian legislation which limits the ownership of foreign entities in local media companies up to 20%. The divestment resulted in a one-off net loss for the seller of some EUR 18mn (USD 20.3mn), primarily due to foreign exchange fluctuations. International Center of Financial and Economic Development is Russia’s largest integrator of professional information. The company publishes 55 specialised magazines with a monthly circulation of over 500,000 copies, as well as ten electronic reference systems. It also organises 100 annual professional and educational events and maintains 11 on-line portals. The sectors covered are health, education and culture, labor safety, accountancy, taxation, office work, management, law, health care, pharmacy and others.
111096 16/09/2015 英国 Charge 少数股权购买 Kinetik 俄罗斯 　 内燃机、汽轮机、传动设备的制造 (3336) 　 　 　 Kinetik, the newly-created fund of former chief executive of wireless telecom operator Yota, Denis Sverdlov, has invested in U.K.-based hybrid powertrain solutions provider Charge, The Financial Times reported. The amount of the invested funds was not specified. The volume of the fund is USD 500mn. Charge has invented alternative powerplants for heavy-duty electric vehicles, such as trucks and buses, that make it possible to use ordinary fuel along with electricity so that the power range is extended. The technology is focused on vehicles that weigh between 2.5 and 26 tonnes and saves three times the fuel consumption. In August 2014, Denis Sverdlov served as deputy head of the Russian communications ministry.
111134 16/09/2015 意大利 The Westin Excelsior Rome hotel 收购 Qatar Investment Authority 卡塔尔 Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide Inc 住宿服务 (721) 251 (官方数据) 100 US hospitality group Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide announced that it has entered into agreement to sell The Westin Excelsior Rome hotel to Katara Hospitality, part of Qatar Investment Authority (QIA), for EUR 222mn (USD 251mn). Under the terms of the agreement, the hotel will be renovated in the next five years. The Westin Excelsior Rome, opened in 1906, is located on Via Veneto, one of Rome's most celebrated streets. The hotel is adjacent to the American Embassy and close to all of Rome's leading attractions, including the Colosseum, the Pantheon and the Sistine Chapel. It offers 281 guest rooms and 35 suites. Katara Hospitality (formerly Qatar National Hotels) is a hospitality owner, manager and developer. The company has 34 properties in operation or under development within its portfolio and is now focused on adding another 26 properties by 2026. QIA was established in 2005 and currently holds assets worth over USD 100bn. The main purpose of QIA is to develop, invest and manage the state reserve funds of Qatar. Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide is a hotel and leisure company with 1,200 properties in 100 countries and approximately 180,000 employees. The company operates, manages and franchises the following international brands: Saint Regis, The Luxury Collection, Sheraton, Westin, Four Points, W and Le Meridien. It generated revenues of USD 5.98bn and net income of USD 633mn in 2014.
111130 16/09/2015 秘鲁 Block 105 in Peru 收购 Union Oil & Gas Group Corp 英国 　 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 　 　 50 Australian oil and gas company Antilles Oil and Gas announced a farmout of a 50% interest in its Block 105 in Peru to U.K.-based, Latin America-focused oil & gas company Union Oil & Gas Group Corp. Financial terms were not disclosed, but Antilles said that Union will fund up to 75% of the cost for the first exploration well at the property up to a cap of USD 3mn. The exploration well at Block 105 will target a mean 29.6 million barrels of oil (mmbo) shallow target and a deeper mean of 100 mmbo target. The Block 105 is located in the Pirin historic producing field, in the Peruvian Titcaca basin. Union Oil and Gas Group is engaged in the exploration and production of oil & gas, and has interests in various projects across Uruguay, Paraguay, Colombia and Peru. The company is managed by the Latin America-focused private equity firm UCG Investments, the investment arm of U.K. firm Union Group. Union Group is a privately owned investment firm which has interests in the agriculture, infrastructure & logistics, minerals, energy, oil & gas, and real estate sectors across Latin America.

ORIGINAL: Swedish paper wholesaler Papyrus announced that it has signed an agreement to acquire Czech peer OSPAP from troubled paper company PaperlinX. Financial details of the deal were not disclosed. The transaction is pending regulatory approval. OSPAP was founded in 1958. The company sells printing materials, packaging materials and solutions, and materials and technologies for commercial production. Papyrus is leading merchant in paper, facility supplies and industrial packaging. The company operates in 20 European countries and employs 1,900 people. It had revenues of EUR 1.6bn in 2014. PaperlinX is a global merchant of paper, communication materials and diversified products and services. In 2014, the company operated in 20 countries and employed around 3,500 people. In March 2015, it sold its Canadian operations, Spicers Canada. In April 2015, the PaperlinX businesses in the UK, Benelux and Austria were placed into administration. In May 2015, the company sold its Polish subsidiary.

According to the Asian Nikkie Review, the deal is worth some JPY 8bn (USD 65.8mn). The acquisition will enable the buyer to expand its operations in the auto loan business and diversify its financial services in Indonesia. The stake to be acquired is the upper limit of what a non-Indonesian company can invest in an Indonesian firm. PT Sinar Mitra Sepadan Finance provides used car loans for proprietors and individual customers. The company has a nationwide network of 106 branches and employs approximately 2,000 people. Orix Corp offers corporate financial services, automobile leasing, car rental, real estate investment services, retail financial services and overseas financial services, among others. Orix is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and its total assets were JPY 11,443 (USD 95.6bn) for FY ended 31 March 2015.
111091 16/09/2015 巴西 Oil and Gas assets of Skanska 收购 KAEFER Isoliertechnik GmbH & Co KG 德国 Skanska AB 采矿业辅助活动 (213) 　 　 　 Swedish construction group Skanska AB has signed an agreement for the sale of certain Brazilian oil and gas assets to German insulation solutions provider KAEFER Isoliertechnik GmbH & Co KG, Brazilian newspaper Valor reported. The buyer acted through its Brazilian subsidiary KAEFER Servicos Industriais Ltda and the seller through its Brazilian subsidiary, Skanska do Brasil. Skanska AB has a 40% participation in Consorcio SPE, atmospheric and vacuum distillation unit (U2100) for the Rio de Janeiro Petrochemical Complex, property of Petroleo Brasileiro SA (Petrobras). The Swedish company decided to leave its Brazilian operations in the maintenance of installations and equipment segment, because it considers them no longer profitable. According to the Brazilian journal Valor, Brazilian Antitrust Authority CADE has already approved the transaction, but it still needs to be approved by Petrobras. KAEFER was founded in 1918 and specialises in insulation, access, surface protection and passive fire protection. The company has operations in over 50 countries and employs some 26,000 people. KAEFER has an annual turnover of close to EUR 1.5bn (USD 1.70bn). Skanska is a multinational construction company operating in the residential building, non-residential building, and heavy construction areas. The company reported sales revenues of SEK 143.3bn (USD 17.38bn) and net income of SEK 3.84bn (USD 465.82mn) for 2014. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ O grupo de construção sueco Skanska AB assinou um acordo para a venda de certos ativos brasileiros para extração de petróleo e gás, com a provedora alemã de soluções de isolamento KAEFER Isoliertechnik GmbH & Co KG, o jornal de notícias Valor relatou. A KAEFER atuou através de sua subsidiária brasileira, KAEFER Serviços Industriais Ltda e o Skanska AB, através da sua subsidiária brasileira, Skanska do Brasil. A Skanska AB tem uma participação de 40% no Consórcio SPE, uma unidade de destilação atmosférica e de vácuo (U2100) responssável para o Complexo Petroquímico do Rio de Janeiro, propriedade da Petróleo Brasileiro SA (Petrobras). A empresa sueca decidiu deixar de operar nos segmentos de manutenção de instalações e equipamentos no Brasil por considerá-los não rentáveis. De acordo com o jornal brasileiro Valor, o Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econômica CADE já aprovou a transação, mas esta ainda precisa ser aprovada pela Petrobras. A KAEFER foi fundada em 1918 e especializa-se no isolamento, no acesso, na proteção de superfície e proteção passiva antifogo. A empresa tem operações em mais de 50 países e emprega cerca de 26,000 pessoas. A KAEFER tem um volume de negócios anual de cerca de EUR 1.5bn (USD 1.70bn). A Skanska é uma empresa multinacional de construção que opera nos segmentos de construção residencial e não residencial, e na área de construção civil pesada. A companhia gerou um faturamento de SEK 143.3bn (USD 17.38bn) e lucro líquido de SEK 3.84bn (USD 465.82mn) em 2014.

The company has more than 100 engineers and booked revenues of USD 13.4mn in 2014. Ditecsa specialises in engineering, installation, operation and maintenance of industrial projects and is owned by Gonzalo Madariaga. The sellers on the deal are Hong Kong Chaoang Holdings Co Ltd and private investors Shi Kan, Feng Tianfang and Zhao Yudi. The acquisition is in line with the buyer's effort to expand its business scale and improve its service value to consumers. Beijing Wushuang Technology Co Ltd develops and sells computer software and hardware. The transaction is carried out through the divestment of a 100% of Hong Kong's holding company Ever Flourish Development (HK) Co., Ltd which in turn holds the 40% stake in the target company. The sale is in line with GKE Corp's strategy to focus on its wholly-owned subsidiary, China's cement producer Wuzhou Xing Jian Ready-mix Co., Ltd in order to benefit from the rising demand for infrastructure materials in China. The sale proceeds will be used for working capital purposes. Maoming owns and operates a factory in China that produces and manufactures environmental friendly lightweight brick, building materials and cement products. GKE Corp, founded in 1995, provides logistics solutions and services, including general warehousing, conventional transportation, container trucking, project logistics, international sea and air freight forwarding services and non-ferrous metal storage. It is also involved in the business of building and chartering of vessels as well as in the infrastructure materials business. The company posted revenues of SGD 31.4mn (USD 22.4mn) for 2014.

111056 16/09/2015 印度 Private sector BPO operations of Serco Group 收购 The Blackstone Group LP 美国 Serco Group Plc 办公支持服务 (5614) 385.01 (官方数据) 100 U.K-based services firm Serco Group Plc has announced it has agreed to divest its private sector business process outsourcing (BPO) business in India to U.S investment firm Blackstone Group LP for a gross consideration of GBP 250mn (USD 385mn). The total consideration comprises a cash portion of GBP 220mn (USD 338.8mn) and a loan note worth GBP 30mn (USD 46.2mn). The acquired assets mainly include the third-party business process outsourcing and contact centre provider Intelenet, which Blackstone sold to Serco for USD 634mn in 2011. The sale is subject to customary closing conditions and approvals, and is expected to close by end-2015. It will be earnings neutral for Serco and will result in a reduction of its debt-to-EBITDA leverage ratio down to 1.0x. Post-transaction, the business will be rebranded back to Intelenet Global Services and will retain its current management team. The acquired BPO business provides middle and back office services and caters to global firms in the insurance, telecoms, travel, healthcare and finance sectors. It is expected to generate a revenue of GBP 235mn in 2015. Blackstone Group is a U.S.-based asset manager and financial advisory firm that focuses on private equity, alternative assets and real estate. It manages a total of around USD 330bn of assets across Asia, Europe and North America.
111050 16/09/2015 印度; 马来西亚; 新加坡 Gathergates Group Pte Ltd 收购 Nitto Kogyo Corporation 日本 Natural Cool Holdings Ltd 电气设备制造 (3353) 24.16 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 30 November 2015, Natural Cool Holdings announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Singapore-based air-conditioning and switchgear specialist Natural Cool Holdings Ltd announced it will sell 100% of its switchgear design and manufacturing business Gathergates Group Pte Ltd to Japanese peer Nitto Kogyo Corp for a total consideration of SGD 33.9mn (USD 24.1mn). The deal is subject to certain conditions precedent and is expected to complete by 30 November 2015. The sale price represents a premium of around SGD 15.1mn over the net asset value of the Gathergates Group as at 30 June 2015. Following the proposed divestment, Natural Cool Holdings' remaining businesses will comprise its air-conditioning business division and a newly acquired paint manufacturing business. The sale proceeds will be used by the seller for further investment in new potential businesses and for general working capital. Gathergates Group Pte Ltd, incorporated in 2008 in Singapore, designs and manufactures switchgear and controlgear products, which are marketed and sold under the brand Gathergates. The group operates in Singapore, Malaysia and India. Nitto Kogyo Corp, incorporated in 1948 in Japan, is mainly engaged in the designing, manufacturing and distribution of switchboard and controlling boards related products. The company is also involved in supporting electrical and information infrastructures through the development of electrical equipment, machines and proposals. Nitto Kogyo Corp is listed on Tokyo Stock Exchange and Nagoya Stock Exchange. Natural Cool Holdings installs and services air-condition systems in addition to designing, manufacturing and selling switchgears. The company is listed on the Singapore Exchange and its revenues were SGD 142.4mn (USD 103.7mn) for 2014.

111344 15/09/2015 土耳其 Messer Aligaz 收购 Air Liquide SA 法国 Messer Group GmbH 基础化学原料制造 (3251) 　 　 100 French industrial gas provider Air Liquide said it is acquiring Messer Aligaz, the Turkish subsidiary of German industrial gas company Messer Group GmbH. In a separate deal, Messer Group will acquire the Hungarian gas business of Air Liquide. No further financial details were disclosed. This acquisition is part of continued investments by Air Liquide in Turkey. Since 2011, the French company has invested in two production sites in capital Ankara and Izmir, western Turkey. With this acquisition, Air Liquide enters the Marmara region and will now be present in the industrial area of Istanbul. Messer Aligaz provides industrial, medical and specialty gases to a range of industries in Turkey. The company employs 70 and generated a revenue of around EUR 9mn in 2014. Air Liquide, founded in 1902, supplies industrial gases and services to various industries including medical, chemical and electronic manufacturers. It is present in 80 countries with more than 50,000 employees and serves more than two million customers and patients. The company is listed on the Euronext Stock Exchange and its revenues amounted to EUR 15.4bn in 2014. Messer Group, founded in 1898, is a family-owned business with operations in 31 countries worldwide. It manufactures and supplies oxygen, nitrogen, argon, carbon dioxide, hydrogen, helium, inert welding gases, special gases, gases for medicinal use and a wide variety of gas mixtures. For 2014, it reported total revenues of EUR 1.05bn and employs more than 5,400 people.

Financial terms were not disclosed. The deal is subject to antitrust approval, and is expected to be closed in about six months. The buyer is acting in the transaction through its Hungarian subsidiary, Messer Hungarogáz. The sale was carried out through the French company's subsidiary Air Liquide Eastern Europe S.A. Messer Hungarogáz will take over more than 50 employees, plus the target company's assets and customer relationships. The acquired assets include an on-site air separation unit, two nitrogen generators, a filling plant for gas cylinders, and road tankers, customer tanks and steel cylinders. In Hungary, Messer operates among others facilities to fill gas into cylinders. In a separate deal, Air Liquide announced the acquisition of Turkey-based Messer Aligaz Sanayi Gazlari from German Messer Group, accelerating its growth in the Turkish market. Messer Group, founded in 1898, is a family-owned business with operations in 31 countries worldwide. It manufactures and supplies oxygen, nitrogen, argon, carbon dioxide, hydrogen, helium, inert welding gases, special gases, gases for medicinal use and a wide variety of gas mixtures. For 2014, it reported total revenues of EUR 1.05bn and employs more than 5,400 people. Air Liquide, founded in 1902, supplies industrial gases and services to various industries including medical, chemical and electronic manufacturers. It is present in 80 countries with more than 50,000 employees and serves more than two million customers and patients. The company is listed on the Euronext Stock Exchange and its revenues amounted to EUR 15.4bn in 2014.

Mitsui & Co invested a total of USD 50mn and other participants in the round include a number of private investors spearheaded by Juan Abelló and his family, who took part in the investment round through Spanish investment firm Torreal. Existing shareholders Four G Capital and the International Finance Corporation (IFC) also participated in the investment round. Afrimax will use the proceeds to accelerate the rollout of its leading edge LTE-led business model across multiple African markets. In November 2014, Afrimax and British telecommunications group Vodafone jointly announced a non-equity strategic framework agreement to cooperate and explore opportunities for Partner Market agreements in the sub-Saharan Africa region. Under the agreement, Vodafone Uganda was launched in February 2015, combining the deployment of new high speed 4G networks with the use of existing infrastructure for 2G and 3G services. Afrimax is based in the Netherlands and was founded in 2011 by mobile telephony entrepreneurs Jay Metcalfe, Peter Langkilde and Rob Philpott. The company is building the largest portfolio of 4G wireless broadband networks across sub-Saharan Africa and currently has a 4G licence footprint in 12 countries Mitsui, established in 1947, is a global diversified trading company with interests in the energy, machinery and infrastructure, metals, chemicals, food, textile, logistics, and finance segments. The company operates a network of 140 offices in 66 countries worldwide and employs more than 47,000 people. Mitsui is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and generated revenues of JPY 5.4trln (USD 49.2bn) in its FY ended 31 March 2015.

Financial terms were not disclosed. The divestiture, which involves 32 out of the 33 KFC restaurants, will allow QSR to focus on the development throughout Costa Rica and Latin America of its three restaurant brands, namely Quiznos, Smashburger and Teriyaki Experience. Richard Eisenberg, President and co-founder of QSR, said that the proceeds from the sale will be used for the expansion of Quiznos and Smashburger in Costa Rica, as well as for acquisitions and new master franchises. QSR International currently operates 119 Quiznos, Smashburger and Teriyaki Experience restaurants in 16 countries across Latin America and the Caribbean.
111194 15/09/2015 泰国 Abaj World 收购 TAM International Pvt Ltd 印度 　 视听设备制造 (3343) 　 　 　 Indian logistics company TAM International Pvt Ltd has acquire Thailand-based digital electronics provider Abaj World, VCCircle reported. Financial details of the transaction was not disclosed. As per deal terms, the target will combine its business operations into TAM International. The buyer announced that the acquisition will enable the company to offer a broader range of services and increase its customer engagement. Abaj World offers HD, LCD and LED television in addition to vibration speakers. TAM International Pvt Ltd operates e-commerce platforms Surpluss.in and Bizpluss.in. Surpluss.in sells refurbished and unboxed products online while Bizpluss is an e-service platform that put distribution and retail business cloud.
111107 15/09/2015 阿根廷 A manufacturing plant of Sanofi 收购 Eurofarma Laboratorios Ltda 巴西 Sanofi SA 医药制造 (3254) 18 (市场估计) 100 Brazilian pharmaceutical company Eurofarma Laboratorios Ltda has acquired a manufacturing plant located in Argentina from its French peer Sanofi SA for an estimated USD 18mn, media sources reported. Eurofarma said that this acquisition will strengthen the company's operations in Argentina and that it is aligned with its strategy of consolidating its international operations and becoming an important regional player. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close in six to 12 months. Following completion of the deal, Sanofi will no longer have production assets in Argentina. The production facility is located in the city of La Matanza, Buenos Aires province. It manufactures liquid, solid and, semi-solid medicines, and has capacity of two million units per month. According to sources, the plant may require an investment of USD 6.5mn for modernization in order to meet the regulatory requirements. Eurofarma Laboratorios is engaged in the manufacturing and marketing of medical prescription, veterinary, and over-the-counter (OTC) drugs. The company is present in 15 Latin American countries and generated revenues of BRL 2.6bn (USD 672mn) for 2014.
111098 15/09/2015 阿根廷 Unisend SA (Bitcoin Exchange Argentina) 收购 BitPagos Inc 美国 　 互联网出版与传播 (516); 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 　 100 U.S.-based Latin America-focused bitcoin merchant payment processor BitPagos Inc said it has acquired Argentinean peer Unisend SA (Bitcoin Exchange Argentina). Financial terms were not disclosed. BitPagos said that this acquisition will allow the company to manage a fully operated bitcoin exchange on Gravel, a bitcoin purchasing platform BitPagos launched in August 2014 to enable its users to acquire bitcoins at 8,000 Argentinean convenience stores. Earlier this year, in June 2015, Unisend sold for an undisclosed sum its Mexican subsidiary Unisend SAPI de CV (Bitcoin Exchange Mexico) to Mexico's Bitso, an operator of a platform for exchanging Bitcoins. Argentina-based Unisend SA, founded in January 2014, is the first online platform for buying and selling Bitcoins in Argentina. BitPagos, founded in 2013, provides electronic payment gateway services in Latin America and operates an online payment processing platform. With the purchase of Unisend, it expects to process USD 1mn per month.
111090 15/09/2015 智利 Embotelladora Metropolitana SA (EMSA) 收购 Humus Capital Partners LLC; Private investor(s) 阿根廷 Myriam Lama - private investor 软饮料及食用冰制造 (31211) 　 　 100 Chilean soft drinks manufacturer Embotelladora Metropolitana SA (EMSA), also known as Embotelladora Latinoamericana SA (Elsa), has been acquired by a consortium of investors, EMSA's financial advisor reported. Financial terms were not disclosed. The investors included Argentinean private equity firm Humus Capital Partners LLC, Chilean private investor Andres Zuazagoitia, and another undisclosed Chilean investor. EMSA is engaged in the manufacturing and sale of soft drinks and beer with annual production capacity of 100 million litres. The company owns the soft drinks brands Cyro, Liv, Rari, Piri, Frog and Ship, as well as the craft beer brands Antillanca and Volcanes, among others. Humus Capital Partners is a private equity firm focused on investments in the middle market, emerging growth, buyout, growth capital investments, and others. The company invests primarily in the agribusiness sector in Latin America.
111069 15/09/2015 美国 InSite Vision Inc 收购 Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd 印度 Seller(s) unknown 医药制造 (3254) 48 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: The transaction was completed on 3 November 2015 through a short form merger under delaware law. ORIGINAL: India-based pharmaceuticals major Sun Pharmaceutical industries has entered into agreements to merge its unnamed wholly-owned U.S-based subsidiary with Insite Vision Inc which it will acquire through a tender offer for a total consideration of USD 48mn, the target announced. Sun Pharmaceuticals will pay a price of USD 0.35 per share of the target. The target terminated its earlier merger agreement with QLT Inc which required a termination fee of USD 2.7mn. Under the agreement, the target will enter into a secure loan transaction with Sun Pharmaceutical's subsidiary to repay QLT held secure notes and fund its operations until cessation. The acquisition will strengthen Sun Pharmaceutical's ophthalmic portfolio in the U.S. and is expected to be completed by the 4th quarter of 2015. Insite Vision is a U.S-based ophthalmologic product manufacturer and developer. The firm is headquartered in California and was founded in 1986. Insite Vision reported consolidated profit of USD 26.8mn for FY ended 31 December, 2015. Sun Pharmaceuticals is an Indian pharmaceutical company that manufactures, develops and markets pharmaceutical formulations as branded generics in India, and the U.S. among others. Sun reported consolidated net revenues of INR 160bn (USD 2.7bn) for FY ended 31 March, 2014 Note: Operating leases were capitalized and included towards debt for the purpose of EV calculation.
111046 15/09/2015 爱尔兰 Transaero Engineering Ireland Ltd 收购 Buyer(s) unknown 　 Transaero 交通运输辅助活动 (488) 　 　 100 Russia’s second largest air carrier Transaero sold its Irish technical services subsidiary Transaero Engineering Ireland Ltd to an undisclosed third party in April 2015, the seller announced in its consolidated financial report for H1 2015. As a result of the sale. Transaero recognised a loss of RUB 402mn (USD 5.94mn). Founded in 1962, Transaero Engineering Ireland Ltd is based at Shannon Airport. The company, formerly known as Air Atlanta Aero Engineering, was purchased by Transaero back in 2012. Transaero Engineering Ireland Ltd has a hangar of 65,000m2 and 9 workshops, and provides a full range of aircraft maintenance services. In the beginning of 2015, the management of the Irish company complained that they stopped receiving payments from their parent. The company then applied for court protection from creditors. As at 1 June 2015, the overall debt of Transaero towards creditors stood at RUB 250bn (USD 3.65bn), Herman Gref, the head of Sberbank, told Interfax earlier. Transaero was founded in 1990 and is the second largest sector player in Russia. The company operates 106 Boeing 777, 747, 767, 737, Airbus A321, Tu-214 aircrafts and two freight carriers Tu-204C. In January-July, Transaero serviced 7.5 million passengers, in 2014 - almost 13.2 million via a network to 260 domestic and international destinations. The company's base airports are Domodedovo and Vnukovo. In start-September 2015, Russian flag carrier Aeroflot agreed to acquire not less than 75% plus one share in Transaero and will begin to service the whole amount of the latter’s debt after a consultation with the banks on a debt restructuring programme.
111072 15/09/2015 乌克兰 Looksery Inc 收购 Snapchat Inc 美国 　 软件出版 (5112) 150 (市场估计) 100 U.S.-based photo messaging application company Snapchat acquired Ukrainian startup Looksery, news agency ain.ua reported. According to the source, the deal could be valued at nearly USD 150mn. Looksery as a standalone app, was removed from the AppStore, and became a part of Snapchat. The entire developer team of Looksery will be relocated to the US, to work with Snapchat's employees. Looksery allows editing and enhancing the image of users' faces in real time, even during a video chat. There are various filters - from eye colour to the shape of the skull. Created in 2011, Snapchat enables customers to take photos, record videos, add text and drawings, and send them to a controlled list of recipients. As of recently, the app also added cash transaction services.

Other participants in the round were RPMVentures and Seer Capital. The amount of the investment was not specified. The average sum Maxfield Capital usually extends in Series A rounds makes USD 2mn. The above is the third investment of Maxfield Capital in the sector of financial technologies. Pave was set up in 2012 and is based in New York. The company provides loans of up to USD 25,000 to technology-enabled millennials in the U.S.A. The interest rates start at 6%. Maxfield Capital is a venture capital firm that invests in global seed and early stage technology companies. The fund is focused on Israel, West and East Europe as well as the U.S.A. The other bidders for Fiesta's assets were Spanish snacks producer RISI SA and Spanish private equity firm Indes Capital SL. Colombina added that this acquisition will strengthen its presence in the European market, where the company expects to generate sales of about EUR 20mn (USD 22.6mn) one year after today's purchase. Fiesta produces confectionary products such as lollipops, gummy candy, twist and cables, freezable and others. Its flagship brands include Kojak and Freskitos. 111031 15/09/2015 尼日利亚 Multipro Enterprise Ltd 收购 Kellogg Company (Kellogg's) 美国 Tolaram Group 食品杂货批发 (4224) 450 (官方数据) 50 U.S. food manufacturer Kellogg Company (Kellogg's) announced that it has agreed to acquire a 50% stake in Nigerian food sales and distribution company Multipro for approximately USD 450mn. The sum of the deal represents a multiple of the average of the 2014 actual and 2015 expected EBITDA of 15 times; as well as a multiple of approximately 13 times the 2015 expected EBITDA. The final purchase price is subject to Multipro's actual EBITDA for 2015. The transaction forms part of a strategic alliance inked with Tolaram Africa, the African arm of Singaporean consumer goods group Tolaram. Kellogg's and Tolaram Africa will create a joint venture company, which will develop snacks and breakfast foods for the West African market. Also, Kellogg's has an option to acquire a stake in Tolaram Africa Foods, which holds a 49% stake in Nigerian noodles producer Dufil Prima. Kellogg's said that the strategic alliance with Tolaram Africa significantly increases its presence in the growing African market and advances its breakfast, snacks and emerging market strategies to drive future growth. Multipro currently operates 19 warehouses and focuses on the sale and distribution of instant noodles under the Indomie brand. The company is expected to book revenues of USD 750mn in 2015 and is currently establishing networks in other African countries including the Democratic Republic of Congo, Ivory Coast, Cameroon and Ethiopia. Kellogg Company is the world's largest cereal company and the second largest producer of cookies, crackers and savory snacks. The group produces more than 1,600 foods and its main brands include Kellogg's, Keebler, Special K, Pringles, Kellogg's Frosted Flakes, Pop-Tarts, Kellogg's Corn Flakes, Rice Krispies, Kashi, Cheez-It, Eggo and Mini-Wheats. Kellogg's is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and it generated revenues of over USD 14.6bn in 2014. Note: The Sales and EBITDA figures and the valuation multiples of Multipro are based on its expected results for FY 2015.

The deal deal is subject to regulatory approval in Colombia, Panama and Guatemala. In 2013, Bancolombia acquired a 40% stake in GAH for USD 217mn. The bank closed 2014 with more than 8,000 small to medium enterprise (SME) clients and an asset base of USD 1.33bn. 112567 14/09/2015 巴西 Meliuz Veiculacao e Divulgacao Virtual SA 收购 Fabrice Grinda - private investor; Jose Marin - private investor; Julio Vasconcellos - private investor 法国; 巴西 　 百货商场及其他综合性商店 (452); 电子购物 (454111) 　 　 Brazilian free discount coupons online platform Meliuz Veiculacao e Divulgacao Virtual SA has received an undisclosed equity investment from French entrepreneur Fabrice Grinda and local entrepreneurs Jose Marin and Julio Vasconcellos, Brazilian media sources reported. The startup will use the raised funds to invest heavily in marketing among people that feel unsatisfied with the customer loyalty programs, showing them the advantages that Meliuz offers. Meliuz, launched in 2011, is an online platform that offers free discount coupons, exclusively for Brazilian online stores. Additionally, the platform offers to its users the option to get back part of the amount spent to their bank accounts. The company has around one million users and 2,000 partner stores that offer discounts on electronics, clothing, shoes, airline tickets, collective buying coupons, movie tickets, hotel reservations, among others. Grinda, one of the founders of OLX, is an angel investor with more than 180 angel investments in companies such as Alibaba, Uber, Lending Club, Delivery Hero and Brightroll. Jose Marin is a Brazil focused venture capital investor that invests normally between USD 3mn and USD 6mn per project. His most successful investment was in Brazilian travel agency Viajanet. Julio Vasconcellos is a co-founder and CEO of online platform free discount coupons Peixe Urbano and is actively involved with a number of startups in the digital media. ______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A plataforma online brasileira Meliuz Veiculação e Divulgação Virtual SA recebeu um aporte de capital não divulgado do empresário francês Fabrice Grinda e dos empresários locais José Marin e Júlio Vasconcellos, fontes da mídia brasileira relataram. A startup vai usar os fundos captados para investir pesado em marketing para as pessoas que se sentem insatisfeitas com os programas de fidelização de clientes, mostrando-lhes as vantagens que a Meliuz oferece. A Meliuz, lançada em 2011, é uma plataforma online que disponibiliza gratuitamente cupons de desconto, exclusivamente para lojas virtuais brasileiras. Além disso, a plataforma oferece aos seus utilizadores a opção de receber de volta parte do valor gasto, nas suas contas bancárias. A empresa tem cerca de um milhão de usuários e 2,000 lojas parceiras que oferecem descontos em produtos eletrônicos, roupas, sapatos, passagens aéreas, cupons de compra coletiva, ingressos de cinema, reservas de hotéis, entre outros. O Fabrice Grinda, um dos fundadores da OLX, é um investidor-anjo com mais de 180 investimentos em empresas como Alibaba, Uber, Lending Club, Hero Entrega e Brightroll. O José Marin é um investidor de capital de risco com foco no Brasil que investe normalmente entre USD 3mn e USD 6mn por projeto. O seu investimento de maior sucesso foi na agência de viagens brasileira Viajanet. O Júlio Vasconcellos é co-fundador e CEO da plataforma online de cupons de desconto gratuítos Peixe Urbano e está ativamente envolvido em uma data de startups que atuam principalmente na mídia digital.

The financials of the transaction was not disclosed. The acquisition is in line with buyer's efforts to expand the company's supplier base in China and to make Barentz known worldwide. Upon the completion of the deal, Barentz will take over the management of New Skyport business, in which the company will operate under the legal entity Barentz (Shanghai) Trading Company Co Ltd. New Skyport distributes specialty ingredients for Food and Nutrition industry in China. The company offers its services to the food, beverage, confectionary, nutrition, supplements, health and well-being sectors. The closing of the transaction is expected by the end of 2015. The acquisition allows Brenntag to bring additional know-how and support customers in the personal care industry. The German chemical distributor has been present in Turkey for 10 years. Established in 1989, Parkoteks Kimya offers a wide range of specialty chemicals products with particular focus on the personal care industry. The Istanbul-based distribution company generated total sales of approximately EUR 14.3mn in 2014. Brenntag, established in 1874, is an international distributor and marketer of industrial and specialty chemicals. With a team of 13,500 employees, the company offers over 10,000 products to around 170,000 customers through a network of 490 storage and distribution facilities in 72 countries. The proceeds will be used for product development and expansion of the partner networks of vendors and telecom operators. In 2013, Cellrox attracted USD 4.7mn from several investors, including Runa Capital and the founder of Maxfield Capital, Alexander Turkot. Cellrox is developing mobile virtualisation software for Android-based mobile phones, which allows customers to use a single device for both corporate and personal needs under the so-called bring-your-own-device (BYOD) programs. Flint Capital was founded in 2013 by Dmitry Smirnov and Oleg Seydak. The fund specialises in financing hi-tech projects in the IT, media and telecom, as well as financial and consumer services sectors.
111014 14/09/2015 巴西 Paramaker 收购 Webedia SAS 法国 　 互联网出版与传播 (516) 　 　 51 French Internet group Webedia has acquired a 51% stake in Brazilian Internet broadcasting media company Paramaker for an undisclosed sum, Brazilian IT news portal Baguete reported. Under the agreement, Felipe Neto, founder of Paramaker, will be Chief Creative Officer (CCO) and Luther Peczan, vice-president of Webedia, will be CEO of the company. Mr. Pezcan said, quoted by Baguete, that Paramaker will work on consolidating its partnership relations with Youtube broadcasting channel, as it is very popular among Brazilian young people. To achieve this goal, the company is planning to create recording studios in the cities of Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo that will be submitted to the owners of Youtube. Peczan added that Webedia will be focused on creating synergies with Paramaker. Paramaker, founded in 2006, is a network focused on videomakers, responsible for more than 5,000 channels in Youtube and which offers support and advice to new producers in the site looking for professionalization. Among its most popular channels are 5inco Minutos with more than 5.7 million subscribers, Eu Fico Loko with 3.3 million subscribers and Rezendeevil 3.5 million members. Webedia, established in 2007, provides website publishing services. It is the largest French digital media group with 21.2 million unique visitors per month. The company's main brands include Allocine, Jeuxvideo.com, 750g and Purepeople. The company had a turnover of around BRL 8mn (USD 2.06mn) in 2014 in Brazil and expects to reach a global turnover of BRL 95 (USD 24.5mn) in 2015. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ O grupo francês de conteúdo digital Webedia adquiriu uma partoicipação acionária de 51% na network brasileira de canais na Internete Paramaker por uma valor não divulgado, o portal de notícias sobre TI Baguete apurou. Conforme os termos do acordo, o Felipe Neto, fundador da Paramaker, será o novo Chief Creative Officer (CCO) e o Luther Peczan, vice-presidente da Webedia, será o novo CEO da empresa. O Sr. Pezcan disse, citado pelo Baguete, que a Paramaker vai procurar consolidar as suas relações de parceria com o canal Youtube, por ser muito popular entre os jovens brasileiros. Para atingir este objetivo, a empresa está planejando a criação de estúdios de gravação no Rio de Janeiro e em São Paulo que serão oferecidos aos donos do Youtube. O Peczan acrescentou que o Webedia será focada na criação de sinergias com a Paramaker. A Paramaker, fundada em 2006, é uma rede virtual focada nos videomakers que gerencia mais de 5,000 canais no Youtube e oferece apoio e consultoria para novos produtores do site que buscam profissionalização. Entre os seus canais mais populares são o 5inco Minutos com mais de 5.7 milhões de inscritos, o Eu Fico Loko com 3.3 milhões de inscritos e o Rezendeevil com 35 milhões de inscritos. O Webedia, criado em 2007, presta serviços de publicação na Internete. É o maior grupo de mídia digital francês com cerca de 21.2 milhões de visitantes por mês. As principais marcas da empresa incluem AlloCiné, Jeuxvideo.com e 750g e PurePeople. No Brasil, o Webedia teve um faturamento de BRL 8mn (USD 2.06mn) em 2014 e projeta gerir um faturamento global de BRL 95 (USD 24.5mn) em 2015.

Financial terms were not disclosed but market sources estimate the deal value at approximately AUD 30mn (USD 21.3mn). Accolade Wines added that with this acquisition the company establishes presence in all major New World wine regions, cementing its position as a leading supplier of premium, commercial and value wines. Vina Anakena is engaged in the production and export of world-class, distinctly Chilean wines. Its flagship brands are ALWA, ONA, TAMA, ENCO, and VARIETALS. The company was founded by Felipe Ibanez and Jorge Gutierrez. Accolade Wines is also dedicated to the production, distribution and sale of wines internationally. The company owns brands such as Hardys, Grant Burge Wines, Banrock, Flagstone, Fish Hoek, Californian Geyser Peak, Atlas Peak, Mud House, Waipara Hills and others.

Seller in the deal is U.S.-based investment firm Anderson Perfect Fit Investors LLC. The buyer will settle the transaction through its Shanghai Shenda Import and Export Co Ltd's financial vehicle SSIE Holdings LLC. The acquisition is in line with the buyer's strategy of expanding its business and presence globally. PFI Holdings LLC processes yarn, bedding and home textiles. The company recorded revenues of USD 45mn in 2014. Shanghai Shenda Co Ltd manufactures textile products, automobile carpets and interior decorating fabrics. The company is listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 7bn (USD 1.1bn) in 2014.
111001 14/09/2015 印度 CanvasFlip Solutions Pvt Ltd 少数股权购买 Bessemer Venture Partners 美国 　 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518) 1.2 (官方数据) 　 India-based mobile application and testing software developer CanvasFlip Solutions Pvt Ltd, has raised USD1.2mn in a seed funding round from Bessemer Venture Partners, The Economic times reported. The proceeds from the round will be used to enhance and further develop its product capabilities. CanvasFlip Solutions is an Indian software developer which provides an online mobile and web-based application prototyping and testing platform. Its clients include Paytm, MakeMyTrip and Ixigo. CanvasFlip was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Noida. Bessemer Venture Partners is an international venture capital and private equity firm which focuses on technology, financial services, healthcare firms especially in India and Israel. It manages a total of over USD 4bn in more than 130 companies worldwide.
110965 14/09/2015 巴西 Jussi Intention Marketing Ltda 收购 WPP Plc 英国 　 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 　 　 　 U.K. marketing communications group WPP Plc announced it has acquired an undisclosed majority stake in Brazilian marketing agency Jussi Intention Marketing Ltda (Jussi), for an undisclosed sum. WPP acted through its New York- based wholly owned subsidiary Ogilvy Public Relations Worldwide (Ogilvy PR). Jussi will become a part of the Ogilvy Group in Brazil (Ogilvy & Mather, David Agency, Nine, Etco and Foster) and will continue to operate under its own brand. The investment aligns with the buyer's goal to become a leading company in the digital area in the Latin American region. Also, WPP wants to reinforce Ogilvy's leading position in the Brazilian market. Jussi, founded in 2010 and headquartered in the city of Sao Paulo, Brazil, is an online performance, programmatic and conversion marketing agency. Among its customers are Allianz Global Assistance, Amazon, Carrefour, Decathlon, FNAC, Google, Leroy Merlin and LinkedIn. The company employs more than 120 people. Ogilvy, created in 1980 in New York city, is a global public affairs agency that also provides Cleantech, clean technology communications and advocacy. It operates in more than 88 offices across six continents, including its offices in Sao Paulo, Brasilia and Rio de Janeiro. It provides services in the areas of advertising, direct marketing, activation, promotional and digital entertainment, and serves customers in consumer marketing, corporate, healthcare, public affairs, social marketing, and technology sectors worldwide. WPP, established in 1971, is a multinational marketing communications services provider, specialised in advertising, media investment management, consumer insight, public relations and public affairs, branding and identity, healthcare communications, direct, digital, promotion and relationship marketing. WPP is listed on the London Stock Exchange, and reached a turnover of GBP 11.5bn (USD 19bn) and a net income of GBP 1.08bn (USD 1.78bn) in 2014. _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora britânica de serviços de comunicação WPP Plc anunciou que adquiriu o controle acionário na agência brasileira de marketing Jussi Intention Marketing Ltda (Jussi), por um valor não revelado. A WPP atuou por meio de sua subsidiária integral baseada em Nova Iorque, Ogilvy Public Relations Worldwide (Ogilvy PR). |A Jussi vai passar a fazer parte do Grupo Ogilvy no Brasil (Ogilvy & Mather, David Agência, Nine, Etco e Foster) mas vai continuar a operar sob o mesmo nome. O investimento está em linha com a estratégia da compradora de se tornar líder no setor digital na América Latina. Com essa aquisição, busca também reforçar a liderança da Ogilvy no mercado brasileiro de comunicação. A Jussi, fundada em 2010 e sediada na cidade de São Paulo, Brasil, é uma agência digital, com foco em performance, programação e marketing. Entre seus clientes são Allianz Global Assistance, Amazon, Carrefour, Decathlon, FNAC, Google, Leroy Merlin e LinkedIn. A empresa emprega mais de 120 pessoas. A Ogilvy, criada em 1980 na cidade de Nova Iorque, é uma agência de relações públicas internacional que fornece também Cleantech, comunicações de tecnologia limpa e advocacia. A empresa opera mais de 88 escritórios em seis continentes, incluindo seus escritórios em São Paulo, Brasília e Rio de Janeiro. Fornece serviços nas áreas de publicidade, marketing direto, ativação, entretenimento promocional e digital, e atende clientes em marketing de consumo, empresas, assistência médica, relações públicas, marketing social, e setores de tecnologia, a nível internacional. A WPP, criada em 1971, é uma proveedora multinacional de serviços de comunicação de marketing, especializada em propaganda, gerenciamento de investimento de mídia, percepção do consumidor, relações públicas, construção de marcas e identidade, comunicação em saúde, marketing direto, internet e digital. A WPP está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Londres, e apresentou um faturamento de GBP 11.5bn (USD 19bn) e um lucro líquido de GBP 1.08bn (USD 1.78bn) em 2014.
