With this acquisition, Grupo Sura increases its interest in SURA Asset Management from 67.05% to 71.38%. SURA Asset Management is specialized in the pension, saving and investment. It has operations in Chile, Colombia, El Salvador, Mexico, Peru, and Uruguay. As of 30 June 2015, SURA had assets under management of USD 112.8bn and a net debt of USD 902.3mn. The company generated a net income of COP 480.6bn (USD 155.4mn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. Grupo Sura is a Colombian investment holding company with investments in leading companies across Latin and Central America. Its investment portfolio is mainly focused on the financial, insurance and social security sector, as well as on industrials such as cement, energy, mining, real estate and food, among others. Grupo Sura reported total revenues of COP 10.7tn (USD 3.41bn) and a net income of COP 650.2bn (USD 206mn) for 2014. On 8 September 2015, Grupo Sura reported it has agreed to acquire a 99.6% stake in the Latin American operations of U.K.-based insurer RSA Insurance Group plc for COP 1.91tn (USD 614mn) in cash.
110985 14/09/2015 捷克共和国 Retail banking and card businesses of Citigroup 收购 Raiffeisen Bank International AG 奥地利 Citigroup Inc 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 100 UPDATE 2: The transaction was closed on 1 March 2016. UPDATE 1: On 5 January 2016, Czech National Bank (CNB) approved the deal. ORIGINAL: Austrian lender Raiffeisen Bank International (RBI) announced that it has agreed to acquire Citigroup's retail banking business and card businesses in the Czech Republic. Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. The deal is subject to regulatory and other approvals, and is expected to close in Q1 2016. The deal aligns with RBI's strategy to reduce its risk-weighted assets and grow in selected markets that are in a strong position to generate sustainable returns. Citigroup plans to focus on the markets where it has the greatest scale and growth potential. The bank is exiting its retail banking business in 11 countries. Raiffeisen Bank International is a leading corporate and investment bank in Austria, as well as in Central and Eastern Europe where it covers 15 regional markets. Raiffeisen has been active in the Czech Republic since 1993. The lender is the fifth-largest bank in the Czech Republic by total assets. As of H1 2015, Raiffeisen served around 397,000 customers through 125 business outlets in the Czech Republic and had about 2,700 employees. U.S.-based Citigroup is a global retail and investment bank with some 200 million customers in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions across the world. In 2014, the group posted a net profit of USD 6.7bn. Its shares are listed on the New York Stock Exchange.
110970 14/09/2015 阿根廷 Nextel Communications Argentina SRL 收购 Grupo Clarin SA 阿根廷 NII Holdings Inc 移动电信服务（卫星除外） (5172) 178 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE 3: On 28 January 2016, NII Holdings said it closed the sale of the 51% stake in Nextel Communications Argentina to Grupo Clarin for USD 178mn. UPDATE 2: On 25 September 2015, AFTIC declared the deal between Grupo Clarin and NII Holdings illegal as the parties did not request prior authorization which violates the telecommunications sector's regulatory framework. UPDATE 1: On 14 September 2015, Argentina's federal telecommunications regulator AFTIC announced that it has not given authorization for the transaction. ORIGINAL: Argentinean media group Grupo Clarin SA announced that it has acquired a 49% stake in local telecommunications company Nextel Communications Argentina SRL and expects to also acquire the remaining 51% for an aggregate consideration of USD 178mn (ARS 1.66bn). The purchase of the 49% stake from U.S. telecom NII Holdings Inc was completed on the day of the deal announcement. The acquisition of the 51% is subject to regulatory and other approvals. Grupo Clarin added that it has made an up-front cash payment of USD 159mn, with the remaining USD 19mn to be paid within the next 30 days. NII Holdings said that the sale is aligned with its strategy to focus on its Brazilian operations, and added that it will use the proceeds to provide extra liquidity for its subsidiary in Brazil. Nextel Communications Argentina offers mobile telephony, short messaging, radio and data transmission services. The company, which has a 3% market share in Argentina, generated sales revenues of USD 425mn and a net income of USD 76.2mn for 2014. Grupo Clarin is engaged in the printing and publishing of newspapers and magazines, in the production and broadcasting of radio, television and internet content, as well as in the provision of wired and wireless telecommunications services. The group reported total revenues of ARS 19.62bn (USD 2.1bn) and a net income of ARS 804.1mn (USD 86mn) for 2014. NII Holdings offers wireless communication services under the Nextel brand name to clients in Mexico, Brazil and Argentina. It reported sales revenues of USD 3.7bn and a net loss of USD 1.96bn for 2014. NII Holdings closed the USD 410.6mn sale of its Peruvian subsidiary Nextel del Peru SA to Chilean telecommunications company Empresa Nacional de Telecomunicaciones SA (Entel) in August 2013. The U.S. company also divested its Chilean subsidiary Nextel Chile SA for an estimated USD 250mn in August 2014, and completed the sale of its Mexican subsidiary Comunicaciones Nextel de Mexico SA de CV to U.S. telecom giant AT&T Inc for USD 1.87bn in April 2015.

The round was also participated by Unitus Seed Fund. The capital raised will be used to migrate its sensor manufacturing and establish its own manufacturing plant in Mumbai, develop back-end IT operations and expand India trials of its ‘iBreastExam’ device. UE LifeSciences is a U.S-based medical equipment manufacturer that focuses on early- stage breast cancer detection equipment.It was established in 2009 and is headquartered in Philadelphia. 110950 14/09/2015 新西兰 Silver Fern Farms Ltd 收购 Bright Food (Group) Co Ltd 中国 　 畜牧业 (112) 165.02 (官方数据) 50 China's Bright Food (Group) Co Ltd announced that its 38%-owned listed unit Shanghai Maling Aquarius Co Ltd will invest NZD 261mn (USD 165mn) in exchange for a 50% stake in New Zealand-based meat co-operative Silver Fern Farms. The transaction values the target company's equity at NZD 311mn, and its ordinary shares at NZD 2.84 each. At the end of its fiscal year 2014, Silver Fern Farms had 100.38 million New ordinary shares outstanding, as well as 15.9 million Members' ordinary shares and 5.5 million Supplier investment shares According to the deal terms, Silver Fern Farms will redeem its 5.5 million Supplier investment shares, and will also pay a dividend of NZD 0.30 (for a total of NZD 35mn) to ordinary and rebate shareholders. The meat co-operative will have a positive cash position with no debt by the end of next year as a result of the acquisition. The transaction is in line with the buyer's strategy to acquire international agricultural companies while also helping the New Zealand meat industry. Silver Fern Farms has reportedly been seeking a USD 100mn capital injection to improve its balance sheet and repay bank loans. Silver Fern Farms Ltd is currently New Zealand's largest livestock processing and marketing company and operates as a multinational co-operative owned by 16,000 farmers. The company booked revenues of NZD 2.3bn (USD 1.5bn) in 2014. For 2015, it is expected to generate EBITDA of NZD 75-85mn. Bright Food (Group) Co Ltd processes and produces dairy products, agricultural products, food, sugar and rice wine products. The company is currently the fourth largest player in China's dairy market. Shanghai Maling Aquarius Co Ltd processes, produces and distributes meat, spices, fruit, vegetables, frozen food and seafood products under the brand name Maling. The company is listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange and had revenues of CNY 10.5bn (USD 1.7bn) in 2014. Note 1: All multiples, Market Value of Equity (USD mn) and Enterprise Value (USD mn) are on a pre-money basis. Note 2: The pre-money market value of equity (MVE) of the target company is assumed to be NZD 311mn, as disclosed.

The company is based in France and operates mainly in Ivory Coast and Senegal through concession companies including CIE, SODECI, SDE and electricity producer CIPREL. Eranove sells electricity to over 1.3 million clients and water to 1.4 million clients and generated revenues of EUR 430mn (USD 571.3mn) in 2014. 103481 14/09/2015 巴西 Beraca Ingredientes Naturais SA 少数股权购买 Clariant AG 瑞士 Beraca Sabara Quimicos e Ingredientes SA 医药制造 (3254); 日用化学产品制造 (3256) 　 　 30 UPDATE: On 26 November 2015, Clariant announced the completion of the transaction. ORIGINAL: Swiss specialty chemicals manufacturer Clariant AG has agreed to acquire a 30% stake in health and personal care product line Beraca Ingredientes Naturais SA of Brazilian organic ingredients provider Beraca Sabara Quimicos e Ingredientes SA for an undisclosed sum, seller's legal adviser announced. Clariant said that there is possibility of major participation in the future. Clariant added that the deal fits with its strategy for value creation based on sustainability and that the investment will enhance its innovation capabilities in the field of natural ingredients for cosmetics and personal care applications. Beraca Sabara Quimicos e Ingredientes SA is a provider of natural and organic certified ingredients sustainably drawn from Brazil's biodiversity, particularly the Amazon rainforest. The company is specialised in the development of high-performance technology, solutions and raw materials for the water treatment, cosmetic, animal nutrition and food and beverage industries. Clariant, established in 1995, specialises in the development, manufacturing and sale of specialty chemicals for various end markets within four business areas: care chemicals, catalysis & energy, natural resources, and plastics & coatings. The company is active in over 150 countries and has some 18,100 employees. Clariant is listed on the SIX Swiss Stock Exchange, and posted CHF 6.08bn (USD 6.27bn) in revenues and a net income of CHF 235mn (USD 242.33mn) in 2014. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 26 de novembro de 2015 a Clariant anunciou o fechamento do negócio. ORIGINAL: A fabricante suíça de especialidades químicas Clariant AG concordou em adquirir uma participação de 30% no segmento de saúde e cuidados pessoais da Beraca Ingredientes Naturais SA do provedor brasileiro de ingredientes naturais e orgânicos, Beraca Sabara Quimicos e Ingredientes SA, por uma quantia não revelada . A Clariant disse que há possibilidade de aumentar a participação no futuro. A Clariant acrescentou que o negócio se encaixa com a sua estratégia de criação de valor com base na sustentabilidade e que o investimento vai reforçar as suas capacidades de inovação na área de ingredientes naturais para cosméticos e aplicações de cuidados pessoais. A Beraca Sabará Químicos e Ingredientes S.A. é um fornecedor de ingredientes naturais e orgânicos certificados, sustentavelmente estraídos da biodiversidade do Brasil , em especial da floresta amazônica. A empresa é especializada no desenvolvimento de tecnologia de alta performance, soluções e matérias-primas para o tratamento de água, cosmético , nutrição animal e indústrias de alimentos e bebidas. A Clariant, criada em 1995, é especializada no desenvolvimento, fabricação e venda de especialidades químicas para vários mercados finais dentro de quatro áreas de negócios: produtos químicos de cuidados, catálise e energia, recursos naturais e plásticos e revestimentos. A empresa está presente em mais de 150 países e tem cerca de 18.100 funcionários. A Clariant está listada no SIX Swiss Stock Exchange, e postou CHF 6.08bn (USD 6.27bn) em receitas e um lucro líquido de CHF 235mn (USD 242.33mn) em 2014.
111037 12/09/2015 南非 Distell Winemasters (K) Ltd 收购 Kenya Wine Agencies Holdings East Africa Ltd (KHEAL) 肯尼亚 Distell Group Ltd 啤酒、葡萄酒和蒸馏酒精饮料批发 (4228) 　 　 　 Kenyan winemaker Kenya Wine Agencies Holdings East Africa (KHEAL) has agreed to acquire South African wine and spirits distribution firm Distell Winemasters (K) from South African wine and spirit group Distell. Kenyan newspaper The EastAfrican reported. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. The EastAfrican said that KHEAL hopes that the purchase will boost its flagging business in East Africa. "The fate of the employees of Distell Winemasters will be dependent on the final outcome of the transaction. However, we do not envisage Distell Winemasters employees being affected adversely by any potential transaction," said Distell Africa's corporate and regulatory affairs manager Maurice DeVries. In 2014, Distell bought a 26% stake in KHEAL for ZAR 111.3mn (USD 10.1mn). The South African group now has two seats on the board of KHEAL. Distell Winemasters currently distributes all Distell Group brands in East Africa not exclusive to KHEAL's subsidiary Kenya Wine Agencies, including Overmeer, 4th Street, Nederburg, Hunters, Knights Whisky, Obikwa, Zonnebloem and DurbanVille Hills. The company employs 21 people and has annual sales revenues of USD 2.64mn. Kenya Wine Agencies Holdings East Africa is Kenya's leading spirits manufacturer, bottler and distributor and its main subsidiary is Kenya Wine Agencies. The group has five distribution centres in Kenya and one in Uganda, as well as a wholly-owned subsidiary in Rwanda.
111725 11/09/2015 波黑共和国 ZIF Kristal Invest Fond ad Banja Luka 收购 Thaler Vermagensverwaltung GmbH 奥地利 　 基金、信托及其他金融工具 (525) 6.88 (DW 估计) 70 Austrian holding company Thaler Vermogensverwaltung GmbH, owned by German businessman Georg Thaler, has acquired a 70% stake in Bosnian investment fund ZIF Kristal Invest Fond a.d. Banja Luka, Bosnian business portal Capital.ba reported. Financial terms and the sellers were not disclosed. Based on the target's closing price of BAM 5.31 (USD 3.04) per share on 10 September 2015, the day before the announcement, the transaction is estimated at BAM 11.9mn (USD 6.8mn). The 70% stake is equal to 2,257,380 shares, based on the 3,224,829 total shares in issue of ZIF Kristal Invest Fond a.d. In a separate deal, Thaler has acquired Bosnian investment fund ZIF Zepter fond a.d. Banja Luka, for an estimated BAM 48.1mn (USD 27.6mn). ZIF Kristal Invest Fond a.d. Banja Luka, the legal successor of PIF Kristal Invest Fond a.d., is a closed-end investment fund which owns interests in 82 companies and 6 other investments funds. The fund mainly invests in companies active in the energy sector, on a long- and short-term basis, as well as in the deposits and bonds. It is managed by DUIF Kristal Invest a.d. Banja Luka.
111718 11/09/2015 波黑共和国 ZIF Zepter Fond ad Banja Luka 收购 Thaler Vermagensverwaltung GmbH 奥地利 Philip Zepter - private investor 基金、信托及其他金融工具 (525) 27.61 (DW 估计) 100 Austrian holding company Thaler Vermogensverwaltung GmbH, owned by German businessman Georg Thaler, has acquired Bosnian investment fund ZIF Zepter fond a.d. Banja Luka, local business portal Capital.ba reported. Financial terms were not disclosed. The seller in the deal is Bosnian businessman Philip Zepter, who owned the target through his firm Zepter International. The transaction was carried through the acquisition of Zepter Invest a.d., the manager of ZIF Zepter Fond a.d. Based on the target's closing price of BAM 6.46 (USD 3.70) per share on 10 September 2015, the day before the announcement, the transaction is estimated at BAM 48.1mn (USD 27.6mn). In a separate deal, Thaler has acquired Bosnian investment fund ZIF Kristal Invest Fond a.d. Banja Luka for an estimated sum of BAM 11.9mn (USD 6.8mn). ZIF Zepter fond a.d. is a closed-end investment fund that controls shares in some 124 companies, with a combined net value of over BAM 100mn (USD 57.7mn). In the first half of 2015, the fund posted a total of BAM 4.2mn (USD 2.40) in dividend income, of which the largest part of BAM 2.7mn came from investments in Telekom Srpske, and the remaining income came from investments in other telecom companies. The fund invests in domestic and foreign companies active in telecom, agriculture, food processing, energy, mining and financial sectors, from countries such as Croatia, Serbia, Montenegro, Macedonia, Austria, Germany and Spain.
111213 11/09/2015 台湾 Chingis Technology Corp 收购 MediaTek Inc 台湾 Integrated Silicon Solution Inc 半导体及相关设备制造业 (334413) 27.1 (官方数据) 100 Taiwanese fabless semiconductor company MediaTek Inc has acquired local flash memory technolgy firm Chingis Technology Corp from U.S.-based Integrated Silicon Solution Inc for USD 27.1mn, the seller disclosed. The sale is part of the seller's internal restructuring in Taiwan where in all assets to be divested are transferred to its subsidiary Chingis Technology which MediaTek acquired. The restructuring is due to the acquisition of Integrated Silicon Solution by Chinese consortium Uphill Investment Co at USD 23 per share. Chingis Technology Corp develops PMOS non-volatile memory technology. It also designs and manufactures standard NOR flash products in addition to providing technical consultation in design and manufacturing of embedded products. MediaTek Inc prides chips for wireless communications, HDTVs, DVDs and Blu-ray. The company develops octa-core smartphone platform with LTE and CorePilot technologies. MediaTek posted revenues of TWD 213.1bn (USD 6.7bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. Integrated Silicon Solution Inc designs and market high performance integrated circuits for the automotive, communications, industrial and digital consumer sectors. Its products include high speed and low power SRAM as well as low, medium and high density DRAM. Integrated Silicon Solution had revenues of USD 329mn for FY ended 30 September 2014.
111105 11/09/2015 罗马尼亚 Two NIC grocery stores in Bucharest 收购 Louis Delhaize Group 比利时 General Nic Import Export SRL 超市和食品杂货店 (4451) 　 　 100 Romanian grocery store chain General Nic Import Export SRL has agreed to sell two supermarkets located in Bucharest to Belgian international food retailer Delhaize Group, Mediafax reported. Financial details were not disclosed. The deal is subject to approval from Romania's Competition Council. Following the deal, Delhaize will consolidate its position in Bucharest, mainly in the districts of Amzei, Dorobanti and Cotroceni. Delhaize is acting in the transaction through its Romanian grocery retailer Mega Image SRL. Delhaize entered the Romanian market in 1995 and it currently owns a network of 433 stores in Bucharest, Constanta, Ploiesti, Brasov, Targoviste and other cities under brands Mega Image (201), Shop & Go ( 229) AB Cool Food (1), Gusturi Romanesti (2). Delhaize Group, founded in 1867, operates currently on three continents. Recently, in June 2015, Delhaize announced it will be taken over by Dutch group Royal Ahold for nearly EUR 9.32bn in stocks, in what will be the largest transaction in the retail industry in almost 10 years. General Nic Import Export SRL, founded in 1990, is a family-run busines, which operates three supermarkets in Bucharest, one tobacco shop and one shop with items for children. For 2014, it reported revenues of RON 59mn (USD 15.0mn).
110964 11/09/2015 印度 Indian Energy Exchange Ltd (IEX) 少数股权购买 TVS Capital Funds Ltd 印度 Bessemer Venture Partners 证券和商品期货交易 (5232) 11.08 (市场估计) 3.1 Indian private equity major TVS Capital Funds Ltd has acquired a 3.1% stake in Indian Energy Exchange Ltd (IEX) from Bessermer Venture Partners for a total consideration of INR 720mn (USD 11.1mn), The Economic Times reported. The deal values the target at INR 25bn (USD 417.6mn). According to The Economic Times, Bessemer will hold around 6% in the company after the transaction. Separate from the deal, TVS Capital is a part of a consortium to buy a 25.64% in the target from Financial Technologies India Ltd for INR 5.8bn (USD 94mn). Indian Energy Exchange is an electricity exchange platform which facilitates day-ahead, team-ahead, renewable energy certificates and energy certificates trading. It has over 4,000 participants from more than 1,000 private generators, and more than 3,000 consumers. IEX reported total assets of as of INR 3.7bn (USD 61.6mn) as of 31 March, 2015. TVS Capital is an Indian asset management company that focuses firms in the retail healthcare, education, media, and consumer goods among others. Its portfolio includes Chilis, RBL Bank, Papa John's and the National Stock Exchange of India. TVS Capital manages over INR 11bn (USD 165.6mn) worth of assets.
110946 11/09/2015 斯洛文尼亚 Kempinski Palace Hotel Portoroz 收购 MK Group doo 塞尔维亚 Istrabenz Holding Company 住宿服务 (721) 28.06 (市场估计) 100 UPDATE: On 28 October 2015, Istrabenz Holding announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Serbian diversified holding company MK Group will acquire the luxurious hotel Kempinski Palace Hotel Portorož, located on the Adriatic coast in southwestern Slovenia, for EUR 25mn (USD 28.06mn), the Slovenian Press Agency reported. The sale is in line with Istrabenz Holding' divestment plans, agreed between the indebted holding company and its creditors. According to Serbian business daily Poslovni dnevnik, the deal value is much lower than the hotel's valuation of up to EUR 90mn. The actual buyer is Switzerland-based Agri Holding AG, part of MK Group, which in turn is acting through Serbian-based tourism arm MK Mountain Resort d.o.o. The seller in the deal is Slovenian hotel operator Istrabenz Turizem d.d., a subsidiary of Istrabenz Holding. Kempinski Palace Hotel Portorož is a five-star deluxe hotel that re-opened in 2008. It was originally opened in 1910 but then closed in 1990. Currently, the hotel offers 164 rooms and 17 suites. MK Group, founded in 1983, is a Serbian holding company engaged in production and trading of agricultural commodities, sugar production and distribution, meat production and processing, commerce, tourism, IT, financial services, real estate and renewable energy. It also operates farming and grain storage in Ukraine. In 2013, the group reported revenues of RSD 612mn (USD 5.5mn) and a net profit of RSD 497mn (USD 4.5mn). The group is controlled by local businessman Miodrag Kostic. Istrabenz Holding has been operating as an investment manager since 1984. It invests in different segments of the market, such as energy, tourism or IT. The company is listed on the Ljubljana Stock Exchange. For 2014, it reported revenues of EUR 39.78mn. Istrabenz Turizem also owns the Lifeclass Grand Hotel Portorož, as well as hotels Apollo, Riviera, Slovenija, Neptun and Mirna.
110923 11/09/2015 南非 Attix5 收购 Redstor Ltd 英国 　 软件出版 (5112); 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518) 　 100 British cloud services provider Redstor announced the acquisition of South African software developer Attix5. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Redstor said that the purchase will transform it into an international software and services business. The company added that Attix5 has been an integral partner for 10 years, providing the underlying technology that drives its backup service for schools (RBUSS). Attix5 was founded in 1999 and is a provider of secure data protection, recovery and storage, specialising in virtualisation and cloud-based solutions. The company has a development office in the city of Stellenbosch and sales and support offices in Johannesburg and the English city of Reading. Redstor was founded in 1998 and is a provider of cloud backup and disaster recovery software and services. The company's business spans three main areas, namely solving storage issues for businesses; remotely managing clients' own data and delivering online backup and cloud services to organisations directly and through partners.
110894 11/09/2015 巴西 Consagro Agroquimica Ltda 收购 Atanor do Brasil Ltda 巴西 FMC Corp 农药、肥料和其他农用化学品的制造 (3253) 　 　 　 U.S.-based chemicals producer FMC Corp announced it has entered into agreement to sell its Brazilian distribution and sales subsidiary Consagro Agroquimica Ltda to Brazilian peer Atanor do Brasil Ltda, a subsidiary of U.S. crop protection products supplier Albaugh, LLC. The transaction is subject to regulatory approvals and the fulfilment of certain conditions. Mark Douglas, president of FMC Agricultural Solutions, said that the sale of Consagro is part of the company's strategy to focus on its portfolio of valued-added products, such as the Cheminova product line in Brazil that was acquired in April, 2015. Consagro, headquartered in the city of Campinas (Sao Paulo state, Brazil) is engaged in the sale and distribution of agrochemical products, such as fungicides, herbicides, insecticides, acaricides, among others. Atanor was founded in 1997 in the municipality of Porto Alegre (Rio Grande do Sul state, Brazil) operates a factory in Rio de Janeiro that produces Copper-based fungicides. Albaugh, headquartered in the city of Ankeny (Iowa state, USA), supplies crop protection products to customers with manufacturing facilities in the United States, Argentina, Brazil, Mexico and Europe. FMC produces chemicals for the agricultural, industrial and consumer markets in North America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Latin America, and the Asia Pacific. It operates in three different segments: Agricultural Solutions, Health and Nutrition and Lithium. The company employs approximately 7,000 people and had a revenue of approximately USD 4.5bn in 2014. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A fabricante estadunidense de produtos químicos FMC Corp anunciou a celebrañçao do acordo de venda da sua filial brasileira de distribuição e vendas Consagro Agroquímica Ltda para a empresa brasileira do mesmo ramo Atanor do Brasil Ltda, que é subsidiária da empresa estadunidense de proteñçao de cultivos Albaugh, LLC. A transação está sujeita a aprovações regulatórias e ao cumprimento de determinadas condições. O Mark Douglas, presidente da FMC Agricultural Solutions, disse que a venda da Consagro está alinhada com a estratégia da empresa de se concentrar num portfólio de produtos de valor acrescentado, tais como a linha de produtos Cheminova no Brasil, que foi adquirida em abril de 2015. A Consagro, localizada na cidade de Campinas (estado de São Paulo, Brasil) está envolvida na venda e distribuição de produtos agroquímicos, tais como fungicidas, herbicidas, inseticidas, acaricidas, entre outros. A Atanor foi fundada em 1997 no município de Porto Alegre (estado do Rio Grande do Sul, Brasil) e opera uma fábrica no Rio de Janeiro que produz fungicidas à base de cobre. A Albaugh, sediada na cidade de Ankeny (estado de Iowa, EUA), fornece produtos de protecção de cultivos para clientes com instalações fabris nos Estados Unidos, Argentina, Brasil, México e Europa. A FMC produz químicos para os mercados agrícolas, industriais e de consumo na América do Norte, Europa, Médio Oriente, África, América Latina e Ásia-Pacífico. Opera em três segmentos diferentes: Soluções para a Agricultura, Saúde e Nutrição e lítio. A empresa emprega cerca de 7,000 pessoas e teve um faturamento de aproximadamente USD 4.5bn em 2014.
110882 11/09/2015 巴西 PPE Fios Esmaltados SA 收购 ASTA Elektrodraht GmbH & Co KG 奥地利 　 金属丝绳及其制品的制造 (3326) 　 　 51 Austrian wire manufacturer ASTA Elektrodraht GmbH & Co KG (ASTA) announced it has acquired a 51% stake in Brazilian peer PPE Fios Esmaltados SA (PPE), for an undisclosed sum. Under the agreement, ASTA will have the option to buy the remaining stake of 49% within four years counted from the closing date. ASTA is a member of Montana Tech Components AG (MTC), a Swiss technology and innovation-oriented industrial group. Michael Tojner, CEO of MTC, said that the acquisition of PPE is an important step towards global leadership in the area of winding material for transformers and generators, as it is the largest producer of magnetic wires in South America. After the incorporation of PPE, ASTA will reach a turnover of approximately BRL 1.54bn (USD 402.47) and will employ about 900 people. Therefore the whole industrial group MTC will exceed the BRL 4.27bn (USD 1.12bn) revenue threshold. PPE is headquartered in the municipality of Cerquilho (Sao Paulo state, Brazil) and produces wires and cables that exports for the U.S. The company's product portfolio includes enameled and covered copper and aluminum wires, transposed cables, copper and aluminum products, and magnet wires, used in the energy-market as well as in the manufacturing of auto parts, hermetic motors and home appliances, among others. It operates two plants, one in the state of Sao Paulo and another, smaller one, in the state of Santa Catarina. The company employs 350 people and has an annual turnover of approximately BRL 600mn (USD 156.74mn). ASTA, founded in 1814 and located in the district of Bezirk Wiener Neustadt (Lower Austria state, Austria), operates as a subsidiary of ASTA Holdings GmbH. It manufactures winding wire for electrical machinery, including continuously transposed conductors, industrial and traction transformers and pumping systems, among others. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A fabricante austríaca de fios de arame ASTA Elektrodraht GmbH & Co KG (ASTA) anunciou a aquisição de uma participação de 51% na empresa brasileira do mesmo ramo PPE Fios Esmaltados SA (PPE), por um valor não divulgado. Pelo acordo, a ASTA vai ter a opção de comprar da participação remanescente de 49% dentro de um prazo de quatro anos, contados a partir da data de fechamento. A ASTA pertence ao Montana Tech Components AG (MTC), um grupo industrial suíço, orientado para a tecnologia e a inovação. O Michael Tojner, CEO da MTC, disse que a aquisição da PPE é um passo importante na direção da liderança global na produção de material para enrolamento de transformadores e geradores, visto que é a maior produtora de fios magnéticos na América do Sul. Após à incorporação da PPE, a ASTA espera atingir um faturamento de aproximadamente BRL1.54bn (USD 402.47) e vai empregar cerca de 900 pessoas. Assim sendo, o grupo industrial MTC deverá chegar a um faturamento máximo de BRL 4.27bn (USD 1.12bn). A PPE está sediada no município de Cerquilho (estado de São Paulo, Brasil) e produz fios de arame e cabos que exporta para os EUA. O portfólio de produtos da empresa inclui fios de arame esmaltados de cobre e alumínio, cabos transpostos, produtos de cobre e alumínio e fios magnéticos, utilizado no mercado de energia elétrica, e também na fabricação de autopeças, motores herméticos e eletrodomésticos, entre outros. A empresa opera duas fábricas, uma no Estado de São Paulo e outra, mais pequena, no estado de Santa Catarina. A companhia emprega 350 pessoas e tem um faturamento anual de cerca de BRL 600mn (USD 156.74mn). A ASTA, constituída em 1814 e localizada no distrito de Bezirk Wiener Neustadt (estado da Baixa Áustria, Áustria), é uma subsidiária da ASTA Holdings GmbH. A empresa fabrica arame para embalagem de equipamento eléctrico, incluindo condutores continuamente transpostos, transformadores industriais e de tração e sistemas de bombeamento, entre outros.
118810 10/09/2015 秘鲁 IRMIN SAC 合资企业 Indico Resources Ltd; Aruntani SAC 加拿大; 秘鲁 　 铜、镍、铅、锌矿的开采 (21223) 18.7 (官方数据) 100 Canadian junior mining company Indico Resources Ltd and Peruvian peer Aruntani SAC have agreed to invest USD 18.7mn for the creation of a joint venture for the development of the Irmin Porphyry Project, located in the Arequipa region, Peru. Indico and Aruntani will form a new company, called IRMIN SAC in which they will hold 30% and 70%, respectively. Aruntani has already spent in excess of USD 0.8mn on project access and community related activities, as well as on camp relocation and project assessment. In addition, in April 2016, Aruntani has made an annual payment of USD 2mn for the development of the project. The Irmin Porphyry Project consists of 23 concessions on a total area of 123,000 m2, on the northwest extension of the Southern Peru Porphyry Copper Belt. A recent exploration of the belt has discovered the Zafranal copper-porphyry deposit, located approximately 75 km to the southeast of the Irmin Property. Indico, headquartered in Vancouver, is a mineral resource exploration company. It is currently focused on the exploration of the Irmin Porphyry Project. Aruntani, established in 2000 in San Isidro district, operates, designs, and constructs gold mines in Peru. In addition, it is involved in the production and sale of gold and silver.

Plutus Financial Inc is a mobile money solutions and software developer which enables users send, deposit and withdraw money through its Abra digital cash platform. 111665 10/09/2015 香港 Hong Kong pension business of Standard Chartered Bank 收购 Manulife Financial Corp 加拿大 Standard Chartered PLC 养老金 (52511) 400 (市场估计) 100 International financial services group Manulife Financial said it will acquire Standard Chartered Bank's pension business in Hong Kong. Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. According to Bloomberg, Manulife will pay some USD 400mn for Standard Chartered's Mandatory Provident Fund (MPF), Occupational Retirement Schemes Ordinance (ORSO) businesses, and the related investment management entity. The deal is a part of the 15-year pension distribution partnership between Manulife and Standard Chartered. The acquisition is in line with Manulife's strategy to expand its pension business in Hong Kong. The deal is expected to close in the first half of 2016. Completion of the deal will occur upon fulfilment of customary conditions, including regulatory approval. Manulife offers financial advice, insurance and wealth and asset management services. As of the end of 2014 the company had 28,000 employees, and 58,000 agents. As at 30 June 2015, Manulife had CAD 883bn (HKD 5,487bn) in assets under management.
111423 10/09/2015 匈牙利 Somos Broadcast Media Zrt 收购 Broadcast Solutions GmbH 德国 Attila Somos - private investor 电动和电子产品的批发 (4216) 　 　 100 Germany-based Broadcast Solutions GmbH, a European system integrator, announced it has acquired Hungarian broadcast equipments distribution company Somos Broadcast Media Zrt. from local private investor Attila Somos. Financial details were not disclosed. The transaction is carried out through a newly-established company Broadcast Solutions Hungary Kft., which will take over the assets and employees of Somos Broadcast Media Zrt. Furthermore, the buyer will take over the local partnerships with manufacturers such as Sony, Arri, SAM (Snell / Quantel), Harmonic and Trilogy. Following the deal, Attila Somos will remain the general manager of the Hungarian company. The acquisition will enable the buyer to enhance and grow on the Hungarian and international markets. Broadcast Solutions Hungary Kft. will continue operations in Hungary and will be integrated into the Broadcast Solutions group. Stefan Breder, CEO's Broadcast Solutions GmbH, will also be responsible for the newly created company. Somos Broadcast Media Zrt., founded in 2009, engages in building broadcast studios, with references projects such as Origo film studios, TV 2, ATV and Hit Park; in addition to the distribution and leasing of professional audio- and video-technological equipments division. Broadcast Solutions GmbH, founded in 2003, is a hardware manufacturer and independent system integrator, providing solutions for all technology in the fields of broadcasting, multimedia, infrastructure, engineering or consultancy - video, audio, IP, control systems, digital signage, IPTV, satellite communications and innovative coach building. Based in Bingen near Frankfurt, the company has also offices in Köln, Stuttgart, Dubai, Kiev as well as Sweden and Hong Kong.
111034 10/09/2015 巴西 Henfel Industria Metalurgica Ltda 收购 VBG Group AB 瑞典 　 内燃机、汽轮机、传动设备的制造 (3336) 　 　 100 UPDATE: Henkel's legal advisor disclosed to DealWatch that on 1 October 2015 the transaction was completed. ORIGINAL: Swedish engineering group VBG Group AB announced it has agreed to acquire Brazilian mechanical power transmission producer Henfel Industria Metalurgica Ltda. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Anders Birgersson, Managing Director and CEO of the VBG Group, said that the investment aligns with buyer's strategy for expansion throughout the South American power transmission market. With the acquisition of Henfel, VBG Group gains a base for domestic production, which will guarantee a higher profit, since it avoids the customs duties. VBG added that it will include Henfel into its Ringfeder Power Transmission division of Henfel, complementing its product portfolio. Henfel, formed in 1981 in Jaboticabal city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil), manufactures mechanical power transmission products for the mining industry. The company has some 150 employees and reports a turnover of approximately SEK 85mn (USD 10.31mn) per year. VBG Group was created in 1951 in Vanersborg, Sweden. Together with its subsidiaries, operates as an engineering group in Sweden, Germany, the Czech Republic, among other countries. Company's operations are divided into three divisions - VBG Truck Equipment, Edscha Trailer Systems and Ringfeder Power Transmission. VBG Group is listed on the Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and had a turnover of SEK 1.19bn (USD 1.44bn) and a net income of SEK 78.88mn (USD 9.57mn). _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: O assessor jurídico da Henkel revelou para o DealWatch que a transação foi concluída. ORIGINAL: O grupo sueco de engenharia VBG Group AB anunciou que dicidiu adquirir a totalidade do capital social da produtora brasileira de maquinaria de transmissão de energia Henfel Indústria Metalúrgica Ltda. Os detalhes financeiros acerda do acordo não foram divulgados. O Anders Birgersson, Diretor Geral e CEO do VBG Group, disse que o investimento está em linha com a estratégia da empresa de expansão no mercado sul-americano de transmissão de energia. Com a aquisição da Henfel, o VBG Group consegue base de produção local, o que vai garantir um lucro mais elevado, uma vez que a empresa escusa de pagar por direitos aduaneiros. Além disso, o VBG vai incorporar a Henfel na sua divisão Ringfeder Power Transmission, complementando o seu portfólio de produtos. A Henfel, criada em 1981 na cidade de Jaboticabal (SP, Brasil), fabrica maquinaria de transmissão de energia para a indústria mineira. A empresa conta com uns 150 funcionários e gera um volume de negócios de aproximadamente SEK 85mn (USD 10.31mn) por ano. O VBG Group foi criado em 1951 em Vanersborg, Suécia. Juntamente com suas subsidiárias, opera como um grupo de engenharia na Suécia, Alemanha, República Tcheca, entre outros países. As operações da Companhia estão concentradas em três divisões - VBG Truck Equipment, Edscha Trailer Systems and Ringfeder Power Transmission. O VBG Group está listado na bolsa de valores Nasdaq OMX Stockholm e teve um faturamento de SEK 1.19bn (USD 1.44bn) e um resultado líquido de SEK 78.88mn (USD 9.57mn).
110876 10/09/2015 哥伦比亚 Selected exploration prospects in Colombia 收购 Gemfields Plc 英国 ISAM Europa SL 非金属矿的采选 (2123) 7.5 (官方数据) 　 U.K.-based coloured gemstones producer Gemfields Plc announced it has acquired 75% and 70% in two Colombian companies holdings rights to mining licence applications and assigned concession contracts, respectively, for a total consideration of USD 7.5mn. The project, comprised of the new licence applications and assignments to existing concession contracts, is currently indirectly controlled by the Spanish firm ISAM Europa SL. Eight assignments have been already approved and issued, with the remainder being under revision by the Colombian Mining Agency. The project covers an area of 200 square kilometres in the Boyaca and other Colombian departments, and consists primarily of greenfield sites. Ian Harebottle, CEO of Gemfields, commented that this acquisition marks the company's entry into Colombia and that it is aligned with its strategy of expanding its global footprint. Simultaneously, on 10 September 2015, Gemfields also informed that it has signed an agreement for the acquisition of a 70% stake in the Coscuez emerald mine located in Colombia for USD 15mn, payable in cash and shares, from Colombian peer Esmeracol SA Esmeraldas y Minas de Colombia. Gemfields is engaged in the mining, production and supply of coloured gemstones such as emeralds, rubies, sapphires, tourmalines, amethyst, and garnets. Gemfields also owns 100% of the Faberge brand. The company reported sales revenues of USD 160.1mn and net income of USD 8.8mn for FY ended 30 June 2014.
110875 10/09/2015 哥伦比亚 Coscuez emerald mine in Colombia 收购 Gemfields Plc 英国 Esmeracol SA Esmeraldas y Minas de Colombia 非金属矿的采选 (2123) 15 (官方数据) 70 U.K.-based coloured gemstones producer Gemfields Plc announced it has agreed to acquire a 70% stake in the Coscuez emerald mine located in Colombia for USD 15mn, payable in cash and shares, from Colombian peer Esmeracol SA Esmeraldas y Minas de Colombia. Under the agreement, Esmeracol will transfer the rights to the Coscuez mine to a newly incorporated Colombian company, in which Gemfields will purchase 70%. Ian Harebottle, CEO of Gemfields, commented that this acquisition marks the company's entry into Colombia and that it is aligned with its strategy of expanding its global footprint. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close by March 2016. Simultaneously, on 10 September 2015, Gemfields also informed that it has signed an agreement for the acquisition of 75% and 70% interests for USD 7.5mn in another two Colombian companies which hold rights to exploration prospects. The Coscuez emerald mine is located in the municipality of San Pablo de Borbur, in the Department of Boyaca. Gemfields is engaged in the mining, production and supply of coloured gemstones such as emeralds, rubies, sapphires, tourmalines, amethyst, and garnets. Gemfields also owns 100% of the Faberge brand. The company reported sales revenues of USD 160.1mn and net income of USD 8.8mn for FY ended 30 June 2014.

The acquisition will enable the buyer to invest in a specialised downstream oleochemical business that has an establish customer base that includes multinational companies. The deal will also allow IOI Corp to expand its product range and acquire technical knowledge that will benefit the company. The oleochemicals business consists of 2 production facilities that provide oleochemical specialty products for the pharmaceutical, cosmetic, food and performance chemicals industries. IOI Group Bhd operates oil palm plantations in Malaysia and Indonesia. The company also manufactures industrial and medical gases in addition to providing property development and investment, provides landscape services. It posted revenues of MYR 11.6bn (USD 3.1bn) for FY ended 30 June 2015. Cremer Oleo GmbH & Co KG, founded in 1946, produces and distributes basic oleochemical products. It also sources raw materials as well as develops distilled fatty acids, fatty alcohols, glycerin, esters, and vegetable oils and care ingredients.
110841 10/09/2015 巴西 Agencia Ideal Comunicacao Ltda 收购 WPP Plc 英国 　 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 　 　 　 U.K.-based marketing communications group WPP Plc announced it has acquired an undisclosed majority stake in Brazilian PR agency Agencia Ideal Comunicacao Ltda (Ideal). Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. WPP acted through its wholly owned New York based subsidiary Hill+Knowlton Strategies Inc (H+K). Under the agreement, Ideal will change its brand name to Ideal H+K Strategies, and will integrate 170 new employees in Brazil, doubling the size of Hill+Knowlton's Latin American operation. Mike Coates, president and CEO of the H+K, said that the investment in Ideal aligns with firms' strategy to strengthen and diversify its offering across the Latin American region. Ideal, founded in 2007 and headquartered in Sao Paulo, is a Brazilian PR, social media, content and advertising agency. It employs more than 150 people and serves a portfolio of regional and global brands and its customers include Dell, Facebook, Johnnie Walker, Yamaha, among others. H+K is an international communications consultancy with 88 offices in 51 countries worldwide, as well as an extensive associate network. It has more than 500 brands in its portfolio. WPP, established in 1971, is a multinational marketing communications services provider, specialised in advertising, media investment management, consumer insight, public relations and public affairs, branding and identity, healthcare communications, direct, digital, promotion and relationship marketing. WPP is listed on the London Stock Exchange, and reached a turnover of GBP 11.5bn (USD 19bn) and a net income of GBP 1.08bn (USD 1.78bn) in 2014. _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora britânica de serviços de comunicação WPP Plc anunciou a aquisição de uma participação acionária de valor não divulgado na agência brasileira de relações públicas Agência Ideal Comunicação Ltda (Ideal). Os detalhes financeiros acerca da transação não foram divulgados. A compradora atuou por meio de sua subsidiária integral baseada em Nova Iorque Hill+Knowlton Strategies Inc (H+K). Nos termos do acordo, a Ideal vai mudar seu nome para Ideal H+K Strategies, e vai integrar 170 novos funcionários no Brasil, duplicando a equipe latino-americana da Hill+Knowlton. O Mike Coates, presidente e CEO da H+K, disse que o investimento na Ideal está alinhado com a estratégia da empresa de fortalecer e diversificar a sua oferta em toda a região latino-americana. A Ideal, fundada em 2007 e sediada em São Paulo, é uma agência brasileira de relações públicas, mídia social, conteúdo e publicidade. Emprega mais de 150 colaboradores e tem um portfólio de marcas regionais e globais, incluindo Dell, Facebook, Johnnie Walker, Yamaha, entre outras. A H+K é uma consultora internacional de comunicação com 88 escritórios em 51 países em todo o mundo e uma extensa rede de empresas associadas. Tem mais de 500 marcas no seu portfólio. A WPP, criada em 1971, é uma provedora multinacional de serviços de comunicação de marketing, especializada em propaganda, gerenciamento de investimento de mídia, percepção do consumidor, relações públicas, construção de marcas e identidade, comunicação em saúde, marketing direto, internet e digital. A WPP está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Londres, e apresentou um faturamento de GBP 11.5bn (USD 19bn) e um lucro líquido de GBP 1.08bn (USD 1.78bn) em 2014.
110836 10/09/2015 巴西 Concept Agencia de Comunicacao Ltda 收购 WPP Plc 英国 　 营销咨询服务 (541613); 其他管理咨询服务 (541618); 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) U.K. marketing communications group WPP Plc announced it has acquired an undisclosed majority stake in Brazilian public relations services provider Concept Agencia de Comunicacao Ltda (ConceptPR). Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. WPP acted through its wholly owned New York based subsidiary Ogilvy Public Relations Worldwide Inc. Renata Saraiva, Managing Director of Ogilvy PR Brazil, said that the investment will help the company expand its operations across the Latin American region and empower the creation of high quality integrated communication programmes. ConceptPR, headquartered in the city of Sao Paulo, Brazil, operates as a PR and digital content agency. It is focused on the development of innovative strategies in the areas of public relations, journalism, advertising, marketing, corporate communications and reputation management. The company employs more than 40 people and serves a portfolio of local and international brands. Ogilvy, created in 1980 in New York city, is a global public affairs agency that also provides Cleantech, clean technology communications and advocacy. It operates in more than 88 offices across six continents, including its offices in Sao Paulo, Brasilia and Rio de Janeiro. It provides services in the areas of advertising, direct marketing, activation, promotional and digital entertainment, and serves customers in consumer marketing, corporate, healthcare, public affairs, social marketing, and technology sectors worldwide. WPP, established in 1971, is a multinational marketing communications services provider, specialised in advertising, media investment management, consumer insight, public relations and public affairs, branding and identity, healthcare communications, direct, digital, promotion and relationship marketing. WPP is listed on the London Stock Exchange, and reached a turnover of GBP 11.5bn (USD 19bn) and a net income of GBP 1.08bn (USD 1.78bn) in 2014. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A provedora britânica de serviços de comunicação WPP Plc anunciou a aquisição de uma participação acionária de valor não divulgado na agência brasileira de relações públicas Concept Agencia de Comunicacao Ltda (ConceptPR). Os detalhes financeiros acerca da transação não foram divulgados. A compradora atuou por meio de sua subsidiária integral baseada em Nova Iorque, Ogilvy Public Relations Worldwide Inc. A Renata Saraiva, Diretora-Gerente da Ogilvy PR Brasil, disse que o investimento vai contribuir para a expansão das operações empresariais por toda a região latino-americana e incentivar a criação de programas integrados de comunicação de alta qualidade. A ConceptPR, sediada na cidade de São Paulo, Brasil, é uma agência de relações públicas e conteúdo digital. Está especializada no desenvolvimento de estratégias inovadoras nas áreas de relações públicas, jornalismo, publicidade, marketing, comunicação corporativa e gestão de reputação. A empresa emprega mais de 40 pessoas e tem um portfólio de marcas locais e internacionais. A Ogilvy, criada em 1980 na cidade de Nova Iorque, é uma agência de relações públicas internacional que fornece também Cleantech, comunicações de tecnologia limpa e advocacia. A empresa opera mais de 88 escritórios em seis continentes, incluindo seus escritórios em São Paulo, Brasília e Rio de Janeiro. Fornece serviços nas áreas de publicidade, marketing direto, ativação, entretenimento promocional e digital, e atende clientes em marketing de consumo, empresas, assistência médica, relações públicas, marketing social, e setores de tecnologia, a nível internacional. A WPP, criada em 1971, é uma provedora multinacional de serviços de comunicação de marketing, especializada em propaganda, gerenciamento de investimento de mídia, percepção do consumidor, relações públicas, construção de marcas e identidade, comunicação em saúde, marketing direto, internet e digital. A WPP está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Londres, e apresentou um faturamento de GBP 11.5bn (USD 19bn) e um lucro líquido de GBP 1.08bn (USD 1.78bn) em 2014.

No financial details were disclosed. ilyan.com has been cooperating with Opera Group since 2008. The acquisition is expected to enable ilyan.com to enter new markets. Established in 1994, ilyan.com is a Google certified agency and has offices in Sofia, Bucharest and London. It is a leading digital agency in Bulgaria with its client portfolio, including Lidl, Avon, Tefal, Nestle, and Carlsberg. Established in 1995, Opera Group focuses on technology, media and telecommunications industries. It has investments in companies based in London, Los Angeles and Dubai.
110859 10/09/2015 秘鲁 Corporacion Lindley SA (CL) 收购 Arca Continental SAB de CV 墨西哥 Lindley family 软饮料及食用冰制造 (31211) 760 (官方数据) 47.52 Mexican non-alcoholic beverages company Arca Continental SAB de CV (AC) announced the acquisition of a 47.52% stake in Peruvian peer Corporacion Lindley (CL) from members of the Lindley family for USD 760mn. The deal includes 308,847,336 common shares of CL, which represent 53.16% of the company's voting shares, as well as 1,459,941 investment shares, which represent 2.03% of its investment shares. As part of the transaction, the Lindley family has agreed to subscribe to 64.5 million AC shares for USD 400mn, which will be issued through a capital increase. Corporacion Lindley chairman Johnny Lindley Suarez said that the company is moving from being a centennial bottler in Peru towards becoming part of a multinational food and beverage company with an excellent outlook and reputation throughout the entire continent. Corporacion Lindley is the sole bottler and distributor of trademarked brands from The Coca-Cola Company in Peru, including Coca-Cola and Inca Kola. The company is also engaged in the manufacturing of fruit-juice beverages. Corporacion Lindley is listed on the Lima Stock Exchange and it generated net sales of PEN 2.23bn (USD 773.9mn) in 2014. Arca Continental is engaged in the production, distributions and sale of non-alcoholic beverages under The Coca-Cola Company brand, as well as snacks under the brands of Bokados in Mexico, Inalecsa in Ecuador and Wise in the USA. The company is listed on the Mexican Stock Exchange and it booked net sales of MXN 62bn (USD 4.66bn) in 2014.

In 2013, Emma Capital has acquired a 33% of lottery system operator Greek Organisation of Football Prognostics (OPAP) for EUR 652mn (USD 861mn). KKCG owns SAZKA, a leading lottery and gaming company in the Czech Republic. Casinos Austria is a national and international gaming company with numerous locations in Austria and other countries. The company owns 68% of Osterreichische Lotterien Gesellschaft which is monopoly operator of lottery games in Austria. Casinos Austria posted consolidated revenues of EUR 3.6bn in 2014. KKCG is a private multinational financial and investment group specialising in the acquisition and development of strategic portfolios, particularly in such sectors as crude oil and natural gas extraction, lottery and entertainment, technology, tourism, real estate, and machinery. The company is active in 10 countries worldwide. It has 1,500 employees and around EUR 1.6bn in assets under management. Emma Capital is an investment group focused on international markets. The company is fully-controlled by Czech investor Jiri Smejc.

The round was also participated by existing investors SAIF Partners and Beenext Ltd The capital infusion will be used to build new fulfillment centres and warehouses. MTech Engineering operates IndustryBuying.com, an e-commerce portal that offers industrial equipment in various categories such as Electrical, Hydraulics, Plumbing and Welding among others. It claims to have over 1,500 suppliers that cater to clients such as British Paints Tata Power and Havells. Kalaari Capital is an Indian advisory, consultancy and venture capital firm focused on local technology-based start-ups. Its portfolio includes Snapdeal.com, Robosoft Technologies and Urban Ladder among others.
110843 10/09/2015 波兰 Saule Technologies 少数股权购买 Hideo Sawada - private investor 日本 　 生命科学的研究和发展 (54171) 　 　 　 Polish technological company Saule Technologies announced that it has signed an agreement based on which Japanese businessman Hideo Sawada will invest an undisclosed sum in the firm. Simultaneously, Saule received governmental subsidy from The National Centre for Research and Development (NCBR) and started cooperation with ARP Venture, an investment arm of Polish state-owned Industrial Development Agency (Agencja Rozwoju Przemyslu - ARP). Saule Technologies, founded by Olga Malinkiewicz, is one of the first companies in the world working on the commercial application of perovskites by creating a new generation of photovoltaic cells. The company created an elastic semi-transparent cell based on PET film which can be easily combined with any products currently present on the market. Mr Hideo Sawada is a founder of Sawada Holdings. The company specialises in banking, securities, loan servicing and real estate sectors. Mr Sawada is also a chairman of travel company H.I.S. Group. ARP Venture is focused primarily on second round investments between PLN 5-15mn (USD 1.5-5mn). It invests in small and medium enterprises aiming to encourage Polish industry to be more open to innovation.

The round was also participated by private investors Vikram Chachra, Aloke Bajpal and Mohandas Pai. The proceeds from the round will be used to expand its operations and upgrading existing technology. Next Door Learning Solutions operates web and mobile based preparations marketplace and publisher OnlineTyari, which offers ebooks, mock tests, and certification exam reviewers. The portal offers material from various partners including MockBank, Arihant, Eduwizard and Success Mate. It claims to have an active user base of 200,000 daily. 500 Startups is a U.S-based venture capital firm which provides seed investment to firms in the consumer, education, design and mobile verticals in China, India, the Middle East and the U.S among others. It typically disburses around USD 25,000 to USD 250,000 in a funding round. Tandem Capital is a mobile technology focused venture capital firm. It invests up to USD 500,000 in a seed round and more than USD 100mn in follow-up investments. Tandem was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in California, U.S.A.

No financial detail were disclosed. AFS Istanbul Fleksibil produces flexible air ducts, ventilation equipment, air curtains, industrial hose, hear recovery units fans and other montage elements. Barcelona-based Soler & Palau manufactures ventilation equipments for residential, commercial & public and industrial buildings. Its products and services are available in more than 90 countries around the world.

The round was also participated by existing investors Accel Partners India, Walden Riverwood Ventures and Toba Capital. Paxata will use the funding proceeds to further expand R&D and the customer success organization, in addition to boost its vertical and geographic sales-marketing expansion efforts. Chu Swee Yeok, CEO and president of EDBI, said that it will assist Paxata in expanding its reach into the Asian region, as the presence of a data technology firm will help drive innovations across local various industry domains. Paxata offers intelligent data preparation solutions to customers across financial services, consumer goods, retail, high-tech and public sector industries. Paxata is the only Adaptive Data Preparation™ platform which provides data quality, data integration, enrichment, collaboration and governance in a single platform that empowers the business to work with all the data they need, and meet the IT's demands. It has changed the way business analysts transform their data into valuable business information. EDBI, founded in 1991, is the corporate investment arm of Singapore's Economic Development Board (EDB), which aims to be the premier investor in building the future pillars of Singapore. The fund focuses on investments in the knowledge and innovation-intensive sectors of biomedical sciences (BMS), information & communication technology (ICT), smart & sustainable technology (SST) and select industry clusters under its strategic growth program (SGP).

Vaillant has squeezed out minority shareholders in Turk DemirDokum holding approximately 2.06 million shares, or 3.81% of its share capital, at a price of TRY 5.2873 per share. Vaillant Group holds the majority stake in Turk DemirDokum since 2007 when it acquired the company from local industrial conglomerate Koc Holding. Turk DemirDokum offers boilers, radiators, air conditioners, water heaters, central heating and solar system solutions. It posted revenues of TRY 575.9mn (USD 263.4mn) for 2014. Vaillant Group is a heating, ventilation and air-conditioning technology concern based in Remscheid, Germany. The family-owned company was founded in 1874. In 2014, it had more than 12,000 employees and sales totalling about EUR 2.3bn.

Neither the financial terms, nor the stake acquired were disclosed. Further transaction details were also not revealed. Earlier this year, in April 2015, the IFC sold an 8.84% interest in FDN for USD 27.7mn to Japanese financial services provider Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp, following which the IFC retained 8.84% participation in the Colombian company. Financiera de Desarrollo Nacional is a specialized financial institution mobilizing resources and providing funding for infrastructure projects in Colombia such as highways, energy, ports, airports, railway, water provision and treatment, and others. As of 30 June 2015, it had total assets of COP 668.4bn (USD 214mn). IFC is a global institution promoting sustainable economic growth in developing countries by providing capital and advisory services to businesses and governments.

BTG acted via a Chilean real estate fund. The seller was Chilean construction company Inmobiliaria y Constructora Amunategui SpA. It posted total revenues of BRL 4.87bn (USD 1.16bn) and net income of BRL 3.41bn (USD 810mn) for 2014. Note: The skyscraper's area of 33,000 square metres was used in calculating the MVE/Area multiple.
111414 09/09/2015 加那 PEG Ghana Ltd 少数股权购买 Investisseurs & Partenaires (I&P); ImpactAssets; Engie SA; DEG - Deutsche Investitions- und Entwicklungsgesellschaft mbH; SunFunder; Buyer(s) unknown 法国; 美国; 德国 　 商业和工业机械和设备租赁 (5324) 3.2 (官方数据) 　 Ghanaian solar energy services provider PEG Africa announced that it has raised USD 3.2mn in a funding round led by French impact investment company Investisseurs & Partenaires (I&P). PEG added that the funding round also included the Impact Assets Emerging Markets Climate Fund of U.S. non-profit financial services firm ImpactAssets, French corporate impact investment fund ENGIE Rassembleurs d'Energies, German development finance institution DEG, U.S. based debt provider SunFunder, as well as other impact investors. PEG plans to use the proceeds to expand its presence within Ghana, and explore other markets. The company plans to eventually bring its products to all of West Africa. PEG Africa is an asset financing company selling pay as you go solar energy products to off-grid customers in Ghana. The company is currently selling the M-KOPA III solar home system, an eight watt system capable of powering three lights, a radio, and a mobile phone charger. PEG Africa has 80 employees as well as 120 sales people and operates 24 service centres. Investisseurs & Partenaires was founded in 2002 and is an impact investment group focused on small and medium enterprises in Sub-Saharan Africa. The company has so far made investments in more than 50 companies in 15 African countries.
110895 09/09/2015 巴拿马 Transporte Masivo de Panama SA (Mi Bus) 收购 Government of Panama 巴拿马 Felgate Enterprises SA; Fabrica Nacional de Carrocerias SA (Fanalca) 城市公共交通 (4851) 49.7 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 29 January 2016, Spanish news agency EFE reported that the deal was completed. ORIGINAL: The government of Panama announced that it has reached an agreement for the acquisition of local public transportation company Transporte Masivo de Panama (Mi Bus) for USD 49.7mn. The sellers include Colombian motor vehicle manufacturer and distributor Fabrica Nacional de Carrocerias (Fanalca) and Panamanian firm Felgate Enterprises. The government said that it will carry out the purchase through Metro de Panama (MPSA) and added that it has reached an agreement with First Transit de Panama, a subsidiary of British transport group FirstGroup, to become the new administrator of Mi Bus. Transporte Masivo de Panama won in 2010 a concession for the operation of the massive transportation system in the districts of Panama and San Miguelito on 83 routes, transversal and corridor. The contract expires in 2025 and the company currently has a fleet of 1,236 buses and employs some 4,000 people. As of the end of June 2015, Mi Bus had USD 195mn of bank debt used to buy new buses.

The Fairmont Mount Kenya Safari Club offers horseback riding, golf, croquet, table tennis and swimming and has a bowling green as well as an animal orphanage. The alleged investment was also dismissed by Zippr founder Aditya. ORIGINAL: India-based Ten20 Infomedia Pvt Ltd, which operates location solutions application Zippr, has raised USD 6mn from Amazon.com Inc for an undisclosed stake, Businessline reported. According to local sources, Zippr will use the funding raised to scale-up its technology and acquire new talent. Amazon is expected to utilize Zippr's address simplification technology for managing its own orders and address deliveries. Zippr is a web and mobile based application, which enables users to convert their home or office addresses into simple 8-character codes. It was founded in 2015 and based in Hyderabad. Amazon.com is a U.S.-based online retail major which offers products from various categories including electronics, books, apparel and games. The firm reported consolidated total net revenues of USD 89bn for FY ended 31 December 2014.
110763 09/09/2015 美国 Primus Power 少数股权购买 I2BF Global Ventures; Kazakhstan-Russian Fund of Nanotechnologies; Anglo American Platinum Ltd; Chrysalix Energy Venture Capital; DBL Partners 美国; 俄罗斯; 南非; 加拿大 　 其他电力设备和元件制造 (3359); 生命科学的研究和发展 (54171) 25 (官方数据) 30.8 U.S.-based energy storage solutions company Primus Power said it raised USD 25mn in a Series D funding round led by international clean technology venture capital firm I2BF Global Ventures, with the participation of I2BF-managed Kazakhstan-Russian Fund of Nanotechnologies. The funding was also joined by existing company investors Anglo American Platinum, Chrysalix Energy Venture Capital and DBL Partners. I2BF injected USD 6.5mn of the total sum, obtaining some 8% of the capital; Kazakhstan-Russian Fund of Nanotechnologies - USD 5mn respectively for around 6% of the shares, Vedomosti daily reported. Thus all the investors grabbed around 30% of shares. With the above fundraising, the total investment amount attracted by Primus Power since 2009 has reached USD 60mn. Primus Power CEO Tom Stepien was quoted as saying that the current equity investment will speed up product shipments to North America, meet the needs of countries with renewable energy plans such as Kazakhstan, as well as enhance partnerships with innovative companies such as Kazakhstan's main energy supplier Samruk-Energy. In May 2015, Primus Power and state-run Samruk-Energy concluded a strategic agreement whereby the latter is to purchase 1,250 Primus systems of 25MWh/100MWh. Thus Kazakhstan hopes to reach 30% of its renewable energy targets by 2030. Primus Power is engaged in the development and commercialisation of stationary energy storage systems. The patented battery technology works on the basis of a chemical compound of zinc and bromide together with power engineering solutions. Established in 2005, I2BF Global Ventures manages USD 400 million across four venture capital vehicles. The fund targets innovative and competitive companies across the clean technology community, biotechnology, materials science, IT and space technology sectors. Apart from its head team in New York, I2BF has also representative offices in London, Moscow and Astana. Kazakhstan-Russian Fund of Nanotechnologies was set up in 2011 by Russian nanotechnology corporation Rosnano and Kazakh state fund Kazyna Capital. Management. The fund is managed by I2BF Global Ventures and Russia's VTB Capital. The fund's investment focus are the sectors of energy production, including alternative energy sources, oil and gas sector, telecommunications, biotechnology, electronics, environmental technology. The targeted capitalization of the fund is USD 100mn.
110824 09/09/2015 越南; 柬埔寨; 老挝; 泰国; 缅甸 Riverorchid 收购 Havas SA 法国 　 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 　 　 100 French multinational advertising and public relation company Havas will acquire Indochina-focused peer Riverorchid for an undisclosed amount, the latter disclosed. The acquisition will enable the buyer to expand its operations across Indochina. The deal also reflects the buyer's view of the fast-growing Southeast Asian region. Riverorchid offers advertising, design, digital, HR consulting, media, public relations, research and production services. Havas Worldwide provides digital services, healthcare communication and promotions, and integrated marketing solutions. It has 316 offices in 75 countries and its client portfolio includes Air France, Danone, IBM, Lacoste, Volvo and LVMH.
110798 09/09/2015 尼日利亚 Unnamed Nigerian micro finance company 收购 Letshego Holdings Ltd 博茨瓦纳 　 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 100 Botswana-based consumer and micro lending holding company Letshego Holdings announced in its financial report for the first half of 2015 that it has agreed to acquire a 100% stake in an unnamed micro finance company in Nigerian. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Letshego said that the transaction will add 28 customer access points and 80,000 customers. The company added that the purchase will also provide it with a strong platform for its growth in Nigeria. Letshego Holdings was founded in 1998 and is a holding company with consumer and micro lending subsidiaries across 10 countries in Southern and East Africa, namely Botswana, Kenya, Lesotho, Mozambique, Namibia, Rwanda, South Sudan, Swaziland, Tanzania and Uganda. The company is listed on the Botswana Stock Exchange and it booked a net profit of BWP 552.6mn (USD 60.8mn) in 2014.

Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Letshego said that combined with its existing business in Tanzania, the transaction will position it to be one of the leading financial services organisations in the country over time. The deal will add five customer access points and over 20,000 customers. Letshego Holdings was founded in 1998 and is a holding company with consumer and micro lending subsidiaries across 10 countries in Southern and East Africa, namely Botswana, Kenya, Lesotho, Mozambique, Namibia, Rwanda, South Sudan, Swaziland, Tanzania and Uganda. The company is listed on the Botswana Stock Exchange and it booked a net profit of BWP 552.6mn (USD 60.8mn) in 2014.
110783 09/09/2015 南非 The Creative Counsel (Pty) Ltd (TCC) 收购 Publicis Groupe SA 法国 　 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 　 　 100 French communications group Publicis Groupe SA announced the acquisition of South African marketing agency group The Creative Counsel (TCC). Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. TCC will operate under Publicis Groupe's agency network Publicis Worldwide. "With the addition of The Creative Counsel, our clients will have access to the most innovative ways to promote, engage and educate their target markets about their products and services. This strategic move positions Publicis Worldwide as the leading creative network in Africa, a key continent for our future development," said Publicis Worldwide CEO Arthur Sadoun. The Creative Counsel was founded in 2001 and it offers holistic services including creative, strategy and execution of go-to market strategies and activations, large-scale conferencing and events, mass-market insights and strategies, loyalty partnerships, merchandising and retail shopper marketing. The group has more than 1,500 employees and its clients include Unilever, Clover, Vodacom, Microsoft, Brandhouse and Tiger Brands among other. Publicis, established in 1926, is an international advertising and communications group, focused on digital (DigitasLBi, Razorfish, Rosetta, VivaKi), creative services (BBH, Leo Burnett, Publicis Worldwide, Saatchi & Saatchi), public affairs, corporate communications and events (MSLGroup), media strategy, planning and buying (Starcom MediaVest Group and ZenithOptimedia) and healthcare communications (PHCG). The company is listed on the Euronext Paris Stock Exchange and had a market capitalisation of EUR 14.1bn (USD 15.8bn) on 9 September 2015.

According the Livemint, Carlyle has acquired a 37% stake for a total consideration of INR 8.5bn (USD 127.8mn) to INR 9bn (USD 135.3mn). The deal will be routed through an affiliate of Carlyle Asia Partners IV. Metropolis Healthcare is an International Indian pathology firm, which operates diagnostics laboratories that offer clinical chemistry and biology, genetics, haematology and molecular diagnostics tests among others. Metropolis has 200,000 consultants and claims to administer 15 million tests annually. The firm has presence in the United Arab Emirates, Sri Lanka, South Africa, Kenya, Mauritius and Ghana. The Carlyle Group is an alternative asset management firm that has USD 194bn of assets under management across 128 funds globally. It has over 1,650 including high net worth individuals, funds and corporations. Carlyle has more than 1,600 employees in 40 offices over Europe, Asia, Africa and the Americas. Note: The deal value is based on the middle point of the market estimated range of INR 8.5bn (USD 127.8mn) to INR 9bn (USD 135.3mn).
110776 09/09/2015 中国 Foshan Electrical And Lighting Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Guangdong Electronics Information Industrial Group Co Ltd 中国 Osram GmbH 半导体及相关设备制造业 (334413); 照明器具制造 (3351) 412.42 (官方数据) 13.5 Shenzhen-listed Foshan Electrical And Lighting Co Ltd announced that German lamps and lighting systems manufacturer OSRAM GmbH will sell its 13.5% stake in the company for a total consideration of CNY 2.6bn (USD 412.4mn). OSRAM will sell its 171,360,391 Class A shares to Guangdong Electronics Information Industrial Group Co Ltd. The transaction is subject to regulatory approvals and is expected to be completed by December 2015. The seller expects to gain USD 335.4mn in pre-tax gain from the sale, in which it will use to fund its pension commitments. Foshan Electrical And Lighting Co Ltd manufactures and sells energy saving lamps, LED products, electronic ballasts, transformers and electrical appliances. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 3.1bn (USD 4482.7mn) in 2014. Guangdong Electronics Information Industrial Group Co Ltd develops electronic components and equipment. The company operates as a subsidiary of Guangdong Rising Assets Management Co Ltd. OSRAM GmbH, founded in 1919, manufactures lamps, light engines and modules, LED products and indoor luminaries. The company operates as a subsidiary of OSRAM Beteiligungen GmbH.
110774 09/09/2015 中国 Didi Chuxing 少数股权购买 Undisclosed investor(s); China Investment Corp; Ping An Ventures; Capital International Private Equity Funds 中国; 美国 　 软件出版 (5112) 1,000.00 (官方数据) 22.727 Chinese car-booking app Didi Kuaidi has secured another USD 1bn in its latest round of funding, Wall Street Journal reported. The company raised USD 2bn in July 2015, bringing the total funding from its current round to USD 3bn. This reportedly marks the highest round of funding to date for a private company globally. According to CrunchBase, Didi Kuiadi has raised a total of USD 4.4bn so far in seven rounds. The latest funding round was led by new investors Chinese sovereign-wealth fund China Investment Corp and Capital International Private Equity Funds, as well as existing investor Ping An Ventures. Other investors were not disclosed. Didi Kuiadi currently has more than USD 4bn in cash reserves, which it plans to use to expand its business beyond transportation. Didi Kuaidi is a company made up of Didi Dache and Kuaidi Dache, two of China's largest taxi-booking apps. Both companies merged in February 2015, creating one of the largest mobile-based taxi platforms. China Investment Corp, founded in 2007, operates as the Chinese government's sovereign wealth fund and manages the country foreign exchange reserves. It has more than USD 575.2bn in assets under management. Capital International Private Equity Funds, founded in 1992, has invested USD 4.5bn in more than 82 companies from 35 industries.
110758 09/09/2015 立陶宛 Loan portfolio of Ukio Bankas 收购 Platfroma-Finance 俄罗斯 Bankruptcy administrator 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 100 Russian company Platfroma-Finance has acquired loan portfolio of Lithuanian bankrupt lender Ukio Bankas, financial portal Verslo Zinios said. The value of the transaction was not disclosed. The acquired portfolio has a nominal value of EUR 54.8mn. Ukio Bankas was the fourth largest bank in terms of deposits in Lithuania before the seizure of its activities. Founded in 1990, it was the oldest private commercial bank providing universal banking services. The bank's largest investors were Russian businessman with Lithuanian citizenship Vladimir Romanov (64.9%) and Lithuanian consulting company FIRST Partneriai (9.5%).
110755 09/09/2015 英国 Cambridge City Hotel 收购 CDL Hospitality Trusts 新加坡 London & Regional Group Trading No.3 Limited 住宿服务 (721) 94.37 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 01 October 2015, CDL Hospitality Trusts announced it has completed the acquisition of Cambridge City Hotel. ORIGINAL: Singapore-based CDL Hospitality Trusts announced that it will acquire Cambridge City Hotel for GBP 61.5mn (USD 94.37mn) from U.K. real estate firm London & Regional Group Trading No.3 Limited. The purchase consideration will be initially fully-funded by GBP-denominated debt financing. The deal will be carried out through the acquisition of LR (Cambridge) Limited, a company which presently owns the hotel. The buyer is acting through its indirect wholly-owned subsidiary CDL HBT Cambridge City (UK) Ltd. The transaction marks the entry of CDL Hospitality Trusts into Europe and it is aligned with the company's strategy to enter markets with strong fundamentals and growth potential. The acquisition will enable the buyer to strengthen its portfolio and earnings base through diversification. Cambridge City Hotel is an upper upscale hotel with a total of 198 rooms. It is located in the centre of Cambridge, U.K., within the vicinity of popular tourist destinations, such as King's College, Fitzwilliam Museum, and Cambridge's largest shopping mall, the Grand Arcade Shopping Centre. The hotel commenced operations in 1991 and in 2014 the property underwent a GBP 8.2mn refurbishment process, which was completed in April 2015. CDL Hospitality Trusts invests in a diversified portfolio of income-producing real estate, which is mainly used for hospitality or hospitality-related purposes. CDL currently owns 14 hotels and two resorts located in Singapore, Australia, New Zealand, Japan and Maldives. Its total assets amounted to SGD 2.42bn (USD 1.70bn) as of 30 June 2015.
