ORIGINAL : Turkish grocery retailer Begendik is acquiring 10 stores of Tesco Kipa, the local unit of British retail group Tesco, in a deal worth TRY 40mn (USD 13.3mn), haberturk.com reported. The transfer of the stores is expected to complete in a month. Seven of the stores are located in capital Ankara, the remaining are located in Mersin, Tarsus and Denizli. Begendik acquired 12 hypermarkets and the headquarters of Real Turkey, the local retail subsidiary of German wholesale and retail trader Metro Group, in 2014. Currently, Ankara-based Begendik has around 60 outlets, located mainly in Ankara and Kayseri. It operates under Yasam and Komsu brands and has an annual turnover of over TRY 1.5bn (USD 498.2mn). Begendik may bid for entire Tesco Kipa, if Tesco decides to sell it, haberturk.com said. Tesco is discussing options to sell its operations in Central and Eastern European countries, Bloomberg reported on 7 September 2015. Recently, the British retailer announced the sale of its Korean subsidiary Homeplus to a group of investors led by South Korean private equity firm MBK Partners for an enterprise value of GBP 4.24bn (USD 6.43bn). Tesco Kipa has over 200 stores located mainly in western Turkey and annual turnover of TRY 2.25bn (USD 747.3mn).
119049 08/09/2015 美国 Hyperloop Technologies 少数股权购买 Caspian Venture Partners 俄罗斯 　 科学研究与试验发展 (5417) 　 　 　 Russian newly-founded seed fund Caspian VC Partners has invested an undisclosed amount in Hyperloop Technologies, a U.S. start-up which realizes the idea of entrepreneur Elon Mask for high-speed tube transportation of passengers and cargo, firrma.ru reported. Other deal-related details were not disclosed. In the past several months, Caspian VC Partners has also invested in companies such as Peek Travel, Uber, Uber China and Diamond Foundry. Hyperloop Technologies is a research company tasked to develop the technology of a high-speed intercity transportation means, a low-pressure tube train that can reach a top speed of 1,300 km/h. The construction of the system is estimated at USD 6bn and is expected to take 10 years. Caspian VC Partners focuses on early- to mid-stage, high-growth technology companies in the sectors of agriculture, manufacturing, consumer sector, as well as robotics. The fund was created by the CEO of Russian diversified holding Summa Group, Ziyavudin Magomedov. The projected volume for investments of Caspian VC Partners is USD 300mn.

110978 08/09/2015 罗马尼亚 Banca Comerciala Carpatica 少数股权购买 JC Flowers & Co LLC 美国 Existing shareholders 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 8.93 (DW 估计) 25 UPDATE 2: On 04 January 2016, BCC announced that it has received a non-binding and conditional offer from local counterpart Nextebank SA, owned by U.S. investment fund Axxess Capital. Nextebank expressed its interest to subscribe shares in BCC, and the investor has already started a due diligence procedure on BCC which is expected to be completed until 22 January 2016. UPDATE 1: On 30 December 2015, Romanian lender Banca Comerciala Carpatica (BCC) announced the failure of the deal. JC Flowers declined to participate in the bank's capitalization due to unfulfillment of certain conditions precedent. ORIGINAL: U.S. investment fund JC Flowers & Co has agreed to acquire a 25% stake in Romanian lender Banca Comerciala Carpatica (BCC) from a group of shareholders, the bank informed in a bourse filling. Financial terms were not disclosed. The group of sellers include the bank's founder and entrepreneur Ilie Carabulea, together with private investors Dana Cojocaru, Nicolae Lupu, Corneliu Tanase and Romanian ground passenger transportation firm Atlassib SRL. Based on the target's closing price of RON 0.045 (USD 0.0114) per share on 04 September 2015, the day before the announcement, the transaction is estimated at RON 35.4mn (USD 8.93mn). The acquisition is in line with JC Flowers' strategic plan to acquire small Romanian banks in a move to create a top 10 bank on the local market. According to business daily Ziarul Financiar, JC Flowers is also interesting in acquiring the Romanian division of Greek Piraeus Bank, and it also showed interest for local Banca Romaneasca as well as for the local unit of French banking group Crédit Agricole. Another source, mainly the portal bankingnews.ro said that JC Flowers will probably participate in the BCC's capital increase via a private placement, and thus it will become the majority shareholder of the bank. JC Flowers & Co is acting in the transaction through JCF III Europe Holdings L.P., a subsidiary of its fund JC Flowers III. BCC was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Sibiu, central Romania. In 2014, the bank was ranked 20th among local lenders, with a market share of 0.9%. It offers its financial services to corporate and retail customers. As at 30 June 2015, BCC has total assets under management of RON 3.25bn (USD 820.5mn). New York-based, JC Flowers is a private equity firm focused solely on the financial services sector. It was founded in 2001 and currently has total assets under management of USD 14bn. Note: For the 25% stake being sold, the deal value was calculated based on the BCC equity capital which is comprised of 3,146,290,494 shares.
110810 08/09/2015 毛里求斯; 尼日利亚; 坦桑尼亚; 乌干达 Smile Telecoms Holdings Ltd 少数股权购买 Public Investment Corp Ltd (PIC) 南非 　 移动电信服务（卫星除外） (5172) 50 (官方数据) 　 Pan-African telecommunications group Smile Telecoms Holdings announced that it has raised USD 50mn of equity financing from South Africa's Public Investment Corp (PIC) on behalf of the Government Employees Pension Fund. Smile said that it has raised another USD 315mn of debt financing from the African Export-Import Bank, the Development Bank of Southern Africa, Diamond Bank, Ecobank Nigeria, the PIC, the Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa and Standard Chartered Bank. Smile plans to use the proceeds to expand its existing 4G LTE mobile broadband networks and services so that that by the end of 2015 it will offer clear voice services and have national coverage comparable to the largest 3G network in each of its current countries of operation. The company also plans to launch its broadband network in the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) early in 2016. Smile Telecoms Holdings was founded in 2007 and it currently owns and operates mobile wireless 4G LTE broadband networks in the 800 MHz band in Nigeria, Tanzania and Uganda. The company is based in Mauritius. PIC was founded in 1911 and is a state-owned investment management company that focuses exclusively on the public sector. The company manages most of South Africa's government-worker pension funds and has assets under management of some USD 150bn.

In 2014, it recorded the highest growth in viewership in the free-to-air TV market, while B92.net has been the most influential and visited Serbian website since 1996. ORIGINAL: Dutch port management services provider APM Terminals Management BV announced it has agreed to acquire a 61% stake in Spain-based container terminal concessions company Grupo Maritim TCB SL from Spanish shipping and logistics firm Grupo Perez y Cia. Financial terms were not disclosed. The acquisition includes Grupo Maritim TCB's European and Latin American maritime services' container terminal portfolio. Maritim TCB operates six container terminal concessions in Spain, and one in each of the following countries: Turkey, Mexico, Brazil, Colombia, and Guatemala. The 11 container terminals have an annual throughput capacity of 4.3 million TEUs, and an annual container volume of 3.5 million TEUs. Kim Fejfer, CEO of APM Terminals, said that this acquisition complements the company's locations portfolio. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals and is expected to close by the end of 2015. Back in August 2015, APM Terminals announced it has agreed to form a joint venture company in Colombia with Colombian peer Compania de Puertos Asociados SA (Compas) with the purpose to operate Compas' multipurpose Cartagena Terminal. APM Terminals Management offers port management, terminal operations, as well as inland transportation and cargo services. The company is also engaged in the design, construction, and operation of ports and terminals. It is a subsidiary of Danish shipping firm AP Moller-Maersk AS.

Petmin now holds a 35% stake in the company. Petmin announced in its financial report for the six months ended 31 December 2014 that it bought a 1% stake in NAIC for USD 1mn. Petmin has an earn-in option to increase its stake in NAIC to 40% for some USD 4mn as well an option to acquire an additional 9.9% interest at a market-related price. North Atlantic Iron Corp owns an iron sands deposit at Goose Bay in Canada's region of Labrador. The company plans to become a dominant supplier of merchant pig iron (MPI) to the western hemisphere's electric arc furnace (EAF) steel making industry. Petmin is focused on the production of metallurgical anthracite in South Africa and has iron ore exploration projects in Canada, Liberia and Turkey. The company is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and it booked ZAR 1.02bn (USD 98.3mn) revenues in its FY ended 30 June 2014.

EIMC United Pharmaceuticals manufactures sterile oncology, sterile non-oncology, capsules, tablets and liquid dosage forms. The company operates production plant in Cairo. Hikma, established in 1978, is focused on developing, manufacturing and marketing a broad range of both branded and non-branded generic and in-licensed products. It specialises in anti-infectives, cardiovascular, CNS, and diabetes therapeutic areas. Hikma is listed on the LSE and NASDAQ Dubai. In 2014, the company posted a revenue of USD 1.49bn and a net profit of USD 299mn.
110716 08/09/2015 俄罗斯 J&T Bank AO 少数股权购买 CEFC China Energy Co Ltd 中国 J&T Finance Group SE 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 50 CEFC China Energy Company said it agreed to acquire a 50% stake in Russian lender J&T Bank from Czech financial holding J&T Finance Group SE. The deal value was not commented, as mutually agreed between the parties. The transaction is pending regulatory approval in Russia. As a result of the acquisition, J&T Finance Group SE will retain half of the bank's shares. It is noted in the press release, that the current acquisition marks the developing co-operation between CEFC and J&T Finance Group SE. Deputy board chairman of J&T Finance Group SE, Patrik Tkac, said, as quoted in the statement, that the purchase will accelerate the bank's growth on the Russian market. Small-sized lender J&T Bank is based in Moscow. The bank's main activities include collection of deposits, service and lending to corporate clients, as well as crediting individuals. The bank does not have own network of ATM's and terminals. As at 1 August 2015, the bank had total assets of RUB 16.3bn (USD 268.9mn), ranking 198th among other local lenders. CEFC China Energy Company is engaged in the national reserve and commercial storage of oil materials, energy database, investment in and exploitation of overseas oil and gas resources, processing and manufacturing of oil and agrochemical products, R&D and production of defence products, import and export trade of oil, petrochemical and natural gas products, as well as financial services including trading, leasing, factoring and electronic settlement.
110730 08/09/2015 南非 ThyssenKrupp Elevator (South Africa) (Pty) Ltd 收购 Otis Elevator Co 美国 ThyssenKrupp AG 修理与维护 (811) 　 　 100 U.S. elevator and escalator producer Otis announced the acquisition of the South African elevator service business of German conglomerate ThyssenKrupp for an undisclosed amount. Otis will buy ThyssenKrupp Elevator (South Africa) and the company said that the purchase will increase its operational footprint, connecting it with new customers and increasing the number of units it maintains and repairs. Otis added that the employees currently working for ThyssenKrupp Elevator (South Africa) will be incorporated into its business units. Otis is the world's manufacturer, installer and maintainer of elevators, escalators and moving walkways. The company has operations in more than 200 countries and territories, and maintains more than 1.8 million elevators and escalators worldwide. Otis is part of U.S. conglomerate United Technologies Corp (UTC).
110710 08/09/2015 阿根廷; 巴西; 智利; 哥伦比亚; 墨西哥; 乌拉圭 Latin American operations of RSA Insurance Group 收购 Grupo de Inversiones Suramericana SA 哥伦比亚 RSA Insurance Group PLC 保险业 (524) 614 (官方数据) 99.6 UPDATE 6: On 31 May 2016, Grupo Sura said it wrapped up the acquisition of RSA's Mexican business. The Colombian company added that the Uruguayan authorities are expected to approve the operation in due course. UPDATE 5: On 5 May 2016, Grupo Sura disclosed it received regulatory approval to buy RSA's Mexican operations. UPDATE 4: On 29 April 2016, Grupo Sura announced it completed the purchase of RSA's operations in Argentina and Chile. UPDATE 3: On 20 April 2016, Grupo Sura said it received regulatory approval for the acquisition of RSA's Chilean operations. UPDATE 2: On 1 April 2016, RSA Insurance informed it closed the sale of its Colombian operations. UPDATE 1: On 1 March 2016, RSA Insurance Group plc said it has closed the sale of its Brazilian operations. Completion of the remaining LatAm businesses (Chile, Argentina, Mexico, Colombia and Uruguay) is expected to occur during the next six months. ORIGINAL: Colombian investment holding group Grupo de Inversiones Suramericana SA (Grupo Sura) announced it has agreed to acquire a 99.6% stake in the Latin American operations of U.K.-based insurer RSA Insurance Group plc for COP 1.91tn (USD 614mn) in cash. Gonzalo Alberto Perez, CEO of Grupo Sura, said that this acquisition will expand the company's presence across Latin America, and that it will diversify its geographical risk and generate synergies. For its part, RSA Insurance Group said that it considers its Latin American assets non-strategic, and that it will focus on its core markets in the U.K. & Ireland, Canada, and Scandinavia. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals, and is expected to close by the end of 2016. Following completion of the deal, Grupo Sura, which acted via its subsidiary Suramericana SA, will become one of biggest insurance companies in Latin America with more than 15.6 million clients. The Latin American operations of RSA include geographically-diversified property and casualty insurance franchise with operations in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, and Uruguay. The business had total assets of COP 6.18tn (USD 1.9bn) at year-end 2014 and total gross written premiums equivalent to COP 3.36tn (USD 1.1bn) for 2014. Grupo Sura is a Colombian investment holding company with investments in leading companies across Latin and Central America. The investment portfolio is mainly focused on the financial, insurance and social security sector, as well as in the industrial sector such as cement, energy, mining, real estate and food, among others. Grupo Sura reported total revenues of COP 10.7tn (USD 3.41bn) and a net income of COP 650.2bn (USD 206mn) for 2014. RSA Insurance Group is engaged in the provision of personal and commercial general insurance products internationally. The company reported total revenues of GBP 8.04bn (USD 12.4bn) and a net income of GBP 69mn (USD 106mn) for 2014. Note: The Latin American operations' net income of GBP 9mn (USD 13.7mn) is for the first six months of 2015, while the rest of the multiples are for 2014.
110697 08/09/2015 保加利亚 Erste Group Immorent Bulgaria 收购 Teximbank 保加利亚 Erste Group Bank 房地产 (531); 租赁服务 (532); 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 Erste Group Immorent, the real estate financing unit of Austria's Erste Group, is selling its Bulgarian business to local lender Teximbank, Sofia-based Capital Daily reported. The transaction has been cleared by the Bulgarian anti-trust regulator. Established in 2004, Erste Group Immorent Bulgaria is engaged in real estate investment, construction, financial and operating leasing and consulting services. It had an asset portfolio of BGN 91mn (EUR 46.5mn) at the end of 2014. Teximbank is one of the smallest Bulgarian lenders with total assets of BGN 161.8mn (EUR 82.8mn) at the end of June 2015. It has an asset management arm, which operates four mutual funds. The lender is controlled by local industrial conglomerate Chimimport. Erste Group Immorent is engaged in real estate financing, infrastructure financing and project development in Central, Eastern and Southeastern Europe. It is part of Erste Group, the second largest banking group in Austria.

It posted revenues of approximately PLN 40mn (EUR 9.24mn) in 2014. Sudpack was established in 1964. It produces flexible films, rigid films, top films, plastic cans, vacuum bags etc. Its products are primarily used in food industry. The company has 22 sales offices and sites. 110684 08/09/2015 保加利亚 Walltopia 少数股权购买 BlackPeak Capital; CEE Equity Partners Ltd; Bulgarian private investor(s) 保加利亚; 中国 　 其他杂项制造业 (3399) 10.14 (官方数据) 12.394 Bulgarian co-investment fund BlackPeak Capital said that it has acquired together with China's CEE Equity Partners a minority stake in Bulgarian climbing walls manufacturer Walltopia. According to data published in Bulgaria's Trade Registry, BlackPeak Capital, CEE Equity Partners and Bulgarian private investors have acquired a combined stake of 12.4% in Walltopia for a total of EUR 9.1mn (USD 10.14mn) through a capital increase. The investment will be used to increase capacity and support the global roll-out of Funtopia, Walltopia's amusement concept for indoor climbing for kids, which has already been launched in Bulgaria, the U.S.A., Canada, and Israel. Founded in 1998, Walltopia is the world's leading manufacturer in the climbing wall industry with more than 1,300 projects in 50 countries. The company employs 350 people. It posted a revenue of BGN 32.4mn (EUR 16.5mn) in 2014. BlackPeak is a EUR 10mn co-investment growth equity fund established under the EU-sponsored JEREMIE initiative in Bulgaria. It targets investments in innovative, high-growth Bulgarian companies that hold leadership positions in the domestic and global markets. BlackPeak aims to invest EUR 0.5mn to EUR 4mn per transaction, which should be then matched at least equally by another institutional or private co-investor. CEE Equity Partners invested through its China Central and Eastern Europe Investment Co-Operation Fund, a private equity fund of USD 435mn. The fund was established by China Exim Bank and other institutional investors from the CEE region. Note: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis.

Systemair has a binding option to acquire the remaining 25% within the next six years. Systemair CEO Roland Kasper said that Traydus is positioned in the upper technological segment of the Brazilian ventilation market and is a perfect fit for the company. He added that this opens possibilities to introduce a wider range of Systemair products from other factories. Traydus is a manufacturer of custom air handling units and fan coils. It focuses on investing in the financial services, telecommunications, technology, transportation and energy sectors, among others. GEM Global Yield Fund agreed to provide YuuZoo with up to SGD 30mn over the next three years. The funding facility will be in the form of a capital commitment, allowing YuuZoo to draw-down funds within the three-year term of agreement by issuing ordinary shares to GEM group. The agreement is subject to both regulatory and shareholder approvals. YuuZoo provides a social e-commerce and networking platform to over 110 million registered users in 164 countries. Through YuuZoo, the consumer can access hundreds of social networks, shops and entertainment. All networks are localized for each market as comes to language as well as merchandise and design. The company generated revenues of USD 37.7mn in 2014. Global Emerging Markets, through its investment vehicles, places capital into public and private companies to fund growth, expansion or restructuring. GEM is a USD 3.4bn alternative investment group having completed 365 transactions in 65 countries.

110711 07/09/2015 俄罗斯 Edipress-Konliga 收购 Maxim Zimin - private investor 俄罗斯 Edipresse Group 报纸、期刊、图书和字典的出版 (5111) 3.65 (市场估计) 100 Swiss media group Edipresse sold 100% in its Russian unit Edipress-Konliga to the latter's general director Maxim Zimin in the summer of 2015, according to the target's web site. Zimin confirmed the information for Vedomosti daily. He did not disclose the deal value but noted that it takes into account the debt of the Russian publishing house towards the Swiss company worth “hundreds of millions of roubles”. A source of the daily familiar with the deal details said that Edipress-Konliga was valued at over RUB 250mn (USD 3.65mn) considering the debt. Zimin used partially own funds to pay for the asset. The other part of the amount, including the debt, is payable within three to six years. Until then, Edipresse will continue to control part of the local trademarks. The transaction is a result of changes in the Russian legislation which stipulate that foreign legal entities should possess no more than 20% in media companies, starting from 2016. Edipresse stepped on the Russian market in 2003 with the purchase of local publisher Kon-Liga Press, later renamed to Edipress-Konliga. Nowadays, the house published 50 magazines with combined circulation of 30 million copies. Among the most popular editions are “Lyubimaya Dacha”, “Landshaftny dizajn”, “Mama I Malysh”, “Lena-Rukodelie”. “Atelye”, etc. In 2014, Edipress-Konliga generated sales of RUB 906.3mn (USD 24mn), down by 5% y/y and net loss of RUB 58.9mn (USD 1.56mn).

The investor group also includes Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, Canada's Public Sector Pension Investment Board and Singapore state-owned investment company Temasek Holdings. Completion of the deal is conditional on Tesco shareholder approval and regulatory approvals in South Korea. Closing is expected by the end 2015. The sale is in line with Tesco's strategic priorities to regain competitiveness in its UK business and strengthen its balance sheet. The Homeplus Group is a leading grocery retailer in the Korean market. The group serves over six million shoppers each week and employs over 26,000 people. It operates online and through 1,075 outlets, of which 140 are hypermarkets, 609 are supermarkets and 326 are convenience stores. The group also operates 139 shopping malls adjacent to its hypermarkets, with over 6,500 tenant leases. Homeplus generated approximately KRW 9.3tn (GBP 5.4bn) in sales in the financial year ended February 2015. MBK Partners is the largest private equity firm in Korea and one of the largest private equity groups in the Asia-Pacific region, with over USD 8.2bn in capital under management. MBK Partners focuses on buyouts in Korea, Japan and China. Tesco serves customers in 7,800 shops in 12 countries in the U.K., Ireland, Central Europe and Asia. It has a workforce of over 500,000 and generates annual sales of GBP 69.7bn. The company is listed on the London Stock Exchange.

110659 05/09/2015 俄罗斯 Axel Springer Russia 收购 Alexander Fedotov - private investor; Regina von Flemming - private investor 俄罗斯; 德国 Axel Springer SE 报纸、期刊、图书和字典的出版 (5111) 　 　 100 UPDATE: On 17 September 2015, Axel Springer SE announced it sold the whole 100% stake to Alexander Fedotov. The portfolio consists of brands such as FORBES, forbes.ru, finanz.ru, OK!, GEO and GALA BIOGRAFIA, and others. Regina von Flemming is acquiring a 20% stake in the coming few weeks. As reported, the negotiations are in a final phase, the Russian arm of Axel Springer reported. As of 1 January 2016, Regina von Flemming will leave the position of general director and become advisor to the general director. ORIGINAL: German media concern Axel Springer SE is selling its Russian business, Axel Springer Russia, to Russian publisher Alexander Fedotov and the general director of the target, Regina von Flemming, German media portal kress.de reported. Fedotov will take 80% in the business and Regina von Flemming - the remaining 20% respectively. The transaction is in compliance with the Russian legislation which stipulates that foreign legal entities should possess no more than 20% in media companies, starting from 2016. According to information of RBC news agency, the deal is in a final stage of completion. The Russian subsidiary of German publishing house Axel Springer AG was established in 2003. The company publishes Russian versions of international magazines in different market segments such as OK!, Geo, Geo Traveller and Forbes. There is no official information about the turnover of the Russian operations. According to information of kress.de, the annual revenue of Axel Springer Russia should be around EUR 25mn (USD 33.2mn). Axel Springer SE is one of the largest publishing houses in Germany and Europe with annual sales of EUR 2.4bn (USD 3.19bn) and net earnings of EUR 147.5mn (USD 196mn). The company publishes over 150 newspapers and magazines in 27 countries worldwide. Alexander Fedotov is the owner of Russia's Artcom Media Group which publishes magazines such as Numero, SNC, Port, Interni, GolfDigest and others.
114977 04/09/2015 乌克兰 Certain assets of Creative Group 收购 Arthur Granz - private investor; Rysbek Toktomushev - private investor; Undisclosed private investors 白俄罗斯共和国; 乌克兰; 国际的 Stanislav Berezkin - private investor 淀粉和植物脂肪和油制造业 (31122) 30 (市场估计) 100 Belarusian entrepreneur Arthur Granz and his Ukrainian partner Rysbek Toktomushev, as well as several undisclosed private investors, have acquired the oil-processing assets of local agribusiness holding Creative Group from the founder Stanislav Berezkin, Forbes magazine reported citing the target's press service. As specified, the new investors took 80% of the oils extraction business as well as the production of fats, margarine and spreads. According to sources of Forbes, Berezkin sold 17 out of all 65 enterprises of Creative Group. Toktomushev later specified, as cited by the magazine, that the plant for production of soybean oil and meal, as well as the other agricultural business of Creative Group was not part of the acquisition. The brand Creative will also be transferred to the new shareholders. The purchased assets include capacities for processing of 1 million tonnes of sunflower and production of 144,000 tonnes of fats and margarine per year, as well as several elevators. Arthur Granz will be the holder of the larger share package in Creative Group whose exact volume was not disclosed. Granz is a financial investor while Toktomushev claims to be a managing shareholder. The remaining new investors, two citizens of Ukraine and one foreign citizen, will hold minority stakes and will not take active part in the management of the business. The deal value was kept confidential. A source of Forbes briefed with the deal details claims that the enterprise value of the sold assets was around USD 550mn, of which USD 30mn was paid in cash to the seller and the remaining USD 520mn represented company debt. Further USD 110mn of the debt will have to be covered by Berezkin. The new investors plan to restart the production at Creative's plants which employ around 1,500 people, as well as to cut off spending, close unpromising lines of business, restructure debt and actively develop the core operations. Until end-2013, Creative Group was profitable and entered the TOP 3 leaders in Ukraine in terms of sunflower-seed processing, exports of sunflower fats and soyabean processing. Prior to its sale, around 80% of the group's liabilities were towards state banks.
110904 04/09/2015 中国 Shanghai Rokin Logistics Co Ltd 收购 Cj Korea Express Corp; National Pension Service; STIC Investments Inc 韩国 　 道路运输 (484) 382.2 (官方数据) 71.4 South Korean-listed logistics company CJ Korea Express Corp announced that the company as well as other investors will acquire a 71.4% stake in Chinese peer Shanghai Rokin Logistics Co Ltd for a total consideration of KRW 455bn (USD 382.2mn). CJ Korea will pay KRW 307.1bn (USD 260mn) while the remaining consideration will be paid by Korea's National Pension Service and STIC Investments Inc. Shanghai Rokin Logistics Co Ltd, founded in 2007, provides logistics and transportation services for food, chemical products, electronics, consumer goods and medical equipment. CJ Korea Express Corp provides logistics, forwarding, parcel delivery and international express services as well as engaging in oil marketing, car repair and consulting businesses. The company is listed on the Korea Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of KRW 4.6T (USD 3.9bn) in 2014. The National Pension Service of Korea operates as the fourth largest pension fund in the world. The fund is Korea's largest investor and has assets worth USD 300bn. STIC Investments Inc provides buyouts and secondary direct investments in automotive, shipbuilding, healthcare, logistics and medical companies.

Ltd. to Netherlands-based airline sales representative WFC Investment B.V. for a total consideration of SGD 6.28mn (USD 4.43mn) in cash. The deal is in line with A-Sonic Group's plan to divest its non-core business, the sales agency services for airlines. The sale proceeds will be used for repayment of a bank loan. Originally, in 2013 WFC Investment B.V. acquired a 50% stake in Worldwide GSA Pte. Ltd. for a total cash consideration of SGD 3.30mn (USD 2.67mn). Following the deal, A-Sonic Aerospace will exit the ownership of Worldwide GSA Pte. Ltd., while WFC Investment B.V. will become the sole shareholder of the target company. Worldwide GSA Pte. Ltd. operates as a cargo general sales agent for various international airlines in eight countries in Asia and Australasia. WFC Investment B.V. owns a network of 65 offices in 41 countries, spanning across Europe, North America, South America, Africa and Asia. A-Sonic Aerospace Limited, incorporated in 2003, is engaged in aerospace engineering-related business and logistics, operating in over 36 cities in 13 countries, spanning three continents in Asia, America and Europe. It is involved in the sale or lease of aircraft; in supplying aircraft systems and components to airlines and it also offers aircraft maintenance and repair services. For 2014, it reported revenues of USD 241.8mn.
110607 04/09/2015 俄罗斯; 美国 Virool 少数股权购买 Flint Capital 俄罗斯 　 软件出版 (5112); 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 5 (官方数据) 　 Russian venture fund Flint Capital has invested USD 5mn in U.S. advertising platform with Russian roots Virool, Firrma.ru reported. The funds will be used for expansion of Virool's market share in the U.S.A. and internationally. In February 2013, Virool attracted USD 6.62mn of seed funding from a pool of investors, including tycoon Yuri Milner, TMT Investments, Phenomen Ventures and others. Virool was founded in 2012 by Russians Alexander Debelov and Vladimir Gurgov. The company is based in San Francisco and has additional offices in New York and St Petersburg. Virool is a programmatic video marketing platform for individuals, small businesses and global brands and their agencies. The company develops the so called ‘native advertising' with the help of which the customer chooses a commercial and is able to post it through the service on web- and mobile-based platforms with targeted audience. Virool is integrated in 100,000 web sites, social networks and mobile applications. Flint Capital was founded in 2013 by Dmitry Smirnov and Oleg Seydak. The fund specialises in financing hi-tech projects in the IT, media and telecom, as well as financial and consumer services sectors.

Financial details of the deal were not disclosed. The acquisition will enable the buyer to establish its operations in the online payment space of the Asia Pacific market which is seen as fast growing. The firm is a 26:74 joint venture between Telephonics Corp and Mahindra Defence Systems Ltd and was established in March 2013. Telephonics Corp is military and civilian electronics equipment manufacturer which offers communication, integrated information, and sensor systems and engineering services. 110598 04/09/2015 俄罗斯 Vankorneft ZAO 少数股权购买 ONGC Videsh Ltd 印度 Rosneft 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 1,270.00 (官方数据) 15 UPDATE 3: On 31 May 2016, Rosneft reported it closed the transaction for a base price of USD 1.27bn. UPDATE 2: On 4 April 2016, the Federal Antimonopoly Service of Russia decided on the preliminary approval of the acquisition. UPDATE 1: On 24 March 2016, the Russian Government Commission for Foreign Investments approved ONGC's acquisition of a 15% stake in Vankorneft for USD 1.3bn, Interfax news agency reported. ORIGINAL: Indian oil and gas major ONGC Videsh Ltd has agreed to acquire a 15% stake in Russian peer Vankorneft from its parent Rosneft, the buyer and the seller announced separately. The respective sales and purchase agreement was inked during the high-profile Eastern Economic Forum held in Vladivostok. ONGC Videsh paid a price that was close to USD 1.25bn, CEO of Rosneft Igor Sechin told journalists, as cited by ITAR-TASS news agency. Interfax news agency cited own sources briefed with the matter, according to which the asset was valued at USD 1.275bn. The deal completion is subject to customary board, government and regulatory approvals. The closing is expected by mid-2016. ONGC Videsh is to have two representatives in the board of directors of Vankorneft. Rosneft is to create an operator company for more efficient management of Vankorneft's projects. ONGC Videsh underlines that the present deal will enhance its footstep in Russia, in line with the strategy to expand the company's portfolio with high-quality international assets. In addition, the acquisition will reportedly boost India's energy security sector. Sechin commented, as cited in the press release of Rosneft, that the current agreement will speed up collaboration between the two sides in other large-scale oil and gas upstream projects in the region. Founded in 2004, Vankorneft develops the Vankor field in Eastern Siberia, the largest field discovered and brought into production in Russia in the last 25 years. The field occupies 447 km2 of area. As of 1 January 2016, 2P reserves by PRMS classification are 265 mln tons of oil and condensate and 88 bcm of gas. In 2015, Vankor field produced 22 mln tons of oil and 8.71 bcm of gas. ONGC Videsh Ltd is the international E&P arm of India's state-run Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Ltd (ONGC). The company operates 36 projects in 17 countries worldwide, producing 167,000 barrels of oil and oil equivalent per day. As of 31 March 2015, ONGC Videsh had total oil and gas reserves of some 647mn tonnes of oil equivalent.
110589 04/09/2015 美国 Exelan Pharmaceuticals Inc 收购 Cipla Ltd 印度 　 医药制造 (3254) 50 (官方数据) 100 India-based pharmaceuticals manufacturing firm Cipla Ltd has agreed to acquire U.S-based generic drugs maker Exelan Pharmaceuticals Inc for a total consideration of USD 50mn, the buyer announced. The acquisition enables Cipla to access the government institutional market in the U.S. The deal is expected to be completed by the end of 31 December 2015 and is subject to certain closing conditions. In a simultaneous transaction, Cipla also acquired U.S. generic drugs maker, marketer and distributor InvaGen Pharmaceuticals Inc for USD 500mn. Exelan Pharmaceuticals is a pharmaceuticals sales and marketing firm that focuses on generic medicine. The firm was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Georgia. Exlan reported sales of USD 28mn for the FY ended 31 December 2014. Cipla is an international Indian pharmaceuticals manufacturing firm which offers active pharmaceutical ingredients, formulations and veterinary medicine. It has a portfolio of over 1,500 products in categories such as respiratory, cardiovascular, gastrointestinal and antiviral. The firm has more than 20,000 employees and presence in 150 countries. Cipla reported consolidated total revenues of INR 115.1bn (USD 1.8) for FY ended 31 March 2015.
110588 04/09/2015 美国 InvaGen Pharmaceuticals Inc 收购 Cipla Ltd 印度 　 医药制造 (3254) 500 (官方数据) 100 Indian pharmaceuticals major Cipla Ltd has agreed to acquire U.S based generic medicines manufacturer InvaGen Pharmaceuticals Inc for a cash consideration of USD 500mn, the buyer announced. The transaction will be routed through Cipla's U.K unit, Cipla EU. The acquisition will scale-up Cipla's presence in the U.S and will provide 40 approved abbreviated new drugs applications, 32 marketed products and 30 products under review which is expected to receive approval within the next 4 years. The deal is expected to be completed by 31 December 2015 and is subject to certain closing conditions. In a simultaneous transaction, Cipla also announced the acquisition of Exelan Pharmaceuticals Inc, engaged in production and marketing of generic drugs, for USD 50mn. InvaGen Pharmaceuticals develops, manufactures, markets and distributes generic drugs. IT manufactures medicine focused on various fields including cardiovascular, anti-infective, anti-inflammatory, and anti-depressants among others. The firm is headquartered in New York and employs 500 people in 3 manufacturing facilities with a total floor size of 32,500 m2. InvaGen reported total sales of USD 190mn for FY ended 31 December 2014. Cipla is an international Indian pharmaceuticals manufacturing firm which offers active pharmaceutical ingredients, formulations and veterinary medicine. It has a portfolio of over 1,500 products in categories such as respiratory, cardiovascular, gastrointestinal and antiviral. The firm has more than 20,000 employees and presence in 150 countries. Cipla reported consolidated total revenues of INR 115.1bn (USD 1.8) for FY ended 31 March 2015.
119315 03/09/2015 阿根廷 La Farmaco Argentina I y CSA 收购 Santiago Saenz SA 阿根廷 Unilever NV 日用化学产品制造 (3256) 10.4 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 1 April 2016, Santiago Saenz said that the Argentinean competition authorities approved the formalization of the offer. The deal is expected to close in the coming days. ORIGINAL: Argentinean soap and cleaning products manufacturer Santiago Saenz SA announced it has submitted an offer for the acquisition of its local counterpart La Farmaco Argentina I y CSA from Anglo-Dutch multinational consumer goods company Unilever NV. Saenz said that on 9 September 2016, Argentina Investments BV and Mixhold BV, both subsidiaries of Unilever, approved the offer and agreed to receive an upfront payment of ARS 24.23mn (USD 2.6mn), a sum which corresponds to 25% of La Farmaco's capital. Other players interested in the acquisition of La Farmaco were Peruvian food manufacturer Alicorp SAA and Argentinean personal care products manufacturer Prifamon SA. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. La Farmaco Argentina manufactures and sells personal care and beauty products under the brand names Veritas, Vo5, Antiall, Farmaco, TRESemme, and St.Ives. The company's manufacturing plant is located in the Buenos Aires province and produces liquids, powders and semisolids. Unilever was obliged to divest the above-mentioned assets due to its monopolistic position which it gained following the acquisition of its U.S. peer Alberto Culver Co five years ago. The company will retain the TRESemme and St.Ives brands. Santiago Saenz engages in the manufacturing of detergents, insecticide aerosol sprays, disinfectants and air fresheners. Unilever is a fast-moving consumer goods company offering food, beverage, personal care, home care and other products. It reported sales revenues of EUR 48.44bn (USD 54.7bn) and a net income of EUR 5.2bn (USD 5.84bn) for 2014. Note: The USD 10.4mn deal value for the entire 100% stake in La Farmaco Argentina is based on the USD 2.6mn paid for 25% of the company’s capital.

111992 03/09/2015 哥伦比亚; 加拿大 Canacol Energy Ltd 少数股权购买 Cavengas Holdings SRL 巴巴多斯 　 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 59.58 (官方数据) 19.9 UPDATE: On 21 September 2015, Canacol said that Cavengas converted the receipts into shares. ORIGINAL: Colombia-focused Canadian oil & gas company Canacol Energy Ltd announced that Barbados-based investment firm Cavengas Holdings SRL has made a strategic equity investment in the company of CAD 78.9mn (USD 59.6mn). In exchange, Canacol issued to Cavengas 17,590,000 subscription receipts at an unitary price of CAD 2.5 (USD 1.886) and 14,000,000 shares at a price of CAD 2.5 (USD 1.886) per share. The subscription receipts can be converted into 17,590,000 shares. Following conversion of the receipts, together with the 14 million shares, Cavengas will own a 19.9% stake of Canacol's enlarged capital. Canacol will use one third of the funds for debt service and prepayment, while the other two thirds for the company's capital program and general corporate purposes. Canacol Energy is dedicated to the exploration and production of oil & gas with main focus on Colombia and Ecuador. It posted sales revenues of USD 149mn and a net loss of USD 106mn for FY ended 30 June 2015. Cavengas Holdings provides investment services to the energy and mining sectors. Note: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis.

110717 03/09/2015 俄罗斯 JV on production and sale of Hawtai cars and Kamaz trucks 合资企业 Hawtai Motor Group co; KamAZ 中国; 俄罗斯 　 　 　 　 　 Russian heavy-duty vehicles maker KamAZ and Chinese automotive manufacturer Hawtai Motor Group co signed a framework agreement on the creation of a joint venture for production and trade of KamAZ trucks in China and Hawtai cars in Russia, according to a press release of KamAZ. The total investment in the project could be worth USD 350mn, Prime news agency reported based on materials of Kamaz for the Beijing International Economic Forum. The manufacturing of Hawtai passenger cars in Russia will be organized on the production sites of KamAZ. A new plant is planned to be built in the city of Tianjin, China for the manufacturing of KamAZ trucks. Sales will be carried out using the advantages of both companies' local distribution networks. Apart from production sites, KamAZ will also contribute truck production technologies and resource management skills. Hawtai will contribute technologies, design developments and other know-how in the production of light vehicles. General director of KamAZ, Sergey Kologin, said, as quoted in the press release, that the agreement is in line with his company's long-term strategy on diversification of sales and acquisition of new fast-growing markets. On the other hand, KamAZ targets to sell 50,000 cars per year in Russia. KamAZ group is the largest automotive corporation of the Russian Federation. The group ranks 11th among the world's top heavy-duty truck producers, according to the company's website. KamAZ manufactures a wide range of vehicles: trucks, trailers, buses, tractors, engines, power units and different tools. Founded in 2000, Hawtai Motor Group co has developed into a diversified automotive enterprise. The business scope covers automobile R&D, core components production, auto manufacturing, auto sales and capital operation. With the Rongcheng and Erdos production bases and its R&D center in Beijing, Hawtai Motor has already reached annual production capacity of 300,000 clean diesel engines, 450,000 automatic gearboxes and 500,000 vehicles.

Financial details of the deal were not disclosed. Ayala Corp will still remain as the largest shareholder of the wind farm with a 36% stake. The sale will enable AC Energy, a unit of the seller, to have capital for future investments. The wind farm has 27 units of wind turbines installed and has already collected feed-in-tariff incentives from the local government. Mitsubishi Corp acts as a global integrated business enterprise that develops and operates businesses in the environmental and infrastructure business, industrial finance, energy, metals, machinery, chemicals and food sectors. Its business portfolio includes retail, real estate, financial services, telecommunications, water infrastructure, renewable energy, electronics and business outsourcing. 110653 03/09/2015 俄罗斯 Sibur Holding 少数股权购买 China Petrochemical Corp (Sinopec Group) 中国 Russian private investor(s) 石化产品的制造 (32511) 1,338.00 (官方数据) 10 UPDATE 2: On 17 December 2015, Sibur Holding announced the completion of the deal. UPDATE 1: The Government Commission for Foreign Investments approved the purchase by Sinopec of a 20% stake in Sibur Holding, the head of the Federal Antimonopoly Service, Igor Artemyev, told journalists on 11 December 2015, as cited by Vedomosti daily. According to Artemyev, the first 10% in Sibur will be acquired for USD 1.338bn. The price of the second 10%-package has not been determined yet. The second transaction is to be carried out within three years. As reported, the existing stockholders will sell their shares in the holding proportionally. ORIGINAL: China Petrochemical Corp (Sinopec Group) has agreed to acquire a 10% equity stake in Russia's largest integrated petrochemicals producer Sibur Holding, according to press statements of Sibur Holding and of Russian energy minister Alexander Novak, as cited by the media in Russia. The financial terms of the acquisition were not disclosed. According to Raiffeisenbank analyst Konstantin Yuminov, as cited by Vedomosti daily, the whole company could be valued at some USD 12-14bn, i.e. USD 1.2-1.4bn for the 10%-stake. The respective framework investment agreement was signed during a state visit of Russia's President Vladimir Putin to China. The transaction is pending corporate and regulatory approvals. Dmitry Konov, General Director of Sibur, told Kommersant daily that the completion of the deal is expected to happen by 01 December 2015. Currently, Sibur Holding is owned by co-owner and CEO of gas major Novatek, Leonid Mikhelson (50.2%), board member Kirill Shamalov (21.3%), tycoon Gennady Timchenko (15.3%), as well as former and current company management (13.2%). According to unofficial information of Kommersant daily, the sellers in the current transaction are Mikhelson and Timchenko. The deal reportedly represents a strategic move for strengthening the existing co-operation between Sinopec Group and Sibur Holding, as well as their leading market positions. It is also in line with Sinopec's strategic objective to expand its petrochemical business internationally. Wang Yupu, Chairman of Sinopec, is quoted in the press statement as saying that Sibur's upstream and petrochemical business complements the operations of Sinopec. Sibur Holding is active in two core segments: feedstock and energy (gathering and processing of APG, transportation, fractionation and other processing of NGLs; marketing and sales of energy products, such as natural gas, LPG, naphtha, raw NGL, methyl tertiary butyl ether (MTBE) and other fuels and fuel additives) and petrochemicals (basic polymers production, synthetic rubbers, manufacturing commodity and specialty rubbers, as well as thermoplastic elastomers, intermediate chemicals, plastics and organic synthesis products). In 2014, the holding generated revenue of RUB 361bn (USD 9.57bn) and a net profit of RUB 25bn (USD 662.6mn). China Petrochemical Corp is a state-run petroleum, energy and chemicals company established in 1998. Core business areas include industrial investment and management, exploration, production, storage and transportation and wholesale trade of oil and natural gas, coal and related products, oil refining, petrochemicals production and trade, engineering and industrial equipment overhaul, R&D of electrical and mechanical equipment, production and marketing of electricity, steam, water and industrial gas, etc. Sinopec Group ranked 3rd in the Fortune Global 500 in 2014 with annual operating revenue of USD 457.2bn. Note: For estimating the deal value, the middle point of the market range quoted by Raiffeisenbank was taken.
110652 03/09/2015 日本 Six rental housing properties in Japan 收购 Samty Co Ltd 日本 Ascott Residence Trust 房地产 (531) 37.28 (官方数据) 100 Singapore-based real estate investment trust Ascott Residence Trust (Ascott REIT) announced it will sell Japan's six rental housing properties to Japan-based real estate company Samty Co., Ltd for a total consideration of JPY 4,475.0mn (USD 37.28mn / SGD 52.6mn). The deal is subject to certain closing condition and is expected to complete in Q3 2015. The sale price represents a 12.5% premium over the properties' latest valuation of JPY 3,977mn (USD 33.1mn), provided by the independent property valuer CBRE K.K as at 30 June 2015. The sale is in line with Ascott REIT's strategy to unlock the value of non-core assets in order to recycle capital. Ascott REIT is acting in the transaction through its wholly-owned subsidiary, ARC-CapitaLand Three Tokutei Mokuteki Kaisha (TMK3). The six properties include Grand E'terna Nijojomae, Grand E'terna Chioninmae, Grand E'terna Saga, Grand E'terna Saga Idaidori, Grand Mire Miyamachi and Grand Mire Shintera. Grand E'terna Nijojomae (with 47 units) and Grand E'terna Chioninmae (with 18 units and one retail), both located in the Kyoto city, in the central part of the island of Honshu, Japan. Grand E'terna Saga provides 127 units, including 4 retail and Grand E'terna Saga Idaidori with 46 units, are both located in the city of Saga, the northwest part of the island of Kyushu, Japan. Grand Mire Miyamachi comprises 91 units and Grand Mire Shintera provides 59 units and both are located in the Sendai city, the northern part of the island of Honshu, Japan. Following the deal, TMK3 will continue to hold five other rental housing properties, including Actus Hakata V-Tower in Fukuoka; Big Palace Kita 14jo in Sapporo; Gravis Court Kakomachi, Gravis Court Kokutaiji and Gravis Court Nishiharaekimae in Hiroshima. Established in 1982, Samty Co., Ltd. is a real estate company with capabilities in planing and design, investment and development, property leasing. The company is also involved in the ownership and operation of hotel assets, including the Amanohashidate Hotel, Center Hotel Tokyo, Center Hotel Osaka, and Laguna Suite Hotel & Wedding. Its shares are listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange's JASDAQ and for 2014 its revenues were JPY 24.4bn (USD 203.2mn). It employs around 150 people. Ascott REIT invests in income-producing real estate primarily used as serviced residences, rental housing properties and other hospitality assets and it is managed by Ascott Residence Trust Management Limited. Ascott REIT had total assets under management of SGD 4.33bn (USD 3.06bn) as of 30 June 2015.
110644 03/09/2015 阿根廷; 巴西; 中美洲; 智利; 哥伦比亚; 厄瓜多尔; 墨西哥; 巴拉圭; 秘鲁; 乌拉圭; 美国 YellowPepper Holding Corp 少数股权购买 Administradora Latin Idea SAPI de CV (LIV Capital) 墨西哥 　 软件出版 (5112) 　 　 　 Mexico-based private equity firm Administradora Latin Idea SAPI de CV (LIV Capital), formerly known as Latin Idea Venture LLC, said it has invested in Latin America-focused U.S.-based mobile financial services provider YellowPepper Holding Corp. Latin Idea Venture LLC acted via its fund Latin Idea Mexico Venture Capital Fund III (LIMVC III) and its parallel vehicle Latin Idea Mexico Venture Capital Fund III LP. Further transaction details were also not revealed. This is the second investment of LIV Capital in YellowPepper in 2015. YellowPepper Holding Corp is a provider of mobile financial products and services enabling monetary and informational transactions between financial institutions and businesses across Latin America. The company says that it allows five million customers to execute more than 30 million transactions on a monthly basis. LIV Capital is a private equity funds manager focused on early stage growth investments in companies in the telecom and media sectors mainly in Mexico.
110638 03/09/2015 美国 Avolon Holdings Ltd 收购 Bohai Leasing Co Ltd 中国 　 租赁服务 (532) 2,509.79 (官方数据) 100 Chinese financial leasing company Bohai Leasing Co Ltd announced that it will acquire U.S.-based NASDAQ-listed aircraft leasing company Avolon Holdings Ltd for a total consideration of USD 2.5bn. The buyer will acquire the target company's 80,960,882 outstanding shares at USD 31 apiece, which represents a 31% premium to its closing price on 13 July 2015. The deal is expected to complete by the first quarter of 2016. It marks the biggest transaction Bohai Leasing has done since its USD 1bn acquisition of GE SeaCo in 2011. The transaction enables Bohai Leasing to expand its presence to the global aircraft leasing sector while also helping Avolon strengthen its foothold in the Chinese market. The buyer's original offer was to only acquire a 20% stake in Avolon for USD 428mn, as announced in July 2015. Avolon Holdings Ltd manages, owns and committs 260 aircraft serving 56 customers in 33 countries. The company is listed on the NASDAQ and recorded revenues of USD 606mn in 2014. Bohai Leasing Co Ltd provides financial, operating, leverage and SPV leasing services. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 6.9bn (USD 1.1bn) in 2014.

The company serves more than 60 banks and is primarily focused on Angola, Mozambique, Republic of Cape Verde or Namibia. It employs 383 people, and recorded revenues of EUR 41.5mn and net profit of EUR 4.95mn in 2014. Asseco Poland, founded in 1991, offers software, ERP and BI solutions to the banking, finance, energy, telecommunications, infrastructure and healthcare sectors, as well as to public institutions. The company posted revenues of PLN 6.2bn (EUR 1.5bn) and net profit of PLN 358mn (EUR 85.7mn) in 2014. 110537 03/09/2015 印度 Actoserba Active Wholesale Pvt Ltd 少数股权购买 Zodius Capital Advisors; Khazanah Nasional Bhd; Unilazer Ventures Pvt Ltd; IDG Ventures India; Kalaari Capital Advisors Pvt Ltd 印度; 马来西亚 　 电子购物 (454111) 37.68 (市场估计) 　 India-based Actoserba Active Wholesale Pvt Ltd, which operates intimate wear e-commerce portal Zivame.com, has raised INR 2.5bn (USD 37.7mn) in its Series C funding round led by Zodius Capital and Khazanah Nasional Bhd, the target's financial advisor Avendus Capital disclosed. The round also saw the participoation of existing investors Unilazer Ventures, IDG Ventures amd Kalaari Capital. The capital infusion will be used for upgrading and improving technology, scaling-up marketing, improving its mobile platform and setting up fitting stores. Actoserba Active Wholesale operates Zivame.com, a e-commerce portal that focuses on intimate wear. The portal offers 5,000 styles and 100 sizes of bras, panties, nightwear, shapewear, comfort wear, active and sportswear, and swimwear. It carries brands such as Hanes, Triumph, Caprice, puma, and WonderBra. Zivame claims to have catered to over 300,000 women locally. Khazanah Nasional is the sovereign wealth fund of the government of Malaysia that invests in various sectors including Infrastructure, real estate, financial services and healthcare. Its portfolio includes Axiata Group, CIMB Group Holdings, Telekom Malaysia, Malaysia Airports and IHH Healthcare. Khazanah Nasional reported total assets of MYR 5.2bn (USD 1.5bn) as of 31 December 2014. Zodius Capital is India-based private equity and venture capital manager that invests in early-stage firms focused on the enterprise software, big data analytics and consumer mobile industries among others. It typically invests in one company every six months.
110533 03/09/2015 印度 Vistaar Financial Services Pvt Ltd 少数股权购买 WestBridge Capital Partners; Omidyar Network; Elevar Equity LLC; Saama Capital; Lok Advisory Services Pvt Ltd 印度; 美国 　 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 37.68 (市场估计) 　 Indian non-banking financial firm Vistaar Financial Services Pvt Ltd has successfully secured INR 2.5bn (USD 37.7mn) in a funding round from existing investors led by WestBridge Capital, The Economic Times reported. The round was also joined by other existing investors Elevar Equity, Saama Capital, Lok Capital and Omidyar Network. The funding raised will be used to increase its branches and expand its loan portfolio to INR 25bn (USD 376.8mn) over the next 3 years. Vistaar Financial Services is an India-based non-banking financial entity that provides business mortgage, hypothecation loans and credit shield insurance to small and medium enterprises. WestBridge Capital Partners is an Indian private and public equity fund manager focused on domestic mid-level companies. It typically invests USD 10mn to USD 80mn and manages a total portfolio of USD 1.2bn in more than 60 companies as of July 2014.
112821 02/09/2015 巴西; 南非; 澳大利亚; 加拿大 Spatial Dimension Canada Inc. 收购 Trimble Navigation Ltd 美国 　 软件出版 (5112) 　 　 100 U.S. provider of location-based solutions Trimble Navigation Ltd announced it has acquired enterprise scale land management solution developer Spatial Dimension Canada Inc, based in Canada, with subsidiaries in South Africa, Brazil and Australia. Financial terms were not disclosed. Trimble has incorporated Spatial Dimension's solution, called FlexiCadastre. It is an enterprise scale land management software that is used by leading mining companies and governments all over the world. Mr. Matt Delano, business area director for Trimble's Land Administration solutions, said that the acquisition of FlexiCadastre will strengthen company's administration portfolio and will enable it to serve public and private customers across the mining, oil and gas, and forestry industries. According to Mr. Bill Festa, CEO of Dimension Spatial, the acquisition will help the company to expand its business across new markets and enrich its hardware and software portfolio. FlexiCadastre is used in over 100 jurisdictions globally to manage companies' land-related operations and obligations. The portfolio of Spatial Dimension comprises customers such as the World Bank, United States Agency for International Development (USAID), United Kingdom Department for International Development (DFID), Australian Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFAT), among others. Trimble provides location-based solutions for GPS, laser, wireless communications and optics, among others. In addition, the company offers customized software content specific to the needs of the user. The company's solutions are focused on applications requiring position or location including surveying, construction, agriculture, fleet and asset management, public safety and mapping. Trimble had a turnover of USD 2.4bn for FY 2014. _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A provedor norte-americana de serviços baseados na localização Trimble Navigation Ltd anunciou que adquiriu a desenvolvedora de soluções de gestão de terra em escala empresarial Spatial Dimension Canada Inc, sediada no Canadá, com filiais na África do Sul, Brasil e Austrália. Os termos financeiros não foram divulgados. A Trimble incorporou a solução da Spatial Dimension, denominada FlexiCadastre que é um software de gestão de terra em escala empresarial, usado por empresas líderes de mineração e governos de todo o mundo. O Sr. Matt Delano, diretor da área de negócios de soluções de Gestão de Terra da Trimble, disse que a aquisição da FlexiCadastre ia fortalecer o portfólio administrativo da empresa e ia permitir-lhe servir os clientes públicos e privados das indústrias de mineração, petrolífera e florestal. De acordo com o Sr. Bill Festa, CEO da Dimension Spatial, a aquisição vai ajudar a empresa a expandir os seus negócios através de novos mercados e enriquecer o seu portfólio de hardware e software. A FlexiCadastre é usada em mais de 100 jurisdições em todo o mundo, para administrar as suas operações e obrigações, relacionadas com a terra. A carteira de Dimension Spatial compreende clientes, tais como o Banco Mundial, a Agência dos Estados Unidos para o Desenvolvimento Internacional (USAID), o Departamento de Desenvolvimento Internacional do Reino Unido (DFID), o Departamento de Relações Exteriores da Austrália (DFAT), entre outros. A Trimble fornece soluções baseadas em localização para GPS, laser, comunicações sem fio e óptica, entre outros. Para além disso, a empresa oferece conteúdo de software personalizado, adaptado as necessidades do utilizador. As soluções da empresa são focadas em aplicações que precisam de posição ou de localização, incluindo agrimensura, construção, agricultura, frota e gestão de ativos, segurança pública e mapeamento. A Trimble teve um volume de negócios de USD 2.4bn para o ano fiscal de 2014.

110560 02/09/2015 俄罗斯 Primorskaya Soya 收购 RusAgro Group 俄罗斯 Grandim Ltd 淀粉和植物脂肪和油制造业 (31122); 其他食品制造 (3119) 　 75 Russian agricultural holding RusAgro Group has approved the acquisition of a 75% stake in local soy processing company Primorskaya Soya, the buyer said in a press release. The financial terms of the acquisition were not announced. Primorskaya Soya is located in Primorsky region. The plant has the capacity to process 450 tonnes of soy per day. It also produces bottled soybean oil and mayonnaise. According to information of the state corporate register, Primorskaya Soya was registered in end-May 2015. Cyprus-based firm Grandim Ltd holds 75% in the company and private investor Tatyana Gerasimenko - 25%. The daily further elaborates, citing the holding’s general director Maxim Basov, that Primorskaya Soya is one of the creditors of ailing Ussuriysk Plant of Fats and Oils, an exclusive supplier of soybean flour to RusAgro Group. Through the above deal, RusAgro Group could possibly gain rights to claim the debt of the plant in Ussuriysk. Thus RusAgro could eventually comply with its strategy and create capacities for soybean processing in Primorsky region on the basis of Ussuriysk Plant of Fats and Oils after gaining control in the company. RusAgro Group is a leading Russian producer of sugar. It is also active in meats, oil and fats manufacturing, as well as other branches of agricultural business.
110559 02/09/2015 丹麦 Fundamenture A/S 收购 Valid Solucoes e Servicos de Seguranca em Meios de Pagamentos e Identificacao SA 巴西 　 半导体和其他电子元件制造业 (33441); 软件出版 (5112) 90 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 6 October 2015 Valid announced the conclusion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Brazilian identification systems provider Valid Solucoes e Servicos de Seguranca em Meios de Pagamentos e Identificacao SA announced it has agreed to acquire the total capital of Denmark-based electronic devices manufacturer Fundamenture A/S for USD 90mn. There will be an additional earn-out payment to sellers, estimated at USD 48.3mn to be paid by the combined company. It will reach the maximum amount if the target company's average annual EBITDA between 2015 and 2017, together with that of Valid Spain is at least USD 31mn. The deal is subject to the fulfilment of certain conditions, including the approval of the Company's Extraordinary Shareholders' Meeting set on 30 September, 2015. According to Mr. Carlos Affonso, Valid's Global CEO, the acquisition will open European, Asian and African markets for Valid and is expected to double its telecommunication business. Also, it will provide the company with a larger market share in the chip global value chain, allowing Valid to occupy fifth position in the world SIM card manufacturing. In addition, Fundamenture's highly qualified team will strengthen the company's know-how in the area. Fundamenture A/S, headquartered in Herlev, Denmark, manufactures and sells Smart Cards. It is specialized in implementation of operating systems on SIM cards, marketing of applications and solutions for Mobile devices. It is the seventh largest supplier of SIM cards in the world with 300 million units a year. It reported net revenues of USD 71.7mn and EBITDA of USD 10mn in 2014. Valid Solucoes e Servicos de Seguranca em Meios de Pagamentos e Identificacao SA, established in 1957, is an international provider of identification, telecommunication, means of payment and digital certification systems, such as digital certificates, magnetic, smart, prepaid and SIM cards and customized information documents to financial institutions, telecommunication companies and governmental entities. The company has production facilities in Brazil, Argentina, Spain and the United States, and engages 6,000 employees. Valid is listed on the BM&FBovespa Stock Exchange. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE: Em 6 de outubro de 2015 a Valid anunciou o fechamento do negócio. ORIGINAL: A fornecedora brasileira de sistemas de identificação Valid Solucoes e Servicos de Seguranca em Meios de Pagamentos e Identificacao SA anunciou que decidiu adquirir a totalidade do capital social da fabricante dinamarquesa de dispositivos eletrônicos Fundamenture A/S por USD 90mn. Está previsto um pagamento adicional para os vendedores em earn-out, estimados em USD 48.3mn, a serem pagos pela empresa combinada. O montante de earn-outs será máximo, se o EBITDA médio anual combinado da Valid Espanha e da Fundamenture entre 2015 e 2017 for pelo menos de USD 31mn. O negócio está sujeito ao cumprimento de certas condições, incluíndo a aprovação pela Assembleia Geral Extraordinária da Companhia, a se realizar no dia 30 de setembro de 2015. De acordo com o Sr. Carlos Affonso, CEO Global da Valid, a aquisição vai abrir os mercados europeus, asiáticos e africanos para a Valid e deve dobrar o seu valume de negócios de telecomunicações. Além disso, o investimento vai fornecer à empresa uma maior quota de mercado na cadeia de valor global do chip com ganho de escala, permitindo-lhe passar para quinta posição no ranking mundial de fornecedores de SIM Cards. Além disso, a equipe altamente qualificada da Fundamenture vai fortalecer o know-how da empresa nesta área. A Fundamenture A/S, com sede em Herlev, Dinamarca, fabrica e comercializa Smart Cards. É especializada na implementação de sistemas operacionais para cartões SIM e na comercialização de aplicativos e soluções para dispositivos móveis. É o sétimo maior fornecedor de cartões SIM no mundo, com 300 milhões de cartóes vendidos por ano. A Fundamenture reportou receita líquida de USD 71.7mn e EBITDA de USD 10mn em 2014. A Valid Soluções e Serviços de Segurança em Meios de Pagamentos e Identificação SA, fundada em 1957, é uma fornecedora internacional de sistemas de identificação, telecomunicação, meios de pagamento e certificação digital, tais como certificados digitais, cartões magnéticos, smart cards, pré-pagos, SIM cards e documentos com informações personalizadas para instituições financeiras, empresas de telecomunicações e entidades governamentais. A empresa tem unidades de produção no Brasil, Argentina, Espanha e nos Estados Unidos e envolve 6,000 colaboradores. A Valid está listada na Bolsa de Valores de São Paulo BM&FBovespa.

The deal value was not disclosed. The buyer will use the building as its European headquarter. In May 2015, CEFC acquired a 5% stake in Czech-Slovak financial company J&T Group for around EUR 79mn. Originally, CPIPG purchased the building in 2011 from UniCredit Bank. CEFC was founded by Shanghai Energy Fund Investment and Shanghai Zhong An United Investment Fund. It also holds companies from insurance and banking sectors. CPI Group is engaged in investment, development and property management. 110545 02/09/2015 匈牙利 Retail banking business of Citigroup in Hungary 收购 Erste Group Bank 奥地利 Citigroup Inc 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 100 UPDATE: On 18 December 2015, Hungarian Competition Office (GVH) and the National Bank of Hungary (MNB) have approved the purchase of the Hungarian retail business of Citibank by Erste Bank Hungary Zrt., both parties announced. ORIGINAL: Austrian lender Erste Group Bank AG announced that it has signed an agreement to acquire consumer banking business of U.S. peer Citigroup in Hungary. Financial terms were not disclosed. The transaction is subject to regulatory approval and is expected to complete by the end of 2016. The deal includes Citi's retail banking and investment business, consumer loans and cards businesses, and the CitiBusiness microenterprise accounts as well as the transfer of consumer banking employees. The sale is in line with Citi's on-going strategy to divest its non-core operating businesses. The bank is exiting retail banking business in 11 countries. Recently, it has sold its consumer banking businesses in Egypt, Panama and Costa Rica. Citi will remain in Hungary and continue to focus on expanding and growing the services it offers to institutional clients and public sector clients in the country. The buyer is acting in the transaction through its subsidiary Erste Bank Hungary Zrt. With the acquisition, Erste will have the second largest retail customer portfolio in Hungary, Radován Jelasity, CEO for Erste Bank Hungary Zrt. said. Citigroup is a global bank with some 200 million customers in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions across the world. In 2014, the group posted a net profit of USD 6.7bn. Its shares are listed on the New York Stock Exchange.

Upon the deal completion, GEFCO will consolidate 100% in the target. No other deal-related details were disclosed. Algai provides services of finished vehicle logistics and distribution throughout the entire territory of Russia and abroad. GEFCO is an international logistics operator and among the top 10 in Europe with EUR 4.1bn (USD 5.45bn) in turnover. The company has 41 subsidiaries on five continents. GEFCO is 75%-owned by Russian state-owned railway operator Russian Railways and the remainder belongs to French car-maker PSA Peugeot Citroen.

Superior Industries is engaged in the manufacturing of groundbreaking, bulk material processing and handling equipment as well as cutting-edge components for machinery products. 110518 02/09/2015 美国 Reduce Data Inc 收购 Jasper Infotech Pvt Ltd 印度 　 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 　 　 100 Indian e-commerce major Jasper Infotech Pvt LTd which operates Snapdeal.com has acquired U.S advertising software developer Reduce Data Inc for an undisclosed amount, The Economic Times reported. The financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. Post-transaction Reduce Data’s employees will join Snapdeal. The deal comes after Snapdeal acquired software and website development firm Letsgomo on June 2015. Reduce Data is a software development firm which offers an online advertising data platform. The plaform offers dyanamic data-driven advertisements, retargeting and algorithmic optimization. The firm is headquartered in the California and has additional offices in Iowa and India. Snapdeal is an e-commerce platform offering more than 5 million products in 500 categories of goods including fashion, electronic and home products. The site has 200,000 merchant partners and 30 million users across 5,000 cities. Snapdeal reported revenues of INR 1.7bn (USD28.1mn) for FY ended 31 March, 2014.
110508 02/09/2015 波兰 ZEC Katowice SA 私有化 Electricite de France SA (EDF) 法国 Katowicki Holding Węglowy SA 化石燃料发电 (221112); 电力传送，控制和分配 (22112) 67.63 (市场估计) 100 UPDATE: On 16 October 2015, DK Energy finalised the transaction. According to the Polish News Bulletin, the deal value was approximately PLN 250mn (EUR 59.3mn). ORIGINAL: Polish state-owned coal miner Katowicki Holding Weglowy (KHW) said it has signed an agreement on the sale of local heat producer and distributor Zaklady Energetyki Cieplnej (ZEC Katowice) to Polish unit of French energy group Electricite de France SA (EDF). Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. The buyer acted through its subsidiary DK Energy Polska. The transaction is subject to approval by the Polish competition authority UOKiK. ZEC Katowice produces and distributes heat to the cities of Katowice, Myslowice, Sosnowiec amd Ruda Slaska. It has total installed capacity of 647,89 MW. The company employs 421 people and posted revenues of PLN 152.2mn (EUR 35.2mn) in 2014. EDF Polska holds 10% of the share in the electricity market, and 15% of the share in the district heating market in Poland. It operates one of the largest power plants, in Rybnik. EDF, established in 1946, is an integrated energy group with operations in the areas of energy generation, transmission, distribution, supply and sale. The company has a net installed capacity of 139.5 GWe, a transmission and distribution network of over 1.38 million km of electricity lines, and serves 39.3 million customers in 26 countries on five continents. EDF is listed on the Euronext Paris Stock Exchange, and reached a turnover of EUR 72.9bn (USD 96.9bn) and a net income of EUR 3.7bn (USD 4.9bn) in 2014.
110488 02/09/2015 新加坡 Capillary Technologies 少数股权购买 Warburg Pincus LLC; Sequoia Capital; Norwest Venture Partners (NVP) 美国 　 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518); 定制电脑编程服务 (541511) 45 (官方数据) 7.7488 Singapore-based business software solutions firm Capilary Technologies has secured USD 45mn in a funding round led by Warburg PIncus LLC, The Economic Times reported. The round was also participated by existing investors Sequoia Capital and Norwest Venture Partners. According to The Economic Times the round values the target at about INR 12bn (USD 180.7mn). A portion of the funding raised has been used to acquire start-up companies MartJack and Ruaha Labs. The funding round comes after USD 14mn capital infusion from Sequoia Capital and Norwest Ventures on July 2014. Capilary Technologies is an international IT software solutions firm that provides cloud-based customer engagement platform that offers customer intelligence, marketing, feedback and social interaction management. Its clients include Nike, Pizza Hut, Puma and Marks and Spencer. The firm has offices in the U.S, U.K, Singapore, Australia, India and South Africa among others. Warburg Pincus is an international U.S private equity firm which invests in multiple industries such as healthcare, consumed technology, financial services, energy and business services among others. The firm manages a total of USD 35bn worth of assets across more than 120 companies worldwide. Note: The deal stake was calculated based on the funding raised of USD 45mn the company valuation of INR 12bn (USD 180.7mn).

Financial terms were not disclosed. Further transaction details were also not revealed. Operadora Maximed offers home health care services. Details on Angelus Fund are not publicly available.
114904 01/09/2015 中国 Ever Fortune Financial Leasing Co Ltd 收购 Shanghai Tonva Petrochemical Co Ltd 香港 Hebei Aowei Industrial Group Co Ltd 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 8.3 (官方数据) 53 Homg Kong-listed heavy construction and petrochemical group Shanghai Tonva Petrochemical Co Ltd said it will acquire 53% of China-based Ever Fortune Financial Leasing Co Ltd from Chinese mining and steel company Hebei Aowei Industrial Group Co Ltd for CNY 53mn (USD 8.3mn). The acquisition will enrich the portfolio of Shanghai Tonva Petrochemical in the area of financial business. Ever Fortune Financial provides financial leasing, commercial factoring and related services. It posted an after-tax profit of CNY 0.15mn (USD 0.03mn) for 2014. Shanghai Tonva Petrochemical is engaged in road and bridge construction and trading of petrochemical products. In 2014 the company posted a revenue of CNY 6.2bn (USD 1bn). Hebei Aowei Industrial Group Co is engaged in mining and steel refining business. It will have no shares in Ever Fortune Financial after the transaction.
112688 01/09/2015 匈牙利 Total Hungaria Kft 收购 UGI Corp 美国 Total SA 石油及制品的批发 (4227) 　 　 100 U.S. global energy company UGI Corp announced it has acquired Total Hungaria Kft., the LPG (liquid petroleum gas) business of French peer Total S.A. Financial details were kept confidential. The transaction has been approved by Hungary's Competition Office (GVH). The buyer acted in the transaction through its Europe's business unit Flaga Group, a member of UGI International group. Following the deal, Total Hungaria will be renamed to Flaga Hungaria, which will continue its previous operations and will honour all of the contracts previously signed by Total. Flaga Hungaria will operate parallel with Flaga Gáz Kft., the other Hungarian company of Flaga Group. Total Hungaria, founded in 1990, is active in fuel wholesale, processing and sale of lubricants, liquid propane-butane filling and sale, solvents, bitumen and aviation fuel sales. The company employs around 100 people and for 2014 it registered revenues of HUF 19.17bn (USD 67.80mn). Flaga Group is one of the leading suppliers of LPG in 11 CEE countries (Austria, Switzerland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Romania, Poland, Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Norway). UGI International's other two European hubs are based in the U.K. (AvantiGas) and France (Antargaz France + Benelux). UGI Corp, based in Philadelphia, is a supplier of LPG, natural gas and electricity and has around 13,000 employees. It has annual sales of more than USD 7.0bn and has been listed on the New York Stock Exchange since 1929.
112270 01/09/2015 韩国 Doctor House 少数股权购买 Strong Ventures; East Gate Partners 美国; 韩国 　 互联网出版与传播 (516) 　 　 　 South Korean online to offline (O2O) home care provider Doctor House received an investment from U.S.-based Strong Ventures and Korean VC firm East Gate Partners, digital technology media besuccess.com reported. No financial details were disclosed. The investment will be used extend the service to finally become a platform that offers total home care services. Doctor House, founded in December 2014 and developed by company Brat Villlage, is a mobile service that connects home care service providers to its users. Services offered range from repairs, installations, frequently required home services and interior products. Earlier in 2015, local VC firm K Cube Ventures also made an investment in Doctor House. Strong Ventures is a seed fund, based in California, that finances, supports and mentors Korean-Global entrepreneurs. East Gate Partners is a venture capital firm focusing on investment primarily in Korea's media & contents industry.
111779 01/09/2015 匈牙利 Micra-Metripond Kft 收购 Comp Centrum Innowacji 波兰 Elzab SA 自动自动售货机制造业 (333311); 航海，测量，电子医学和控制仪表制造业 (33451) 1.73 (官方数据) 92.17 Polish cash register producer Elzab SA announced it will divest its 92.17% stake in Hungarian peer Micra-Metripond Kft, to a jointly-owned asset management firm Comp Centrum Innowacji (CCI) for PLN 6.5mn (USD 1.7mn) in stock. As payment for the transaction, CCI will issue 6,516 new shares at PLN 1,000 (USD 265.1) apiece. Thus, Elzab will increase its stake to 49.7% in the CCI's enlarged capital, up from 46.7%. Micra-Metripond, founded in 1991, produces cash register systems, industrial scales for fast and accurate measurement of products, retail price computing scales, and other automatic industrial equipment for measurement. CCI, incorporated in 2011, provides research and development (R&D), production technology and sales strategy for IT security and network security services within the Comp Group. Prior to the current deal, CCI was jointly-owned by Comp Group (53.22%) and Elzab SA (46.78%). Elzab (est. 1969) specialises in the design, production and distribution of a wide range of fiscal cash registers, devices and POS systems, peripherals and accessories for sales registering and managing. The company exports to Hungary, Slovakia and Greece. It posted revenues of PLN 186.9mn (USD 49.5mn) and net profit of PLN 24.1mn (USD 6.4mn) in 2014. Comp Group holds a 75.89% stake in Elzab SA.

Jacobs Engineering Group Inc provides engineering, construction, architectural, and various professional services to industrial and commercial companies.
