110870 01/09/2015 罗马尼亚 Clinica de Diagnostic Phoenix SRL 收购 Affidea 匈牙利 Romanian private investor(s) 流动救护服务 (621) 　 　 100 European private healthcare group Affidea, has acquired Romanian diagnostic imaging centres Clinica de Diagnostic Phoenix SRL from five local private investors, the buyer's financial advisor Ernst & Young announced. Financial details were kept confidential. The sellers on the deal are Bolog Vartolomeu Nicolae, Bolosiu Horatiu Dorin, Oancea Irinel Dorina, Banicescu Antonia Monica and Bolog Lidia. Affidea Group acquired the Phoenix diagnostic centres in Cluj-Napoca, Piatra Neamt, Deva and Medias. The group now has 18 diagnostic and treatment centres across Romania. Affidea acted in the transaction through its local subsidiary Affidea Romania, former Euromedic Romania. Following the acquisition, the acquired medical centers will be rebrended to Affidea. Clinica de Diagnostic Phoenix SRL, founded in 2006 in Cluj-Napoca, central Romania and operates four diagnostic imaging centers, offering its medical services to more than 30,000 patients annually. For 2014, it reported revenues of RON 8.45mn (USD 2.15mn). Affidea, former Euromedic International, performs diagnostic imaging, nuclear medicine and cancer treatment care services in 14 European countries throughout a network of 157 wholly-owned medical centers. It is present in Poland, Hungary, Romania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Greece, Italy, Turkey, the Czech Republic, Ireland, Switzerland, Lithuania, Bulgaria and Portugal. The company employs over 3,000 professionals, of which more than 570 are medical doctors. Recently, in July 2015, Affidea has acquired Romanian medical services provider SanMed which operates two diagnostic imaging centres and one medical centre in the country.
110706 01/09/2015 巴拿马 Fortuna Containership SA 收购 Undisclosed buyer(s) 　 Uni-Asia Holdings Limited 水上运输业 (483) 1 (官方数据) 50 Singapore-listed alternative investment firm Uni-Asia Holdings announced it has divest a 50% in its ship owning subsidiary Fortuna Containership S.A. to an unrelated corporate investor, following a capital increase of USD 1.0mn of the target made by the co-investor. An additional capital increase of USD 990,000 would be contributed by Uni-Asia Holdings through the capitalisation of a portion of the Uni-Asia Holdings's shareholder's loan. Fortuna Containership will issue new ordinary share to the co-investor at an issue price per share equivalent to its par value. The deal is expected to complete in September 2015. The divestment is in line with Uni-Asia Holdings' core investment activities where the company may solely invest in ships through ship owning companies before inviting other investors to participate. Fortuna Containership, was acquired earlier in 2015 by Uni-Asia Holdings as a ship owning subsidiary for the purpose of acquiring a 3,500 TEU second hand containership, a vessel which was successfully delivered on 30 June 2015. The acquisition was financed by a shareholder's loan from Uni-Asia Holdings to Fortuna Containership and by external debt financing. Fortuna Containership's business is presently based on its containership owning and chartering, and its vessel was scheduled to be chartered out to a reputable charterer on 07 July 2015. Uni-Asia Holdings Ltd. offers alternative investment opportunities for assets, such as vessels and properties to its clients. Its main activities are the finance arrangement of transportation related assets and the provision of ship charter arrangements and the direct investing in alternative assets such as ships, distressed assets, and real estate. For 2014, it reported a net profit of SGD 2.15mn (USD 1.52mn).
110704 01/09/2015 墨西哥 EIM Capital 少数股权购买 American Energy Partners LP 美国 　 基金、信托及其他金融工具 (525) 　 　 　 U.S.-based oil and natural gas operating and asset management company American Energy Partners LP (AEP) announced it has agreed to join forces with Mexican private equity investment manager EIM Capital. Under the agreement, AEP will make a significant investment into EIM Capital, with the purpose of jointly pursuing investments in the Mexican energy sector with main focus on the exploration of unconventional oil and gas energy resources. Neither the financial terms nor the stake to be acquired were disclosed. EIM Capital is a private equity investment manager entirely focused on investments in the Mexican energy sector's power, upstream, midstream, and other energy-related infrastructure. American Energy Partners is dedicated to investing in, and managing oil and natural gas assets.
110576 01/09/2015 英国 Penlon Ltd 收购 BPL Medical Technologies Pvt Ltd 印度 　 其他制造业 (339) 　 　 100 India-based medical equipment manufacturer BPL Medical Technologies Pvt Ltd has acquired its U.K-based peer Penlon Ltd for an undisclosed amount, The Economic Times reported. The financial details of the deal were not disclosed. The acquisition will expand the buyer’s critical care segment portfolio, expand its global reach and augment its research and development capabilities. Post-transaction, Penlon will continue to be operated by the current management team. Penlon is a U.K-based medical equipment manufacturing company that produces anaesthesia systems, vaporizers and patient monitors among others. It has presence in 90 countries globally including Japan, China and the U.S. Penlon was established in 1943 and has its headquarters and manufacturing facilities in Oxford, U.K. BPL Medical Technologies is an Indian medical equipment manufacturer that offers patient monitors, defibrillators x-rays and ultra sound scanners among others. The firm has over 300 employees locally and is 49% owned by Goldman Sachs.

The financial details of the deal were not disclosed. The acquisition is seen to enhance the buyer’s opiate alkaloid portfolio, strengthen its market position and expand its narcotics materials market share. As a part of the transaction Sun Pharmaceuticals will acquire two Opiates manufacturing facilities in Port Fairy and Latrobe. Sun Pharmaceuticals is an Indian pharmaceutical company that manufactures, develops and markets pharmaceutical formulations as branded generics in India, and the U.S. among others. Sun reported consolidated net revenues of INR 274.3bn (USD 4.4bn) for FY ended 31 March, 2015.

The deal is expected to close by the end of March 2016. UPDATE 2: On 28 December 2015, EVERTEC announced that it has extended the period for closing the transaction to 31 March 2016. UPDATE 1: On 30 November 2015, EVERTEC said that the company and the selling shareholders of Processa have agreed to extend the deadline for completion of the deal to 28 December 2015. ORIGINAL: Puerto Rico-based transaction processing company EVERTEC Inc announced it has agreed to acquire a 65% stake in Colombian payment processing firm Processa SAS for COP 16.73mn (USD 5.4mn). EVERTEC said that this acquisition is aligned with the company's strategy to invest in Colombia, and that it provides it with a platform for future growth. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. Processa is specialized in the payment processing, and supply of related services and equipment in Colombia. It offers electronic payments processing and business solutions processing for financial institutions, nongovernmental welfare funds, and merchants. The company reported sales revenues of COP 28.2bn (USD 8.9mn) and net income of COP 1.32bn (USD 0.41mn) for 2014. EVERTEC offers full-service transaction processing services such as merchant acquiring, payment processing and business solutions in 19 Latin American countries. The company operates networks which process more than 2.1 billion transactions per year. EVERTEC reported sales revenues of USD 361.1mn and net income of USD 67.5mn for 2014.

Bhd. has changed its name to Wilmar Fertilizer Malaysia Sdn. Bhd. ORIGINAL: Singapore-based agribusiness group Wilmar International Ltd. said it has acquired Malaysia's fertiliser manufacturer Taiko Fertiliser Sdn. Bhd. from Malaysian chemicals manufacturing and trading company Taiko Marketing Sdn. Bhd. for a total consideration of CNY 9.69mn (USD 1.52mn). The buyer is acting in the transaction through its Malaysian wholly-owned subsidiary PGEO Group Sdn. Bhd., a manufacturer of integrated edible oils. Taiko Fertiliser Sdn Bhd is engaged in the manufacturing, trading and warehousing of fertilisers and other related products, which are used in plantation crops, cash crops, and horticulture. Wilmar International Ltd., incorporated in 1999, is engaged in oil palm cultivation, oilseeds crushing, edible oils refining, sugar milling and refining, specialty fats, oleochemicals, biodiesel and fertilisers manufacturing and grains processing. The firm is among the largest listed companies by market capitalisation on the Singapore Exchange. It posted revenues of USD 43.0bn for 2014. Founded in 1989, Taiko Marketing Sdn. Bhd. engages in the manufacturing of bleaching earths, inorganic chemicals, latex gloves, wooden floorings, high density polyethylene drums, bitumen and bituminuous products. With operations spread throughout Asia and Europe, its product portfolio of over 300 types of chemicals covers the need of every major industry.

The seller is Irish real estate company Ballymore. The deal value was not disclosed. According to the daily Hospodarske Noviny, the deal value is around EUR 83mn. 110512 01/09/2015 新加坡 Store Friendly Self Storage Group 收购 Singapore Post Ltd 新加坡 Store Friendly Asia (BVI) Holdings Limited 房地产 (531) 8.5 (官方数据) 100 The national postal services provider Singapore Post Ltd (SingPost) announced it will acquire local mini-warehouses and self-storage network operator Store Friendly Self Storage Group Private Limited for a total consideration of SGD 12.0mn (USD 8.5mn) in cash. The seller on the deal is a British Virgin Islands-based holding company Store Friendly Asia (BVI) Holdings Limited. The deal also envisages an earn-out payment of a SGD 4.0mn (USD 2.83mn), if certain terms and conditions are fulfilled. Both the first and second payment (if materialised) will be satisfied wholly in cash from the SingPost's internal resources. The buyer is acting in the transaction through its wholly-owned subsidiary General Storage Company Pte. Ltd. Store Friendly Self Storage Group provides personal and business storage facilities services in Singapore. The company has a large self storage network with more than 90 sites and 35,000 storage rooms. SingPost is the leading provider of mail, logistics and e-commerce solutions in Singapore and the Asia Pacific region, with operations in 15 countries. It offers end-to-end integrated mail solutions covering letter-shopping, delivery and mailroom management, as well as secured data printing. It reported revenues of SGD 919.58mn (USD 672.0mn) for FY ended March 2015.
110503 01/09/2015 澳大利亚 Honeymoon uranium project in South Australia 收购 Wattle Mining Pty Ltd; Boss Resources Ltd 澳大利亚 Rosatom State Corporation 其他金属矿的开采 (21229) 9.64 (官方数据) 100 Australia-based minerals exploration company Boss Resources has entered into an agreement on the acquisition of the Honeymoon uranium project in southern Australia from Uranium One Inc, a unit of Russian state-run atomic corporation Rosatom, according to a press release of the buyer. The acquisition will be carried out via the purchase of 100% in company Uranium One Australia Pty Ltd. Boss Resources will partner with local firm Wattle Mining Pty Ltd of businessman Grant Davey in the transaction whereby Wattle Mining will obtain 20% of the project. The asset is priced at USD 9.64mn of which USD 200,000 of a fee for access to Honeymoon, USD 2.42mn of initial cash payment, USD 3mn in promissory notes payable within 24 months of completion of the deal and another USD 4mn of promissory notes payable within 48 months. Additionally, Boss Resources undertakes to make contingent payments depending on certain conditions, i.e. USD 2mn in cash or shares upon the recommissioning of the project and commercial production or 5 years after the deal completion, as well as 10% of the net operating cash flow up to USD 3mn, payable on an annual basis. The deal completion is expected within three months subject to customary closing conditions. The Honeymoon uranium project is located 80 kilometres north-west from the town of Broken Hill. Production on the site was launched in 2011. The output volume is estimated at 400 tonnes of uranium per annum. The main assets in the project include a solvent extraction plant and well fields, all of them currently being on care and maintenance, as well as administrative buildings, 75km power line, vehicles and other related equipment, a runway and a personnel of 200 people. Boss Resources operates nickel and copper projects in Sweden and Finland and gold projects in Burkina Faso, West Africa. The company is listed on the Australian Stock Exchange.

The completion of the transaction is subject to satisfaction of closing conditions. VCP won in 2012 an international tender to operate the cruise port in Valletta for 65 years. It also holds the rights to use the adjacent building and commercial areas of 48,000 m2 and owns 90% of duty-free shop operator Travel Shopping Ltd. The company expects to service 650,000 cruise passengers in 2015. Global Liman operates three Turkish seaports, including Kusadasi passenger seaport, Antalya commercial and passenger seaport and Bodrum passenger seaport. It owns a majority stake in Creuers del Port de Barcelona, which manages Barcelona port and owns a majority stake in Malaga port in addition to a minority stake in Singapore passenger port. Global Limani is part of a Turkish consortium which took over the management of Durres port in Albania in June 2011. In 2013 Global Liman acquired a majority stake in Bar Port in Montenegro. In 2014, a consortium, in which Global Liman participates, won a tender for Lisbon Passenger Terminal. Global Yatirim has investments in energy, sea port operations, property development and financial services. It posted revenues of TRY 337mn (USD 154.1mn) for 2014.

Financial terms were not disclosed. The merchant acquiring business is conducted via Citigroup's wholly-owned Mexican subsidiary Banco Nacional de Mexico SA (Banamex). EVO Payments said that this acquisition perfectly matches its strategy of expanding to new markets. The company added that as part of the transaction, it has entered into a 10-year strategic marketing alliance with Banamex. Banamex is the second largest merchant acquirer in Mexico by transaction volume with approximately 100,000 merchant locations. The business will operate under the brand name Servicios de Pago Banamex provided by EVO Payments. EVO Payments is a provider of payments processing and merchant acquiring services for merchants, independent sales organizations, financial institutions, government organizations, and multinational corporations in North America and Europe.

Marshall said that the properties are located in an area of the city that is currently subject to development and change and that the sale represents an opportunity to realise a satisfactory return on the investment. The company added that it's not active in property development. The properties are located on Prince Alfred Street, Stanger Street, Hunter Street and Morrison Street. They generated a net profit of USD 0.51mn in the year ended 30 September 2014. Marshall Monteagle is an investment holding company focused on procurement, logistics and trading of various hard and soft commodities; food production and processing; as well as property investment. The group has investments in the UK, Europe, the USA and the Far East. Marshall Monteagle is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and had a market capitalisation of ZAR 538.2mn (USD 40.5mn) on 1 September 2015.

Actis said that it looks forward to helping Coricraft Group continue on its growth trajectory organically and through acquisitions as well as geographically. Coricraft Group said that it plans to open 22 new stores during the current financial year. Coricraft Group is a cash furniture retailer with a network of 115 stores in South Africa, Namibia and Botswana. The company has three factories in South Africa and employs over 2,000 people. Actis was established in 2004 and is a private equity firm with USD 7.6bn of assets management. 110470 01/09/2015 巴西 Unik SA 少数股权购买 WEX Inc 美国 　 办公支持服务 (5614) 　 　 49 U.S. corporate card payment solutions provider WEX announced that it has acquired the remaining 49% stake in its Brazilian subsidiary Unik. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. In 2012, WEX bought a 51% stake in Unik. Unik, established in 1999, provides payroll cards, prepaid public transportation cards (vale transporte), fleet cards and gift cards for the retail, government and transportation sectors. The company's cards are accepted at over 1.8 million commercial establishments in Brazil. WEX was established in 1983 and is engaged in the provision of corporate payment solutions. The company has offices in the USA, Australia, New Zealand, Brazil, the UK, Italy, France, Germany, Norway and Singapore. WEX is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and had a market capitalisation of USD 3.66bn on 1 September 2015.
110466 01/09/2015 泰国 nudeJEH 收购 WPP Plc 英国 　 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 　 　 100 British multinational advertising and public relations firm WPP has agreed to acquire Thailand-based advertising firm nudeJEH for an undisclosed amount, the buyer reported. The deal will be carried out by advertising and marketing agency Grey Group, a unit of the buyer. The acquisition is aligned with the strategy of WPP to develop its networks in fast growing markets and sectors. nudeJEH will merge with Grey Group Thailand and will be known as GREYnJUnited following the completion of the deal. nudeJEH offers creative branding strategy, consultation, web design and production service. It owns the digital company Nine Dotz and has more than 60 employees. nudeJEH has revenues of THB 239mn (USD 7.2mn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. WPP provides advertising, media investment management, public relations and affairs, branding and identity and specialist communications services. The company has 10 offices worldwide and its revenues were USD 19bn in 2014.
110462 01/09/2015 英国 Weetabix Ltd 少数股权购买 Baring Private Equity Asia Ltd 香港 　 谷物磨制、植物油加工 (3112) 　 　 40 Asia's largest independent private equity firm Baring Private Equity Asia announced that it has acquired U.K.-based cereal producer Weetabix Ltd. Financial details of the transaction was not disclosed. The buyer announced that it will cooperate with the target company's majority shareholder Chinese food manufacturer Bright Food (Group) Co Ltd to further expand in China. The expansion will allow the target company to strengthen its presence internationally. Weetabix Ltd produces and manufactures cereals and cereal bars sold under the brand name Weetabix, Alpen, Ready-brek, Weetos, Oatibix and Alpen. Baring Private Equity Asia, founded in 1997, currently manages more than USD 9bn in committed capital. The company's portfolio include more than 30 companies across Asia.
110460 01/09/2015 土耳其 Total Oil Turkey 收购 Demiroren Holding 土耳其 Total SA 加油站 (447) 356 (官方数据) 100 French energy group Total said it will sell its fuel retail network in Turkey to local industrial conglomerate Demiroren for EUR 325mn (USD 356mn). The transaction is subject to customary approvals and is expected to close in last quarter of 2015. The sale includes Total Oil Turkey's service station network and commercial sales, supply and logistics assets. Total will maintain a petroleum product marketing presence in Turkey through its lubricant activities, including a blending plant in Menemen and odorless LPG operations, which will be transferred to a separate company prior to the sale. The sale is in line with Total's objective, announced in Q3 2014, of divesting USD 10bn of assets by 2017. Total Oil Turkey is the fifth-largest oil distributor in Turkey with a market share of 5.5% at the end of 2014. It sells fuel products and liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) through a network of 440 service stations across the country, employing 360 people. Family-owned Demiroren has interests in various sectors including in manufacturing, construction, tourism, property, education and media. Its subsidiary Milangaz is the country's leading LPG distributor supplier with a 15% market share. Total is the fourth largest global oil and gas company with operations in 130 countries and 100,000 employees. It reported sales of EUR 177.7bn (USD 236.1bn) in 2014.
110451 01/09/2015 罗马尼亚 ProLogis Park Bucharest A1 收购 CTP Invest spol sro 捷克共和国 Prologis Inc 仓储 (493) 42.57 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 23 November 2015, CTP Invest announced it has concluded the acquisition of the ProLogis portfolio in Romania, namely of Prologis Park Bucharest A1, for EUR 40mn (USD 42.57mn). Following the deal, the target has been renamed CTPark Bucharest West. ORIGINAL: U.S. industrial real estate company ProLogis will sell Romanian logistics centre ProLogis Park Bucharest A1 to Czech fellow CTP Invest, the Romanian financial newspaper Capital reported. The purchase price was not disclosed. According to Romanian economic news portal economica.net, the deal value is estimated between EUR 50mn (USD 56.0mn) and EUR 60 mn (USD 67.3mn). For ProLogis, the transaction represents an exit from the Romanian market, since the logistics park is the only property owned by the company in Romania. For CTP, the acquisition is the fourth deal in Romania in 2015. Earlier, CTP has also acquired Deva Logistics Park (renamed CTPark Deva) with a total area of 43,000 m2 and another 17,000 m2 available for development; Cefin Logistics Park (renamed CTPark Arad) with a total area of 93,000 m2; and Mercury Logistics Park in Bucharest (renamed CTPark Bucharest), comprising 35,000 m2. ProLogis Park Bucharest A1 is located on the A1 Bucharest-Pitesti highway and consists of four warehousing facilities with a total area of 108,000 m2 and with 28 ha land available for expansion, being the fourth largest logistics park in Romania. The whole park was valued at USD 49.3mn in ProLogis' financial report for 2014. The park is almost fully let to logistics operators such as Geodis Calberson, Kuehne & Nagel, H. Essers, and Cargo Partners. Prologis, founded in 1983, is an owner, developer and operator of industrial real estate focused on markets across the U.S.A., Europe and Asia. The company is also engaged in the leasing of modern distribution facilities. Its portfolio consists of approximately 3,000 industrial properties with a total capacity of 55 million m2 in 21 countries. In 2014, the company controlled property assets worth USD 25.8bn and had revenues of USD 1.76bn, and a workforce of over 1,400. CTP, founded in 1998, is a real estate developer and property manager focused on markets in Central Eastern Europe. The company's portfolio consists of premium industrial, office, retail and mixed-use properties with over 2.5 million m2 of leasable space. CTP employs over 140 people. Note: The deal value is the middle point of the estimated range provided by economica.net.

Frontier Advisory will now be known as Frontier Advisory Deloitte. "With the acquisition of Frontier Advisory, we are even better equipped to advise inbound investors and intra-Africa investors", Deloitte Africa CEO Lwazi Bam said. Frontier Advisory was founded in 2007 and is engaged in the provision of research, strategy and investment advisory services. The company is base in the area of Sandton in Johannesburg. Deloitte is engaged in the provision of audit, consulting, financial advisory, risk management, tax and related services in more than 150 countries worldwide. The group employs 210,400 people and it generated revenues of USD 34.2bn in its FY ended 31 May 2014.

Financial terms were not disclosed. Further transaction details were also not revealed. Following completion of this deal, Casa Toro will increase its interest in Finandina from 90% to 99%. The IFC added that it will grant a 5-year loan of up to USD 40mn to Banco Finandina to support its lending activities to small and medium enterprises (SMEs). Banco Finandina offers car financing to customers across Colombia. It had total assets of USD 574.9mn (COP 1.8tn) as of March 2015. For FY ended 31 December 2014, it generated a net income of COP 23.1bn (USD 7.2mn). Casa Toro operates as a car dealer in Colombia. It reported sales revenues of COP 475.4bn (USD 148mn) and a net income of COP 19.5bn (USD 6.1mn) for 2014. IFC is a global institution promoting sustainable economic growth in developing countries by providing capital and advisory services to businesses and governments.

Financial details of the transaction was not disclosed. The buyer will also acquire Trend Micro's product and technology licensing rights in the Chinese market. Seller in the deal is Tokyo-listed security software and cloud computing security provider Trend Micro Inc. The acquisition will enhance the buyer's information security product architecture to help expand into the finance, education, manufacturing and healthcare areas. The transaction is expected to be completed at the end of 2015. Trend Micro Inc is currently the world's largest security software provider. The company provides internet content security, threat management solutions, data centre and cloud security solutions. It is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of JPY 115.2bn (USD 957.4mn) in 2014. AsiaInfo Technologies (China) Co Ltd, founded in 1993, provides more than 700 telecom software solutions and more than 300 software and IT security products.

Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. The buyer, through its wholly-owned subsidiary PTTEP South Asia Ltd, will divest the 20% stakes in the target to Japan's Mitsui Oil Exploration Co Ltd and Palang Sophon Ltd. The divestment is part of the seller's portfolio management strategy to add value to the project as well as manage risks. Block PSC-G and Block EP-2 are located in the Central Myanmar Basin. It covers an aggregate area of 6,492 square kilometres and are operated by PTTEP Mitsui Oil Exploration Co Ltd explores, develops, produces and sells crude oil, natural gas and other energy resources. The company also invests in oil and gas exploration projects and companies. Palang Sophon Ltd is a privately held exploration and production company. PTTEP is a national petroleum exploration and production company, subsidiary of the Petroleum Authority of Thailand. It owns and develops fields for the production of oil and natural gas. The company is listed on the Bangkok Stock Exchange and its revenues amounted to USD 7.5bn for FY ended 31 December 2014.
110563 31/08/2015 匈牙利 Stora Enso Packaging Kft 收购 Van Genechten Packaging NV 比利时 Stora Enso Oyj 造纸业 (322); 其他支援服务 (5619) 13.42 (市场估计) 100 Belgian folding carton producer Van Genechten Packaging (VGP) announced it has agreed to acquire the Hungary's Stora Enso Packaging Kft., the microfulte packaging operations of Finland's pulp and paper manufacturer Stora Enso Oyj. According to the website packagingeurope.com, the initial cash consideration is approximately EUR 12.0mn (USD 13.4mn), subject to adjustments on deal completion. The transaction is expected to be closed within one month. The acquisition will enable VGP to expand its geographical footprint in Central Europe and will consolidate its existing microflute operations in Belgium. Stora Enso Packaging Kft. operates a corrugated packaging plant located in Komárom, northern Hungary. It is specialised in the conception and production of microflute packaging. In 2014, it postes sales of EUR 14mn and employs around 100 people. VGP, with headquarters in Turnhout, Belgium, consists of 11 folding carton factories in 8 countries, serving the European FMCG industry with printed folding cartons, microflute and other packaging solutions. The group converts more than 200,000 tons of cardboard each year and employs 1,600 people. For 2014, it reported an annual turnover of EUR 295mn. Stora Enso Oyj was formed in 1998 by the merger of Swedish mining and forestry products company Stora and Finnish forestry products company Enso-Gutzeit Oy. Headquartered in Helsinki, Stora Enso is a leading provider of renewable solutions in packaging, biomaterials, wood and paper on global markets and has more than 27,000 employees. The company is listed on the Helsinki and Stockholm stock exchanges and its revenues were EUR 10.2bn in 2014.
110553 31/08/2015 阿根廷; 加拿大 Argentex Mining Corp 收购 Austral Gold Ltd 澳大利亚 　 金属矿的开采 (2122) 4.39 (官方数据) 80.1 UPDATE: On 3 February 2016, Austral Gold said it has entered into a definitive agreement for the purchase of Argentex Mining. ORIGINAL: South America-focused Australian mining firm Austral Gold Ltd, controlled by Argentinean businessman Eduardo Elsztain, announced it has offered to acquire an 80.1% stake in Argentina-focused Canadian miner Argentex Mining Corp in an all stock transaction valued at approximately CAD 5.8mn (USD 4.4mn). Under the agreement, Argentex shareholders (except for Austral Gold which already holds directly and indirectly a 19.9% stake in the company) will receive 0.5651 of an Austral Gold share for each share they hold in Argentex. This implies a price of about CAD 0.08 (USD 0.061) per Argentex share. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. Following completion of the share swap, Argentex shareholders, excluding Austral Gold and affiliates, will own a 7.75% of Austral's capital. The parties are expected to enter into a definitive agreement by 31 October 2015. Eduardo Elsztain, Chairman of Austral Gold, said that this acquisition is a further step in the company's goal of becoming a leading broad-based precious metals company in South America. Argentex Mining is an exploration company focused on developing minerals properties in Argentina. Austral Gold Limited engages in the exploration and development of gold, silver, and copper properties in Argentina and Chile. It reported sales revenues of USD 66.4mn and net loss of USD 11.7mn for FY ended 30 June 2014.
110542 31/08/2015 俄罗斯 OOO Trading Company Massco 收购 Teknos Group 芬兰 　 油漆、涂料及胶粘剂的制造 (3255); 其他非耐用品的批发 (4229) 　 100 Finnish paints and coatings supplier Teknos Group announced the acquisition of Russian peer OOO Trading Company Massco for an undisclosed price. The purchase will strengthen Teknos' positions on the Russian market of industrial coatings and expand the group's customer base. The target's products complement and extend the portfolio of Teknos, the press release notes. The financial terms of the transaction were kept confidential as agreed by the deal parties. The production of the Massco brand products will be relocated to Teknos' new plant in St Peterburg. In addition, all employees of OOO Trading Company Massco will keep their jobs and will be transferred to Teknos. OOO Trading Company Massco specialises in industrial coatings and paints offered to large metal sector companies. Part of the production is realized on the basis of subcontracting agreements using the know-how and trademark of the company. The expected turnover of OOO Trading Company Massco in 2015 exceeds RUB 500mn (USD 7.64mn). Teknos is a supplier of paints and coatings to the painting and finishing trade. The company is specialised in the production of paints for factory finished joinery, coatings for modified timber and metal manufacture and specialist powders. The group also supplies manufacturers of interior joinery, domestic and contract furniture, as well as specialist applications in metal and plastic fabrication.
110511 31/08/2015 新加坡 P99 Holdings Ltd 收购 HOCH Ventures Pte Ltd; Power Ridge Holdings Limited; Pearl Bridge Holdings Limited; Stream Field Holdings Limited; Quest Field Investments Limited; PT Trans Coalindo; Ceri Wibisono - private investor; Hendy Narindra - private investor 新加坡; 印度尼西亚 　 基金、信托及其他金融工具 (525) 163.12 (官方数据) 86.47 Singapore Exchange-listed non-operational cash company P99 Holdings said it will acquire Indonesia's coal hauling road operator PT Talenta Bumi in a reverse takeover deal worth SGD 228.65mn (USD 163.12mn). The deal is subject to certain closing conditions, including regulatory approval. The transaction will be carried out through the acquisition of a 95.95% stake in Singapore's investment holding company Barito Pte Ltd, which owns a 99.99% stake in Indonesia's PT Pratama Guna Inti, which in turn owns a 99.99% in PT Talenta Bumi. The legal buyer P99 Holdings will issue 970,520,403 new shares to the shareholders of Barito Pte Ltd at an issue price of SGD 0.2356 (USD 0.1671). The new shares represent 86.47% of P99 Holdings' newly enlarged share capital. The shareholders of Barito Pte Ltd include Singapore's investment holding companies HOCH Ventures Pte Ltd, Power Ridge Holdings Ltd, Pearl Bridge Holdings Ltd, Stream Field Holdings, Quest Field Investments Limited, Indonesia-based PT Trans Coalindo, as well as private investors Ceri Wibisono and Hendy Narindra. On 01 December 2014, P99 Holdings ceased to operate and remained a cash company until the announced reverse takeover deal. The acquisition of Barito Pte Ltd will enable P99 Holdings to acquire a business that meets Singapore Exchange requirements and to remain listed. P99 Holdings, former China Fashion Holdings, was founded in 1996 and it was engaged in the manufacture and sale of men's apparel with major operations in China. Then, it was engaged in the ownership and brand management of Pelé Cafe outlets, which are football themed coffee shops and bars in Hong Kong, Macau and Singapore. For 2014, no revenue was reported in the company's income statement but it has generated other operating income of SGD 3.84mn (USD 2.72mn). PT Talenta Bumi owns a 46 km dedicated commodities hauling road and a licensed public port, which cater to the infrastructural and logistics needs of several operational coal mines located north of Banjarmasin in South Kalimantan, Indonesia. For 2014, PT Talenta Bumi reported revenues of SGD 19.47mn (USD 13.81mn).

Almalence will use the proceeds to further develop the next generation imaging technology for mobile applications. Intel is expected to integrate Almalence’s technology with its own architecture. Almalence Inc was set up in 2005 by Russian engineers Dmitry Shmunk and Evgeny Panich. The company develops innovative digital imaging technologies, applied for a wide range of optical systems - from high-end DSLR cameras to mobile phones. Almalence’s headquarters is in Austin, Texas, USA, R&D branch - in Novosibirsk, Russia, with sales representatives in China and South Korea. Intel Capital makes equity investments in a broad range of companies offering hardware, software, and services targeting enterprise, mobility, consumer Internet, digital media and semiconductor manufacturing.

110439 31/08/2015 中国 Tianjin Rex Packaging Co Ltd 收购 Hong Leong Asia Ltd 新加坡 Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group Co Ltd 塑料制品的制造 (3261) 7.16 (官方数据) 75 UPDATE: On 18 November 2015, Hong Leong Asia Ltd announced the completion of the transactions. ORIGINAL: Singapore Exchange-listed industrial conglomerate Hong Leong Asia Ltd announced it will acquire the remaining 75% stake, it did not own, in China's plastic receptacles producer Tianjin Rex Packaging Co., Ltd from China's packaging materials manufacturer Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group Co., Ltd for a total consideration of CNY 45.8mn (USD 7.16mn) in cash. The deal is part of a larger agreement under which Hong Leong Asia will divest a 55% stake in China's plastic packaging products maker Shanghai Rex Packaging Co., Ltd to Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group for a total consideration of CNY 55.8mn (USD 8.72mn) in cash. Both transactions are subject to the fulfillment of condition precedents, including the approvals of the relevant authorities in China. The net difference between the first and second transaction of CNY 10mn (USD 1.56mn) shall be payable by Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group to Hong Leong Asia. Hong Leong Asia is acting in both transactions through its wholly-owned subsidiary Rex Holdings Pte. Ltd. Following both deals, Hong Leong Asia, through Rex Holdings, will hold a 100% stake in Tianjin Rex Packaging Co. Ltd, while Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group will hold a 100% stake in Shanghai Rex Packaging Co. Ltd. Tianjin Rex Packaging was founded in 1998 as a joint venture (JV) company between Hong Leong Asia and Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group. It manufactures blowing bottles, pails, jerry cans, lids and other packaging products and it serves multinational companies such as Shell, Caltex, Coca-cola, Akzo Nobel, etc. Shanghai Rex Packaging was founded in 1994 as a subsidiary of Rex Holdings Pte. Ltd. and it also manufactures plastic packaging containers such as blowing bottles, pails, jerry cans, lids and other packaging products. Hong Leong Asia is engaged in the manufacturing and distribution of consumer products, diesel engines, building materials, industrial packaging and air-conditioning systems. It generated revenues of SGD 4.56bn (USD 3.5bn) a net profit of SGD 26.9mn (USD 21.2mn) in 2014. Shanghai Zijiang Enterprise Group Co., Ltd., incorporated in 1988, owns more than 40 enterprises engaged mainly in the fields of packaging & printing. It is also engaged in real estate, precision manufacturing, IT, etc. For 2014, it reported revenues of CNY 8.50bn ( USD 1.33bn)and a net income of CNY 161.9mn (USD 25.3mn).

110411 31/08/2015 印度 Reverie Language Technologies Pvt Ltd 少数股权购买 Aspada Investment Advisors Pvt Ltd; Qualcomm Ventures 印度; 美国 　 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518) 4 (官方数据) 　 India-based Reverie Language Technologies Pvt Ltd a cloud-based language technology firm has raised 4mn in its Series A funding round from Aspada Investment Advisors and Qualcomm Ventures, the target announced. The funding raised will be used to scale-up its sales and marketing operations in the Middle East and Southeast Asia and expand its presence in the internet, software public and financial services sectors. Post-transaction, the vice president of Aspada, Sahil Kini will join Reveries board of directors. Reverie Language Technologies is an Indian cloud-based language as-a-service platform operator that provides language localisation services to mobile apps, web portals, and content. The firm offers translation of more than 50 languages including Bengali, Sanskrit, Bahasa, Tagalog, Arabic, German, Russian and English. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangalore. Aspada Investment is an India-based venture capital and private equity holding company that focuses on firms catering to under-served populations through basic services, market access and capital sourcing. It is backed by Soros Economic Development Fund and claims to invest USD 1mn to USD 10mn per year in the agriculture, healthcare, education and financial industries. Qualcomm Ventures is the venture capital division of international telecommunications equipment manufacturer Qualcomm Inc. The firm focuses on investing software, consumer technology and health care firms among others. Its portfolio includes BlueStacks, Capillary Technologies and AppsDaily. Qualcomm Ventures has 8 offices across 7 countries including India, U.K and Brazil.
110395 31/08/2015 美国; 新加坡; 阿拉伯联合酋长国 Offshore rigs business of Cameron International Corp 收购 Keppel Corp Ltd 新加坡 Cameron International Corporation 农业、建筑、采矿专用机械制造 (3331) 100 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 03 May 2016, Keppel Corp. informed that KOM USA has completed the acquisition of Cameron International Corporation' offshore product division, comprising the LeTourneau jackup rig designs, rig kit business, aftersales and aftermarket services. The acquired company (NewCo) will operate as Keppel LeTourneau USA, Inc. with offices in the U.S., United Arab Emirates and Singapore. ORIGINAL: Singapore Exchange-listed industrial conglomerate Keppel Corp. announced that it will acquire the offshore rigs business of U.S. oilfield equipment manufacturer Cameron International Corporation for a total consideration of USD 100mn in cash. The business being acquired comprises the LETOURNEAU™ jackup rig designs, rig kit business, and aftermarket services. It had a net tangible asset value of USD 63mn as of 30 June 2015. The deal is subject to the fulfillment of certain conditions precedent, including regulatory approval. The acquisition will add to the Keppel's offerings in the jackup rig market and will enable it to deliver ready-to-drill rig solutions from Keppel yards worldwide or to provide the new rig designs directly to customer. The acquisition will also enhance Keppel's capabilities to service customers through the provision of expanded aftermarket sales and services. The buyer is acting in the transaction through it wholly owned subsidiary Keppel Offshore & Marine USA, Inc. (KOM USA). The deal will see the transfer of the offshore rigs business into a new Delaware company incorporated by Cameron (NewCo), which will be 100%-owned by Keppel Offshore & Marine USA, Inc. The cash consideration will be financed by Keppel through internal working capital. Keppel Corporation has interests in the offshore & marine, infrastructure and property sectors in addition to other investments. The group posted revenues of SGD 13.28bn (USD 9.42bn) and a net profit of SGD 1.88bn (USD 1.33bn) for 2014. Keppel Offshore & Marine (Keppel O&M) is a global leader in offshore rig design, construction and repair, ship repair and conversion, and specialised shipbuilding. It has a global network of 20 yards in the Asia Pacific, Gulf of Mexico, Brazil, the Caspian Sea, Middle East and the North Sea regions. Cameron International Corp produces pressure control, processing, flow control and compression systems for the oil and gas industries. The company is currently being acquired by France-based Schlumberger in a USD 14.8bn deal.

The buyer is acting in the transaction through its wholly-owned subsidiary Raffles SurgiCentre Pte Ltd (RSC) which will subscribe for 375,112 ordinary shares of the target company. The purchase consideration will be fully satisfied in cash by Raffles Medical Group' internal resources. International SOS (MC Holdings), headquartered in Singapore, is a provider of quality and comprehensive clinical care that operates 10 clinics in China, Vietnam and Cambodia. Raffles Medical Group, founded in 1976, is one of the largest medical private group and provides general and specialized medical services. It operates medical clinics, imaging centers, and medical laboratories, serving over 2 million patients annually and more than 6,500 corporate clients. For 2014, it booked revenues of SGD 374.6mn (USD 265.8mn). AEA International Holdings, founded in 1985, provides international healthcare and medical security assistance services, with operations in 92 countries worldwide. It has 27 assistance centres which provide medical and security information in nay language and manage travel data. It operates from 850 affiliated locations and employs over 11,000 people, led by 1,400 doctors and 200 security specialists. In 2013, LCP purchased three ECHO shopping malls in Poland for a combined value of PLN 272.69mn (EUR 67.1mn). The company is present in the UK, Poland and Germany. It has 32 sites in Poland with a total area of 173,000 m2. In the financial year 2013/2014, it recorded revenues of GBP 89.8mn (EUR 113mn) and net profit of GBP 43.2mn (EUR 54.3mn). Market-Detal operates supermarket chain Mila. 110713 28/08/2015 美国 Qbox.io 少数股权购买 Steve Tamm - private investor; Steve King - private investor; Flint Capital; Vulcan Ventures Inc; FundersClub Inc 美国; 俄罗斯 　 软件出版 (5112); 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518); 电脑系统设计及相关服务 (5415) 2.4 (官方数据) 　 U.S. company Qbox.io, which provides managed cloud hosting services for Elasticsearch users, has raised USD 2.4mn in a seed investment round led by Vulcan Ventures of billionaire Paul Allen, with the participation of Russian venture fund Flint Capital, VentureBeat.com reported. Other investors that joined the funding were FundersClub, chief technology officer of Salesforce - Steve Tamm, as well as former DocuSign CEO Steve King. The proceeds will be used for further development of the company’s products. Qbox.io (former StackSearch) was launched in 2012. The company has offices in San Francisco and Fayetteville, Arkansas. Qbox enables clients to work with full-text search engine Elasticsearch without having to deal with the issues of its configuration, maintenance and scalability. International fund Flint Capital was founded in 2013 by Dmitry Smirnov and Oleg Seydak. The fund specialises in financing hi-tech projects in the IT, media and telecom, as well as financial and consumer services sectors.
110369 28/08/2015 英国; 新加坡 Hotel Football in Manchester; Café Football in London and in Manchester; GG Collections Pte Ltd 收购 Rowsley Ltd 新加坡 Gary Neville - private investor; Philip Neville - private investor; Ryan Giggs - private investor; Paul Scholes - private investor; Nicholas Butt - private investor; Lim Eng Hock - private investor 住宿服务 (721); 餐饮业 (722); 住宿和餐饮业 (72) 45.52 (官方数据) 75 UPDATE: On 24 November 2015, Rowsley announced the completion of the deal, and it now holds a 75% stake in each of GG Collections Pte. Ltd., Hotel Football in Manchester, and Café Football in London and in Manchester. ORIGINAL: Singapore's property investment firm Rowsley announced it will acquire a 75% stake in a soccer-themed hotel and restaurant business from former Manchester United stars Gary Neville, Philip Neville, Ryan Giggs, Paul Scholes and Nicholas Butt and from private investor Lim Eng Hock, for an aggregate consideration of GBP 29.15mn (USD 45.52mn). Rowsley will acquire a 75% of a hotel management company GG Collections Pte. Ltd., 75% of a Manchester football-themed boutique hotel, Hotel Football; and another 75% of Café Football in London. The acquisition is subject to certain closing conditions, including regulatory approval. The deal marks for Rowsley the entrance in the hospitality business and it is in line with its strategic plan. Hotel Football is located next to the Old Trafford stadium of Manchester United Football Club. The hotel which opened in March 2015, was build by the ex-Man Utd stars. It has 133 bedrooms and offers hospitality, conferencing and banqueting facilities for up to 750 people. It also includes the Café Football, a 185-seat restaurant, and the Heaven rooftop football pitch on the 12th floor. The Café Football in east London is a 120-seat restaurant and is located in Stratford's Westfield shopping centre. GG Collections (which currently owns the brands Hotel Football and Café Football) is an upscale hotel management company focusing on developing its portfolio base of football-themed hotels and cafes throughout the world. It further plans to create new brands and manage external hotels primarily in the boutique hotel space. Rowsley Ltd is an international real estate group with capabilities in planning, architecture, engineering, investment and development. The firm is listed on the Singapore Exchange and reported total consolidated revenues of SGD 87.2mn (USD 65.9mn) for 2014. Rowsley also announced it has formed a joint venture (JV) company with Gary Neville and Ryan Giggs to develop the St Michael's project, which will be located on a 1.43-acre site, in the Manchester's city centre, and will comprise a five-star hotel, luxury apartments, office space, restaurants and bars, and two new public squares. Rowsley will invest around GBP 40.0mn (USD 62.47mn) to acquire a 75% in St Michael Investments, the JV company. The ex-Man Utd footballers (Gary and Philip Neville, Ryan Giggs, Paul Scholes and Nicholas Butt) are knows as the "Class of 92", a reference to their emergence in the Manchester United youth team of the early 1990s.
110520 28/08/2015 新加坡 Dalian Dongda Water Co Ltd 收购 China Everbright Water Ltd 新加坡 Dongda Group Co Ltd; Liu Yubao - private investor 水的供应、污水处理和其他水的处理、利用与分配 (2213) 156.34 (DW 估计) 100 Chinese environmental protection company Chinese Everbright Water Ltd announced that it will acquire local water company Dalian Dongda Water Co Ltd for CNY 1bn (USD 156.3mn). The buyer is acting in the deal through its wholly-owned subsidiary Beijing Everbright Water Investment Management Co Ltd. The sellers in the deal are Dongda Group Co Ltd and private investor Liu Yubao. As per deal terms, the buyer will acquire Dalian Dongda Water Co Ltd in three tranches. Beijing Everbright Water Investment Management Co Ltd will first acquire 34% and 56% stakes in the target for respective considerations of CNY 302.2mn (USD 47.1mn) and CNY 497.8mn (USD 776mn). The 10% remaining interest is dependent to the contingent payment of up to CNY 203.2mn (USD 31.7mn), subject to certain concession agreements. The acquisition is in line with the effort of Chinese Everbright Water to strengthen its position towards becoming one of the leading environmental water companies in China. Upon the completion of the transaction, Chinese Everbright Water Ltd's contractual waste water treatment capacity will exceed 4.6 million tonnes per day. Dalian Dongda Water Co Ltd specialises in investment and urban utilities operations in Liaoning and Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region of China. The company had revenues of CNY 193.5mn (USD 25mn) in 2014. Chinese Everbright Water Ltd specialises in waste water treatment, sludge treatment and research and development of environmental water technologies. The company is listed on the Singapore Stock Exchange and posted revenues of HKD 1.1bn (USD 135.4mn) in 2014. Note: Deal value includes the maximum contingent payment of CNY 203.2mn (USD 31.7mn) for the remaining 10% in the target, which will be transferred over a three-year period.
110532 28/08/2015 津巴布维 Anchor Yeast (Pvt) Ltd 收购 Lesaffre Group 法国 　 其他食品制造 (3119) 11.5 (市场估计) 60 French yeast producer Lesaffre has agreed to acquire a 60% stake in Zimbabwean counterpart Anchor Yeast for USD 11.5mn, Zimbabwean newspaper Financial Gazette reported. Financial Gazette added that according to a statement from the French embassy, the transaction is expected to improve the standard and quality of yeast products produced in Zimbabwe, with the long-term goal of generating regional exports for the business. The deal will be officially signed in Harare on 10 September 2015. Anchor Yeast started operations in 1958 and is currently the sole yeast manufacturer in Zimbabwe. The company has manufacturing facilities in the city of Gweru and distribution outlets in the cities of Harare, Bulawayo, Mutare and Gweru. Lesaffre was founded in 1853 and is focused on the manufacturing of yeast and other fermentation products. 110497 28/08/2015 新加坡 Olam International Ltd 少数股权购买 Mitsubishi Corp 日本 Kewalram Chanrai Group 其他作物的种植 (1119); 其他食品制造 (3119) 435.4 (官方数据) 8 Japanese global industrial conglomerate Mitsubishi Corp announced it has acquired an additional 8.0% stake in Singapore-based agribusiness giant Olam International Ltd from India's global diversified enterprise Kewalram Chanrai Group for SGD 610.4mn (USD 435.4mn). The buyer has acquired 221,962,556 Olam ordinary shares at SGD 2.75 (USD 1.96) apiece. In a separate transaction, Mitsubishi has also subscribed for around 332.7 million new ordinary shares for SGD 915.0mn (USD 652.7mn) in a private placement on the Singapore Exchange. The shares represents a 12.0% stake in Olam's enlarged share capital. The offered price represents a premium of 54.5% over the weighted average price of SGD 1.78 for trades done on 26 August 2015, the full market day prior to the announcement. The combined acquired stake (20%) worth a total of SGD 1.52bn (USD 1.06bn). Following both transactions, Mitsubishi will become Olam's second largest shareholder, having the right to nominate up to two members to the Olam board and will also have its members join Olam's global management team. Singapore state-owned investment firm Temasek Holdings will remain Olam's majority shareholder. However, the deal will dilute Temasek's stake in Olam to 51.4%, from 58%. The acquisition is aligned to Mitsubishi's strategic plan to expand its global procurement network for sustainable food products and raw materials such as coffee, cocoa and edible nuts. Through the deal, Olam will establish a long term strategic partnership with a strong and reputed industry player such as Mitsubishi Corp and it will also set a platform for collaboration across multiple geographies and products. Olam and Mitsubishi are already in discussions to establish a joint venture company (JV) in Japan to distribute specific products of Olam that can leverage on Mitsubishi's strong distribution and retail presence. Established in 1989, Olam is a leading agri-business that supplies food and industrial raw materials in 65 countries worldwide. It deals in some 44 products, including cashew, sesame, dehydrated onion and garlic, almond, hazelnut, cocoa, coffee, rice, grains dairy, cotton and timber, supplying some 13,800 client companies globally. It employs around 23,000 people and it posted revenues of SGD 18.31bn (USD 13.06bn) for FY ended 31 June 2015. Mitsubishi Corp, founded in 1954, is a global diversified holding company with operations in seven business groups: global environmental & infrastructure; industrial finance, logistics and development; energy; metals; machinery; chemicals; and living essentials. The group employs around 72,000 people in 200 offices and subsidiaries in approximately 90 countries worldwide. Its shares are listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and the Osaka Stock Exchange and it booked revenues of JPY 7,669.5bn (USD 63.7bn) for FY ended 31 March 2015. Established in 1860, Kewalram Chanrai Group is the original promoter of Olam. Today, the group is a multinational conglomerate with interests in products and services such as textiles, property development, automobiles, agricultural products, and palm residue recycling. It has operations in the commercial hubs of Asia, Africa and the USA. The group operates in 35 countries and employs more than 10,000 people.
110478 28/08/2015 新加坡 Olam International Ltd 少数股权购买 Mitsubishi Corp 日本 　 其他作物的种植 (1119); 其他食品制造 (3119) 652.67 (官方数据) 12 Japanese global industrial conglomerate Mitsubishi Corp has acquired a 12.0% stake in Singapore agribusiness giant Olam International Ltd for SGD 915.0mn (USD 652.7mn) in a private placement on the Singapore Exchange, both parties announced. The buyer has subscribed for 332,727,273 new Olam ordinary shares at SGD 2.75 (USD 1.96) apiece. The subscription price represents a premium of 54.5% over the weighted average price of SGD 1.78 for trades done on 26 August 2015, the full market day prior to the subscription announcement. In a separate transaction, Mitsubishi has also acquired around 222.0 million Olam shares from Kewalram Chanrai Group for SGD 610.4mn (USD 435.4mn). The shares represent an additional 8.0% of the target's enlarged share capital. Following both transactions, Mitsubishi will become Olam's second largest shareholder with a 20.0% stake in the company. The buyer will also nominate up to two members to the Olam board and will also have its members join Olam's global management team. Singapore state-owned investment firm Temasek Holdings will remain Olam's majority shareholder. However, the deal will dilute Temasek's stake in Olam to 51.4%, from 58%. The acquisition is aligned to Mitsubishi's strategic plan to expand its global procurement network for sustainable food products and raw materials such as coffee, cocoa and edible nuts. Through the deal, Olam will establish a long term strategic partnership with a strong and reputed industry player and it will also set a platform for collaboration across multiple geographies and products. Olam and Mitsubishi are also in discussions to establish a joint venture company (JV) in Japan to distribute specific products of Olam that can leverage on Mitsubishi's strong distribution and retail presence. Established in 1989, Olam is a leading agri-business that supplies food and industrial raw materials in 65 countries worldwide. It deals in some 44 products, including cashew, sesame, dehydrated onion and garlic, almond, hazelnut, cocoa, coffee, rice, grains dairy, cotton and timber, supplying some 13,800 client companies globally. It employs around 23,000 people and it posted revenues of SGD 18.31bn (USD 13.06bn) for FY ended 31 June 2015. Mitsubishi Corp, founded in 1954, is a global diversified holding company with operations in seven business groups: global environmental & infrastructure; industrial finance, logistics and development; energy; metals; machinery; chemicals; and living essentials. The group employs around 72,000 people in 200 offices and subsidiaries in approximately 90 countries worldwide. Its shares are listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and the Osaka Stock Exchange and it booked revenues of JPY 7,669.5bn (USD 63.7bn) for FY ended 31 March 2015. Note : All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis.

ORIGINAL Malaysian hospital operator IHH Healthcare Bhd has agreed to acquire a 73.4% stake on a fully-diluted basis in India-based Ravindranath GE Medical Associates for a total consideration of INR 12.8bn (USD 194.3mn), the buyer disclosed on Bursa Malaysia. The acquisition is subject to certain closing conditions. The deal is in line with the seller's strategy to realign the business activities of its unit Wasco China International Ltd. Ashburn International Inc provides project consultation, material procurement and general trading services particularly for the petroleum and petrochemical industries Wah Seong Corp Bhd offers specialized pipe coating, corrosion protection services as well as EPC, fabrication and rental of gas compressors and process equipment for the international oil and gas sector. The company also process equipment that serve the plantations, oleo-chemical, petrochemical and power generation industries. 110380 28/08/2015 土耳其 Zinc and lead exploration properties in Adana 收购 Pasinex Resources 加拿大 Undisclosed seller(s) 铜、镍、铅、锌矿的开采 (21223) 　 　 100 Canada-based Pasinex Resources, focusing on metal exploration in Turkey, said it will acquire eight new properties for zinc and lead exploration in the province of Adana, southern Turkey. No financial details were disclosed. The transaction is subject to some Turkish governmental approvals to complete and final approval from the Prime Minister's Office. The properties were acquired through a staking process for Horzum A.S., a 50/50 joint venture company between Pasinex Turkey and Turkish mining company Akmetal. The new properties are located relatively close to Horzum's current projects namely Pinargozu and Akkaya, as well as, the historic Horzum zinc project. Pasinex Resources is a base and precious metal-focused exploration company, which is listed on the Canadian Securities Exchange and Frankfurt Stock Exchange. Its initial priority is to build a prospective portfolio of base metal opportunities in Turkey with the assistance of local partner Akmetal. Established in 1973, Akmetal has chromium enrichment plants in Aladag, southern Turkey.
110390 28/08/2015 瑞士 Sitag AG 收购 Nowy Styl 波兰 Nimbus BV 家具及相关产品制造 (337) 　 　 100 Polish office furniture producer Nowy Styl announced that it has signed an agreement to acquire Siwss sector firm Sitag from Dutch private equity firm Nimbus. Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. In September 2014, Nowy Styl purchased a 50% stake in Turkish peer TCC-The Chair Company. Sitag produces chairs, office armchairs, office furniture systems, sofas and tailor-made solutions. The company has 130 employees and expects to reach revenues of around CHF 32mn (EUR 31mn) in 2015. Nowy Styl, founded in 1992, manufactures chairs, armchairs, office interiors, as well as forum seating for stadiums, cinemas, theatre halls and other public venues. It has 15 manufacturing plants in Poland, Ukraine, Russia and Germany. With 13 international offices, Nowy Styl exports its products to over 100 countries. It employs 6,000 people and has annual revenues of approximately EUR 300mn. Nimbus invests in European-based industrial companies with a substantial and evident potential for improvement. The company seeks majority shareholdings or management control. It has has offices in Zeist (the Netherlands) and Munich (Germany).
110389 28/08/2015 乌拉圭 Retop SA (Credito de la casa) 收购 Banco Santander SA 西班牙 　 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 75 (市场估计) 100 Spanish financial group Santander has acquired Uruguayan housing credit provider Retop (Credito de la casa), media sources reported. In April 2015, Uruguayan newspaper El Observador reported that Santander was about to acquire Retop for some USD 75mn. Retop was founded in 1993 and is the fourth largest housing credit provider in Uruguay. As of 30 June 2015, the company had an asset base of UYU 2.05bn (USD 77.1mn). Banco Santander SA, established in 1857, is the largest financial group in Spain with operations in Europe, North America and South America. The company is listed on the Madrid, Mexican, London, New York, Euronext and Italian Stock Exchanges and had a market capitalisation of EUR 79.7bn (USD 90bn) on 28 August 2015.
110382 28/08/2015 巴拿马; 牙买加 Pedregal diesel power plant; Jamaica Energy Partners Ltd; West Kingston Power Partners 收购 InterEnergy Holdings Ltd (IEH) 开曼群岛 Conduit Capital Partners LLC 化石燃料发电 (221112) 242 (官方数据) 　 UPDATE: The seller's financial advisor on the transaction revealed that the sum of the deal stands at USD 242mn. ORIGINAL: Latin America-focused electric utility InterEnergy Holdings (IEH) announced that it has acquired four power plants in Jamaica and Panama from U.S. investment firm Conduit Capital Partners for an undisclosed amount. IEH bought Conduit's 55% stake in Panamanian diesel power plant Pedregal and 100% stakes in Jamaica Energy Partners and West Kingston Power Partners, which operate three diesel plants on the island of Jamaica. IEH chairman Rolando Gonzalez Bunster said that the transaction demonstrates the company's commitment to growing its presence in markets where it already has a footprint. He added that the purchase also confirms IEH's strategy of growing into new markets and diversifying its portfolio. Conduit's managing partner George Osorio, in turn, said that the sale is consistent with the company's commitment to maximise value for its investors. The Pedregal power plant is located in the city of Pacora and has a capacity of 55 MW. The three power plants of Jamaica Energy Partners and West Kingston Power Partners have a capacity of 190 MW and supply 30% of the electricity on the island of Jamaica. InterEnergy Holdings is a Cayman-based holding company that owns and operates power generation and distribution assets, and fuel logistics assets in Latin America and the Caribbean. The firm has operations in the Dominican Republic, Panama, Chile and Jamaica.
110378 28/08/2015 巴西 AD.Dialeto Agencia de Publicidade Ltda 收购 Accenture Plc 爱尔兰 　 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 3.31 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: The buyer's legal advisor on the transaction said that the sum of the deal stood at BRL 43.4mn (USD 3.31mn). ORIGINAL: Irish management consulting services provider Accenture announced that it has acquired Brazilian digital agency AD.Dialeto for an undisclosed amount. Accenture said that the purchase will enhance its ability to serve clients in the growing Latin American market with digital marketing and commerce services that help maximise a return-on-investment (ROI) of their digital programmes. AD.Dialeto provides end-to-end marketing services across strategy, media planning, search, mobile and social, through to digital commerce. The company's clients include B2W, Electrolux, Accor Hotels, Rossi Telhanorte and Serasa Experian. Accenture, established in 1995, is a global provider of management consulting, technology services and outsourcing solutions for the communications, electronics, media and entertainment, banking, insurance, health, logistics, consumer goods, industrial equipment, infrastructure, retail, and energy industries. Listed on the New York Stock Exchange, Accenture booked USD 30bn revenues in its FY ended 31 August 2014.
110356 28/08/2015 香港 E Link Station Ltd 收购 Singapore Post Ltd 新加坡 　 速递服务 (492) 1.03 (官方数据) 50 The national postal services provider Singapore Post Ltd (SingPost) announced it will acquire a 50% stake in Hong Kong's self-collection parcel services point E Link Station Ltd for HKD 8.0mn (USD 1.03 / SGD 1.44mn). The purchase consideration will be fully satisfied in cash by SingPost's internal resources. In a separate deal, SingPost has also agreed to acquire a 33% stake in Hong Kong's logistics and delivery services firm Morning Express & Logistics Limited for HKD 39.6mn (USD 5.11mn / SGD 7.14mn) in cash. The buyer is acting in both transactions through its wholly-owned subsidiary Quantium Solutions Holdings Pte. Ltd. Through both acquisitions, SingPost will strengthen its e-commerce logistics presence in Hong Kong and establish an integrated network for parcel deliveries across multiple channels. SingPost's CEO, Dr Wolfgang Baier, said that Hong Kong is a priority market for SingPost, since this country is a gateway to China and a node in the buyer's pan-Asian network. E Link Station Ltd operates a parcel locker business where it acts as a collection point by receiving and storing parcels on behalf of its end customers. The company has a rapidly expanding network of self-collection parcel service points. SingPost is the leading provider of mail, logistics and e-commerce solutions in Singapore and the Asia Pacific region, with operations in 15 countries. It offers end-to-end integrated mail solutions covering letter-shopping, delivery and mailroom management, as well as secured data printing. It reported revenues of SGD 919.58mn (USD 672.0mn) for FY ended March 2015.
110351 28/08/2015 香港 Morning Express & Logistics Limited 少数股权购买 Singapore Post Ltd 新加坡 Morning Express & Logistics Holding Limited 速递服务 (492) 5.11 (官方数据) 33 The national postal services provider Singapore Post Ltd (SingPost) announced it will acquire a 33% stake in Hong Kong's logistics and delivery services firm Morning Express & Logistics Limited for HKD 39.6mn (USD 5.11mn / SGD 7.14mn) in cash. The seller on the deal is the holding company Morning Express & Logistics Holding Limited. The deal envisages potentially a second payment of HKD 39.6mn, if certain terms and conditions are fulfilled. Both the first and second payment (if materialised) will be satisfied in cash by SingPost's internal resources. In a separate deal, SingPost has also agreed to acquire a 50% stake in Hong Kong's self-collection parcel services point E Link Station Ltd for HKD 8.0mn (USD 1.03 / SGD 1.44mn). The buyer is acting in both transactions through its wholly-owned subsidiary Quantium Solutions Holdings Pte. Ltd. Through both acquisitions, SingPost will strengthen its e-commerce logistics presence in Hong Kong and establish an integrated network for parcel deliveries across multiple channels. SingPost's CEO, Dr Wolfgang Baier, said that Hong Kong is a priority market for SingPost, since this country is a gateway to China and a node in the buyer's pan-Asian network. Morning Express & Logistics, incorporated in 1984, provides logistics and documents and parcel delivery services in Hong Kong. SingPost is the leading provider of mail, logistics and e-commerce solutions in Singapore and the Asia Pacific region, with operations in 15 countries. It offers end-to-end integrated mail solutions covering letter-shopping, delivery and mailroom management, as well as secured data printing. It reported revenues of SGD 919.58mn (USD 672.0mn) for FY ended March 2015.

The sellers include AlmapBBDO's co-presidents Marcello Serpa and Jose Luiz Madeira. BBDO Worldwide Inc has now total control of the company. AlmapBBDO is an advertising and marketing company. It also provides design services, as well as brand management and interactive marketing. Their clients include HP, Pepsi, O Boticario, Snickers and Twix, among others. AlmapBBDO is the brazilian arm of BBDO Worldwide. The latter has 289 offices in 81 countries around the world. Omnicom, established in 1944, is a global advertising, marketing and corporate communications holding company, comprised of three advertising agency networks (BBDO, DDB and TBWA), 175 marketing services companies and a media group, Omnicom Media Group. The group offers services in over 30 marketing communications disciplines to more than 5,000 clients in 100 countries, and employs 71,800 professionals. Omnicom is listed on the New York Stock Exchange, and posted USD 15.3bn in revenues in 2014. _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ O grupo de comunicação estadunidense BBDO Worldwide Inc adquiriu uma participação acionária adicional na agência publicitária brasileira Almap BBDO Publicidade e Comunicações Ltda (AlmapBBDO) por um valor não revelado, a Revistapublicitta comunicou. Os vendedores são Marcello Serpa e José Luiz Madeira, sócios e co-chairmen da AlmapBBDO Concluída a transação, o BBDO Worldwide Inc passou a ter controle total sobre a empresa. A AlmapBBDO é uma empresa de publicidade, marketing, serviços de design, gestão de marcas e marketing interativo. Seus clientes incluem HP, Pepsi, O Boticário, Snickers, Twix, entre outros. A AlmapBBDO é a filial brasileira do BBDO Worldwide. Este último tem 289 escritórios em 81 países ao redor do mundo. A Omnicom, fundada em 1944, é uma holding global de publicidade, marketing e comunicações corporativas, composta por três redes de agências de publicidade, BBDO, DDB e TBWA, 175 empresas de serviços de marketing e um grupo de mídia, Omnicom Media Group. O grupo oferece serviços em mais de 30 disciplinas de comunicação e marketing para mais de 5,000 clientes em 100 países, e emprega 71,800 profissionais. A Omnicom está listada na Bolsa de Valores de Nova York, e gerou um faturamento de USD 15.3bn in 2014.

ORIGINAL: Japanese noodles producer Nissin Foods announced that it has agreed to acquire the 50% stake of local peer Ajinomoto Co in their Brazilian joint venture Nissin-Ajinomoto Alimentos (NAA) for JPY 32.5bn (USD 272.3mn). Nissin Foods said that it considers Brazil as one of the most important areas in its overseas business, given that the country has the largest population in South America and has a demand for instant noodles of about 2.4 billion servings annually. Nissin-Ajinomoto Alimentos was founded in 1965 and is engaged in the manufacturing and sale of instant noodles. The company became a joint venture between Nissin and Ajinomoto in 1975. In 2014, Nissin-Ajinomoto Alimentos generated sales of BRL 695.2mn (USD 295.8mn). Nissin Foods was established in 1948 and is engaged in the production of instant noodles, ramen, frozen foods and sweets and cereals among other. The company is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and the Osaka Securities Exchange and it booked sales of JPY 431.6bn (USD 3.93bn) in its FY ended 31 March 2015.

The seller is Polish coal importer and distributor Barter. No financial details were provided. Barter Coal specialises in the wholesale trade of coal, liquefied petroleum gas, fertilizers and road salt. Flame, established in 1993, is an integrated shipping and trading company. It supplies steaming coal, petroleum coke and metallurgical coke from various origins such as Australia, Indonesia, Russia, South Africa, United States and Colombia. Barter, founded in 1999, is an operator of LPG gas stations and has a broad base of coal sales depots. The company distributes and imports coal, fertilizers and road salt.
