110364 27/08/2015 巴西; 美国 Garnero Colombo Inc 合并 Garnero Group Acquisition Co; Grupo Colombo 巴西 　 服装、服饰店 (448); 基金、信托及其他金融工具 (525) 　 100 U.S.-listed Brazilian special purpose acquisition company Garnero Group Acquisition Co (GGAC) announced that it has decided to merge with local apparel retailer Grupo Colombo SA (GC) into a new company called Garnero Colombo Inc. According to the terms of the transaction, GGAC will acquire a 100% of the equity of GC in exchange of issuing six million GGAC shares to GC's existing shareholders. Upon deal completion, the shareholders and the managers of GC will have a 25% stake in the newly-created public company Garnero Colombo Inc, which is valued at USD 330mn. In addition, GGAC will make a private placement for up to USD 100mn new shares. Furthermore, the shareholders of GC have agreed to purchase USD 30mn of GGAC shares in the public market or through the private placement. Mario Garnero will be kept as an Executive Chairman of Garnero Colombo Inc, and Alvaro Jabur Jr., CEO of GC, will be elected as Member of the Board of the merged company. Mr. Jabur will remain CEO and manage the Brazilian operation with the executives of GC. The transaction is subject to certain approvals, including GGAC shareholder approval, and is expected to complete by the end of the year. Alvaro Jabur Jr., CEO of Grupo Colombo, considers the deal beneficial for its company because it will provide it with access to public markets. In addition, he expects an improvement in the company's prices and operating results, and accelerated growth as a result of the new investment. Mario Garnero, Executive Chairman of GGAC believes that The Colombo brand has a good reputation and the investment will be beneficial in terms of rapid growth and higher revenues. Grupo Colombo was founded in 1917 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil. It is one of the largest Brazilian retailers of menswear, with more than 400 stores throughout the country. The company had net revenues of BRL 550mn (USD 234mn) in 2014. GGAC, founded in February 2014 in Sao Paulo by a group of Brazilian entrepreneurs led by Mario Garnero, Javier Martin Riva and Nelson Filho, operates as a blank check company for the purpose of entering into a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition or other similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. GGAC focuses on investments in companies in Latin America, with a particular emphasis on Brazil, or Europe, operating in the energy (including renewable energy) and biotechnology industries. In June 2014, GGAC raised USD 143.75mn in its IPO on the Nasdaq Capital Market and in November the same year, it acquired a 93.4% stake in Swiss digital security solutions provider WISeKey SA, in a cash and equity deal, valued at USD 124.9mn. ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A empresa brasileira de propósito específico, com foco em aquisições, e listada na Bolsa de Valores americana NASDAQ, Garnero Group Aquisition Co (GGAC), anunciou que decidiu fundir com a varejista de artigos de vestuário local, Grupo Colombo SA (GC), criando uma nova empresa chamada Garnero Colombo Inc. Nos termos da transação, GGAC vai adquirir 100% do capital social do GC, por meio de subscrição de novas ações ordinárias do GGAC que vão ser atribuídas aos acionistas do GC. Após a conclusão do negócio, os acionistas e os gestores do GC vão deter uns 25% do capital social da recém-criada Garnero Colombo Inc, avaliada em USD 330mn. Além disso, o GGAC vai fazer uma emissão privada de novas ações por um valor total máximo de USD 100mn. Os acionistas do GC também decidiram comprar ações do GGAC por USD 30mn, fazendo a transação ou no mercado público, ou através de emissão privada. O Mário Garnero vai ser mantido como presidente executivo da Garnero Colombo Inc, e o Álvaro Jabur Jr., CEO da GC, vai ser eleito como membro do Conselho de Administração da nova empresa. Mr. Jabur vai continuar sendo CEO, com o papel de supervisionar as operações do GC. A transação está sujeita a certas aprovações, incluindo a aprovação dos acionistas da GGAC, e deverá ser fechada até ao final do ano. O Álvaro Jabur Jr., CEO de Grupo Colombo, considera o acordo benéfico para a empresa, esperando facilitar o seu acesso aos mercados públicos. Ele ainda prevê uma melhora dos preços da empresa e dos resultados operacionais, e um crescimento acelerado resultante do novo investimento. O Mário Garnero, Presidente Executivo do GGAC, acredita que a marca Colombo tem uma boa reputação e que o investimento será benéfico em termos de crescimento rápido e receitas mais elevadas. O Grupo Colombo foi criado em 1917 e está sediado em São Paulo, Brasil. É um dos maiores varejistas brasileiros de artigos de vestuário masculino, com mais de 400 lojas em todo o país. O Grupo teve um faturamento de BRL 550mn (USD 234mn) em 2014. O GGAC, fundado em fevereiro de 2014 em São Paulo por um grupo de empresários brasileiros liderado por Mário Garnero, Javier Martin Riva e Nelson Filho, opera com a finalidade de realizar fusões, trocas de capital, aquisições de ativos ou outras combinações comerciais semelhantes, com uma ou mais empresas ou entidades. O GGAC está focado em investimentos em empresas na América Latina, especialmente no Brasil, ou na Europa, operando nas áreas de energia (incluindo energias renováveis) e indústrias de biotecnologia. Em junho de 2014, o GGAC levantou USD 143.75mn na sua oferta pública inicial de ações (IPO, na sigla em inglês) na Bolsa de Valores Eletrônica NASDAQ, e em novembro do mesmo ano adquiriu uma participação de 93.4% na provedora suíça de soluções de segurança digital WISeKey, em uma transação de dinheiro e ações, avaliada em USD 124.9mn.
110360 27/08/2015 智利 A joint venture between Goldcorp and Teck Resources 合资企业 Goldcorp Inc; Teck Resources Ltd 加拿大 　 金属矿的开采 (2122); 金矿和银矿的开采 (21222); 铜、镍、铅、锌矿的开采 (21223) 　 UPDATE: On 24 November 2015, Goldcorp announced the completion of the transaction. ORIGINAL: Canadian miner Goldcorp Inc said it has agreed to form a 50:50 joint venture company in Chile with Canadian metals and mining firm Teck Resources Ltd. Financial terms were not disclosed. The purpose of the joint venture is to combine Goldcorp's copper-gold project El Morro and Teck's copper project Relincho, both located 40 kilometres apart in the Chilean province Huasco, Atacama region. Goldcorp said that this asset combination will maximize value from its asset portfolio, while Teck added that it will consolidate infrastructure to reduce costs and environmental footprint. Simultaneously, on 27 August 2015, Goldcorp said it has agreed to acquire a 30% stake in the El Morro project for USD 90mn from compatriot peer New Gold Inc. Following completion of this purchase, Goldcorp will own 100% in the project. Both transaction are subject to regulatory and other approvals and are expected to close during the fourth quarter of 2015. The El Morro project has proven and probable gold reserves of 278 tons, and 3.25 million tons of copper as of 31 December 2014. The Relincho project has proven and probable reserves of 5.05 million tons of copper, and 232,000 tons of molybdenum as of the same period. Goldcorp is engaged in the acquisition, exploration, development, and operation of precious metal properties in the Americas. The company reported sales revenues of USD 3.44bn and net loss of USD 2.2bn for 2014. Teck Resources is engaged in mining, smelting and refining activities. The company mines zinc, copper, molybdenum, gold and metallurgical coal and has operations in Canada, USA, Chile and Peru. It reported total revenues of CAD 8.6bn (USD 6.5bn) and net income of CAD 362mn (USD 272mn) for 2014.
110357 27/08/2015 智利 El Morro copper-gold project in Chile 少数股权购买 Goldcorp Inc 加拿大 New Gold Inc 金矿和银矿的开采 (21222); 铜、镍、铅、锌矿的开采 (21223) 90 (官方数据) 30 UPDATE: On 24 November 2015, New Gold said it closed the sale of its 30% interest in the El Morro project. ORIGINAL: Canadian miner Goldcorp Inc announced it has agreed to acquire a 30% stake in the El Morro copper-gold project located in Chile for USD 90mn from compatriot peer New Gold Inc. Goldcorp will also pay to New Gold 4% gold stream on future gold production from the project. Following completion of this deal, Goldcorp will own 100% in the El Morro. For its part, New Gold said that the sale will strengthen the company's balance sheet and will increase its financial flexibility. Simultaneously, on 27 August 2015, Goldcorp said it has also agreed to form a 50:50 joint venture company in Chile with Canadian metals and mining company Teck Resources Ltd. Both transaction are subject to regulatory and other approvals and are expected to close during the fourth quarter of 2015. The El Morro project has proven and probable gold reserves of 278 tons, and 3.25 million tons of copper as of 31 December 2014. Goldcorp is engaged in the acquisition, exploration, development, and operation of precious metal properties in the Americas. The company reported sales revenues of USD 3.44bn and net loss of USD 2.2bn for 2014. New Gold specializes in the acquisition, exploration and operation of mineral properties in Canada and Chile. It reported total revenues of USD 726mn and net loss of USD 477.1mn for 2014.
110352 27/08/2015 俄罗斯 Media Alliance 收购 National Media Group 俄罗斯 Discovery Communications Inc 有线广播电视和其他付费订阅节目服务 (5152) 　 　 80 UPDATE: On 8 October 2015, the transaction was completed, Interfax news agency reported, citing a joint press release of NMG and Discovery. ORIGINAL: Russian media holding National Media Group (NMG) and U.S. mass-media and entertainment group Discovery Communications agreed to create company Media Alliance, which will control Discovery's Russian assets, the two deal parties announced in a joint press statement. NMG will possess 80% in Media Alliance and the remainder will be in the hands of Discovery Communications, Kommersant daily specified, citing Olga Paskina, the general director of Discovery Networks for southeast Europe. Paskina will also be in charge of Media Alliance. So far, all eleven TV channels operated by Discovey in Russia were controlled by the Group's locally-registered subsidiary OOO Discovery Communications. In fact, Media Alliance is the new name of legal entity OOO Discovery Holdings which was part of the shareholder structure of OOO Discovery Communications prior to the deal. During an internal restructuring process, Media Alliance will gain full ownership over OOO Discovery Communications. The deal is expected to close in the coming few weeks. The transaction is in compliance with the Russian legislation which stipulates that foreign legal entities should possess no more than 20% in media companies, starting from 2016. NMG will participate in the deal via daughter company NMG Design which in turn holds a broadcasting licence in Magnitogorsk. The licence will enable Discovery to revive the sale of TV ads through its channels, again in harmony with the Russian media laws. Discovery group of popular TV channels among which Discovey Channel, Animal Planet, Eurosport, TLC and others, have been present on the Russian paid TV market for 17 years. In 2014, OOO Discovery Communications generated RUB 3.296bn (USD 87.3mn) in revenue and registered a net loss of RUB 15.4mn (USD 408,100). NMG's assets include St Petersburg TV Broadcasting Company (72.4%), Channel One (25%) and Media Holding Ren TV (68%). In addition, it holds the majority in local company Izvestia, publisher of the eponymous social, political and business daily newspaper (73.2%) and Russkaya Sluzhba Novostej radio station (100%). In 2014, NMG bought a 50% stake in TV production company Art Pictures Vision. National Media Group belongs to structures of Bank Rossiya and its founders - private investor Aleksey Mordashov and company Surgutneftegaz.
110331 27/08/2015 巴西 Moinho Pacifico Industria e Comercio Ltda 收购 Bunge Ltd 美国 　 谷物磨制、植物油加工 (3112) 　 　 　 U.S. agribusiness company Bunge announced that it has agreed to acquire Brazilian wheat processor Moinho Pacifico for an undisclosed amount. The transaction is subject to approval from Brazilian competition regulator CADE. Bunge will carry out the purchase through its Brazilian arm Bunge Brasil. The U.S. company said that the acquisition is in line with its strategy of growing its wheat flower and premixes business for the industrial, domestic and bakery markets. Currently, the company has seven flour mills in Brazil. Moinho Pacifico was founded in 1955 and is based in the municipality of Santos in Brazil's northern state of Sao Paulo. The wheat processing capacity of the company's plant stands at close to 700,000 tonnes. Bunge, established in 1818, is a multinational vertically-integrated agribusiness and food company, specialised in production and distribution of oilseeds, grains, sugar and ethanol from sugar cane, and manufacturing of edible oils and food ingredients. The company is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and generated sales of USD 57.8bn in 2014.
110321 27/08/2015 印度 Komli Media India Pvt Ltd 收购 SVG Media Pvt Ltd 印度 Komli Media Inc 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418); 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518) 100 Indian digital advertising firm SVG Media Pvt Ltd has entered into an agreement to acquire Komli Media India Pvt Ltd, for an undisclosed amount, the target announced The financial details of the deal were undisclosed. Post-transaction, Komli India will continue to operate as a separate entity from the SVG Media which shall have a reach of more than 150mn internet users locally. The deal comes after Komli demerged its mobile advertising unit RevX. Komli India is a digital advertising firm which offers data-driven multi-platform marketing solutions across social media, video, and display media. The firm caters clients such as to publishers, advertisers and ad agencies and has a total reach of 60 million internet users. It is a part of Komli Media Inc, which has presence in India, Asia, Australia and New Zealand. SVG Media is an Indian digital advertising and technology media network which focuses on the domestic market. It also operates through its subsidiaries Tyroo, DGM, Seventynine and nNext. The firm has a total reach of over 100 Indian internet users and was launched in 2006.
110319 27/08/2015 泰国; 美国 Eko Communications 少数股权购买 Gobi Partners; Undisclosed investor(s) 中国 　 软件出版 (5112) 5.7 (官方数据) 　 U.S. and Thailand-based communications platform developer Eko Communications announced that it has raised USD 5.7mn in its series A financing round. The investment was led by by Asia-based venture capital firm Gobi Partners as well as previous undisclosed investors. Eko will use the funds raised to expand its business across Asia, enhance its marketing effort and hire new talents. Eko Communications, founded in 2012, develops enterprise messaging applications used for the workplace. Its clients include bank, medium-sized retailers and public companies. Gobi Partners is a venture capital firm that invests in IT and digital media in China and Southeast Asia.
110318 27/08/2015 加拿大 Twin Rivers Technologies Entreprises De Transformation De Graines Oleagineuses Du Quebec Inc 收购 Viterra Inc 加拿大 Felda Global Ventures Holdings Berhad 淀粉和植物脂肪和油制造业 (31122) 90.88 (DW 估计) 100 UPDATE: On 03 November 2016, the seller announced the completion of the deal. ORIGINAL: Malaysian diversified agri-commodities company Felda Global Ventures Holdings Bhd (FGV) announced that it will divest its Canadian indirect wholly-owned subsidiary Twin Rivers Technologies Entreprises De Transformation De Graines Oleagineuses Du Quebec Inc for an enterprise value of CAD 190mn (USD 142.7mn). FGV will sell 298,070 common shares of the target to Canada-based agricultural firm Viterra Inc. The deal includes a canola and soybean crushing and refining plant located in Quebec, Canada. FGV originally acquired Twin Rivers in 2007 for USD 13.2mn. The current deal will enable the seller to to divest a non-core asset and cut costs, while using the proceed for partial repayment of borrowings and for working capital. Viterra announced that the acquisition will create more marketing opportunities for the company and will help them optimise their output through canola and soybean crushing. Twin Rivers Technologies Entreprises De Transformation De Graines Oleagineuses Du Quebec Inc operates an oilseed crushing facility and a food grade oil refinery. It markets refined oil in addition to crude degummed canola and soybean oil. The company's revenues were CAD 375.2mn (USD 322.6mn) for the FY ended 31 December 2014. As of 31 March 2015, Twin Rivers had net debt of CAD 69.1mn (USD 54.6mn). Viterra processes, distributes and transport grains and oilseeds. The company is wholly-owned by global commodities producer Glencore Plc. Felda Global Ventures Holdings Bhd manages plantation estates and makes soybean, sugar and canola products. The company employs 19,000 people in its 44 subsidiaries located across more than 10 countries. Felda posted revenues of MYR 16.4bn (USD 4.7bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014. Note: The deal value was estimated based on the aggregate sale price of CAD 190mn and the target company's net debt of CAD 69.1mn as of 31 March 2015.
110317 27/08/2015 中国 Shanghai Rajax Information Technology Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Beijing Hualian Department Store Co Ltd; JD.com Inc; Sequoia Capital; Horizons Ventures Ltd; Slender West Lake Investment Ltd 中国; 美国; 香港 　 电子购物 (454111) 630 (官方数据) 　 Update:/B> The company announced that its funding has raised a total of USD 630mn instead of USD 90mn. Existing investor Hong Kong-listed internet giant Tencent Holdings Ltd, China Media Capital and Gopher Assets also joined the other investors in the funding. The company is now valued at USD 3bn, making it one of the top companies in its industry along with GrubHub, Delivery Hero and JustEat. Original: Shanghai Rajax Information Technology Co Ltd announced that its online food ordering service provider Ele.me has raised USD 90mn in its latest round of funding led by Shenzhen-listed Beijing Hualian Department Store Co Ltd. Existing investors Chinese e-commerce company JD.com and Sequoia Capital joined the funding as well as Horizon Ventures and and Slender West Lake Investment Ltd. Beijing Hualian will settle the investment through its subsidiary Singapore-based Beijing Hualian Mall (Singapore) Commercial Management Pte Ltd. The target company previously raised USD 350mn in last round of funding in January 2015. Ele.me provides and offers online food ordering services that focuses on food outlets around universities and colleges. The company currently has partnered with more than 180,000 restaurants and has more than 1 million orders everyday. Beijing Hualian Department Store Co Ltd operates and manages shopping centers. The company is listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 1.3bn (USD 208.5mn) in 2014. JD.com operates as one of the largest online direct sales companies in China and offers mobile applications, products and services through its website JD.com. The company is listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange and recorded revenues of CNY 115bn (USD 18.5bn) in 2014.
110277 27/08/2015 中国 Yuneec International Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Intel Corp 美国 　 航空航天器械制造 (3364) 60 (官方数据) 　 Major semiconductor chips maker Intel Corp announced that it has invested USD 60mn in Chinese drone manufacturer Yuneec International Co Ltd, China Money Network reported. The investment is the third one Intel has made in the drone manufacturing industry, as it has also invested in U.S.-based Airware and PrecisionHawk. Both parties will collaborate to develop new products for the semiconductors industry. Yuneec International Co Ltd, founded in 1999, has manufactures drones and radio control electric powered airplanes. The company's flagship product is E430, a 48KW electric propulsion system and a carbon fibre composite airframe. Intel Corp is a global leader in designing, manufacturing and selling microprocessors, chipsets, motherboards, mobile components, mobile and network security software products, and other integrated digital technology platforms. Intel is listed on the NASDAQ Stock Exchange and recorded revenues of USD 55.9bn in 2014.

It offers alternative accommodation through a network of hundreds of hosts, in addition to an optional veterinary pet insurance. Its portfolio includes over 33 technology companies in Latin America, operating in the e-commerce, software, education, healthcare, on-line games and digital marketing sectors, such as Kekanto, VivaReal, GoIntegro, Oppa, Pitzi, Open English, eOtica and ComparaOnline. _______________________________________________________________________________ A provedora brasileira de serviços de hospedagem de cachorros PetStay Agencia Online de Servicos para Animais de Estimacao Ltda (DogHero) levantou um aporte de capital de valor não revelado da empresa argentina de capital de risco Kaszek Ventures, o portal de informações sobre startups Crumchbase apurou. Não foram revelados mais detalhes acerca da transação. A DogHero, criada em 2014, oferece serviços de hospedagem de cachorros low-cost. A empresa oferece alojamento alternativo através de uma rede de centenas de anfitriões, para além de uma garantia veterinária de emergência opcional. A Kaszek Ventures, fundada em 2011 por Nicolás Szekasy e Hernán Kazah, é uma empresa de capital de risco com USD 191.4mn em ativos sob gestão (a data de 12 de janeiro de 2016), especializada em capital de crescimento e investimentos em empresas em estágio inicial. O seu portfólio inclui mais de 33 empresas de tecnologia da América Latina, que atuam nos segmentos de comércio eletrônico, software, educação, saúde, jogos online e marketing digital, tais como Kekanto, VivaReal, GoIntegro, Oppa, Pitzi, Open English, eOtica e ComparaOnline.

At a later stage, Kiwanda will acquire the entire 100% stake in Iza from Carlos Caceres by issuing shares worth some USD 450,000. 110452 26/08/2015 巴西 Block FZA-M-320 少数股权购买 JX Nippon Oil & Gas Exploration Corp 日本 Ecopetrol SA 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 　 　 30 Japanese oil and gas company JX Nippon Oil & Gas Exploration Ltda (JX Nippon) announced it has signed an agreement with Ecopetrololeo e Gás do Brasil Ltda (Ecopetrol Brasil), the Brazilian subsidiary of Ecopetrol SA, to acquire 30% of Brazilian oil block Bloco AZF-M-320. Financial terms were not disclosed. JX Nippon acted through its Brazilian subsidiary JX Nippon Oil & Gas Exploration (Brasil) Ltda (JX Brasil). JX Nippon said that they decided to get an equity stake of Block FZA-M-320 because it is considered to be a geographical area with good future oil exploration opportunities. Block FZA-M-320 was awarded to JX Nippon in Brazil's 11th concession round in 2013. It is located at Foz do Amazonas Basin, in the Northern part of Brazil and it has an area of 192 km2. JX Brasil was established in 2014 and is engaged in exploration, production and sale of oil and natural gas. The company explores natural resources ranging from crude oil to liquefied natural gas and oil sand. It has shareholder interests in more than 15 countries around the world, but it is focused mostly on Malaysia, Vietnam and the North Sea. Ecopetrol, founded in 1948, is engaged in the exploration and production of crude oil and natural gas in Colombia. The company is also involved in the refining and petrochemicals, transportation and market & supply segments. Its main activity areas are Columbia, Gulf of Mexico and Brazil and it produces 755 million Barrels Of Oil Equivalent Per Day (BOED). It reported sales revenues of approximately USD 34.5bn and net income of around USD 3.76bn for 2014. __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A petrolífera japonesa JX Nippon Oil & Gas Exploration Ltda (JX Nippon) anunciou que celebrou um contrato com a subsidiária brasileira da Ecopetrol SA, Ecopetrololeo e Gás do Brasil Ltda (Ecopetrol Brasil), sobre a compra de uma participação acionária de 30% no Bloco AZF-M-320. Os detalhes financeiros acerca da transação não foram divulgados. A JX Nippon agiu por meio de sua subsidiária brasileira JX Nippon Oil & Gas Exploration (Brasil) Ltda (JX Brasil). A JX Nippon afirmou que decidiu adquirir uma participação no capital do Bloco AZF-M-320 porque é considerado uma área geográfica com boas oportunidades futuras de exploração de petróleo. O Bloco AZF-M-320 foi atribuído a JX Nippon na 11ª roda concessionária do Brasil em 2013. Este está localizado na Bacia da Foz do Amazonas, no norte do Brasil e tem uma área de 192 km2. A JX Brasil foi criada em 2014 e está envolvida na exploração, produção e venda de petróleo e gás natural. A empresa explora recursos naturais que variam desde petróleo bruto até gás natural liquefeito e areias asfálticas. Esta tem interesse acionário em mais de 15 países ao redor do mundo, mas está focada principalmente na Malásia, Vietnã e Mar do Norte. A Ecopetrol, fundada em 1948, está envolvida na exploração e produção de petróleo bruto e gás natural na Colômbia. A empresa também está envolvida na refinação do petróleo e atua nos mercados de petroquímicos, de transportes e de abastecimento. As suas atividades estão concentradas principalmente na Colômbia, no Golfo do México e no Brasil, e produz cerca de 755 milhões de barris de óleo equivalente por dia (BOED). A empresa registrou um faturamento de aproximadamente USD 34.5bn e um lucro líquido de cerca de USD 3.76bn em 2014.
110365 26/08/2015 巴西 A gold processing plant located at the Andorinhas mine of Troy Resources 收购 Magellan Minerals Ltd 加拿大 Troy Resources Ltd 金矿和银矿的开采 (21222) 4.5 (官方数据) 100 Brazil-focused Canadian gold miner Magellan Minerals Ltd announced it has agreed to acquire a gold processing plant located at the Brazilian gold mine Andorinhas from Canadian mining company Troy Resources Ltd for USD 4.5mn. The deal also involves equipment and mining fleet associated with the processing plant. Alan Carter, President and CEO of Magellan Minerals, said that this acquisition is a further major step for the company in its plans to build and develop the high grade Coringa gold mine, located in the Para state. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. The gold processing plant, which has a crushing and grinding facility with capacity of 800 tons per day, gravity recovery circuit, and a carbon-in-pulp recovery circuit, is scheduled to be decommissioned during the fourth quarter of 2015. Magellan Minerals engages in the acquisition, exploration and development of gold mineral properties in Brazil. The company reported net loss of CAD 6.5mn (USD 4.9mn) for 2014. Troy Resources engages in the exploration and production of gold and silver properties in Argentina, Brazil and Guyana. It reported total revenues of AUD 178mn (USD 127mn) and net loss of AUD 59.1mn (USD 42mn) for FY ended 30 June 2014.
110343 26/08/2015 土耳其 Customer Management Center 收购 Mid Europa Partners LLP 英国 ISS Group 办公支持服务 (5614) 　 　 100 CEE-focused private equity firm Mid Europa Partners will acquire Customer Management Center (CMC), which runs the Turkish call centre activities of Danish facility management services group ISS, for an undisclosed price, the seller said. The transaction is subject to satisfaction of certain conditions and is expected to close in the last quarter of 2015. CMC is a leading company in its industry with 4,110 employees and close to 4,000 computerised workstations, equivalent to around 8% of the Turkish industry capacity. It was established in 2000 and operates four call centres, located in Sanliurfa, Malatya and two in Istanbul. CMC provides services to customers across various industries, including the financial services, entertainment, consumer goods, automotive and retail industries. The company had an annual revenue of over DKK 300mn (USD 53.5mn) in 2014. The sale is part of ISS' strategy to focus on its core activities. ISS Turkey had an annual revenue of DKK 2,535mn (USD 452mn) and nearly 30,000 employees in 2014. Mid Europa Partners, founded in 1999, is a London-based private equity investor with a focus on Turkey and Central and Eastern Europe. The firm has offices in Budapest, Istanbul and Warsaw, and has raised funds of over EUR 4.2bn since its inception.

The transaction brings ServiceMax’s total raised capital to USD 202mn. The proceeds from the round will be used to rapidly expand its global operations, scale up sales and marketing, and accelerate product development. ServiceMax is a U.S.-based field service software solutions firm which provides data analytics, scheduling, parts management solutions. 110306 26/08/2015 澳大利亚 Integra Coal Mine 收购 The Bloomfield Group; Glencore Plc 澳大利亚; 瑞士 Vale SA 煤炭开采 (2121) 　 　 　 Swiss-based commodities trader Glencore Plc and Australian counterpart Bloomfield Group have acquired the Integra coal mine located in Australia from Brazilian peer Vale SA, NMB - Mining News reported. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Vale has decided to sell its Australian asset following a drop in coal prices in 2014, which made the mine economically unviable for the company. Vale's Integra Mine complex is located in Hunter Valley, New South Wales, Australia. The mine extracts metallurgical coal used in steel production, and thermal coal, used in electricity generation. Since 2007, the mine has been 61.2% owned by Vale, while the remaining stake is held by a group of Asian companies. Integra mine used to produce about 4.5 tons of coal per year, until July 2014, when it was closed. Glencore, established in 1974, is an integrated producer and marketer of commodities, specialized in the production, sourcing, processing, refining, transporting, storage, financing and supply of metals and minerals, energy products and agricultural products. The company has more than 90 commercial offices in 40 countries and engages more than 61,000 employees. Glencore is listed in London (GLEN:LN) and Hong Kong (805:HK), and posted USD 221bn in revenues for 2014. The Bloomfield Group was established in 2006 in the Hunter Valley, Australia. It is a group of private companies engaged in mining and engineering. The group employs around 500 people and operates two open-cut mines - Bloomfield Colliery at East Maitland and Rix's Creek, close to Singleton, NSW. _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A comerciante de commodities suíça Glencore Plc e a homóloga australiana Bloomfield Grupo adquiriram a mina de carvão Integra localizada na Austrália da companhia brasileira do mesmo ramo Vale SA, reportou MiningNews.net. Os detalhes financeiros acerca da transação não foram divulgados. A Vale decidiu vender o seu ativo australiano após a redução dos preços do carvão em 2014, o que tornou a mina economicamente inviável para a empresa. O complexo minário Integra, detido majoritariamente pela Vale, está localizado em Hunter Valley, New South Wales, Austrália. Da mina são extraídos carvão metalúrgico, utilizado na produção de aço, e carvão térmico, usado na geração de eletricidade. Desde 2007 a Vale tinha uma participação de 61,2% na mina, sendo que os restantes 38.8% pertencem a um grupo de empresas asiáticas. Até � data do seu fechamento em julho de 2014, a Integra produzia cerca de 4.5 toneladas de carvão por ano. A Glencore, criada em 1974, é uma produtora e comerciante integrada de commodities, especializada na produção, fornecimento, processamento, refino, transporte, armazenagem, financiamento e fornecimento de metais, produtos agrícolas e energia. A empresa tem mais de 90 escritórios comerciais em 40 países, empregando mais de 61.000 funcionários. A Glencore está listada em Londres (GLEN: LN) e Hong Kong (805: HK), e gerou um faturamento de USD 221bn em 2014. A Bloomfield Group foi criada em 2006 em Hunter Valley, Austrália. É um grupo de empresas privadas envolvidas nas áreas de mineração e engenharia. O grupo emprega cerca de 500 pessoas e opera duas minas a céu aberto - Bloomfield Colliery em East Maitland e Rix's Creek, perto de Singleton, NSW.

NEPI has agreed to acquire all the issued shares in Romanian company Degi Titan SRL (the sole owner of Auchan Titan) and to repay Degi's outstanding shareholder claims from its sellers - the U.K. global investment management group Aberdeen Asset Management Deutschland AG and Germany's property investment company Degi Beteiligungs GmbH. In addition, NEPI has repaid Degi's entire outstanding debt. The purchase price was satisfied by NEPI's existing cash resources. Auchan Titan has a total gross lettable area (GLA) of 44,730 m2 and is located in Titan district, one of the most densely populated district of Bucharest. The property is currently occupied by Auchan hypermarket and international brands such as Adidas, C&A, CCC, Deichmann, dm, Flanco, H&M, New Yorker and Takko, as well as a seven-screen cinema. The property's monthly weighted average rental price per square metre is EUR 14.7. NEPI is an Isle of Man company established in 2007 to invest primarily in the high quality office, retail and industrial property market initially in Romania and thereafter in other Central and Eastern European countries. Its shares are listed on the Johannesburg, London and Bucharest stock exchanges. In 2014, it had total assets under management of EUR 1.52bn. Note: The deal value (consideration paid) is assumed to equal the aggregate purchase price of EUR 86mn, including the settlement of debts.

110281 26/08/2015 美国 World Triathlon Corporation 收购 Dalian Wanda Group Co Ltd 中国 Providence Equity Partners LLC 艺术表演、竞技运动和相关服务业 (711) 650 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 19 November 2015, Dalian Wanda Group has completed its acquisition on World Triathlon Corporation, making WTC an official member of Wanda Sports. ORIGINAL: Chinese private conglomerate Dalian Wanda Group Co Ltd (China Wanda Group) announced that it has agreed to acquire U.S.-based World Triathlon Corporation (WTC) from U.S.-based PE firm Providence Equity Partners LLC for USD 650mn. The acquisition will enable the buyer to secure assets in the global sports industry, in light of the increasing popularity of triathlon events in China. Following the completion of the acquisition, Wanda will become the world's largest sports company in terms of scale, taking over the entire management of WTC. In 2015, Dalian Wanda Group Co Ltd also acquired a 68.2% stake in Swiss sports marketing firm Infront Sports & Media AG for EUR 1.1bn (USD 1.2bn) and 20% of Spanish football club Atletico Madrid. World Triathlon Corporation, headquartered in Tampa, U.S.A., owns the Ironman brand and organizes Ironman events. The company accounts for more than 90% of the global market share of long-distance triathlon events. It has promoted and licensed some 130 races with 230,000 participants within 37 years. The company's revenues have grown at a CAGR of 40% over the past four years. Established in 1988, Dalian Wanda Group Co Ltd develops commercial property, luxury hotels, department stores and movie theatres. It is the parent company of the Hong Kong-listed Dalian Wanda Commercial Properties Co Ltd. The company is run by private investor Wang Jianlin and it had revenues of CNY 242.5bn (USD 39.4mn) in 2014. Providence Equity Partners LLC invests in global companies focused on media, communication, education, entertainment and others. Providence has two main complementary businesses - private equity and credit. It manages assets worth USD 40bn and has invested in over 140 companies since its inception.

Co-operation with Servers.com will bring less network delays and eliminate the geopolitical factor. Edinaya Set specialises in the construction of geographically distributed corporate infrastructure based on its own MPLS network, as well as leasing of network resources. The company also renders co-location services. XBT Holding Ltd was incorporated in 2005 and offers a wide range of business continuity telecom services covering colocation, managed dedicated servers, cloud computing, high-performance managed network, storage, security, etc.
110255 26/08/2015 罗马尼亚 Mediapost Hit Mail 少数股权购买 La Poste 法国 Seitan Marian - private investor 广告、公共关系及相关服务 (5418) 　 　 40 France's national postal services provider La Poste has acquired the remaining 40%, it did not own, in Romanian direct marketing services firm Mediapost Hit Mail, from its founder Seitan Marian, the Romanian business daily Ziarul Financiar reported. Financial terms were not disclosed. La Poste is acting in the transaction through its subsidiary Mediapost, which originally acquired a 60% stake in the Romanian company in 2009. The buyer said it intends to grow the Romanian business organically and via acquisitions. Following the deal, Romanian entrepreneur Seitan Marian will keep its CEO position in the target company. Mediapost Hit Mail Group, previous Hit Mail Group, was founded in 1997 by Seitan Marian, as a full service direct marketing company. It operates in Romania and Bulgaria and its services include e-mail marketing, letterbox marketing, database services, and mobile marketing. The group employs around 900 people and for 2014 it booked consolidated revenues of EUR 10.7mn. La Poste has a network of around 9,600 post offices throughout France and operates in 40 countries. The group has some 260,000 employees and it generated EUR 22.2bn in revenue in 2014.
114519 25/08/2015 印度 Barbeque Nation Hospitality Ltd 少数股权购买 CX Partners Pte Ltd 新加坡 　 餐饮业 (722) 15 (官方数据) 10 India-base restaurant operator Barbeque Nation Hospitality Ltd has received USD15mn in additional investment from Singaporean Investment firm CX Partners Pte Ltd, an advisor disclosed. The additional funding comes after the buyers initial investment of INR 1.1bn (USD 20.4mn) on March 2013. Barbeque Nation is an Indian barbecue restaurant chain. It has branches in cities across India such as Bangalore, Chennai, Delhi, Gurgaon an. The chain is majority owned by publicly listed firm Sayaji Hotels Ltd. CX Partners is a Singapore-based India-focused investment firm, which focuses on the power, electronics, hospitality and financial services among others. It was founded in 2009 and currently has a total funds under management of USD 500mn.

The funding will allow Yogiyo to continue the development and improvement of its products and services. It brings the total investments into Yogiyo to USD 55mn. Yogiyo was launched in June 2012 and became Korea's leading online food ordering platform. The app has 12 million download as of August 2015. Delivery Hero is a global network of online ordering platforms for food with more than 100,000 partner restaurants worldwide. It has around 1,500 employees in 28 countries, including 520 in its Berlin headquarters. Investors in the company include among others Insight Venture Partners, Kite Ventures, Team Europe, ru-Net, Tengelmann Ventures, Point Nine Capital, Rocket Internet and Vostok Nafta.

No financial details were disclosed. The funding will be used for launching MyRealTrip service globally. MyRealTrip was founded in 2012 as a travel startup offering locals around the globe the opportunity to partake tour guide roles. Later it has extended its range of services and products to include tickets, activities and local travel related products. In June 2014, MyRealTrip raised USD 0.84mn investment from Smile Gate Investment and Capstone Partners. Altos Ventures is a first-stage venture capital firm focusing on investments of up to USD 10mn in software, mobile and Internet companies. Initial investments are typically USD 1-3mn.

IPG is an injection moulder and assembler serving the personal care, oral care, and fast moving consumer goods markets in Mexico. Plastek Industries is engaged in the design and manufacturing of plastics products for the consumer packaging, personal care, household, food and beverage, healthcare, and cosmetics markets. 110242 25/08/2015 巴西 Rio Verde Energia SA; Rio Canoas Energia SA; TNE - Triunfo Negocios de Energia SA 收购 China Three Gorges Corp 中国 TPI - Triunfo Participacoes e Investimentos SA 水电发电 (221111); 电力传送，控制和分配 (22112) 462.07 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE 2: On 26 November 2015, Triunfo disclosed to the BM&FBOVESPA the conclusion of the transaction. Under the agreement, the total consideration to be paid is BRL 1.72bn (USD 462mn). It includes a cash payment of BRL 966.7mn (USD 251.1mn), assumption of BRL 809.7mn (USD 210.3mn) of gross debt of the target companies, as of 30 September 2015, and assumption of earn-outs of BRL 51.6mn (USD 13.4mn) as of 30 September 2015. Of the total consideration, BRL 918.4mn (USD 238.5mn) were paid in cash on the closing date, and the remaining value will be paid in up to 10 days after the closing of the Balance sheet, to take place on 30 November 2015. UPDATE 1: On 24 September 2015 Brazilian Antitrust Authority (Cade) approved the transaction. The completion of the deal is still pending and depends on the approvals of the National Agency of Energy Electricity (ANEEL), The Brazilian Development Bank (BNDES), the debentureholders and the Government of China. ORIGINAL: Brazilian infrastructure group TPI - Triunfo Participacoes e Investimentos SA announced that is has agreed to sell its hydropower generation subsidiaries Rio Verde Energias SA and Rio Canoas Energias AS, as well as its power trading unit TNE - Triunfo Negocios de Energia SA to Chinese energy group China Three Gorges Corp (CTG) for a consideration of BRL 970mn (USD 274.9mn). CTG acted through its subsidiary China Three Gorges Brasil Energia Ltda. The deal also includes the assumption of BRL 770.4mn (USD 218.4) of gross debt of the target companies, as of 31 December 2014. Also, the sum of the deal can increase by BRL 148.5mn (USD 42.1mn), depending on achievement of certain goals. The transaction is subject to approval by Brazilian antitrust authority CADE and Brazilian Electricity Regulatory Agency (Aneel), and the Chinese authorities. The sale of Rio Verde, Rio Canoas and TNE aligns with the TPI's goal to improve its capital structure and to stimulate its growth. The funds will be used to reduce debt and increase financial liquidity. Furthermore, the company commits to create additional value for shareholders and to focus its activities on outgoing operations. CTG corporation will increase its electricity producing capacity in Brazil from 687 MW to around 1000 MW. It already has a stake in three hydropower plants and 11 wind farms in the country. Rio Verde has an installed capacity of 116 MW and operates Salto Hydroelectric Plant , located in the state of Goiás. Rio Canoas Energia has an installed capacity of 192 MW and manages the Garibaldi Hydroelectric Plant in the state of Santa Catarina. TNE - Triunfo Negocios de Energia SA is engaged in energy trading. CTG, founded in 1993, is a state-owned power company, specialized in the development, construction and management of hydroelectric power plants. The company manages the Three Gorges Dam, which is the world's largest hydroelectric power plant with a total installed capacity of 22,500 MW. TPI - Triunfo Participacoes e Investimentos SA, established in 1999, operates infrastructure facilities through concessions in the states of Rio Grande do Sul, Rio de Janeiro, Minas Gerais, Parana, Santa Catarina, Sao Paulo, Goias, Mato Grosso do Sul and Amazonas. Its portfolio comprises three railway highway concessions, one port terminal, and two hydropower plants with total installed capacity of 317.9 MW. The company also engages in the cabotage segment, and the management of the Viracopos-Campinas International Airport, and involves around 3,500 employees. Note: The target companies' reported gross debt of BRL 770.4mn is used for the calculation of Enterprise Value. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ UPDATE 2: Em 26 de Novembro de 2015, a Triunfo revelou para a BM&FBOVESPA o fechaento da transação. O valor do negócio nos termos do acordo foi de BRL 1.72bn (USD 462mn). Este valor inclui um pagamento de BRL 966.7mn (USD 251.1mn) em moeda corrende, assunção de dívida bruta que em 30 de setembro de 2015 totalizava BRL 809.7mn (USD 210.3mn), e assunção do caixa que em 30 de setembro de 2015 totalizava BRL 51.6mn (USD 13.4mn). Nesta data, foi realizado um pagamento em dinheiro de BRL 918.4mn (USD 238.5mn), sendo que o valor remanescente vai ser pago em até 10 dias úteis da conclusão dos balanços, i.e. 30 November 2015. UPDATE 1: A O Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econômica (Cade) aprovou a transação. A conclusão do negócio ainda está pendente e depende das aprovações da Agência Nacional de Energia Elétrica (Aneel), do Banco Nacional de Desenvolvimento Econômico e Social (BNDES), dos debenturistas e do Governo chinês. ORIGINAL: O grupo de infraestrutura brasileiro TPI - Triunfo Participações e Investimentos SA anunciou um acordo para vender as suas subsidiárias de geração hidrelétrica Rio Verde Energias SA e Rio Canoas Energias AS, e também a sua filial de negociação de energia TNE - Triunfo Negócios de Energia SA, para o grupo de energia chinês China Three Gorges Corp (CTG), por BRL 970mn (USD 274.9mn). A CTG agiu através de sua subsidiária China Three Gorges Brasil Energia Ltda. O acordo também inclui a assunção de BRL 770.4mn (USD 218.4) da dívida bruta das empresas-alvo, considerada para o período anual, encerrado em 31 de dezembro de 2014. Além disso, a soma do negócio pode aumentar em BRL 148.5mn (USD 42.1mn), dependendo da realização de determinadas metas. A transação está sujeita à aprovação do Conselho Administrativo de Defesa Econômica (CADE), da Agência Nacional de Energia Elétrica (Aneel) e das autoridades chinesas. A venda dos ativos de Rio Verde, Rio Canoas e TNE está alinhada com o objetivo da TPI de melhorar a sua estrutura de capital e de estimular a seu crescimento. Os fundos vão ser usados ​​para reduzir a dívida e aumentar a liquidez financeira da empresa. Para além disso, esta compromete-se a criar valor adicional para os acionistas e a concentrar as suas atividades nos projetos atualmente desenvolvidos. A CTG vai aumentar a sua capacidade de produção de eletricidade no Brasil de 687 MW para cerca de 1000 MW. A corporação já tem participações de capital em três usinas hidrelétricas e 11 parques eólicos no país. A Rio Verde tem uma capacidade instalada de 116 MW e é responsável pela operação da Usina Hidrelétrica Salto, localizada no Estado de Goiás. A Rio Canoas Energia tem uma capacidade instalada de 192 MW e administra a Usina Hidrelétrica Garibaldi, no estado de Santa Catarina. A TNE - Triunfo Negócios de Energia SA está envolvida no comercialização de energia. A CTG, criada em 1993, é uma empresa de energia estatal, especializada no desenvolvimento, construção e gestão de usinas hidrelétricas. A empresa administra a Hidrelétrica da Three Gorges, que é a maior usina hidrelétrica do mundo, com uma capacidade total instalada de 22,500 MW. A TPI , fundada em 1999, opera facilidades de infraestrutura por meio de concessões nos Estados do Rio Grande do Sul, Rio de Janeiro, Minas Gerais, Paraná, Santa Catarina, São Paulo, Goiás, Mato Grosso do Sul e Amazonas. O seu portfólio é composto por três concessões rodoviárias, um terminal portuário, e duas usinas hidrelétricas com capacidade instalada total de 317.9 MW. A empresa também é envolvida no segmento de cabotagem e na administração do Aeroporto Internacional de Viracopos-Campinas, e emprega em torno de 3,500 colaboradores. Note: As empresas-alvo registaram uma dívida bruta de BRL 770.4mn que é utilizada no apuramento da Enterprise Value.
110251 25/08/2015 美国 Mobee 少数股权购买 Flint Capital; Stage 1 Ventures; Atlas Venture; Interwest Partners 俄罗斯; 美国 　 数据处理、主机管理及相关服务 (518) 5 (官方数据) 　 U.S. crowdsourcing start-up Mobee said it raised USD 5mn in a Series A funding led by Russian venture fund Flint Capital. Following the transaction, Flint Capital’s Partner, Sergey Gribov, will join the target’s board of directors. The round was also joined by existing shareholders Stage 1 Ventures, Atlas Venture and InterWest Partners. The proceeds will be used for entering new markets, engaging more clients and further development of the technology for crowdsourced data gathering. Mobee was set up in 2011. The company has developed a platform for offline collecting of user information (geo-located data points and photographs) from smartphones. The service includes also real-time alerts and analysis tools. Mobee services brands, retail and asset management companies. E.g. retailers can track the execution and performance of critical sales and marketing initiatives. Mobee provides data such as the absence or presence of goods on the shelves and monitoring the vendor performance. Flint Capital was founded in 2013 by Dmitry Smirnov and Oleg Seydak. The fund specialises in financing hi-tech projects in the IT, media and telecom, as well as financial and consumer services sectors.

BPT Real Estate is a property and asset management company with activities in the Baltics and Poland. The company has around one million square meters under management. It employs 80 people. BaltCap is a private equity and venture capital firm focused on Baltic states. Since 1995, the fund has invested into more than 60 different projects. The company is supported by a broad blue-chip investor base that includes both international and local institutions like the European Investment Fund, the European Bank for Reconstruction & Development and some of the Baltics' largest institutional investors. Northern Horizon Capital was formed in 2011 through the merger between BPT Asset Management and Evli Property Investments. The proceeds of the transaction would be used to develop new content, expand its global footprint and improve localization. Coursera is an international online education platform that offers specialized courses and online classes in psychology computer science, business and finance among others. It caters to 15 million user globally. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. The transaction includes Silver Food's subsidiaries SOPCODA and Silver Fishing. Talem Africa said that the purchase represents a strategic move towards its goal to create a leading consumer-facing food and beverage player in Africa. The company added that it's currently reviewing a number of other acquisition opportunities so as to further diversify and grow its food and beverage business across Africa. Silver Food was founded in 2004 and is engaged in the production and sales of canned tuna, mackerel and sardines under the Mario, Silver and Atlanta brands. The company's subsidiary SOPCODA provides fish freezing services while its other subsidiary Silver Fishing operates a 200-tonne capacity deep-sea fishing vessel. Talem Africa is based in Dubai and is part of a group of companies operating in food, media and consumables distribution in over 20 countries. The firm is focused on the consumer-facing branded food and beverage industries.

Financial terms were not disclosed. Carlyle added that it will merge the target companies in order to create a regional tourism platform. Some of the selling shareholders include UAE-based private equity firm The Abraaj Group Ltd which agreed to sell its interest in Condor Travel. This is the second investment of Carlyle in Peru during 2015. Earlier this month, on 17 August 2015, the U.S. firm announced it agreed to purchase an 85.42% stake in Peruvian armoured car services provider Hermes Transportes Blindados SA for an estimated PEN 606mn (USD 187mn). Nuevo Mundo Viajes is an outbound travel agency offering travel arrangement services for leisure and corporate clients via a network of 1,000 agencies. It is also one of the largest wholesalers of packaged vacations through affiliated agencies. Condor Travel is an inbound tour operator with a global network of more than 2,000 institutional clients. The company also operates in Chile and Ecuador, and owns 5% of the total global visits to Machu Picchu. Condor Travel is the largest inbound tour operator in the country with 5 percent of the total global visits to Macchu Picchu. It also covers Ecuador and Chile through its local offices in those countries. Condor Travel has a global network of more than 2,000 institutional clients in the five continents and an online platform to reach directly to consumers. The Carlyle Group is a global alternative investment firm with USD 193bn in assets under management across 128 funds and 159 fund of funds vehicles as of 30 June 2015. Carlyle specializes in private equity investments in the aerospace, defence, consumer and retail, energy, financial services, healthcare, industrial, technology and business services, telecommunications, media and transportation sectors.

107870 25/08/2015 阿拉伯联合酋长国 ProVita International Medical Center LLC 收购 NMC Health PLC 阿拉伯联合酋长国 TVM Capital Healthcare Partners; The Olayan Group; Al Zarooni Emirates Investment; Minority Shareholders 护理和养老机构 (623) 160.6 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 25 August 2015, NMC Health announced completion of the transaction. ORIGINAL: UAE-based healthcare company NMC Health said that it has agreed to acquire the entire share capital of local long-term medical care provider ProVita International Medical Cente for USD 160.6mn. The deal consideration will be paid in cash and the target's shares will be purchased from TVM Capital Healthcare Partners, the Olayan Group, Al Zarooni Emirates Investment and other minority shareholders. The transaction is subject to customary closing conditions and is expected to close in Q3 2015. This is NMC's fourth acquisition this year. In May 2015, the company acquired a 90% stake in local healthcare services provider Americare Group for an enterprise value of USD 33mn, and also acquired Dr. Sunny Healthcare Group for an enterprise value of USD 64mn. In February 2015, NMC purchased an 86.4% stake in Spanish fertility centre Clinica Eugin for an enterprise value of USD 162.3mn. ProVita International Medical Center was established in 2011 by Christina Shawky-Boehme, who first established ProVita Germany in 1995. The company focuses on chronic ventilator-dependent patients, who require regular medical, nursing and rehabilitative treatments in a non-hospital environment. ProVita operates a total of 90 long-term care beds in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain, with a further 30 beds expected to become operational in Abu Dhabi by Q3 2015. The company employs 383 people and generated adjusted TTM EBITDA of USD 12.7mn, and adjusted TTM net profit of USD 10.7mn in 2014. NMC Health is a leading healthcare provider in the United Arab Emirates. The company was established in 1976. It has modern facilities including speciality hospitals, general hospitals and clinics. Apart from the healthcare, NMC also has affiliate companies serving business sectors such as financial services, pharmaceutical manufacturing, hospitality, real estate and media. NMC Health is listed on the London Stock Exchange. The company posted revenues of USD 644mn (EUR 527.4mn) and a net income of USD 77.5mn (EUR 63.5mn) in 2014. TVM Capital Healthcare Partners is a highly focused private equity and growth capital firm operating in MENA, India and Turkey. It is headquartered in Dubai and has offices in Beirut, Munich and Boston. The company is a part of the global venture capital and private equity group TVM Capital. The Olayan Group, established in 1947, is a private, multinational enterprise with diverse commercial and industrial operations in the Middle East and an actively managed portfolio of international investments. The group's portfolio comprises more than 40 companies engaged in distribution, manufacturing, and services. Al Zarooni Emirates Investments (ZEI) is the UAE holding company managing the Al Zarooni family's assets in private equity, public equity, investments funds, and real estate.
117169 24/08/2015 中国 Wuxi Meitong Food Technology Co. Ltd. 收购 FU JI Food and Catering Services Holdings Ltd 香港 Perfect Future Investment Limited 食品制造 (311) 46.3 (官方数据) 75 Hong Kong-listed cold food storage and logistics services provider FU JI Food and Catering Services Holdings said it will acquire the remaining 75% of Chinese food processor Wuxi Meitong Food Technology Co from Hong Kong-based Perfect Future Investment Ltd for CNY 296.25mn (USD 46.3mn). The completion of the deal is subject to fulfilment of certain closing conditions. Earlier in 2015, FU JI Food entered a deal to acquire 25% of Wuxi Meitong Food for CNY 98.7mn (USD 16.1mn). Wuxi Meitong is engaged in food processing and owns a logistics centre for fresh and cold food. Perfect Future Investment is 50% owned by Wang Jianqing, who controls a 30% interest in firm Marvel Light, the controlling shareholder of FU JI Food. Perfect Future Investment was originally a wholly-owned subsidiary of FU JI Food. Following completion of an reorganisation and restructuring of FU JI Food, it was sold to an investor group comprising Marvel Light in June 2013. The activities of FU JI Food have been changing from delivery and processing and sale of convenient packaged food to providing cold food storage and logistics platforms, catering for large scale food ingredients and convenient packaged food integrated services. Now the company intends to slowly recapture its previous business operations along with expanding new business operations. FU JI Food posted a revenue of CNY 913mn (USD 148.5mn) for the year ended March 2015.
115850 24/08/2015 越南 Hotdeal Co Ltd 少数股权购买 Transcosmos Inc 日本 　 软件出版 (5112); 互联网出版与传播 (516) 　 　 30 Japan-based outsourcing giant Transcosmos announced that it has agreed to acquire a 30% stake in Vietnamese daily deals e-commerce platform operator Hotdeal Co as a part of a strategic alliance between the two companies. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Transcosmos said that it will implement its operational know-how in Global E-Commerce One-Stop Service to deliver its products and services to consumers of Vietnam from Japan and beyond. The two companies also plan to continue a broader partnership in the ASEAN region, including support for Transcosmos' client companies that are expanding e-commerce to the ASEAN market. "I strongly believe that the strategic tie-up with transcosmos would be a breakthrough for Hotdeal.vn in improving our quality of services, and to strengthen business expansion in Vietnam and the South East Asia’s fastest-growing market," said Hotdeal founder and CEO Nguyen Thanh Van An. Hotdeal was established in December 2010 and it operates HOTDEAL.vn, the largest daily deals e-commerce portal in Vietnam. The website has 3.1 million unique monthly users and about 2.5 million members. Hotdeal also operates a travel vertical named yesgo.vn. Transcosmos provides call centre, business process outsourcing, digital marketing and global e-commerce services among other. The company is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and it booked revenues of JPY 199.2bn (USD 1.7bn) in its FY ended 31 March 2015.
111471 24/08/2015 韩国 ChulGaBang 少数股权购买 SBI Investment; HB Investment; Sejong Venture Partners 日本; 韩国 　 互联网出版与传播 (516) 2.7 (官方数据) 　 South Korean food delivery platform ChulGaBang has received an investment worth USD 2.7mn from Japanese investment firm SBI Investment, and local VC investors HB Investment and Sejong Venture Partners, digital technology media besuccess.com reported. The investment will help HelloWorld, the company behind the platform, to support ChulGaBang's expansion in the offline-to-online (O2O) market. Launched in 2011, HelloWorld's platform facilitates the management of deliveries and operations of small-to-medium sized food companies. SBI Investment is a Japanese asset management company, which operates in Korea through its local venture capital unit SBI Investment Korea. HB Investment is a venture capital and private equity firm, founded in 1999.
110808 24/08/2015 多米尼加共和国 Titularizadora Dominicana SA 少数股权购买 Titularizadora Colombiana SA 哥伦比亚 　 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 1.25 (官方数据) 25 UPDATE: On 4 September 2015, Titularizadora Colombiana informed that it will acquire the 25% stake in Titularizadora Dominicana for USD 1.25mn by gradually subscribing for a total of 500,000 shares of the latter. ORIGINAL: Colombian mortgage loans securitizing firm Titularizadora Colombiana SA announced it has agreed to acquire up to 25% of Dominican Republic-based peer Titularizadora Dominicana SA. Financial terms were not disclosed. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. The other shareholders of Titularizadora Dominicana include Dominican Republic-based entities Asociacion La Nacional de Ahorros y Prestamos para la Vivienda, GAM Capital SA, Centro Financiero BHD Leon SA, and Tenedora Banreservas SA. Titularizadora Dominicana is engaged in the securitization of mortgages in the Dominican Republic. Titularizadora Colombiana is also specialized in securitizing mortgage loans in Colombia. Its main line of business includes the issue of mortgage-backed securities (MBS), repo lending and trading of MBS, as well as mortgage portfolio management. The company reported net income of COP 13.62bn (USD 4.4mn) for 2014.
110633 24/08/2015 贝宁 Eau Technologie Environnement (ETE) 少数股权购买 Les Eaux Minerales d'Oulmes (LEMO) 摩洛哥 Cauris Management 软饮料及食用冰制造 (31211) 　 　 45.74 Togo-based private equity fund manager Cauris Management announced that it has sold its 45.74% stake in Benin-based mineral water company Eau Technologie Environnement (ETE) to Moroccan mineral water producer Les Eaux Minerales d'Oulmes (LEMO). The sum of the deal was not disclosed, but Cauris said the exit represented 3.4 times its initial investment. Cauris made an investment in ETE in 2007 and the latter used the proceeds to upgrade and increase production capacity of its plant. ETE was founded in 1995 and is engaged in the bottling and distribution of mineral water under the brand name of FIFA Ste Luce. The company exports part of its production to Burkina Faso, Niger, Nigeria and Togo. Les Eaux Minerales d'Oulmes is the largest water bottling and distribution company in Moroccan with a market share of some 68%. The company produces more than 520 million bottles per year under the Sidi Ali, Oulmes, Ain Atlas and Bahia brands. Les Eaux Minerales d'Oulmes is listed on the Casablanca Stock Exchange and had market capitalisation of MAD 1.78bn (USD 188.1mn) on 31 August 2015.
110235 24/08/2015 安哥拉 Block 21/09, offshore Angola; Block 21/11, offshore Angola 少数股权购买 Sociedade Nacional de Combustiveis de Angola EP (Sonangol) 安哥拉 Cobalt International Energy LP 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 1,750.00 (官方数据) 40 U.S. oil exploration and production company Cobalt International Energy announced that it has agreed to sell its 40% stakes in Blocks 21/09 and 20/11 offshore Angola to Angolan state-owned energy group Sociedade Nacional de Combustiveis de Angola EP (Sonangol) for USD 1.75bn. The transaction is subject to customary Angolan government approvals. Cobalt said that the sale greatly simplifies its organisation which will result in significant cost savings. The company added that the deal also allows it to focus its investments on its highest return projects. Blocks 21/09 and 20/11 are located in the Kwanza Basin and cover an area of 3.4 million acres. There have been five significant oil discoveries inside the two blocks to date, namely Orca, Lontra, Mavinga, Cameia and Bicuar. Orca is the largest oil discovery so far in the Kwanza Basin and has an estimated resource potential of between 400 and 700 million barrels of oil. Sonangol, established in 1976, is a state-owned energy group, focused on the exploration, development, marketing, production, transportation and refining of hydrocarbons and their derivatives. The company has some 13,000 employees.
110205 24/08/2015 爱沙尼亚; 拉脱维亚; 立陶宛 Eco Baltia 少数股权购买 European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) 国际的 　 废物治理 (562) 11.38 (官方数据) 30.51 The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) announced a EUR 10mn equity investment in leading Baltic waste management services provider Eco Baltia. EBRD acquired a 30.5% stake in the transaction. The proceeds will be used for the construction of a mechanical biological treatment plant for extraction of recyclable materials from household waste. The technology of the plant is unique for Latvia and the region where almost 90% of the municipal waste is transported to landfills. Founded in 2002, Eco Baltia is headquartered in Riga and spans operations across the Baltic countries, being the largest vertically integrated multi-service waste management group. The operations of the group's subsidiaries cover the whole waste treatment cycle, including waste recovery, waste collection, polymer recycling, as well as recyclables sorting and trading. In 2014, Eco Baltia reported USD 56.1mn in sales. Since 1991, the EBRD has invested over EUR 620mn in some 75 various-sector projects in Latvia.
110203 24/08/2015 加拿大 Well completions business in Canada 收购 TMK 俄罗斯 　 农业、建筑、采矿专用机械制造 (3331) 8.32 (官方数据) 100 Russian major producer of steel pipes for the oil and gas industry TMK acquired a well completions business in Canada for USD 8.32mn, TMK announced in its interim consolidated financial report for the six-month period ended 30 June 2015. The acquisition enables TMK to enter the local well completions market and increase the number and variety of products and services to its clients. The fair value of the acquired net identifiable assets is determined at USD 6.117mn and USD 2.198mn is recognised as goodwill. In 2014, TMK and U.S. oilfield services company Baker Hughes Inc announced the creation of a joint venture for development of well completions solutions. TMK Completions provides multi-stage completion systems and downhole completion tools for the oil and gas industry. TMK is Russia's largest manufacturer and exporter of steel pipes and ranks among the global top three pipe producers, according to data on its website. The group comprises 28 enterprises in Russia, the U.S.A, Canada, Romania, Oman, UAE and Kazakhstan, as well as two R&D centres in Russia and the U.S.A. TMK GDRs and ordinary shares are traded on the London Stock Exchange, OTCQX and the Moscow Exchange. In 2014, TMK posted sales of USD 6bn and booked net losses of USD 217mn.
110176 24/08/2015 巴西 Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos; Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos SP 少数股权购买 Hill International Inc 美国 　 建筑，工程及相关服务 (5413) 　 　 　 U.S.-based engineering company Hill International Inc has acquired minority stakes in Brazilian counterparts Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos and Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos SP, the buyer's legal adviser on the deal said. Hill acted through its subsidiary Brazilian Hill International Brasil Participacoes Ltda. Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. Hill purchased a 21.33% stake in Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos and an 18.32% interest in Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos SP, which was held by the latter's shareholders Francisco Nioac de Salles and Henrique de Aragao. The shareholders were paid with shares of Hill International. Following the deal, Hill has a 95.7% stake in Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos and an 87.78% interest in Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos SP. The transaction aligns with the buyer's goal to become one of the leading construction project management companies in Latin America. Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil. It is an engineering company, focused on project management. In 2010 it became a subsidiary of Hill International. Engineering SA Servicos Tecnicos SP was founded in 1990 in Sao Paulo, Brazil. Hill International Inc was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. It is an international construction consulting firm that provides project and construction management services. The company is listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE:HIL) and reported a total net revenue of USD 640.3mn for 2014. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A empresa de engenharia estadunidense Hill International Inc adquiriu participações minoritárias nas companhias brasileiras do mesmo ramo Engenharia SA Serviços Técnicos e Engenharia SA Serviços Técnicos SP, disse o consultor jurídico da compradora. A Hill agiu através da sua subsidiária brasileira Hill International Brasil Participações Ltda. Os detalhes financeiros do acordo não foram divulgados. A Hill comprou uma participação de 21.33% na Engenharia SA Serviços Técnicos e uma de 18.32% na Engenharia SA Serviços Técnicos SP, detida pelos acionistas Nioac Francisco de Salles e Henrique de Aragão. Os acionistas receberam em troca ações da Hill International. Na sequência do acordo, a Hill passa a ter uma participação de 95.7% na Engenharia SA Serviços Técnicos e uma de 87.78% na Engenharia SA Serviços Técnicos SP. A transação está alinhada com o objetivo da compradora de se tornar uma das mais importantes empresas de gestão de projetos de construção na América Latina. A Engenharia SA Serviços Técnicos foi constituída em 1975 e tem a sede em São Paulo, Brasil. Concentra as sua operações na área da engenharia, com foco na gestão de projetos. Em 2010 tornou-se uma subsidiária da Hill International. A Engenharia SA Serviços Técnicos SP foi fundada em 1990 em São Paulo, Brasil. A Hill International Inc. foi fundada em 1976 e tem a sede na Filadélfia, Pensilvânia. É uma empresa internacional de consultoria de construção que fornece serviços de gestão de projeto de construção. A empresa está listada na Bolsa de Valores da Nova York (NYSE: LIS) e gerou um faturamento de USD 640.3mn em 2014.
110188 24/08/2015 智利 Anglo American Norte SA 收购 Audley Capital Advisors LLP; Orion Mine Finance; Private investor(s) 英国; 美国 Anglo American Plc 铜、镍、铅、锌矿的开采 (21223) 300 (官方数据) 100 UPDATE: On 14 September 2015, Anglo American Plc said it closed the sale of its Chilean subsidiary Anglo American Norte. ORIGINAL: U.K.-based mining company Anglo American Plc announced it has agreed to sell its Chilean copper subsidiary Anglo American Norte SA to a consortium led by U.S. employee-owned hedge fund sponsor Audley Capital Advisors LLP, with U.S. private equity firm Orion Mine Finance as main co-investor, for USD 300mn. The USD 300mn deal value is payable in cash and may be increased by up to USD 200mn, depending primarily on the average London Metals Exchange copper price performance. The transaction is subject to certain approvals and is expected to close in Q3 2015. Anglo American has said that the sale is part of its plan to divest assets that do not meet its return criteria. The disinvestment was also motivated by the low commodity prices. Anglo American Norte owns the Mantoverde and Mantos Blancos copper mines located in the north of Chile. In 2014, the company had revenues of USD 1.9bn and a net profit of USD 29.1mn. Audley Capital Advisors is a hedge fund sponsor providing its services to other pooled investment vehicles. The company also invests in the public equity and alternative investment markets, as well as in private equity funds. Orion Mine Finance is a private equity firm focused on the mining sector, with assets under management of USD 1.86bn as of 31 March 2015.

CYI runs the diesel engine division of Hong Leong Asia. CYI is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and its principal subsidiary, Guangxi Yuchai Machinery Company Limited (GYMCL) manufactures, assembles and sells diesel engines for trucks, buses, passenger vehicles, construction equipment, marine and agriculture applications, diesel-powered generators, engine parts and components. Hong Leong Asia is also engaged in consumer products, building materials, industrial packaging and air-conditioning systems, lifestyle consumer appliances and other sectors. Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. According to Firrma.ru, SplitMetrics is valued at around USD 3mn (pre-money valuation). SplitMetrics plans to open up an office in San Francisco, near the Silicon Valley, where most of the company's clients are located. SplitMetrics is an app which allows to conduct A/B testing for a page of an app on the App Store. SplitMetrics allows to increase conversion of an app page by the means of optimiziation of screenshots, icons and other data of any app page. Embria Ventures focuses on the Russian and foreign Internet markets. Embria Ventures was established in 2007. The company invests predominantly in social network, mobile game and Internet advertisement companies.
110174 24/08/2015 巴西 Loggi Tecnologia Ltda 少数股权购买 Qualcomm Ventures; Dragoneer Investment Group LLC; Monashees Capital 美国; 巴西 　 互联网出版与传播 (516); 定制电脑编程服务 (541511) 14.17 (官方数据) 　 Brazilian online courier services provider Loggi Tecnologia Ltda has received BRL 50mn (USD 14.2mn) in a funding round from U.S. private equity firm Dragoneer Investment Group LLC, U.S. venture capital firm Qualcomm Ventures, and Brazilian venture capital firm Monashees Capital, media sources reported. The stake acquired was not disclosed. Loggi will use the funds obtained to further accelerate its growth. The company's co-founder and CEO Fabien Mendez said he aims to maintain Loggi's monthly clients’ portfolio growth at 30%. In September 2014, Qualcomm Ventures and Monashees Capital invested another BRL 10mn (then USD 4.2mn) in Loggi. Loggi, founded in October 2013 by entrepreneurs Fabien Mendez, Eduardo Wexler and Arthur Debert, specialises in the development and management of an on-line platform, which allows the user to hire courier services via internet or mobile applications. The company currently has 10,000 corporate clients and more than 500 registered couriers in the state of Sao Paulo. Loggi has a turnover of approximately BRL 0.5mn (USD 0.23mn) per month. Qualcomm Ventures, founded in 2000 as the venture capital investment arm of U.S. mobility solutions provider Qualcomm Inc, focuses on investments in companies from the mobile software, consumer internet, healthcare, energy, e-commerce and digital media segments. The company usually invests between USD 0.5mn and USD 10mn in a single transaction. Monashees Capital, established in 2005, is a venture capital firm, focused on investments in the internet and educational sectors. The company usually invests between BRL 0.5mn (USD 0.24mn) and BRL 5mn (USD 2.4mn). Its portfolio comprises Brazilian IT firms Algentis, Peixe Urbano, boo-box, Elo7, Mind Lab, VivaReal and Baby.com.br. Dragoneer, headquartered in San Francisco, California, is an investment management firm with USD 276mn in assets under management, specialized in growth capital investments in the mobile and software sectors.

Financial terms were not disclosed. Sol SpA and VIVISOL Srl have acted through their wholly owned subsidiary AIRSOL Ltd. After the capital increase, the remaining 40% stake of INSPIRAR is owned by U.S. holding company Palomba Investments Ltd (32%) and private investor Mr. Artemio Ayala (8%), co-founder of the company. INSPIRAR, established in 2014 in Sao Paulo city (Sao Paulo state, Brazil), is a startup that offers medical equipment for respiratory therapy, including hospital pattern beds, wheelchairs and hygiene chairs, serum holders, and other furnishings. The company also specialises in assisting patients with medical equipment and services. The startup operates with two agencies in Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro, employs 15 people and expects to close fiscal year 2015 with a turnover of about EUR 1mn (USD 1.08mn). The SOL Group, based in Italy, is a multinational group with operations in Europe, Brazil, Morocco, Turkey and India. The firm operates in two production sectors: production, research and marketing of industrial and medicinal gases, and respiratory home care. The Group employs around 3,000 people in 26 countries and had a turnover of EUR 636mn (USD 845mn) in 2014. ____________________________________________________________________________________________ A fabricante italiana de gases industriais Sol SpA e a provedora local de serviços médicos de terapia respiratória Vivisol Srl anunciaram a aquisição de uma participação de 60% na fabricante brasileira de equipamentos médicos para terapia respiratória INSPIRAR Equipamentos Médicos Hospitalares SA, através de um aumento de capital. A INSPIRAR, criada em 2014 na cidade de São Paulo (SP, Brasil), é uma startup que oferece equipamentos médicos para terapia respiratória, incluindo leitos hospitalares, cadeiras de rodas e cadeiras de higiene, porta-soros, e outros móveis. A empresa também é especializada na assistência clínica de pacientes com doenças respiratórias. A startup opera duas agências em São Paulo e Rio de Janeiro, emprega 15 pessoas e espera fechar o ano fiscal de 2015 com um volume de negócios de cerca de EUR 1mn (USD 1.08mn). O Grupo SOL, baseado na Itália, é uma empresa multinacional com operações na Europa, Brasil, Marrocos, Turquia e Índia. A companhia opera em dois sectores de produção: produção, pesquisa e marketing de gases industriais e medicinais, e cuidados domiciliários de denças respiratórias. 114795 21/08/2015 马来西亚; 新加坡 Cosmo Restaurants Sdn Bhd; Burger King Singapore Pte Ltd 收购 Newscape Capital Sdn Bhd 马来西亚 Ekuiti Nasional Bhd (Ekuinas) 餐饮业 (722) 18.17 (官方数据) 　 Malaysian private equity fund management company Ekuiti Nasional (Ekuinas) announced that it has sold its restaurant operations under the Burger King brand in Malaysia and Singapore to Malaysian investment company Newscape Capital for MYR 74.6mn (USD 18.2mn). The sale was conducted together with Asiapac, the master franchisor for the brand in the Asia Pacific region. Ekuinas had acquired a 95% stake in Cosmo Restaurants (Burger King Malaysia) and a 100% interest in Burger King Singapore progressively in 2011 and 2012. Ekuinas said that the sale completes the restructuring of its food and beverage portfolio in order to focus on its core casual dining and beverage segments with brands such as Tony Roma;s, Manhattan Fish Market, New York Steak Shack, Coolblog and San Francisco Coffee. The company added that the divestment generated a negative internal rate of return (IRR) of 28.1% and investment recovery of 0.45 times of capital invested across two funds. Burger King Singapore was established in 1982 and it operates a total of 41 outlets in Singapore. Burger King Malaysia, in turn, was established in 1997 and it owns and operates 50 outlets throughout Malaysia. Newscape Capital is led by Dato Chua Tia Guan and Lee Thiam Wah. Chua is a member of the Goods and Services Tax Monitoring Working Committee under the Ministry of Finance, while Lee is the founder of convenience store chain 99 Speedmart.

Launched in February 2015, HuiSeoul offers reasonably priced Korean cosmetics to Chinese customers. Its services feature am online forum where beauty consultants provide advice. Altos Ventures is a first-stage venture capital firm focusing on investments of up to USD 10mn in software, mobile and Internet companies. Its initial investments are typically USD 1-3mn.

The deal will be carried out by Yuanta Commercial Bank, a unit of the buyer. The transaction marks the first acquisition of a Taiwanese bank in South Korea.
