110180 21/08/2015 罗马尼亚 Floreasca Park office building in Bucharest 收购 GLL Real Estate Partners GmbH 德国 Portland Trust sro 房地产 (531) 89.26 (市场估计) 100 UPDATE: On 03 November 2015, Romanian news portal profit.ro reported that the Romania's Competition Council has approved the takeover of Floreasca Park office building in Bucharest by the German investment fund GLL. ORIGINAL: German real estate investment firm GLL Real Estate Partners is in the process of acquiring an office building in Floreasca Park, Romania from Czech real estate developer Portland Trust, the Romanian business daily Ziarul Financiar announced. Financial terms were not disclosed. According to Ziarul Financiar, market sources have estimated the deal value within EUR 75 - 85mn. Floreasca Park office building has a total gross lettable area (GLA) of 38,000 m2. It is located in northern Bucharest, near the Pipera district. Currently the building is fully occupied, with IT giant Oracle being the main tenant. GLL Real Estate Partners manages assets worth over EUR 5bn in Europe and the U.S. The firm already owns in Bucharest the Charles de Gaulle Plaza office building close to the Aviatorilor subway station. Currently, GLL Real Estate is 81% controlled by its management team, while Italian insurance group Assicurazioni Generali holds the remaining 19%.. Portland Trust has been active on the Romanian market since 1999 and it has developed some 260,000 m2 of office space in Bucharest, including Opera Center, Bucharest Business Park, Floreasca 169A and Floreasca Park. The company is controlled by British businessman Robert Neale. Note: The deal value is the middle point of the estimated range provided by Ziarul Financiar.
110160 21/08/2015 印度 VISA Steel Ltd 少数股权购买 Baosteel Group Corp 中国 　 钢铁制造 (3311); 金属和矿产品（石油除外）的批发 (4215) 1.35 (DW 估计) 5 Indian steel manufacturer VISA Steel Ltd, has received board approval to issue a 5% stake to China-based peer and Joint Venture (JV) partner Baosteel Group Corp worth an estimated INR 88.3mn (USD 1.4mn) for the sale of its 35% stake in its VISA Bao Ltd joint venture, VISA Steel disclosed on the local bourse. The target will issue a total of 5,789,500 at an estimated price of INR 15.25 (USD 0.23) a piece. Post-transaction VISA Bao will become amalgamated with VISA Steel. The integration of the JV will improve cost and operational efficiency of the targets Ferro Chrome operations. VISA Steel is an Indian ferro chrome, special steel and metalugical coke manufacturer. It is feadquartered in Kolkata and has manufacturing facilities in Chhattisgarh and Odisha. The firm is listed in the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and the National Stock Exchange of India (NSE) and reported total consolidated revenus of INR 14.7bn (USD 245.3mn) for FY ended 31 March, 2015. Baosteel Group Corp is a China-based state-owned steel and iron manufacturer which specializes in carbon, stainless and special steel products. The firm currently has over 130,000 employees and was founded in 1978. Baosteel Group reported consolidated total revenues of CNY 2bn (USD 319.5mn) for FY ended 31 December 2013.

As a result of the transaction, Ozdogan concentrated 8.96% in the company. JKX Oil & Gas provides the full-cycle E&P value chain of exploration, appraisal, and development through to production. The company's principal oil and gas assets are located in Ukraine and Russia, with additional in Hungary and Slovakia. In 2014, the group produced 3.6mn barrels of oil equivalent and its 2P reserves stood at 97.7mn barrels of oil equivalent. Note: The deal value is calculated based on the closing share price of JKX Oil & Gas on the LSE as at 19 August 2015.

110112 21/08/2015 丹麦 Saxo Bank 少数股权购买 Sinarmas Group 印度尼西亚 Kim Fournais - private investor; Lars Seier Christensen - private investor; Undisclosed investor(s) 投资银行及其他金融投资活动 (523) 142.17 (官方数据) 9.9 Indonesian conglomerate Sinar Mas Group has acquired a 9.9% stake in Denmark-based Saxo Bank for a total consideration of DKK 951mn (USD 142.2mn), the latter disclosed. The purchase price values the target at DKK 9.6bn (USD 1.4bn). As per deal terms, the target's co-founders Kim Fournais and Lars Seier Christensen sold a total of 7% stake in Saxio Bank while other minority shareholders sold their combined 2.9% interest in the company. Kim Fournais and Lars Seier, together with private equity firm TPG Capital, will remain as the controlling shareholders of the target following deal completion. The transaction is in line with the strategy of both parties to strengthen its asset trading platform in the Asian markets. Saxo Bank, founded in 1992, provides online multi-asset platforms to private investors and institutional clients. Through its platform, clients are able to trade foreign exchange, CFDs, ETFs, stocks, futures, options and other derivatives. The company also offers portfolio and fund management as well as banking services. Saxo Bank had total assets of DKK 38.2bn (USD 5.7bn) as of 30 June 2015. Sinar Mas Group, through its units, manufactures pulp and paper products, products palm-based consumer products, provides financial services, and develops properties. The company also provides telecommunications services in addition to operating power plants.

ORIGINAL: Global energy and commodities firm Vitol Group announced that it will acquire the 50% that it does not own in Dutch oil storage company VTTI BV for a total cash consideration of USD 830mn. Vitol will acquire 250 shares of VTTI from Malaysian ship operator MISC Bhd, its partner in the joint venture. The seller's original cost of investment in VTTI was USD 882.1mn. The company plans to use the proceeds from the sale to repay its bank borrowing and for future acquisitions and investments. The sale will enable MISC Bhd to focus on its core business, which is energy petroleum shipping. VTTI operates and manages a network of oil product storage terminals internationally. It has a total gross storage capacity if 54 million barrels, including the assets currently under construction. VTTI posted net profits of USD 41.8mn for FY ended 31 December 2014. Vitol Group, founded in 1966, trades a portfolio of commodities including crude oil, oil products, LPG, LNG, natural gas, coal, electricity, agricultural products, metals and carbon emissions. Vito Group has revenues of USD 270bn in 2014. MISC Bhd owns and operates LNG carriers, petroleum and chemical tankers, as well as offshore floating facilities and tank terminals. The company also provides maritime education training and innovation. Its revenues amounted to MYR 9.3bn (USD 2.7bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014.

117092 20/08/2015 塞尔维亚 Konzul doo 收购 Ameropa Holding AG 瑞士 Dragan Slijepcevic - private investor 农畜产品批发 (4225) 　 　 　 Swiss agribusiness company Ameropa Holding announced it has acquired a majority stake in Serbian grain and fertilizer trader Konzul d.o.o. from local entrepreneur Dragan Slijepcevic, for an undisclosed amount. Having been a minority shareholder until now, Ameropa disclosed it has increased its shareholdings to 70% in Konzul, while Mr. Dragan Slijepcevic holding the remainder 30%. The acquisition is in line with Ameropa's strategy to strengthen its grain and fertilizer operations across the region. Ameropa already has offices, elevators, and port operations in Croatia, Serbia, Hungary, Romania, and Bulgaria. Konzul owns and operates 5 elevators across Serbia with a total storage capacity of 85.000 mt, and is Ameropa's main customer for fertilizers in Serbia, as well as its main supplier of grains from Serbia. Konzul is managed by Mr. Dragan Slijepcevic, and employs 85 people. Konzul was founded in 1997, and has been working as a long-term partner of Ameropa since 2007. Ameropa Holding, founded in 1984, is present in 30 countries globally. The firm trades in agricultural products, as well as artificial fertilisers and chemicals. The group employs around 4,900 people worldwide and annually sells 10 million tons of grain, as well as 10 million tons of fertilisers.

Mega Cineplex Prai, established in 2004, holds 6 screens with a total of 1,420 seats. Mega Cineplex Langkawi, established in 2011, holds 3 screens with a total of 536 seats, and is the only cinema on the island of Langkawi. Mega Cineplex Bertam, established in 2013, has 4 screens with a total of 756 seats. mm2 Asia Ltd produces movies and entertainment programs for television stations, advertisers and online media. BCP said that it will invest MAD 240mn (USD 24.6mn) in a capital increase of BIA-Niger which will give it a 53% stake in the latter. Also, BCP plans to acquire additional shares in BIA-Niger from local investors, thus increasing its stake to some 70%. Under the deal, the government in Niger agreed to support billions of CFA francs of BIA-Niger bad loans. BIA-Niger was founded in 1944 and has a total of 16 branches, including seven in Niger's capital Niamey. In 2012, the bank was acquired by the government of Niger. Banque Centrale Populaire was established in 1926 and provides a wide range of services including daily liquidity management, funding of individual and professional projects, asset management, insurance, investment banking, brokerage, counselling and financial engineering, etc. The group has a network of over 1,320 points of sales and more than 1,600 ATMs. BCP is listed on the Casablanca Bourse and posted a net profit of MAD 3.26bn (USD 383.9mn) in 2014.

Financial details on the deal were not disclosed. The facility is located in the city of Barquisimeto in northwestern Venezuela and ceased operations in March 2013. 110169 20/08/2015 捷克共和国; 波兰 Orlen KolTrans Sp z oo 收购 PKP Cargo SA 波兰 PKN Orlen SA 铁路运输业 (482) 48.6 (官方数据) 99.85 UPDATE: On 16 November 2015, PKP Cargo said that it has signed a conditional agreement to acquire OrlenKoltrans for PLN 192.3mn (EUR 43.4mn). On the same day, PKP signed another conditional agreement to acquire assets of Polish company Euronaft Trzebinia for PLN 59.4mn (EUR 14mn). ORIGINAL: Polish freight rail company PKP Cargo will acquire local peer OrlenKoltrans from Polish oil and gas giant PKN Orlen SA for an undisclosed amount, Polish railway news portal kurierkolejowy.eu reported. PKP Cargo will take over the assets of OrlenKoltrans in Poland and the Czech Republic, including locomotives and rail tankers, as well as the commercial contracts. The deal is subject to the approval of antitrust authorities in Poland and the Czech Republic. OrlenKoltrans has a 1.26% market share in terms of the weight of goods transported by rail, while PKP Cargo has nearly 48%. Orlen KolTrans currently has a fleet of 35 locomotives and 700 rail tankers. It has an electric and combustion modern fleet, transporting around 200,000 tons of petrochemicals each month. The company employs over 300 people. PKP Cargo transports various types of goods and raw materials, with a growing volume of intermodal transports. The company employs some 27,600 people and it transports more than 100 million tons of goods annually. It recorded revenues of PLN 4.16bn (USD 1.32bn) and a net profit of PLN 59mn (USD 18.7mn) in 2014. Recently, PKP Cargo has acquired the remaining 44.44% stake in Polish logistics services firm PS Trade Trans for PLN 40mn (EUR 9.61mn). In late December 2014, it has also agreed to acquire an 80% stake in Czech peer Advanced World Transport (AWT) for PLN 445mn (EUR 103.2mn). PKN Orlen is among Central Europe's largest refiners of crude oil. The company specialises in processing crude oil into gasolines, diesel oil, fuel oil and aviation fuel and it is also a producer of petrochemicals. It operates six refineries as well as the region's largest network of around 2,700 modern service stations located in Poland, Germany, the Czech Republic and Lithuania. The total deep processing capacity of the refineries reaches more than 30 million tons annually. The group has around 22,000 employees and for 2014 it posted revenues of PLN 106.8bn (EUR 25.5bn) and a loss of PLN 5.82bn (EUR 1.39bn).
110132 20/08/2015 新西兰 Scott Technology Ltd 收购 JBS SA 巴西 Existing shareholders 金属加工机械制造 (3335); 机械及办公设备制造 (333); 建筑，工程及相关服务 (5413) 25.45 (DW 估计) 50.1 Brazilian meat processor JBS SA announced that it intends to acquire a 50.1% stake in New Zealand-based engineering company Scott Technology Ltd through a combination of private placement and purchase of existing shares. The transaction is subject to regulatory approvals and the fulfilment of certain conditions. Under the agreement, JBS SA will acquire 10 million newly issued shares at NZD 1.39 (USD 0.92) each, and will offer to purchase some of the existing shareholders' shares at the same price. Also, Scott Technology plans to carry out a one for eight non-renounceable rights issue at NZD 1.39 (USD 0.92) for shareholders who do not want to sell but would like to increase their shareholding. In addition, Scott Technology may issue additional shares to JBS SA in order to increase the latter's interest up to 50.1%. On 20 August, Scott had around 45.5 million shares outstanding. Based on DealWatch estimates and assuming that only 10 million new shares will be issued by Scott, the price of the deal could be as low as NZD 38.6mn (USD 25.5mn). Scott will use the funds obtained from the operations to reduce debt and support future growth. The company is already a key supplier of JBS. Scott Technology Ltd, founded in 1913 in Dunedin, New Zealand, engineers, manufactures and sells various automotive machinery used in home appliances, meat processing, and other areas. It exports to New Zealand, North America, South America, Australia, the Pacific Islands, Asia, Russia, Africa, the Middle East and Europe. The company reported net sales of NZD 60mn (USD 40mn) and a net income of NZD 2.5mn (USD 1.68mn) for 2014. JBS SA, founded in 1953 in Sao Paulo, Brazil, produces and commercializes meat and meat products in the local market and internationally. It reported consolidated net sales of BRL120bn (USD 30.45bn) and a net income of BRL 2bn (USD 575mn) for 2014. Note 1: The deal value was estimated based on the assumption that 10 million new shares will be issued by Scott and JBS will control 50.1% of the target company (roughly 27.8 million shares). Note 2: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis, accounting for the 10 million newly issued shares. Note 3: Scott's balance sheet data (Net Debt, Book Value) is as of 28 February 2015. __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A processadora de carne brasileira JBS SA anunciou ontem a intenção de comprar uma participação de 50.1% na empresa de robótica inovadora Scott Technology Ltd, baseada na Nova Zelândia. A transação vai ser feita através de uma combinação entre colocação privada de ações e compra de ações existentes. O acordo está sujeito á aprovação societária e ao cumprimento de determinadas condições. Nos termos do acordo, a JBS SA vai adquirir 10 milhões de novas ações emitidas, cotadas a NZD 1.39 (USD 0.92) por ação, e ainda vai sugerir aos acionistas atuais que vendam parte das ações que detêm, pelo mesmo preço. A Scott Technology mantém a possibilidade de emitir mais ações para a JBS SA até esta atingir os desejados 50.1%. No dia 20 de Agosto a Scott teve aproximadamente 45.5 milhões de ações existentes. Com base nas estimativas do DealWatch e assumindo que a Scott só vai emitir 10 milhões de novas ações, o valor da deal vai ser NZD 38.6mn (USD 25.5mn). A Scott vai utilizar os fundos procedentes das operações para reduzir a dívida e investir no seu desenvolvimento futuro. A empresa é atualmente um dos fornecedores principais da JBS. A Scott Technology Ltd foi constituída em 1913 em Dunedin, Nova Zelândia. A empresa opera no fabrico e comercialização de eletrodomésticos e máquinas para processamento de carne, entre outros. A companhia exporta os seus produtos para Nova Zelândia, as Américas do Norte e do Sul, Austrália, As Ilhas Pacíficas, Ásia, Rússia, África, o Médio Oriente e Europa. A empresa declarou vendas consolidadas líquidas de NZD 60mn (USD 40mn) e resultado líquido de impostos de NZD 2.5mn (USD 1.68mn) para 2014. A JBS SA foi constituída em 1953 em São Paulo, Brasil. A empresa concentra as suas atividades na produção e comercialização de carne e produtos à base de carne, posicionando-se no mercado nacional e internacional. Para 2014 declarou vendas consolidadas líquidas de BRL120bn (USD 30.45bn) e resultado líquido de impostos de BRL 2bn (USD 575mn). Note 1: O deal value foi estimado com base no pressuposto que a Scott vai emitir 10 milhões novas ações e a IBS SA vai ter uma participação acionária de 50.1% na empresa (cerca de 27.8 milhões de ações). Note 2: Todos os múltiplos são estimados em uma base pre-dinheiro. Note 3: O Balanço de Scott (Dívida Líquida, Book Value) é de 28 de Fevereiro de 2015.
110141 20/08/2015 黑山 Institut Dr Simo Milosevic AD Igalo 私有化 International Wellness Group Ltd 英国 Privatisation and Capital Investment Council 医院服务 (622) 11.08 (官方数据) 56.4806 Montenegro's Privatisation Council announced that it has sold a 56.5% stake in local rehabilitation and spa centre Institut Dr. Simo Milosevic AD Igalo for EUR 10mn (USD 11mn) to U.K.-based holding company International Wellness Group Ltd. International Wellness Group was the sole bidder for the spa institute in a fourth public auction. As part of its offer, the buyer committed to invest another EUR 50mn in the next five years, as well as to carry out an employment program and ensure the application of the existing collective contract within three years of acquiring the institute. According to the agreement, the buyer will maintain the core activity of the institute and will develop it into a well-known health centre, and a health tourism brand in Montenegro. Founded in 1949, Dr. Simo Milosevic Institute engages in physical medicine, rehabilitation and rheumatology and is one of the largest institutions for multidisciplinary spa treatment in the Balkans, with more than 300 employees. It was a pioneer of modern physical and preventive medicine, rehabilitation, thalassotherapy, and wellness for children, adults and seniors.
110052 20/08/2015 新加坡; 新西兰 Zelam 收购 Lonza 瑞士 Undisclosed 农药及其他农业化学品生产 (32532) 　 　 100 Swiss-based and Singapore-listed pharmaceutical, biotech and specialty ingredients supplier Lonza said it acquired New Zealand-based research-focused chemical company Zelam for an undisclosed price. Zelam also develops and manufactures products for wood protection. It has facilities based in New Plymouth with field research and timber facilities nearby in New Zealand, as well as in Australia and the United States. The company employs 45. The acquisition is in line with Lonza's growth strategy for agro ingredients and provides entry into a new market. Founded in 1897, Lonza has more than 40 manufacturing and R&D facilities and approximately 9,800 employees worldwide. The company is based in Basel, Switzerland, and is listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange and has a secondary listing on the Singapore Exchange. It generated sales of about CHF 3.64bn (USD 3.73bn) in 2014.
110104 20/08/2015 美国 Carbon3D 少数股权购买 Google Ventures; Yuri Milner - private investor; Reinet Investments; Fidelity National Information Services; Sequoia Capital; Silver Lake; Northgate Capital 美国; 俄罗斯; 卢森堡 　 计算机与电子产品制造业 (334) 100 (官方数据) 　 U.S.-based industrial 3D printers producer Carbon3D raised USD 100mn in a C investment round, led by Google Ventures, with the participation of Russian tycoon Yuri Milner, techcrunch.com reported. Other companies that joined the round were Reinet Investments and F.I.S., as well as existing investors Sequoia Capital, Silver Lake Kraftwerk, and Northgate Capital. Carbon3D’s industrial-scale printers are currently in beta version and are expected to be launched on the market later in 2015. Carbon3D was founded in 2013 and is based in the Silicon Valley. The company produces industrial 3D printers, powered by photochemical process which create objects from liquid polymers. Carbon3D already co-operates with large manufacturers in the automotive, aerospace and consumer electronics sectors.

China Cinda will also take over the project liabilities for an aggregate consideration of CNY 5.9bn (USD 926.7mn). The project has a planned gross floor area of 510,000 m2, comprising shopping centres, an office building with twin towers, apartments and hotels. China Cinda is engaged in distressed asset management and provision of customised financial solutions and asset management services. Singapore-listed GuocoLand is engaged in real estate development and investments, hotel operations, property management and relevant businesses. The parent company of GuocoLand is Hong Kong-listed Guoco Group, engaged in proprietary investments, property development and investments, hotel and leisure related businesses and financial services. Guoco Group is part of Hong Leong Group, one of the largest corporations in Southeast Asia.

Other investors included the U.S. PE and VC firms Omidyar Network and QED Investors, as well as angel investors. Existing investors including Argentinean venture capital firm Kaszek Ventures, Brazilian business development company e.Bricks Digital, and U.S. investment firm Valor Capital Group LLC also participated in the funding round. The stake acquired was not disclosed. GuiaBolso will use the funds to accelerate growth, aiming to reach five million users by the end of 2016. GuiaBolso, created in 2012, by private investors Benjamin Gleason, Thiago Alvarez, and Inaja Azevedo specializes in the development and implementation of an online financial advice platform for personal financial planning and management, financial education and consulting services.

According to various media reports including CNBC, The Financial Times and The Wall Street Journal, the target raised an amount of USD 100mn. The deal marks Tata Opportunity Fund's first investment into an international firm. It comes after the Uber's announcement from July 2015 that it has raised USD 1bn funding to expand in India. Uber Technologies operates international ride sharing mobile application Uber. It is present in over 60 countries and 330 cities globally. The firm was established in 2010 and is headquartered in San Francisco. Tata Opportunities Fund is a sector and stage agnostic mutual fund, which focuses on making medium and long term investments in Tata Entities and Indian businesses. It is managed by Tata Capital and typically invests USD 30mn to USD 200mn.

Cal-Comp Electronics subscribed to 32,000,000 new shares of the target at a price of TWD 14 (USD 0.5) per share. The acquisition is aligned with the buyer's strategy to expand its resources in the field of integrated circuit (IC) packaging technology and IC and printed circuit boards research and development. Dawning Leading Technology provides SD and micro SD flash memory cards, chip on board USD flash drives, multi-chip packaging, thin small outline package (TSOP) and quad flat no-leads (QFN) package. The company also offers test and turn-key solutions. Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) PCL produces electronics products for major brands such as Seagate, Western Digital, Hitachi, Panasonic and Hewlett Packard among others. It manufactures computer peripherals as well as telecommunications products. Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) PCL had revenues of THB 150.3bn (USD 4.6bn) in 2014.

Soompi is the longest-running English online media providing coverage of Korean pop culture. Founded in 1998, Soompi publishes latest news on Korean celebrities, music, TV shows, movies, and style. Viki offers TV shows, movies and other premium content, translated into more than 200 languages by a community of fans. It has 40 million viewers each month and was acquired by Rakuten in September 2013. Rakuten operates and manages one of the largest e-commerce sites in Japan. It also provides internet banking, online brokerage, credit card payment services as well as online insurance. Rakuten employs 12,000 people, and posted revenues of JPY 598.6bn (USD 4.97bn) in 2014. Crunchyroll is U.S.-based website and international online community focused on video streaming East Asian media. It is funded by The Chernin Group and TV Tokyo.

In 2013, Al Ayuni acquired French producer of filling equipment for LPG cylinders Siraga. Seera purchased Kosan Crisplant in 2008. Kosan Crisplant supplies equipment, plants and systems for filling and maintenance of LP gas cylinders and offers after-sales and engineering services, facility management, and supply of components for the gas industry. Al Ayuni is a holding company operating in eleven business sectors: highway, railway and building constructions, equipment services, children's education, information technology, marble and mining, pre cast concreting, water works, gas and energy services, real estate development, vehicles services and manpower services. The funding saw the buyers infuse an amount less than USD 20mn each. The Samsung and Wipro plan to use Vicarious for document recognition and smart device AI integration. The investment comes after a USD 12mn investment round led by ABB Ltd on November 2014. It offers engineering, financial and information technology services to over 900 clients in 61 countries. It portfolio consist of investments in North America, Europe and Asia. The firm typically invest around USD 2mn to USD 5mn in a funding round.
110025 19/08/2015 挪威 PL410 oil exploration licence 少数股权购买 Lime Petroleum 挪威 Lundin Petroleum AB 天然原油的开采 (21111) 　 　 30 Norway-based Lime Petroleum, owned by Singapore-listed firm Rex International Holding and Malaysia's Hibiscus Petroleum, entered into an agreement with Sweden's Lundin Petroleum to acquire 30% interest in licence PL410 in the North Sea, Rex International said. The transfer is subject to authority's approval. Upon completion of the transaction, Lundin, the operator of the licence, will hold 52.35%, Lime Norway will have 30% and Statoil Petroleum will have a 17.65% interest in the PL410 licence. The licence is located south of the Edvard Grieg field on the Utsira High in the North Sea in water depth of about 100 metres. This is Lime Norway's third farm-in agreement with Lundin in a prospective area close to infrastructure. The other two licences are PL338C and PL544. Lime Petroleum is 65% owned by Rex International and 35% by Malaysian investment holding company Hibiscus Petroleum, focusing on oil and gas sector. Rex International has stakes in exploration assets in the Middle East, Norway, the USA, Trinidad & Tobago and Australia. The company owns a key set of proprietary and innovative exploration technologies originating from its Swedish founders. Lundin is an independent oil and gas exploration and production company with core operations in Norway and South East Asia.

Metus current CEO will own the remaining 30% of the company. The acquisition will expand Serendipity's operations in the elevator and the electricity sector on the international market. Metus was founded in 2005. It is engaged in the installation, modernisation, service, maintenance and repair of elevators and escalators. The company has operations and customers in countries including Germany, Austria and Benelux. It has annual revenues of approximately SEK 90mn (USD 10.5mn) with a net profit of about SEK 11mn (USD 1.3mn). Serendipity is active in venture management, technical services and corporate services. Since its establishment in 2004, the company has founded and managed more than 15 technology companies within clean tech, life sciences, materials engineering, IT and medical technology, as well as managed over 30 projects for external clients. Its preference shares are traded on NASDAQ OMX's First North market.

110095 19/08/2015 俄罗斯 Akrilan 收购 Russian Nanotechnology Corporation (RUSNANO) 俄罗斯 Trimdon Management Ltd; Company Kardin Properties Ltd 油漆、涂料及胶粘剂的制造 (3255) 　 　 20 Russian state-run technology corporation Rusnano has obtained antitrust approval to acquire additional 20% in leading local producer of aqueous polymer dispersions Akrilan, according to an announcement of the Federal Antimonopoly Service. Financial details of the transaction were not disclosed. According to data of EMIS corporate database, Rusnano currently holds 49.95% in the target. The other two shareholders are Belize-based Trimdon Management Ltd and British Virgin Islands-based Company Kardin Properties Ltd. Akrilan became part of Rusnano's portfolio back in 2012. Vladimir-based Akrilan launched production in 2009. The company manufactures aqueous polymer dispersions which serve as a basis for the production of paints, varnishes, sealants, adhesives and mortars. According to data of Rusnano, the targeted market share of the company in 2015 is 40%. The Akrilan project is aimed at replacing the imported aqueous dispersions locally. Rusnano is 100% state-owned corporation established after the reorganisation of Russian Corporation of Nanotechnologies. The company provides funding to nanotechnology projects in Russia as well as abroad.

GrabTaxi will use the funds raised to develop its technology services in Southeast Asia and to invest in engineering offices. GrabTaxi, founded in 2012, provides a taxi-dispatch service with GPS enhancements that allow passengers to hail the nearest taxi available. The company uses smartphone-based technologies to receive bookings in Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, Singapore, Vietnam and Indonesia. Didi Kuaidi is a taxi hailing application firm that provides car for-hire services such as taxi and chauffeured limo services in China and Hong Kong. China Investment Corp is a state-owned investment firm that invests in public companies and fixed-income securities, and manages local and overseas assets. Coatue Management acts as a global investment firm focuses on investing in public and private companies from the technology, media and telecommunication industries.

ORIGINAL: Malaysian investment holding company Acoustech Bhd has entered into an agreement to acquire the total capital of local property developer JM Cemerlang Sdn Bhd for a total cash consideration of MYR 15.5mn (USD 3.8mn), the buyer announced. Acoustech will acquire 100 shares of the target from private investors Teo Chai Hock and Lee Boon Leng. In addition, Teo Chai Hock will provide a profit guarantee of MYR 18.5mn (USD 4.5mn) that represent the minimum estimated total forecasted and projected cumulative profit after tax of the target for next four consecutive financial years which will end in 31 December 2019. The deal is in line with the buyer's strategy to strengthen its long-term growth prospects and its earning base. The acquisition also marks the entry of the company to the industrial property market that will ensure that it will not solely depend on its existing core business of manufacturing speaker units. JM Cemerlang Sdn Bhd acts as a property developer which is currently planning to develop a parcel of land that consists of 81 units of cluster and detached factory. The company incurred a net loss of MYR 1.7mn (USD 527,729) in 2014. Acoustech Bhd manufactures audio speakers, woofers, water dispensers and chemical paints for industrial and electronics components. The company is listed on Bursa Malaysia and its revenues were MYR 152mn (USD 43.4mn) for FY ended 31 December 2014.

The round was also joined by current investors, Israeli VC fund Singulariteam and Samsung Ventures. So far, StoreDot has attracted USD 66mn of funding in total, including another USD 10mn from Abramovich's Millhouse Capital in May 2014. The current proceeds will be used for development of high-speed charging car battery for electric vehicles, as well as for employing new people and expansion of the number of laboratories. Founded in 2012, StoreDot has created a new-generation technology, based on its discovery of self-assembled Nanodots of biological origin. Representing elementary biological building blocks, these multifunctional Nanodots are at the core of several patented innovations by StoreDot, and constitute the future nanotechnology and advanced nano-photonic devices, including smartphones, TV's, energy storage devices and more.

110078 18/08/2015 新加坡 Paywhere Pte Ltd 收购 Philippine Long Distance Telephone Co 菲律宾 　 软件出版 (5112) 5 (官方数据) 100 The Philippine Long Distance Telephone Co (PLDT) announced that it has acquired Singapore-based e-commerce platform Paywhere Pte Ltd for a total cash consideration of USD 5mn. The acquisition was carried out by Voyager Innovations Inc, the digital unit of PLDT. As per deal terms, USD 3mn of the purchase consideration will be paid in cash while the remaining USD 2mn will be payable as deferred consideration. The acquisition is aligned with the buyer's strategy to grow its digital operations. Paywhere Pte Ltd is an e-commerce platform that operates the online store builder Tackthis. Tackthis offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) model that enables businesses to set online store. PLDT provides fixed line, wireless, information and communication technology in the Philippines. The company operates fibre optic backbone, fixed line, cellular and satellite networks in the country. It also offers communications infrastructure and services for internet applications, Internet protocol-based solutions and multimedia content delivery. The company is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and Philippine Stock Exchange, and its revenues were PHP 171bn (USD 3.8bn) for FY ended 31 December 2014.
110068 18/08/2015 肯尼亚; 加拿大; 埃塞俄比亚 Africa Oil Corp 少数股权购买 International Finance Corporation (IFC) 国际的 　 石油和天然气的开采 (211) 50 (官方数据) 6.83 Africa-focused oil and gas exploration company Africa Oil Corp announced a USD 50mn private share placement to International Finance Corp (IFC), the investment arm of the World Bank. IFC will subscribe for 31,169,048 shares in Africa Oil at CAD 2.10 (USD 1.60) apiece and thus get a 6.83% stake in the company. Africa Oil plans to use the proceeds to fund its oil and gas exploration, appraisal and development activities, as well as general working capital requirements, primarily aimed at advancing the appraisal and development of the Blocks 10BB and 13T blocks in the South Lokichar Basin in Kenya. Africa Oil Corp is an oil and gas company with assets in Kenya, Somalia and Ethiopia. The company is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange and on Nasdaq Stockholm and had a market capitalisation of CAD 842mn (USD 643.3mn) on 19 August 2015. International Finance Corp is the largest global development institution focused exclusively on the private sector in developing countries. Since 1956, the organisation has invested USD 2bn in 75 retail projects in more than 30 countries. Note 1: All multiples are calculated on a pre-money basis. Note 2: Intangible exploration assets were not excluded in calculation of book value.
110053 18/08/2015 俄罗斯 Uraltransbank 少数股权购买 Sevilon; Modern Forestry Technologies; Fund for Development of Entrepreneurship 俄罗斯 European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) 商业银行及其他信贷服务 (522) 　 　 25 The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) has sold its 25% plus one voting share interest in Russian lender Uraltransbank and exited the company's list of shareholders, according to a disclosure statement of the target. The transaction price was not specified. The buyers of the stake are three companies based in Yekaterinburg: investment firm Sevilon which raised its stake from 1.76% to 8.76%, as well as corporate consulting services providers Modern Forestry Technologies (8.99%) and Fund for Development of Entrepreneurship (8.99%). The majority holder in Uraltransbank, CEO Valery Zavodov (56.56%), holds 19% and 15% in Modern Forestry Technologies and Fund for Development of Entrepreneurship respectively, Kommersant daily reported. Further 3% are in the hands of Zavodov's wife and son. EBRD acquired the stake back in 2004 with the aim to increase the bank's capital base and speed up its growth in terms of lending to private sector SMEs. Uraltransbank was set up in 1990 in Yekaterinburg and provides universal banking services. According to data of Banki.ru, the bank's net assets as of 1 August 2015 amounted to RUB 15.6bn (USD 257.8mn) which ranked the bank on 201st place among other Russian lenders. Own capital stood at RUB 1.46bn (USD 24.1mn).
110047 18/08/2015 捷克共和国 Inovac sro 收购 Stager Group 瑞士 　 塑料制品的制造 (3261) 　 　 100 Swiss packaging solutions provider Stager announced that it has acquired Czech peer Inovac for an undisclosed amount. The acquired company will be renamed to Stager Inovac Packaging. Inovac is based in Rokycany, western Czech Republic. It develops and manufactures vacuum-formed packaging solutions from plastics intended for the automotive, electro-technical and consumer industries. Following the deal, the company will relocate its office to production facility in Pilsen. Stager Group designs and manufactures transparent and thermoformed plastic packaging solutions including the use of composite materials for the confectionery/food, cosmetic, textile/non-food and technical industries. It has three manufacturing facilities in the UK, the Czech Republic and Switzerland. The company has over 40 years of experience and employs 200 people.

The proceeds of the round will be utilised to expand to the U.S and acquire new talent. The round comes after the target raised a total of INR 20mn (USD 310,000) in 2014. IntelligenceNODE is a marketing analytics firm which provides data driven reports and consulting services through its products iNCompetitor and iNOptimizer. It claims to have a total 60 clients locally and internationally. Orios Venture Partners is a venture capital and private equity firm focused on early-stage software and technology companies. Its portfolio includes Ola, Snaplion and Hashcube. New Enterprise Associates is a U.S.-based venture capital firm with a total committed capital of over USD 13bn that focuses in companies engaged in technology and healthcare sectors primarily on India and China.
110038 18/08/2015 巴西 Companhia Brasileira de Esterilizacao (CBE) 收购 Sterigenics International LLC 美国 Fundo de Investimento em Participações Gamma 医药制造 (3254); 科学研究与试验发展 (5417) 　 　 100 U.S. contract sterilisation services provider Sterigenics International announced the acquisition of Brazilian peer Companhia Brasileira de Esterilizacao (CBE) for an undisclosed amount. "This strategic geographic acquisition demonstrates our commitment to expanding our global footprint in order to meet our customers' growing needs', Sterigenics CEO Michael Mulhern said. Companhia Brasileira de Esterilizacao was founded in 1976 and is a provider of contract sterilisation, gamma technologies and medical isotopes. It was the first company in Brazil to employ gamma sterilisation methods and it offers solutions through the E-BEAM particle accelerator. Sterigenics International is a vertically integrated sterilisation company focused the provision of contract sterilisation and ionisation services for the medical device, pharmaceutical, food safety, and high-performance materials industries. The firm has 47 facilities in 13 countries across the Americas, Europe and Asia, Sterigenics is a portfolio company of U.S. private equity firms Warburg Pincus and GTCR.
109977 18/08/2015 中国 Assets of Camigo Media 收购 YuuZoo Corp Ltd 新加坡 Camigo Media 软件出版 (5112); 互联网出版与传播 (516) 　 　 100 Singapore-listed social e-commerce company YuuZoo Corporation said it has acquired key assets of Chinese mobile game developer Camigo Media for an undisclosed consideration in stock. The assets include user data for over 26 million users, 11 leading mobile games and the Camigo brand. Launched in 2010 and headquartered in Shanghai, Camigo is a leading developer and distributor of mobile games in China. Three of its mobile games have reached the number one position in the iOS Appstore in China, and reached 5.4 million monthly active users. The Camigo games acquired by YuuZoo also include seven educational games targeted at young children. The games, which teach mathematics and reading, will be integrated into the YuuKids platform, which YuuZoo plans to launch in China in 2015. The shares used for the payment represent less than one half of 1% of the issued shares of YuuZoo. Prior to the acquisition YuuZoo had over 90 million registered users in 164 countries. The company combines social networking, e-commerce and gaming in a mobile-optimised virtual shopping mall, where the consumer can access social networks, shops and entertainment products. It generated revenues of USD 37.7mn in 2014.

110020 18/08/2015 厄瓜多尔 Fideicomiso Pacific Plantations 收购 Buyer(s) unknown 　 VTB Group 水果和树生坚果的种植 (1113) 13.75 (市场估计) 100 Russian financial group VTB divested company Fideicomiso Pacific Plantations, an owner of banana plantations in Ecuador, to an undisclosed third party, according to the seller's Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements as of 30 June 2015 and information of Vedomosti daily. Fideicomiso had been reportedly obtained by VTB in June 2015 in a non-cash transaction. The net asset value of the company was then estimated at RUB 900mn (USD 13.8mn). The amount of the current transaction though has not been revealed. A representative of VTB, as cited by Vedomosti, explained that the asset was on the group's balance sheet as a result of “work with problematic debts”. According to information of the daily, Fideicomiso Pacific Plantations previously belonged to fruit producer and distributor JFC Group of Russian businessman Vladimir Kekhman which went bankrupt in February 2012 due to financial problems. In an earlier Vedomosti report from 2009, Kehman said that JFC holds more than 3,500 ha of plantations in Ecuador and 700 ha in Costa Rica. Since its establishment in 1990, VTB has grown into the second largest financial institution in Russia and the CIS.
110014 18/08/2015 阿根廷 Petroquimica Cuyo SAIC (Petrocuyo) 少数股权购买 YPF SA 阿根廷 Grupo Inversor Petroquimica SL 合成树脂、合成橡胶、人造纤维的制造 (3252) 　 (官方数据) 45.99 UPDATE: On 2 December 2015, YPF said that the transaction could not be completed in the specified time due to reasons foreign to the parties involved. According to sources, the deal failed to close because YPF could not meet the government's conditions requiring the company to fund the transaction with U.S. dollars, as YPF did not manage to secure the U.S. currency due to the foreign currency trade restrictions currently in place. ORIGINAL: Argentinean state-controlled oil and gas company YPF SA announced it has agreed to acquire a 45.99% stake in Argentinean polypropylene manufacturer Petroquimica Cuyo SAIC (Petrocuyo) from Spanish investment firm Grupo Inversor Petroquimica SL (GIP) for USD 50mn on a debt free and cash free basis. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals. Following completion of the deal, YPF and GIP will jointly control 92% of Petrocuyo. Simultaneously, on 18 August 2015, YPF and GIP agreed to acquire in equal share the entire 100% interest in Argentinean polypropylene manufacturer Petroken Petroquimica Ensenada SA (PESA) held by Netherlands-based plastics, chemical and refining firm LyondellBasell Industries NV for USD 145mn. Petroquimica Cuyo is engaged in the production of polypropylene. The company offers homopolymers, block copolymers, random copolymers, and special polyolefins. YPF SA is an integrated oil & gas company engaged in the exploration and production of hydrocarbons, petroleum products, natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas, crude oil products and derivatives, as well as petrochemical products. The company reported sales revenues of ARS 141.9bn (USD 15.4bn) and net income of ARS 9bn (USD 974mn) for 2014. Grupo Inversor Petroquimica is an investment company focused on the petrochemical sector.

The company provides agronomy services, inputs, and crop marketing solutions. It also manufactures micro nutrition applications. Kazgod employs 200 people and services some 2,600 customers across an established direct farm and retail distribution network throughout central and eastern Poland. It generated revenues of PLN 837mn (EUR 193.3mn) and EBIT of PLN 5.1 (EUR 1.18mn) in 2014. Origin Enterprises is focused on the provision of on-farm advice and the supply of agri-inputs. The company has manufacturing and distribution operations in Ireland, the U.K., Poland and Ukraine. Its shares are listed on the Irish ESM and London AIM markets. For 2014, it had revenues of EUR 1.4bn and net income of EUR 63.5mn. Origin Enterprises's majority shareholder is the Swiss-Irish global bakery group Aryzta AG with a stake of 68.1%. 110012 18/08/2015 阿根廷 Petroken Petroquimica Ensenada SA (PESA) 收购 YPF SA; Grupo Inversor Petroquimica SL 阿根廷; 西班牙 LyondellBasell Industries NV 合成树脂、合成橡胶、人造纤维的制造 (3252) 162 (市场估计) 100 UPDATE: On 2 December 2015, YPF said that the transaction could not be completed in the specified time due to reasons foreign to the parties involved. According to sources, the deal failed to close because YPF could not meet the government's conditions requiring the company to fund the transaction with U.S. dollars, as YPF did not manage to secure the U.S. currency due to the foreign currency trade restrictions currently in place. ORIGINAL: Dutch plastics, chemical and refining firm LyondellBasell Industries NV announced it has agreed to sell its 100% interest in Argentinean polypropylene manufacturer Petroken Petroquimica Ensenada SA (PESA) to Argentinean state-controlled oil and gas company YPF SA and Spanish investment firm Grupo Inversor Petroquimica SL (GIP) for an enterprise value of USD 145mn. YPF and GIP will each acquire an equal share of 50% in Petroken. The seller expects to receive cash proceeds of USD 162mn. Tim Roberts, Executive Vice President of LyondellBasell, said that the sale is part of the company's long-term growth strategy to focus on regions and assets generating maximum value-creation for its shareholders. The transaction is subject to regulatory and other approvals, and is expected to close in late 2015. Simultaneously, on 18 August 2015, YPF said it has also agreed to acquire a 45.99% stake in Argentinean polypropylene producer Petroquimica Cuyo SAIC (Petrocuyo) from GIP for USD 50mn. Following this deal, subject to approvals, YPF and GIP will jointly control 92% of Petrocuyo. YPF used a loan granted from HSBC in both deals. Petroken is engaged in the production of polypropylene, and operates a 180 kiloton polypropylene plant located in the Argentinean city Ensenada, Buenos Aires province. YPF SA is an integrated oil & gas company engaged in the exploration and production of hydrocarbons, petroleum products, natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas, crude oil products and derivatives, as well as petrochemical products. The company reported sales revenues of ARS 141.9bn (USD 15.4bn) and a net income of ARS 9bn (USD 974mn) for 2014. Grupo Inversor Petroquimica is an investment company focused on the petrochemical sector. Note: The deal value (consideration paid) and the net debt are estimated based on the disclosed enterprise value of USD 145mn and the proceeds for LyondellBasell Industries of USD 162mn.

The capital raised will be used to expand its geographic presence in the U.S. Post-transaction, Dayakar Puskoor from Naya Ventures will join the targets board of directors. HyperVerge Inc is an India and U.S-based photo recognition software development firm if focuses on developing artificial intelligence that can recognize, classify and process images. It was founded in 2014 and has offices in California and Chennai. New Enterprise Associates is a U.S.-based venture capital firm with a total committed capital of over USD 13bn that focuses in companies engaged in technology and healthcare sectors primarily on India and China. Naya Ventures is a U.S and India-based venture capital firm which focuses on technology firms in the mobile and cloud verticals. Its portfolio includes Boxfish, Zoomingo, Motivity Labs and KeepTrax. Milliway Ventures is a U.S-based venture capital firm which focuses in early stage technology companies. Its notable investments include Snapdeal, facebook and India Infoline.

The site has 100,000 merchant partners and 30 million users across 5,000 cities. The company is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and booked revenues of USD 12.3bn for its FY ended 31 March 2015. Softbank is a Japanese holding company, which primarily provides mobile and fixed-line communications and internet services internationally through its subsidiaries. It employs a total of around 69,000 people in 769 subsidiaries worldwide. Softbank reported consolidated total net profit of USD 6.3bn for FY ended 31 March 2015. Mann Hummel, founded in 1941, develops, produces and commercializes complex automotive filter systems (air and water filtering systems, etc.). The company employs 16,000 people at more than 60 locations worldwide. Its revenues reached EUR 2.8bn in 2014.

The group operates in Brazil, Chile and Colombia in the oil, energy, offshore industry, logistics and mining sectors. Upon completion of the buy-back, all the target shares will be cancelled by FCL. After the cancellation of the shares, Freeman Financial Corp will become the sole owner of FCL. Completion of the deal is subject to customary closing conditions. The deal is in line with Freeman Financial Corp's strategy to strengthen its control over FCL. FCL engages in provision of securities brokerage services, insurance brokerage and financial planning, corporate finance advisory, trading of securities, provision of finance, as well as investment holding. Upon completion of the deal, the buyer will hold a 45% stake in the target. Completion of the transaction is subject to customary closing conditions. The company engages in hospital investment management, medical equipment leasing, asset management, healthcare industry investment, technology service, technology consulting and others. Sinopharm is a Hong Kong-listed group, focused on thee distribution and wholesale of pharmaceutical and healthcare products.
111027 17/08/2015 德国 FFG Werke GmbH 少数股权购买 Good Friend International Holdings Inc 香港 Existing shareholders 金属加工机械制造 (3335) 2.6 (官方数据) 25.5 Chinese computer numerical control (CNC) machine tools producer Good Friend International Holdings Inc said it agreed to acquire a 25.5% stake in German machine tools company FFG Werke for EUR 2.3mn (USD 2.6mn). Sellers on the deal are Fair Friend Enterprise Company Limited and World Ten Limited. Fair Friend Enterprise Company Limited is the controlling shareholder of the purchaser with a 57.5% stake. Upon completion of the deal, Good Friend International Holdings Inc will hold a 39% stake in the target. Completion of the deal is subject to shareholders approval. The acquisition is in line with buyer's future business development strategy. FFG Werke focuses on the production and sale machine tools and production systems. The company was established in 2013. Good Friend International Holdings Inc is active in design and production of CNC machine tools, construction of three-dimensional car parking garage structures and design and assembling of forklift trucks.
110261 17/08/2015 俄罗斯 Philips and Optogan 少数股权购买 Royal Philips NV 荷兰 Optogan 半导体及相关设备制造业 (334413); 照明器具制造 (3351) 　 49 Dutch electronics major Royal Philips, via subsidiary Philips Lighting holding BV, has obtained antitrust approval to acquire the rights to determine the business activity of St Petersburg-based LED products maker Philips and Optogan, according to a resolution of the Federal Antimonopoly Service (FAS). Philips and Optogan is a joint venture between Royal Philips Electronics (51%) and Russian LED products solutions producer ZAO Optogan (49%). According to a report of Interfax, the FAS resolution actually means that Philips is to acquire Optogan’s stake in the JV. The reasons for the transaction and its financial terms were not disclosed. Interfax notes that Philips and Optogan has ceased the production of LED diodes and street lighting equipment. Philips and Optogan was set up in April 2012 to enter the LED road lighting market and to support the energy efficiency projects of the Russian government.
110071 17/08/2015 俄罗斯 ATO 收购 Bipek Auto - Asia Auto 哈萨克斯坦 Undisclosed private investors 修理与维护 (811) 　 　 100 Kazakhstan’s largest automobile holding Bipek Auto - Asia Auto, via daughter company Asia Auto Ust-Kamenogorsk, has obtained antitrust approval to acquire Russian automotive repair services company ATO, according to a statement of the Federal Antimonopoly Service. The amount of the deal was not disclosed. The current shareholders of ATO are several private investors, Kommersant daily reported, citing data of Kartoteka.ru company database. In March 2015, Bipek Auto - Asia Auto bought majority stakes in four Siberian dealerships of Russian motor vehicles producer Avtovaz: Novosibirsk-Lada and Omsk-Lada (93.85% each), Altai-Lada (81.05%) and Kuzbass-Lada (77.68%), Kommersant daily reported. OAO ATO deals with technical maintenance and repair of automotive vehicles. Bipek Auto - Asia Auto is the general partner of Avtovaz in Kazakhtsan. The group owns 54% of the car retail market in the country and 85% of the passenger car production. The holding unites car assembly plant Asia Auto in Ust-Kamenogorsk, construction and logistics units, service and retail chain for brands such as LADA, SKODA, Chevrolet, KIA, UAZ, Renault, machinery KAMAZ, AMKODOR, AVANT, equipment for outdoor activities.
110065 17/08/2015 匈牙利 Infopark E office building 收购 Diofa Alapkezelo Zrt 匈牙利 Bluehouse Capital 房地产 (531) 　 　 100 A Hungarian open-ended retail fund managed by Diofa Alapkezelo has purchased the office building Inforpark E from Greek investment company Bluehouse Capital, real estate advisor Colliers International said. The deal value was not disclosed, however Colliers said that it was the largest real estate transaction so far in 2015. Bluehouse originally bought the property in October 2012. Inforpark E is situated in the 11th district of Budapest. It offers 17,000 m2 of office space and is currently fully rented. Inforpark E is the first building in Hungary that has achieved a LEED Silver certification. Founded in 2009, Diofa Alapkezelo Zrt is an asset management company, which has been part of the Hungarian banking group FHB Bank since 2013. For 2014, Diofa Alapkezelo reported individual total assets under management of HUF 511.2mn (USD 1.83mn). Bluehouse Capital, founded in 2004, is a private equity real estate investment management firm focused on Emerging Europe. The company is managing capital across three funds, investing on behalf of a high-quality institutional investor base, including financial institutions, pension funds, endowments, multimanager funds and family offices. Bluehouse manages over 26 properties in Bulgaria, the Czech Republic, Croatia, Greece, Romania and Serbia. Colliers International represented Bluehouse Capital in the transaction.
　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 　 总计: 46,447.53
